1b1(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/ myur bangul pra be sha mA hA swA
1b2(rgyud): skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong
1b3(rgyud): gas pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i ma/
1b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag 'tshal
2a1(rgyud): #// lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2a2(rgyud): 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan
2a3(rgyud): 'dus kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yengs
2a4(rgyud): pa'i grong khyer ga la bar 'dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bigyi'o zhes gsel nas// tshe dang
2b1(rgyud): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de na su bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir rgyu zhing
2b2(rgyud): gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal ni bzhugs
2b3(rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs
2b4(rgyud): pa'i grong khyer du song la phyi nas sgo'i them pa la rkeng pa zhig ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshig
2b5(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la
3a1(rgyud): thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa rang sangs rgyas thams
3a2(rgyud): cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa nyan thos thams
3a3(rgyud): cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa chos kyis bsams pa tshangs pas bsams
3a4(rgyud): pa tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa lha sa bsams pa/
3a5(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa
3a6(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse
3b1(rgyud): bcan gyis bka' stsal to// mAny+dzu ta/ muny+tsa tA/ ma 'dug cig/ yams kyis nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirkats+tsha ta/ nirga ts+tsha ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha
3b2(rgyud): chen po/ lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag
3b3(rgyud): po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong bcom ldan
3b4(rgyud): 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis nirkats+tsha ta gzhin te/
3b5(rgyud): ninats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar
3b6(rgyud): 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la'ang 'jug par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu su mu su mu ru su mu ru kasu mu ru/
3b7(rgyud): su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ ri mi/ r-i mi/ ri mi r-i ma/ ri mi
4a1(rgyud): rim/ rim/ rim/ rimi/ mU ru rimi/ nu ru rim-i/ su ru ri mi/ mu ru mu ru rimi/ mu ru rimi/ mu ru ri mi/ mU ru ri mi/ mU ru ri si
4a2(rgyud): rI su pa/ mA ru / pu rU ti/ rir ra ro re ri/ rI rI du/ ti ma ra/ mi'i ma ma mi mi/ sau ri ti/ ha so mi ti/ r-I r-i ti/ mi ti/ sis
4a3(rgyud): sin+ni kaM ka ra/ kaM ka rA/ ka ka ra/ kaM ka ra tsA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kAM kA rA/ kAM kaR+Sha/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM kA rA/ kaM ka R+Sha/ kaM ka rA/ kAM ka rA/ kaM ka
4a4(rgyud): kaM ka rA/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM ka rI/ kaM ka rot+no ti/ ku ri sho ka ka rA/ kaM ka ri she/ kaM ka ri she/ re rir 9/ ti re te phu s+thA/ ri pu ri pu ri phu ri phu/ ri pu ri phu/ ri pu ri phu/ nAthA
4a5(rgyud): nanu thAH/ ri ru rI dz+ra/ nA d+haH/ nin d+ha te/ ri pra ri bu/ nin d+ha te/ pA la yata/ ri pu ri phu/ pa la sa ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs pa rtse btsun/ sems can thams cad la pa
4a6(rgyud): par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas par gshegs kyis/ k+Shi pran ni ra gats+tsha ta swAH
4a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni
4b1(rgyud): grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs ni gnod pa mi mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams//
4b2(rgyud): thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// grang gis
4b3(rgyud): bde ba mnga' mdzad do// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bsgyings te// khyed la bde leg
4b4(rgyud): mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum
4b5(rgyud): gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /
4b6(rgyud): don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' de//
4b7(rgyud): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ byang chub snying por gshegs pa na// sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cig/ bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi
5a1(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de// khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed//
5a2(rgyud): thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang /
5a3(rgyud): 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring
5a4(rgyud): grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs
5a5(rgyud): mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing // khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs
5a6(rgyud): mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan
5a7(rgyud): byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang
5b1(rgyud): rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par mgyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lpags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag na gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang /
5b2(rgyud): spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la dang /
5b3(rgyud): ba gaganas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// bis rat+na/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa r+ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsa
5b4(rgyud): to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams
5b5(rgyud): pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos
5b6(rgyud): bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa khi sa ra ta/
5b7(rgyud): bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ bi sar ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ ninats+tsha ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ninats+tsha ta
6a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas lnga chen po/ lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang /
6a2(rgyud): skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams sam/ lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
6a3(rgyud): dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po khyer par 'gyur gyis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirbats+tsha ta/ ninats+tsha ta/ nin ts+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig/ khyed
6a4(rgyud): cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la/ srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la'ang 'jug par gyis
6a5(rgyud): shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ su ru/ mu ru/
6a6(rgyud): mu ru/ u ru/ su ru/ swarba/ muru/ suR+Ya/ mi ri/ mi ri/ si ri/ mi r-i/ mir/ mi ri/ mo re/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru sa~M ri/ mu ru mi / mu ru ma ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru me ri/ mu ru mi ri/ su ru mor/ mU ru mi ra/ mu ru mi ra~M/
6a7(rgyud): mu ru si ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu nu rI ti/ r-i r-i ri ri/ rI rI rI ni/ di ni di/ mir mi ri/ mi mi ri/ mi ri mo ri/ ha si mo rI ti/ mi si si mI/ kaM ka ra/ ke ka ra/ kaM ka ra/ ka ka tsa/ kaM ka tsa/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kar/
6b1(rgyud): kr-i karA/ ka kaR+Sha/ kaM kA rA/ kAkArA/ kr-i kan/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kr-i ka rA/ kaM kaR+Sha/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka ra/ kAM kan+ta/ kaM ka ro/ trI ti ku ri sh+lo ka ka rA/ kaM ka ri shi/ ri ri ri ri/ ri ri ti/ ri phus+t+ra/ ri thA/
6b2(rgyud): ri phu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ ri phu/ nI nA tha/ nAnAH/ ri phu ri phu/ nA nA tha/ ninats+tsha ta/ ri pu ri phu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa la ya ta/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ serba/
6b3(rgyud): can thams cad la phan par lhags par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis/ k+Shi phran nir gats+tsha ta swAhA/ sangs rgyas/
6b4(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang chos nyid kyis/ lha thams cad dang 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa//
6b5(rgyud): rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/
6b6(rgyud): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi// thugs/
6b7(rgyud): kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de// khyed la bde leg mdzas/
7a1(rgyud): #pa can// gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa// phun sum
7a2(rgyud): tshogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni// nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' de/
7a3(rgyud): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gang zhig gi/ sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na// 'phags
7a4(rgyud): pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed// thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing // tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des
7a5(rgyud): khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad// brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang // 'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni// khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu
7a6(rgyud): dag dang // lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog/ khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog
7a7(rgyud): phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs shog/ nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing // khyed cag rtag tu bde legs shog/ khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag
7b1(rgyud): gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis//
7b2(rgyud): 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni gtong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang srog chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun// bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun
7b3(rgyud): gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lcags gyur te// sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos
7b4(rgyud): kyang spyod gyur cig/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pa su ren+d+ra be d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
7b5(rgyud): la babe pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsau ri bi d+ha na sA nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas pa
7b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la drug 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis rjes pa dus gcigan// bcom ldan 'das zhapas 'bring bco dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thas cig tu lus 'dags ri la gshegs pa'i ni/ da
7b7(rgyud): dag padan dpa ba mnad pa la mnos kyang banas mthang // mthongs kyang ma zhig spabang shes byed dpa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di ga kyisashesas to// bcom ldan das sa nod dag cigag 'de ba gsheg ni
8a1(rgyud): nod dag kyig go/ com ldan das kyis bka' stsas pa/ su dga' pa stod pa rgod nams kyis 'jigs sas/ gsol pa/ bcos ldan 'das 'jigs sugs so// 'de bar/
8a2(rgyud): gshegs pa 'jigs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu gzhom pa
8a3(rgyud): 'di bka' stsa la to// tad+yathA/ a nu le me pra ti lo me/ a nu lo ma pra ti lo ma/ a ti ke/ pra ti ke/ paM ke/ a ti paM ke/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ paN+Da li/ ma taM gi puka si/ ri mi ri mi
8a4(rgyud): rid+d+hid+ham tse bat+ti tsaur pra dan+tu/ bis+tha han+d+ha/ b+ha man+t+ri/ mA mi yun+tu/ ya bad dgran thi na muny+tsa mi swAhA/ kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu srung ba dang / mi rgod thams cad dang / ri sul gyi
8a5(rgyud): grong khyer gyi mi thams cad dang / gseb la me srung ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so// rmugs par byas so// rengs par byas so// ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor
8a6(rgyud): lo bskor ba 'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar/ mi rgod rnams 'dar bar gyur cig/ rengs par gyur cig/ mgo rmongs par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
8a7(rgyud): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// cho ga ni shing kun dang / bong bu'i spu bregs te/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la lan/
8b1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na gos kyi tha ma la mdud pa bor te bde bar phyin na dgrol bar bya'o// 'di ni grub pa'o// 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
8b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra saM grA sa d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang
8b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /
8b4(rgyud): 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'gro ba'i
8b5(rgyud): rims gzhan yang ba dang / mdze'i nad dang / gsor mi rung ba'i nad yang ba dang / g.yang la ltung ba dang gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang /
8b6(rgyud): de sbyar ba shis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par ni 'gyur ro// bya na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la nis dang rnam ma'a' la gnas pa'i
8b7(rgyud): bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang klags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang
9a1(rgyud): nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang shing dag ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha ta/
9a2(rgyud): ba la hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nAM an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o// nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngaH
9a3(rgyud): rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
9a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
9a5(rgyud): bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba'
9a6(rgyud): zhig dang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pastan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
9a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za ma rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams nad dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / dus ma
9b1(rgyud): yin pa'i 'chi ba dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / ser ba dang / sa g.yos pa la sogs pa byung ste/ de dag zhi bar mdzad gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom
9b2(rgyud): ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sku'i ba spu'i lung bu nas 'od zer me lce rab tu 'bar ba byung ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa
9b3(rgyud): la thug pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to// de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham me dang / lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin te/ lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham me dang / lhan ne dang / lhang nge ma yin
9b4(rgyud): no// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang sha za la sogs pa rnams ni rlung drag pos bdas pa'i shing bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhas
9b5(rgyud): ste mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ba shig nas zhabs kyi pus mo la brdabs pas thugs kyi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag byung ste/ thabs las byung ba'i khro bo'i sprul pa dpag tu
9b6(rgyud): med pa dang bcas nas rnam sa 'a'as lus pa'od kyis 'gengs pa'o// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpan zugs pa tshangs pa dang / khyab 'drug dang / dbang phyug rten po dang / drag po chen po bzhi po dge sa tu
9b7(rgyud): zhes bya bas skrag par byed pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gnyi sus dang / ser sna dag 'joms pa/ klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / shaM ba yi dgas la sogs pa nyi maM zhes brjod pas/
10a1(rgyud): skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to// gsung gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phyed sa la pus so dang mthe bong btsugs pa// zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs/
10a2(rgyud): pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can/ shes rab kyi bdag nyid ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi
10a3(rgyud): sngags spras pa/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA dzAM/ a tsa la kan na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha/ s+pho Ta ya hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i ka khan hUM maM hUM maM/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ srin lag dang mthe'u
10a4(rgyud): chung gnyis bsgrengs pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas skor du mtshams gcad do// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la kan na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hUM/ a mr-i ta hUM hUM/ zhes brjod do// phyag
10a5(rgyud): rgya ni lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ g.yas nas bskor la bgegs bskrad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba
10a6(rgyud): bsrungs pa ni dmar po'i yi ge raM spyi bor bsams te/ rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'dis brtan par byas nas rdo rje dang ral gris lus me 'od dang bcas par sgom ste/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA roSha
10a7(rgyud): Na ka te b+h+yaHsarba bi ga ti b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ta hAM maM rak+Sha/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar smin mtshams su bca' bar bya'o// de nas bcom
10b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen po'i srung ba bsrungs pa ni hUM dang bzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra d+hA/ a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+ha sarba bi ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu ShAH/
10b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta dz+dza me/ rak+Sha ma hA ba le sarba ta thAg ta pra mi ni na rdza hUM hUM phaT Ta tha T+Ta thA/ u pra ti ha te swAH/ zhes brjod de/ phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i zil mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la gung mo rtse sprad de/
10b3(rgyud): srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung shig bkug la snying khar bcas te srung ba ni yum gyi ste/ bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'byer bab tshung/ de nas bcom
10b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ kha zas kyi bye brag bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / gzhib pa dang / btung ba dang / bldag pa la sogs pa dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang
10b5(rgyud): dri dang / ro'i bye brag la byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad de/ oM sarba d+harmatrA si ta hU~M/ zhes byas pas dag par byas te/ oM a mr-i ta oM hUM hrIHzhes bya bas ni 'dod pa'i don du'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a
10b6(rgyud): la lo ki te sastA ra saM b+hA ra hUM/ zhes bya bas lan bdun bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ldang bar 'dod na
10b7(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ da~MSh+Thi ta ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li kha kha khA hi khA hi/
11a1(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na han/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ gardza gardza bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+na bi nA sa ga na ma sa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra Na swA hA/ zhes bya ba brjod do// lag pa
11a2(rgyud): gnyis du tshur bcangs la kha nang du bstan te mdzub mo bsgreng la brang du bsnol la phyag rgya bcings te/ gtor ma gtang shing 'chag pa'i dus su'ang de bzhin no// nye reg bya ba dang khrus bya ba ni rin po che'i bum par
11a3(rgyud): dri zhim po'i chu la/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM/ a tsa la ka na ya a mr-i ta/ zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste/ lag pa g.yon pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la
11a4(rgyud): ri mo can gyi nang du a bsams la chu blugs te/ oM shud+d+ha dun+te sho d+ha nA ye swA hA/ zhes bya bas khrus bya'o// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la'o//
11a5(rgyud): de nas rgyal po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / suM cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang / rnga dang / bdug spos dang /
11a6(rgyud): lha'i zhal zas dang / lha'i bu pho dang bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta pag tu med pa dang / mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu med bdag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang skor ba rgya chen po dag
11a7(rgyud): byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa
11b1(rgyud): mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par gzhag ste/ 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtog pa tsam mo// de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtse gcig pa'i rtog dpyod/
11b2(rgyud): spangs te dga' bde tsam so// bsam gtan gnyis pa nas gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te bde btsas mo// de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag/
11b3(rgyud): ste/ tshor ba nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba tsam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ting nge 'dzin de dag dang ldan na rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
11b4(rgyud): kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra dz+nyA/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod de
11b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'di'o// lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis sgreng ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//
11b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te/ snying khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bon 'od kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/
11b7(rgyud): sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro bsdu dang bcas pa'o// de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'das nas skyes pa'i dri ma med/
12a1(rgyud): cing yongs su rgyas par tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba/ 'das skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du nam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyi sa don dang bdag nyid
12a2(rgyud): gcig pa'o// nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyad par 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur te/ de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po// rnam rtog thams cad yongs su
12a3(rgyud): bcom pa/ dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o// de'ang gzhon zhing sku'i sha rgyas pa ni/ dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste/ de'i sku mdog ni mthing nag tu gnas te/ dper na dbyar gyi char sprin nag
12a4(rgyud): po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o// nam mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni/ dper na rta bdun pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no// dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni/ dper na shing
12a5(rgyud): a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin no// sku cung zhig 'gying ba dang g.yo ba ni/ dper na dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'dus brtol bzhin no// zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa ni/ dper na gyad kyi 'gros bzhin no//
12a6(rgyud): spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ni/ dper na pa la sha'i me tog bzhin no// spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni steng 'og gi bgegs sreg pa ste/ dper na lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no// mche ba gtsigs pa ni
12a7(rgyud): dper na zla ba phyed pa bzhin no// ljags shin tu 'khyug pa ni/ dper na nam mkha'i glog bzhin no// smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni/ dper na shing 'brig sha'i lo ma bzhin no// phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams
12b1(rgyud): pa ni/ dper na gza' chen po'i 'od ltung ba bzhin no// sbrul gyi zhag pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni/ dper na rgya mtsho'i mching bzhin no// de lta bu'i sku des ni tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen
12b2(rgyud): po bzhi po dag dang / phyogs skyongs pa la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdud pa/ lha dang / klu ma rungs pa dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa 'joms par byed
12b3(rgyud): pa dag go// de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ nu maHsa main+ta badz+rA NA~M traT/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro ShASha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ma ya tra ma ya hUM/ tra ta tsa maM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// de'i ni 'che ba dang /
12b4(rgyud): rnam par 'tshe ba dang / sdang ba dang / rnam par sdang ba dang / log 'dren dang / rnam par log 'dren dang / srin po dang / lha dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar
12b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / rims nyin
12b6(rgyud): gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / yud tsam pa'i rims dang / rtag pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro// seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang /
12b7(rgyud): srung gi dang / sbrul dug can dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / bung ba'i gnod pa las thar ro// rgyal po'i chad pa dang / dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro// rkun po dang / bran dang / gza'
13a1(rgyud): mi 'thab cing rtsod pa las thar ro// chu yis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa las thar ro// ral gri
13a2(rgyud): dang / shak+ti dang / dgra sta dang / mdung dang / mda' dang / mda' bo che dang / 'khor lo dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las thar ro// 'chi ba dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro// mtshams
13a3(rgyud): med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun dag par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yul mtha' 'khob dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / lha tshe ring po dang /
13a4(rgyud): log par lta bar 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba las mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ lan cig brjod pas kyang
13a5(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro// 'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni chos nyid kyi lam rdo rje lta bu myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od
13a6(rgyud): kyis 'gengs pa bsams te/ byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir haM ser po mig tu'o// srog gi lam du ni maM nag po bsam par bya'o// spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge bsams te sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//
13a7(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta badz+ra pA Ni tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na hUM/ zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te/ gung mo bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung zad bkug la/ srin lag kyang de bzhin du byas te rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// 'di'i byin gyis rlabs
13b1(rgyud): kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag nas dang / 'bras dang / gro dang / so ba dang / til la sogs pa dang / zho dang 'o ma
13b2(rgyud): dang sbrang rtsi dang / khar dang gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / mu tig dang / bru ru dge blugs te/ 'bru gsum pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta
13b3(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yoH/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA laM ud ga te/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga gan kha~M/ zhes brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ki te/ oM sa~M b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ zhes bya bas
13b4(rgyud): 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o// de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a sa me tri sa me mahA sa ma ya/ sarba pA paM swA hA/ phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la gsol ba gdab
13b5(rgyud): ste dam tshig gso ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas dam tshig ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun ni 'bras bu dang /
13b6(rgyud): las dang / sgrub pa'i khyad par te/ gang nas brtsams te khyad par gyis mchod cing nam du'ang mi 'bral bar bya'o// tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu sgrom zhing smon lam rgya chen por gdab par bya'o// sngags dang /
13b7(rgyud): bya cu dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i rten rgyun du bcang shing 'bral bar mi bya'o// lha dang / bram dang / byang chub kyi thogs la 'ong nas 'jug pa'i sems spang ngo // srog gis btab pa'i sems can thams cad la byas
14a1(rgyud): pa dang snying rje sngon du song bas/ gnod pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba spangs te nas yang dor byar mi bya'o// ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// sems can la gnod pa dang rnam par
14a2(rgyud): 'tshe ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims brten pa'o// rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod par bya'o// rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o// rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag
14a3(rgyud): go nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don la ma yengs par bya'o// dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya la sogs pa
14a4(rgyud): kun bstan cing bshad par mi bya'o// srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la phyin ci log pa dang / rdzun du smra ba ni tshangs par spyod pa dang spyad par 'dod pas spang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams/
14a5(rgyud): dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / dam tshig dang ldan pa la gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o// thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o// khro bo dang / bab col du smra ba dang / lad lud dang / bshang
14a6(rgyud): gci 'dor ba dang / dri ma 'khru ba dang / skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang / dri nga ba dang / dri mo zhim pa dku zhing mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa
14a7(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dag bkra shis pa'i sgo shar du bstan pa/ gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa 'am/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ lha khang ngam/ ri bo'i rtse 'am/
14b1(rgyud): bya skad sgrog pa'i sa 'am/ dgon pa 'am/ bas mtha' 'am/ spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus sbyang nul byas la/ rtswa'i stan bting ste gnas par bya'o// khril 'dug pa spang bar bya'o// zho dang /
14b2(rgyud): 'o ma dang / mar dang / la du dang / la ban dang / snum 'khur dang / 'khur skya dang / 'bras dang / 'bras zan la sogs pa dag bsang ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o// sha dang / chang dang /
14b3(rgyud): sgog pa la sogs pa dgu pa'i zas rnam kun tu spang bar bya'o// zla ba dang / skar ma dang / chos grangs la sogs pa ni yar gyi ngo dag la dkon mchog la gsol ba btab la bsgrub par bya'o// re ba dang /
14b4(rgyud): rnga ma dang / rtsub pa dag ni ma yin no// 'dod pa'i don 'jam zhing gnag pa la ni 'gal ba med do// dus rtag tu yi dam la dang ba bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o//
14b5(rgyud): sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can ni kha dog shin tu gnag pa ste/ nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// rdo rje chags chen ni mdog dmar po// chags pa dang chags
14b6(rgyud): par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o// rdo rje rnon po ni ljang zhu ste/ 'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje 'bar ba ni mdog dmar po ste/ mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms
14b7(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i bras 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje khro bo ni ser po ste/ khro ba dang khro ba'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o// rdo rje gtum chen ni mdog ldang nag ste/ btang snyoms dang btang
15a1(rgyud): snyoms su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje thabs bdag ni du ba'i mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdza rnga bsnams pa'o// rdo rje stobs chen
15a2(rgyud): nimathing kha ste/ dman pa dang dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje chu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/ rten 'brel dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin
15a3(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs 'phrin las kyi mdog can mtha' drang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o// de dag ni sa bcu'i bdag nyid can me 'bar ba'i sku las/
15a4(rgyud): rab tu 'phro ba'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong du de dag
15a5(rgyud): pa'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i skyang nul byas la/ me tog sngon po dgram par bya'o// de nas
15a6(rgyud): bum pa gser ram dngul lam/ zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi tshad du byas te/ der rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / byu ru dang / mu tig dang / rnam pa lnga
15a7(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang / bu ras dang / kha ra dang / ko dang / 'o ma dang / mar rnams gzhug par bya'o// nas dang / 'bras dang / so ba dang / til dang / gro dang / cu rtse rnams gzhug par bya'o//
15b1(rgyud): cu gang dang / gur kum dang / dzA ti dang / sug spe la dang / ka ko la dang / li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / kla rtsi dang / rgya spos dang / ga pur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang
15b2(rgyud): gzhug par bya'o// mtsho dang / rdzing dang / lteng ka dang / 'bab chu dang / lu ma bkod ma rnams kyi chu'ang blugs la/ ba la 'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o// dri dang / me tog/
15b3(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te/ dri dang / spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / lha bshos dang / rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bshas par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad pa'i
15b4(rgyud): gtor ma'ang cha bdun nam lnga la sogs par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ big+h+nAM s+pho Ta ya/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika khan+ta hUM/ zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcing bar bya'o// de bzhin du srung ba'i
15b5(rgyud): cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/ bum pa la bzungs kyi thag pa btags nas rnam par dag pa'i ye shes yongs su bsgyur ba'i bum pa la b+h+rUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang tshad dang ldan pa'i bum pa'o// thugs kyi sa
15b6(rgyud): bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das don de kho nyid las mnyam par bzhug pa/ byang chu sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa gdan seng ge'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan bcwa
15b7(rgyud): da zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o// chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya'o// chos nyid dang / sems dang / sems kyi rnam pa dang / sgra dang / sgra brnyan dang / gzugs dang /
16a1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag glang sna'i steng du bsam ste thugs ka'i sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas nam mkha' kun khebs
16a2(rgyud): pa'o// de las bdud tshar gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur bsams te/ mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM AHhUM/ pra ba ra sata kA ra pra tIts+tsha hUM/ zhes
16a3(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM / sarba de ba tA a tsin t+ya a sr-i ta d+ha ra ya swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ oM ha ra b+ha ga bAn/ sarba bi d+hA d+hA ra pU dzi ti swA hA
16a4(rgyud): zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga te d+hU pe hUM swA hA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA mai tri b+h+yo ga te puSh+pa hUM/ zhes brjod par bya'o//
16a5(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta a tsi prA Na a b+hA ba ga ga ni b+h+ya ni b+h+yA nir+ya A lo ka hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM AHhUM/ ga ga na sa ma ya gan+d+he hUM swA hA/ zhes
16a6(rgyud): brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a ha ra sarba ta thA ga te nai wi t+yai pU dza na s+pha ra Na ye hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a ba~M s+pho ra ye/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM/ d+harma d+hA tuM A kA shA ya/
16a7(rgyud): sa man+ta ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+he maN+Da le/ ma ma pra Ni d+hi pU dza na ma ba lin d+harma d+hA tu/ oM d+hiSh+ThA na pa tsa hUM swAhA/ zhes brjod do// rdo rje dang dril bu gsil bar bya'o// thal mo bkan la mdzub mo gnyis
16b1(rgyud): gung mo'i rgyab tu cung zhig bkug la sbyar/ srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bong cung zhig bkug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug nas gung mo bsgreng ba ni
16b2(rgyud): bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te nang du bcug nas mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// mthe bong dang gung mo'i sor mo rtse sprad de lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa ni mar/
16b3(rgyud): me'i phyag rgya'o// mi 'jigs pa'i phyag lag pa g.yon pas mkhrig ma bteg pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo bkan pa'i zur sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs nas bsgreng ba ni lha bshos kyi phyag rgya'o// spyi bor lag/
16b4(rgyud): pabaskor te thal mo long stong sbyar nas dgrol ba ni rgya chen po'i mchod pa ste mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzas sbyangs pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba mud ga tA nA~M/ na maHpra t+ye ka
16b5(rgyud): bud+d+ha Ar+ya shra ba kA nAM/ na mo bo d+hi satwA nAM/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi ti sha ra nAM/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA hiM khA hi duSh+Ta swA hA/ kA ma kra a saM mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ tsa tur+N+Na dza
16b6(rgyud): rba chu kha~M// gtsa raN/ gar+b+ha la ga ts+tsha ya/ sarbo baT+Te/ g+hA ta bi kr-i tA nA~M/ sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya~M ka ra aT+Te hA sa nin+ti te b+ha g+ha tsardza bas ni/ ku ru kA ru sirba d+harmAdz+dza/ ts+tshin+da/ sarba san+ta/ b+hin+da hrIn+da/ pa ramar+tha
16b7(rgyud): A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ ni ma tha ni rma tha/ sarba duSh+TA na/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye b+hai be sat+ya dzI bi ta na/ ka ra ka ra ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAr+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi laM ba/ sa ma ma
17a1(rgyud): a nu s+pha ra hUM hUM/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba ShaT+TATA ri pU ra ka/ he b+ha ga ban/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ ma ma sarba thaM sA d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM tra ma tra ma haM maM
17a2(rgyud): zhes bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la/ las dang / rnam par smin pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang /
17a3(rgyud): rnam par 'tshe ba dang / nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzlas par bya'o// de nas gtong bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bzhi pa'o//
17a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze 'am/ gtsang sbra dang ldan pa'i khrus byas te/ dkon mchog gsum la
17a5(rgyud): gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o// rigs ngan dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni spang bar bya'o// ras de gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / a ka ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o// de nas sngags
17a6(rgyud): 'di srog 'am ras la bri nas gdags par bya'o// a A i I u U ri rA li lAM e ai o oM aM aHka la ga d+hA nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyAH/ Ta rba DaD+haN/ ta thad d+ha na/ pa pa ba b+ha ma/ ya ral la/ sha Sha sa hak+Sha
17a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o// de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya hU~M/ tra tha haM maM/ oM bA kye na maHzhes bya ba las thams cad 'grub pa ste
17b1(rgyud): gu kum dang / tsan dan dang / kA rdzi'i chu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o// de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par byas te/ bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ni gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / lcags rang
17b2(rgyud): gis bri bar bya ba'am/ yang na dkar rtsi dang / mtshal dang / ldong res dang / ba p+la dang / spang ma dang / mthing shun dang / rgya skyegs dang / rdo sol dang / snag tsha dang / de la sogs pa'i tshon rnams la a ka r+ya dang /
17b3(rgyud): du ruka dang / tsan dan dang / sartsi dang / rgya spos la sogs pa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan bdun brjod de bri bar bya'o// na maHsa sar+b+ba bud+d+hAn+ta/ tsaN+Da madz+dza ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra thA ha mA~M/ dkye hUM/ oM AH
17b4(rgyud): bi ra hUM/ khe tsa ra maM/ zhes brjod la bri bar bya ste/ khyad par bzang po 'dzom pa'i dus su tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o// bri ba'ang de bzhin te/ spyan 'byed pa'i dus su sngags 'di
17b5(rgyud): brjod do// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra thA haM maM/ ga ga na ba rak+Sha Na/ ku ru Na ma ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsak+ShaH/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ zhes sbrang rtsi gser gyi thur ma la byugs la lan gsum
17b6(rgyud): du byug par bya'o// bris sku tshad dang ldan pa yongs su zin pa dang / 'dri ma khan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/ gser ram/ dngul las/ zangs sam/ rwa 'am/ rje ba dag las byed na'ang de bani/
17b7(rgyud): du bya'o// gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang / rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste/ rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongs su bsgyur nas
18a1(rgyud): byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas byed par bang ngo'i dus su lang pa ba'i rnam lngas byug par byas te/ ras ris dang / thang ka dang / po ti dang / glegs pas la sogs pa marnam
18a2(rgyud): steng du bzhugs su gsol to// spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / dri dang / lha bshos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa bshams te/ gtor ma'ang de bzhin du'o// gdugs
18a3(rgyud): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bla re la sogs pa'ang bre bar bya'o// de nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya ste/ namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a mo g+ha e hi/ a pre ti ha ta a tsa la tsa
18a4(rgyud): ta en ta kaH/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ta di tadi/ ta Ta ta Ta/ bidz+dza g+hA ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khA da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa taM tsa ma/ a nu ban+d+ha ya/ a d+h+r-i ku ru/ a d+ha ha d+ha hA naM kra/ kA ta ka tra/ satra
18a5(rgyud): ma ta/ haM haM ma maM/ e te ba la e ha~M ma hA nu ni bi sha na/ nuT+Ta naT+Ta/ a bai sha ya a be sha ya/ a tsa le tse ha/ ta Ta ta Ta/ da ma da ma/ phaT phaT/ tses 'bum brjod par bya ste/ lha'i sku gnyis la ni
18a6(rgyud): bye ba'o// zhi ba ni sprul pa'i sku ste/ sngon du ni de bzhin shes par bya'o// a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / rgya spos kyi chu la/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya
18a7(rgyud): na maHshAkya mun me ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaH/ saM myaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ tad+yathA/ mu ne mu ne ma hA ne/ oM dza ya dza ye/ bAkye she swAh+ma/ oM bAkye baM dza ya/ oM bAkye niSh+Te ye oM bAkye daM nas
18b1(rgyud): oM bkye nam / oM AHhUM ta ma~M/ zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o// de nas rol mo bsgrags par bya'o// rdzas la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ haM maM/ oM A d+ya nuta banan
18b2(rgyud): twAta pra b+ha swa ra su bi shud+d+ha/ d+harmad+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&he/ the bya bar brjod par bya'o// de nas mchod pa dpag tu med pas mchod de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu brjod pa'i gzungs
18b3(rgyud): sdisngags so// namaHs+t+rai ya d+h+wi ka na~M/ sarba ta thA ga tA nA~M tsaN+Da tsaN+DA/ ba la ba la/ ba tra ba tra/ shAn+te shren+te/ ha la ha la/ ba ra ba la/ ma rA Na ma rA Na badz+ra da la s+pho Ta ma li ti ta shi Sha ra/ sa man+ta dz+ra
18b4(rgyud): Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la na mo stu ti/ a mo g+hA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha NaM saM saM ra Na ra Na haM hUM la badz+ra s+pho Ta me swahA/ ni ma~M stai ya d+hI kA naM ta thA ga tA nAM sarba tra a pra ti ha ta bAp+ta d+harma tA ba li nA/ a a sa ma sa man+ta to a nAM ta tra dAp+ti sha
18b5(rgyud): sa ni/ ha ra ha ra/ sme ra s+pha ra Na/ bi ka ta rA ga/ bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ma ba lA/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ ga ga na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/
18b6(rgyud): rnam sa rbA ba d+hi nA / bi ra dze/ ma hA bi ri dze/ ma hA bi ra dze/ swa ra te swa ra te/ tra yi tra yi/ bi d+ha ma ni/ saM b+ha dza ni ram ti sid+d+ha a tr-i traM swAhA/ zhes brjod do// 'do ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
18b7(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams par dag pa'i gzungs te/ lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
19a1(rgyud): dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'dis lha dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya bcings pa rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lA dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya rnams
19a2(rgyud): kyis ltas dang mtshan ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro// srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rjes su brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
19a3(rgyud): dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i khrus 'di la brtson par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ taHthA/ oM i ho shud+d+he shud+d+he maM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/ raM ho a shud+d+he shud+d+he/ a shu maM bi shud+d+he shud+d+he sa ma ya swA hA/ zhes
19a4(rgyud): brjod do// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/ chu la sngags bzlas nas khrus byas na sdig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro// rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang /
19a5(rgyud): mtshan ma ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// rims dang / 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'tshe ba las thar par 'gyur ro//
19a6(rgyud): 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs/
19a7(rgyud): pa tshar gcod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa gsungs pa/ dang po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi nam mkha'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan can yaM las byung ba'o//
19b1(rgyud): chu'i dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar ba'i zlum po bum pa can baM las so// sa'i dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog gru bzhi rdo rje can laM las byung ngo // de'i steng du ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan pa oM las/
19b2(rgyud): byung ba'o// me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po glu gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa las so// de'i nang du brul dog sa tshogs byung ba'i khang bu brtsigs pa/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i rin po che sna lnga las grub pa ni shes
19b3(rgyud): dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / b+hu ru dang in+d+ra nI la dang / gser las grub pa'o// de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i gdan no// shar gyi 'dab ma ni shel las grub pa'o// lho'i 'dab pa ni baiDUR+Ya las
19b4(rgyud): grub pa'o// nub kyi 'dab sa ni bru ru las grub pa'o// byang gi 'dab ma ni in+d+ra nI la'o// mtshams rnams kyang shel dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / byu ru dang / in dra nI la las grub pa'o// dbus su ni tshogs
19b5(rgyud): bdag glang sna'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i 'dam skyes dang nyi ma'i gdan no// shar du brgya byin/ lhor lha chen po/ nub tu khyab 'jug/ byang du thag bzangs ris so// shar lho mtshams su tshangs pa
19b6(rgyud): lho nub mtshams su gzhon nu/ nub byang du dga' byed/ byang shar du kun tu rgyal ba ste/ lha chen po brgyad kyi steng du pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no// yi ge raM las byung ba'i nyi ma dang / maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi
19b7(rgyud): mtshan ma ma dang ldan pa las/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba nam mkha'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i
20a1(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ pu pu zhes bya ba'i
20a2(rgyud): sgra 'don pa'o// shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsam las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba shes rab kyi mdog can
20a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa g.yon pa na klu nor rgyas
20a4(rgyud): bsnams pa phu pu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// lhor bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs yi ge d+he las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma d+he dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi
20a5(rgyud): bdag nyid mi g.yo ba bai DUR+Ya'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na
20a6(rgyud): ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o// phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi ge maM las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma
20a7(rgyud): maM dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba byu ru'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom
20b1(rgyud): ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// byang du bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs yi
20b2(rgyud): ge he las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma he dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi gso ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/ nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/ rin po
20b3(rgyud): tshe'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yon na klu rigs ldan bskams pa/ phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o// shar
20b4(rgyud): lho mtshams su raraM las byung ba'i tri shU lar gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ g.yas kyi dang po na tri shU la g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha' yas kyi bu g.yas
20b5(rgyud): g.yon gyi 'og man rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// lho nub mtshams su ShaM las byung ba'i dbyug tho Sha~M gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i gshin rje gshed po bai DUR+Ya'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang
20b6(rgyud): po na rdo rje'i dbyug to// g.yon gyi dang pon klu dga' bo bsnams so/ g.yas g.yon gyi 'og sa gnyis na thob pur bu bsdams pa'o// / nub byang mtshams su Na las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga Na'i mtshan ma dang ldan
20b7(rgyud): pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i rnamagrin byu ru'i mdog can/ g.yas kyi dang po na kha T+wA~M ga/ g.yon gyi dang po na klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o//
21a1(rgyud): \u0f7f/ byang shang mtshams su hrulas byung ba'i bcon hUM gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i / la gcig phyag pazhi pa'i bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yin nI la'i dogs/ gnas kyi dang pon bcod
21a2(rgyud): g.yon gyi dang don klu stobs kyi chu bskams pa/ g.yas g.yon gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o// shwar lce'i gru tshad la lha mo bdug pa mi mdog mthing la khog por 'dzin pa dang ldan pa
21a3(rgyud): lho rub tu lha mo me tog ma mdog dkar mo me tog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o// nub byang du lha mo mar me ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa'o// byang shar du lha po dri chab ma ljang khu dri sa snabs pa'o// de dag ni gnon nu
21a4(rgyud): yang tshol bab pa mdzes pa'i tshul can hUM las bskyed par bya'o// shar phyogs su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar po lcags kyu bsnams pa ste/ lho phyogs su lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhags pa
21a5(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// nub phyogs su lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogs su lha mo ljang khu dril bu 'dzin pa'o// de dag ni cung zhig khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya'o// chos kyi
21a6(rgyud): dbyings kyi rang bzhin las yongs su gnas par bsgom par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par brjod pa'i gzungs 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT
21a7(rgyud): na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nA~M/ trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nA a kro d+he kA ya mA~M ta ka hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+rA nA badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra nA
21b1(rgyud): traH a oM b+ha a shreta r+b+ha d+hu ya sa / udz+dza/ traT badz+dza/ a tsal co datu phrul nasas su bar+d+ha/ tra rad+ha sa tsa wA la hU~M baT/ rnam la/ Tan
21b2(rgyud): ma pad+ma a tsa la tsal ba Ta/ rnamaHpa sa rbanan/ rlab sa mo T+Ta/ sa a tsa la tan tan d+hU ba nA~M/ ces bya ba gsungs telha dang / lham yin da/ mi 'a ci dang byen pa
21b3(rgyud): dang lha dang / kA dang ma rungs pa dang sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa dman pa'i las rnams 'dag par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u drug pa'o//
21b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// nu maHsa san+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na a tsa la kAn tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ na tan ta/ ba teT
21b5(rgyud): ma ta Ta/ mo Ta ta mo Ta ta/ sha ta sha ta/ Ta ta Ta ta/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo hA/ mo ha sarba pA paM ka re/ ha sa haM sa/ badz+ra ha sa a mo g+ha ku ru ha sa ha sa/ marta marta/ gardza gardza/
21b6(rgyud): ban+d+ha ban+te/ han ha na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha ya a bi sha ya/ ma hA man+t+ra pa la ka/ dun du na/ tin ti ni/ kha da kha da sarba biSh+Ta/ mA ra ya sA ra ya/ sarba duSh+TAn b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba big+h+na/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA bi shwa
21b7(rgyud): sarba bAM pa/ mahA badz+ra/ s+pho Ta la s+pho Ta ya/ hUMHba li ta ra b+han ta ka/ hUM d+hI ma maM he haM na maHsa san+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ mahAtsaN+Da ma dz+ra ro She NA ya/ a mo g+ha e hi/ e pra ti ta ta me hi/ a tsa le tsi ti yanan+ta []
22a1(rgyud): tadi Ti ta/ ta Ta ta Ta/ bid+d+ha g+hA ta ya/ mA ra ya/ khAd yi/ s+pho Ta ya/ sa tsa me/ a nu ban+d+ha/ a drA ku ru ku ru/ a ha sa/ a dan/ kraka ta maT/ maT ma Ta/
22a2(rgyud): a ti pa la i ti ma hA mu N+Dab shin/ nan+danan+na ta/ oM baM sha ya A tsa la tse t+ya/ sarba tra/ a mu re/ katse ta ta Ta ta Ta/ Da e ra ma \u0f7fmAM maMphaT phaHhU~M/ namaHsa man+ta badz+rA/ tA ya
22a3(rgyud): mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM Ta ma ya Ta me ye/ hUM traT haM maM/ oM ba lin+ta te dzo ba liM swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ a tsa la tse ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM.a sa man+ti ka tr-i ta/ ma hA ba
22a4(rgyud): la/ ShaT+Ta ra man+taM/ aM aM/ he haM/ shud+d+ha trai lokya tu sh+yaM tu badz+ra/ a pra ti ha te bi li b+h+yaHna mo dza la ya tra ta/ aT+TA ha sa na maM hAM swA hA/ zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang / lha ma
22a5(rgyud): yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pa thams cad sreg cing sa la 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas cho ga gsungs so// lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral
22a6(rgyud): gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te/ sngags kyi 'phreng ba maM haM zhes bya ba bkod la/ khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyi maN+Dal byas te/ mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri gzhag ste/ gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod
22a7(rgyud): cing bzlas na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur ro// de nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// lcags sna lnga la byas pa'i
22b1(rgyud): lhung bzed byas te/ ma he zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de/ gser dang / dngul dang / zangs las byas pa'i bus par gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dpal be'u dang / me tog dang / 'khor
22b2(rgyud): lo dang / nya dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang / b+hu ru bcug pa 'am/ yang na zangs la b+hu ru bcug la gzungs sngags 'di gro ga 'am ras la bris te/ khong pa 'am mgul du btags nas gsang
22b3(rgyud): sngags bye ba bzlas na lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phags te gsol ba btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/ ljon pa'i shing bzhin no// nam mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang / bug pa'i mig dang gnyis cha mnyam
22b4(rgyud): pa dang / lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khA ta'i khrag gis ril bu bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes bya bas pad+ma la bskor te/ gzungs sngags bye ba
22b5(rgyud): bzlas na pad+ma nam mkha' la 'phags te/ de mi dbugs dang bral ma thag gi snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te/ mig ni snang byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na thams cad mthong zhing
22b6(rgyud): thos la khar bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba le ki te/ dza ya dza ya/ bAkye daM na wa ni tsak+Sha ra bi sho d+ha swAhA/ rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi
22b7(rgyud): tshil bu byugs nas mnyes te lham byas la/ haM dang maM rang gi rkang mthil la bris te/ gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham nam mkha' la 'phags te/ rkang pa yi bya rgod kyi tshol bu byugs nas gon na gar
23a1(rgyud): 'dod par phyin no// na maHsa san bur+d+hanA/ oM dr-i ma hA ye kr-i ta swAH/ shes bya bas nas mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te/ bya nod bzhin du'o// skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang
23a2(rgyud): bya rgod kyi sha dang / rtsangs pa'i sha dang / sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la lde gu byas te/ gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ra mnye ba dang / nye'u shing pa dang bra ma ka ra'i mar dang sbyar ba'i lde
23a3(rgyud): gu rnams nang re la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste/ zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na nam mkha' la thogs pa med do// rta nag po'i mig gnyis dkar po 'am byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar
23a4(rgyud): po 'am/ pha wang dkar po 'am/ mi mngal nas skra dkar po'i srog chags la rma bya'i chu 'khar phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas te blud la de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar bton pa grib ma la
23a5(rgyud): bskams nas ma rul ba'i phye ma la sngags 'di btab ste/ g.yas g.yon ma nor bar byugs na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mon spos dang / gi'u wang
23a6(rgyud): dang stag ma'i shun pa dang / nya mkhris dang / ru rta dang / phug ron gyi mig dang / lce dang / go ro tsa na dang / rtug pa rnams la ril bu byas te/ kham pa'i ga'ur ril bu re re la gzungs sngags haM saM
23a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba brjod do// ga'u nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ na maHya~M na ma hA ri bi ni nat+ta hri/ zhes lan bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bya rgod dang / bya geg dang /
23b1(rgyud): wa dang / stag dang / spung ki dang / wa dang / de rnams kyi mche ba dang / sder mo dang / bram ze'i rus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te bsgrub pa byas nas/ dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang ser ba dag la gtor/
23b2(rgyud): na sprin rnams 'thor zhing ser ba dang / 'brug dang / thog la sogs bzhi par 'gyur ro// gcan gzan thams cad dang / sha za thams cad dang / khyi dang / phag dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / gu gul dang sbyar te dud
23b3(rgyud): papas bdugs na dom kun 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bdun pa'o// / oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po
23b4(rgyud): stelan cig brjod pas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa dang / zla ba byed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / ldang dub pa dang / rtag pa'i
23b5(rgyud): rims dang / yud tsam pa las thar ro// 'brum bu dang / lha gor dang / shu ba dang / me dpal dang / g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gcig brjod pas kyang mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi
23b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// rig byed tshig gi dang po dang // gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni// gsum pa dag gi lnga par ldan// bzhi pa yoni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa dag gi smra ba'o// ut+pa'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang // mthar
23b7(rgyud): gnas pa yi gnyis pa ni// oM gyis mtshan pa bri bya ste// uSh+ma rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang // uSh+ma yi ge bzhi pa la// u yis brgyan cing thig ler bcas pa'o// sde tshan lnga pa/
24a1(rgyud): dag gi ni// dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang // bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni// snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag go// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/ khyinag/
24a2(rgyud): po'i thod pa'i nang du bcug la/ gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te nyungs dkar gyis brab par bya'o// de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsi byugs te chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags
24a3(rgyud): 'di brjod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ na mo b+ha ga ba te bud+d+ha bI rA ya/ tad+ya thA/ phuT phu Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ mi li mi li/ hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams brkyang ste
24a4(rgyud): mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos mnan te bskor bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba na mi mi li tsi la~M d+hi/ ban+d+ha ya/ kro d+ha ya/ badz+ra la ma ya/ ma ka na ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la / pra dz+wa la pra
24a5(rgyud): dz+wa la/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ sarba nA ga ban d+ha ban d+ha/ nA ga ni sa ra sa/ bi sar sarba duSh+Ta hr-i da ya/ sho ShaNahUM hUM phaT phaT+Ta/ phyag rgya ni lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te/ srin lag gnyis rgyab tu
24a6(rgyud): bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs bsgreng la gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis gshibs te spyi bor bzhag nas/ sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o// gu gul dang
24a7(rgyud): yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / dri chen dang / nya'i mkhris pa dang / sgo skya dang / shu dag rnams sbyar te lu so la byugs nas rdzas kyis srung ba'o// rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdugs na ser ba dang
24b1(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams ni bar 'gyur zhing gdo rnams 'bros par 'gyur ro// zho dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / spyang rtsi dang / dbu ram dang / kha dang / 'bras mos dang / dung dang / mtshas dang /
24b2(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i lbu ba la sogs pa dga' bar gzhong du blugs te/ yungs kar la gzungs sngags 'di brjod cing klu mchod par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nas tsuN+Da badz+ra kro d+ha ya hUM hUM/ tad+ya thA/ oM anan+ta ka/
24b3(rgyud): tak+Sha ka/ shaM kha pA la/ bA su ki ma hA pad+ma/ oM ga ta pa la wa ta/ kirko Ta pu swAhA/ zhes brjod pas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// char dbab par 'dod na dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal byas
24b4(rgyud): tenispra tshil la klu'i gzugs ser mo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog ga tor la gzungs thag btegs te gzhag par bya'o// snying khar gong gi de gro gal gi'u wang gis bris la gzhug par
24b5(rgyud): byas/ nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po se'u'i lcug mas byab par byas nas gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o// oM suM su pra ti badz+ra dun te mi li mi li ba ri shwa ya/ ba ri sha ya swAdz+dza/ zhes brjod de rang spyang
24b6(rgyud): bar gnas par bya'o// gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs na klu rnams kyi mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro// spros kyi maN+Dal byas te/ spos kyi me la gzug
24b7(rgyud): bsro zhing gzungs sngags brjod pa ni spobs pa'i cho ga'o// dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang / sbrang rtsi dang / kha ra dang / til la sogs pa'i dkang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par
25a1(rgyud): byas te/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM shAn+tiM ku ru sAhA/ zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u brgyad pa'o//
25a2(rgyud): de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du a las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du muM gyi sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma muM dang ldan pa las 'phags pa
25a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu/ gser btso ma 'am gur kum gyi kha dog 'dra ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa la phyag g.yas pa na
25a4(rgyud): ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba g.yon pas po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'o// shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog khab la gur kum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sems
25a5(rgyud): dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa na ut+pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kan 'dzin pa'o// lho'i pad+ma la 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug
25a6(rgyud): sku mdog mthing kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/ g.yon pa na 'khor lo thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o// nub kyi pad+ma
25a7(rgyud): la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog b+hu ru bcag pa lta bu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag gnyis na ut+pal gnyis bsnams pa'o// byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la
25b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal shes rab ral gri sku mdog ljang khu la zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba g.yon gyi dang po na ut+pa la sdong bu/
25b2(rgyud): dang bcas bkrugs kar 'dzin pa'o// g.yas kyi 'ogs nam da' 'dzin pa g.yon gyi 'ogasan rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o// sku de dag ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i rnam mkha' sa lus pa'i 'od kyis
25b3(rgyud): bgengs pa'i sku'o// oM d+harma d+ha tu bA gI shwa ri muM zhes brjod pas shes rab dang ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i bum pa cu gang dang gur kum dang
25b4(rgyud): a ka ru dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi la sogs pa dri zhim po'i chu blugs te/ na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga te b+h+yaHarbad b+hUHsa s+yag sa bud+d+haHtad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra b+hU tA ya d+hA ra Ni/
25b5(rgyud): bi shra swaM b+ha ba A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya hu lu hu lu bruM bruM br-i hUM hUMdzi na dzaMka many+dzu shri ya/ su shri ye/ ta ra ya maM hau/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT/ a mr-i tod b+ha baHsa ma ya
25b6(rgyud): sam ya/ ud b+ha be/ sarba pA paM mi nA sha ya swA hA/ shes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i chu la lan bdun brjod do khrus byas na sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro// dbang po rno zhing thos pa 'dzin par
25b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+had b+h+yaHsa myag saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya tad+ya thA/ oM many+dzu g+ho Sha ha na ha na pa tsa pa tsa/ ma Ta saT/ mtham tha/ bid+hA sa/
26a1(rgyud): \u0f7f/ sa/ kA ra ka rakatu tra tutra/ b+hany+dza ban+d+ha/ a bi sha ya a bi sha ya/ tu tra tra tra/ tuT tuT/ s+phu Ta sa s+phu Tas/ hr-i da ya sA d+ha ni/ namaHsaM bo d+ha ni/ pra be sha ya/ lau rba ta lo h+yata//
26a2(rgyud): kle te kr-i te/ pra ban+d+ha pra ban+d+ha/ a be sha a be sha ya/ haM maM serba br-in+tu/ hUM hUM phaT phaT+Ta swAhA/ zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi snye mo 'am/ til btab te zhus bya'o// gzungs bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas las dang
26a3(rgyud): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro// ka ra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro// ral gri la btab g.yul du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// spung
26a4(rgyud): ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// gro ga 'am ras la bris te sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa la btags par bya'o// skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste/
26a5(rgyud): mdud pa byas la srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te/ 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// rigs kyi bu'am bu mo dag smyung bas 'dug ste/ yi dam du 'don na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sha za
26a6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / lce 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur/ stag dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang /
26a7(rgyud): rlung dang / ser ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// yid gzhungs shing thos pa 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i sku thams
26b1(rgyud): cad thogs pa med pa'i sman gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan gcigags/ lan gsum mas/ bdun mam+b+ha/ nyi shu na gcig gas/ bcwa cwa brgyad du rjod par byed/ de sum
26b2(rgyud): la mdze dang / po la mig dang / 'bras dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / srog sa'i lha gor na pa dang / mig dang / rna ba'i dang / son pa la sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so// de nas
26b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro dang /
26b4(rgyud): gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i
26b5(rgyud): gnas man chad khyab par mdzad do// bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan dang po las langs te bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhag go// gnyis pa las langs
26b6(rgyud): te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par gzhag go// gsum pa las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par gzhag go// bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam
26b7(rgyud): par gzhag go// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas ci'ang med pa'i skye mched la
27a1(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag go// ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med min skye mched la mnyam par gzhag go// de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag
27a2(rgyud): go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras
27a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga' 'o// lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang dri zer bcas
27a4(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u dgu pa'o// / 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes
27a5(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA shrI mi tra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
27a6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badz+ra kro d+ha rA dzA kalpa la g+hA tan+da nA maM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal
27a7(rgyud): lo// 'di ga bdag gis thos pa dus gcig/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rnam mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa/ g+ha'i
27b1(rgyud): gnal med khang bye ba phrag brgyad rgyal bskor ba'i dbus su dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma shin tu mthob/ kun kyang rin po che du ma'i shrI pad+ma dang seng ges mthob dbu rtse rin po che zur mangs
27b2(rgyud): kyi mchod rten pad+ma/ 'khor lo dang gdugs mtho bar drangs pa la dar gyi sbyangs snying ba/ de'i grib mas gzhi la bkod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i bzhon pa las babs nas nang du
27b3(rgyud): gshegs pa/ sna tshogs dril bu dang / kha dan dang / rin po che'i me tog pa 'phreng ba dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang / rnga yab dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / chu 'byung
27b4(rgyud): shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/ sgo khrung khyams dang / sgo glegs dang / rin po che'i me long dang / gdugs la sogs pa du mas khyab pa// rin po che'i pha gu brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa dum de thams
27b5(rgyud): cad kyi dbus su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de'ang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang /
27b6(rgyud): byams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / zhi ba'i blo gros dang / sna tshogs bkram pa dang / mkha' 'od me tog 'chad pa dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / gzugs mdzes dag pa dang / sa'i snying po
27b7(rgyud): dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal dang / rta thul dang / 'od srungs la sogs pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang / grags chen snyan pa
28a1(rgyud): chen po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / lus ngan dang / gshin rje dang / dga' ra ba dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i rigs sum brgya dang lhan cig tu chos kyi/
28a2(rgyud): rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnam pa dum dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsas pa dang
28a3(rgyud): 'thun pa'i bkod pa chen po bskyed pa dang / cho 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba dang 'od zer du ma 'gyed cing thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ljags kyi dbang /
28a4(rgyud): po bkram ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ yi ge ming tshig dag gi sgos// sngags dbyibs chos su byin brlabs kyis// yi ge sgra tsam phyed dam gcig
28a5(rgyud): mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang // dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshon mas mtshan// sa bcu pha rol phyin bcu dang // dbang bcu don bcu rnam pa bcu// mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos// byams dang thugs
28a6(rgyud): rje chen po dag/ dbyangs gcig gis ni sngags su gyis// sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang // yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang // mthu stobs du ma bskyed pa dang // rtag gnas thob dang don nges thob//
28a7(rgyud): rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed// mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa// bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje bla na med pa gsor// chos su bla na med pa sgrogs// 'khor lo bla na med pa
28b1(rgyud): skor// ral gri blan med pa zung / pad+ma bla na med pa chongs// rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis// dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang // mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar gyis// lha klu gnod sbyin dri
28b2(rgyud): za dang / lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ni// srin po shes brjed byed tshogs// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs 'gyur ba'i// nam 'phrul du ma 'di sbyar cig/ gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag/ lagon rdo rje
28b3(rgyud): mthu bo che// dga' mgu thal mo rab sbyar te// snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to// gser dang rin chen lnga po las// rab mchog ri bor gyur pa las// 'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang // rtags su
28b4(rgyud): yang dag 'dzin pa ltar// rnam pa shes dang phung po bzhi// 'byung ba rnam par dag bsgrubs pas// lha dang phyag rgya 'phrin las su// sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas// btul ba'i ye shes byang chub
28b5(rgyud): rim// khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches// sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can// 'od zer du ma byung nas kyang // gzhi dang snying po me
28b6(rgyud): tog gis/ brgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas tshe// sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos// 'jig rten skyong dang bdud kyi tshogs// ma lus pa rnams brtsal bar gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal 'dar bar gyur/
28b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi// tshogs rnams shin tu skrag par gyur// de tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu nas// khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba// 'od zer rtse
29a1(rgyud): mos drangs nas su// zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags// 'od zer tshogs kyang rab 'dus nas// dpal be'u nyid du thim par gyur// de tshe 'od de'i byin rlabs las// mkha' las
29a2(rgyud): 'di grags par gyur// shAkya'i mgon pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs slad// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs// dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog/ gsang
29a3(rgyud): sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba// thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas// 'jig rten mgon po brnyes par gyur// de nas lag na rdo rje tshogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang // snyim pa me tog bkang byas te// gtor nas phyag
29a4(rgyud): 'tshal bskor ba byas// dang zhing gus pa'i tshul gyis su// pus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba 'debs// mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog/ yon tan rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gtso// mtshan nyid thams cad rab brgyan pa/
