29a5(rgyud): mtshan min spangs pa'i thub pa che/ dri med dge baji ltar lags// gsang sngags tshul du spyod pa cig 'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang // 'jig rten mgon po ji ltar 'gyur/ bdag cag rnams la sngan
29a6(rgyud): rab dang // 'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir// mgon po bcom lda grub pa che// yang dang yang du bshad du gsol// de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bos bka' stsal pa/
29a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin// shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan phan don la brtson phyir// legs par nyon la yid lazung / yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul// de ni nga yis
29b1(rgyud): bshad pa sa/ thon gcod masbyin na basmra 'dri tshibacu ba dade dang ngag pas sa// ngan ba sems gnod sems logs cad/ dra ngon pa'i bas gos dang / thog na gzug so/
29b2(rgyud): 'byor bas// slob dpon ge dun mchod rten sogs// khyad par yul can yo byad dang / dman zhing nam thag drog dgupa// glegs pas 'tshong dang chos kyi zong // g.yang saral gris dug
29b3(rgyud): sogs/ me'o bas ltar mthong spangs nas kyang // rnam par dkar la sogs par bya// yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin rtsol dang // nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang // mchod pa dang ni kha ton dang // de dag sems da/
29b4(rgyud): sgom pa ste// dkar bcu lam la yun rings dang / nub bcus rgyun mi 'chad du 'bad// gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems// shel ltar dri ma med pa'o// mchog 'di spyad pas sdug bsngal tshogs// myung du
29b5(rgyud): gcod pas dge ba'o// chos bdag med dang mnyam nyid dang // rang sems gdod nas dag pa gang // sgyu 'dra 'du byed med pa dang // zag bcas de dang bral ba las// byang chub phyogs mos ma lus pa/
29b6(rgyud): chos nyid bdag med spyod pa ni// chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas// ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba// 'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste// chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so// 'dod pa'i khams
29b7(rgyud): sogs yon tan la// shin tu bde rol spyad pa sprod// sangs rgyas mu stegs can rnams kyi// lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste// bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du// brlabs dkar yangs zab rgya chen rnams//
30a1(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du// lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa// dbyer med tshul du skyob pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis sngags su brjod// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku/
30a2(rgyud): yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa ni// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon// la lar 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs// la lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs// la lar/
30a3(rgyud): srin po srin mo'i gzugs// la lar 'gro ba bzang po'i gzugs// chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang // seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad la sogs// sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni// rkang gnyis lha min rnam gnyis
30a4(rgyud): sogs// 'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o// rtag dang 'dra dang nges med pa'i// gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams// 'jig rten phal pa'i mgon po ste// gzugs byed kha dog tha dad pa// yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag
30a5(rgyud): gis// grangs ma byung ba mchod 'os so// thub pas gsung ba'i de ma thag/ rdo rje can gyis bzhengs nas kyang / phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol/ 'dren pa gtso'o/
30a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// sngags zhes pa ni gang gang yin// phyag rgya zhes ni ji lta bu/ ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar bshad lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas// dbyer med tshul du ji
30a7(rgyud): ltar skyob// bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang // gzhan la brtse phyir bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkras byas te// tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis// rnam rtog zad phyir
30b1(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// snying po nyi snying rtsa ba'i sngags// las kyi sngags su gyur pa ste/ snying po brjod dang sa bon no// nye snying ye shes mchog dang ni// gsang ba'i snying po zhes grags so// las kyi sngags
30b2(rgyud): ni gnyis yin te// bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang // sbyor tshogs grub par byed pa'o// phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang // rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o// rtags su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang /
30b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba med par byed pas na// phyag rgya zhes su bshad pa'o// rang gi rtse gcig sems bsdus no// sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa// de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya// de ltar de dag la rten nas/
30b4(rgyud): snga ma'i gnas de yongs gyur nas// sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab bzang ltar// lus 'di mkha' la chere song nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du// rgyal ba dam chos mnyan nas kyang // rgyal sras kun la
30b5(rgyud): bshad pa dang // skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas kyang // shes bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa// lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o// sems dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe// ye shes bde bar shar ba ni// dus gsum sang
30b6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis// dbyer med tshul du skyob ces gsungs// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// lhag par gnas pa'i don yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
30b7(rgyud): zhi bas btul dka' bgegs chen dang // log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas// de dang gzugs 'dral gzhom pa'i phyir// rtog med nam mkha'i lam gnas te/
31a1(rgyud): rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul mdzad smra// rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras// mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir// rgyal dang
31a2(rgyud): rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal// tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun// de la rtag tu mchod par byed// rgyal bas byas gzo rgyal sras kyi// smon rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// ye shes rdzogs nas mi
31a3(rgyud): g.yo'i sa// thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya// phas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste// tshar gcod pa ni khro bo yin// sngags kyi bden tshig mi slu bas// nyan thos bdud tshogs kyis mi g.yo// rtog med bdud rtsi
31a4(rgyud): khro bas rgyal// rdzu 'phrul skyod med mi g.yo ba// de bzhin nyid kyi snying po mchog/ stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku// chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas// sprul 'dis srid pa'i khams skyong mdzad/
31a5(rgyud): mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung // spros med nam mkha'i rang bzhin la// tha snyad tsam du gsang sngags zhes// brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das// skyob pas
31a6(rgyud): tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs// sems med rang bzhin stong pa nyid// sgyu 'drar yid kyis sgom pa yin// dngos med mnyam mdzes 'dod don rnams// gsang sngags mgon 'dis brjod pas stsol// mu stegs bdag dang
31a7(rgyud): sogs gang zag/ gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas pas// 'khor ba rtag rtog nga rgyal rmongs// log pa'i zhags bcings sdug bsngal skyed// bdag med srog med sems can med// byed po med cing gtso bo med// khyab gnas
31b1(rgyud): med cing dngos po med// rdzas la sogs pa'i rang bzhin med// log rtog srid 'ching zhags gcad phyir// dngos med sna tshogs gzugs bsgoms pas// dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang 'thog / phyi nang khyang bar/
31b2(rgyud): goms pa'o// khru bcu bur sgyu 'drar sgom// stong nyid las ldang ting 'dzin gyis// rnam rtog sdig bcings las grol nas/ 'chi med ye shes glo 'phang thob// phung po khams dang skye mched med// kun
31b3(rgyud): gzhi med de gang zag med// gzungs 'dzin med de bcings med pa// rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad// kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i// stong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar// bag yod pas
31b4(rgyud): ni rtag bsgoms na// byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che// mkha' lhur gos pa med pa'i sku// sngags spyod byang chub sems dpa' yi// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa
31b5(rgyud): 'thog/ ngo mtshar gsungs te thos mthag/ khro bo rnams kyis gtsol bskyed// rtag tu dag cing dri med pa// rnam rtog rgyun 'gags kun rtog med// brtag rtog med la zhugs pa yi// dpa' bo chen/
31b6(rgyud): po phyag 'tshal bstod// chos kun g.yo ba med pa khyod// spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas// kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtog/ rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag 'tshal// sems can sna tshogs
31b7(rgyud): phan don du// mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o// dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung // rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// mun pa phra rab dul spangs pa'i// sprin bral nas mkha'
32a1(rgyud): sa da drug zho tog sas 'gyu rjod/ smos pa sa su// du
32a2(rgyud): kyi ched shi ga/ se shes phyag la ston/ ma sa pa shA gatshogs pa // 9 rtsod dag pa'i sems can gakrigs// rga yodan sa dpa lan 'jus// chen po bya
32a3(rgyud): bstod// chos nyid las byung snying po ni// mi ge gtsug pa gzi brjid ce// sems can sdug bsngal sa gnyis// mun 'phrigs sel la phyag 'tshal bstod// sngags mchog gtso ba'i gsung ba 'dis/
32a4(rgyud): rgyal sras chos 'phel shes rab bskyed// bre med go 'bang myur 'gro gsungs// gtso bi khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos kun nur dang bcas pa yi// las dang skye las rnam par grol// rgyal
32a5(rgyud): brgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs// gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dngos med ye shes me lce yis// 'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs nas// chos dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal/
32a6(rgyud): bla med skul phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i don dathugs chud nas// 'gro la phan phyir cho ga gsungs// gsang sngags log par spyod pa dang / ser sna log par goms pa las// 'dod
32a7(rgyud): pas non pa'i sems rtog gis// sngags pa yi dgas gnas su skye// dang pos mar me me tog dang // zhal zas gtor ma 'phreng ba sogs// mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang // mi yi lus dang kha zas la// 'tshe zhing
32b1(rgyud): byung ba'i 'dugatho / mi mug dang skyed ba to ma/ gnyis pa da sbyi 'dugyugs/ shAthAg chang sa rlom 'i ga / thos pasas sgrub pa'i bar gnod cing / rlud skye sa den logs sred/ gas
32b2(rgyud): 'chang gi gden gzhos byir// sgrub pos 'bad de sngags brjod bya// sngags pathu sbed pa gtor ma dang // sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags pacas dang // mnan pa'i las kyis nags sa kar// thogs pa med par
32b3(rgyud): 'joms par 'gyur// de dag rten byed sgra yin te// de gsal byed paras ris yin// de kun nas dag gas la byed pa// byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni// log rtog 'khor ba'i po chun la// ral gri rnon po'i
32b4(rgyud): sA re ltar// 'phags pa khro ba'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ 'byung bar rab tu bshad par
32b5(rgyud): bya/ na saHsarbas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsarba thAhAM/ snying po dam pa'o// na maHsarba pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thAg te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ TA ta ha sa~M/ snying po'o//
32b6(rgyud): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA hra ta a mo g+ha/ tsaN+Da mahA ro ShaNas+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra sa ma ya hU~M/ Ta Ta haM maM nye ba'i snying po'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga
32b7(rgyud): teb+h+yaHsarba a tsa lAn na rbAnaT+Ta/ moHsoT+Ta/ sar+b+ba sArbA taT+Ta taH/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha A be sha aHmAHma la ka/ d+ha Na d+ha Na/ tirti to Ni/ khA da 'ad/ bin+d+han mA ra sA ra
33a1(rgyud): duSh+TAn pa langs traM/ ku k+Shu ru / ki ri ki ri mad pi dzas badz+ra phaT/ d+hAd+hU ng+ku tri bi la tar gtsutug6a tsal/ te tsa phaT phaT/ a hUM/ as
33a2(rgyud): man+ta ka/ Ta Ta ka ma hA bi la sa ta a man ya/ traM maM haM/ shud+d+ha tra lo ka/ tu Sh+TAn tu loka/ badz+rA na me/ srA pra tiha tA ba le b+h+yo/ dza la ma tra ta/ a sa tan maHsAT+Ta/ gsang ba'i snying po'o//
33a3(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya stang stabs kyis sngags brjod pa 'dir gsungs so// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ha na ha na mA ra ya mA ra ya/ dz+nyA na kha T+wAM ga hUM phaT/ ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngags
33a4(rgyud): so// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ khAd khA da/ pA shan/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ mahA Ar+ya te/ d+harma te swAhA/ zhigs pa'i'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH
33a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ha na ha na/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ mA ra ya duSh+Ta bi na ya kaM hUM dza/ go tshwa'i 'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra na l-i/
33a6(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga pa sha d+ha ra swAhA/ gtsug tor gyi'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+hany+dza ban d+ha ha pa tsa b+hU smi ku ru kA ru ha na ha na badz+ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/ tho ba'i'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri
33a7(rgyud): pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ au Sh+Ta na ta sUrti/ da ha da ha/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi dza ya bi dze ya/ bi dza ya kIrti swA hA/ mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+ya
33b1(rgyud): spya da sarban/ oM b+had+h+ya d+hA / atshan rgyabs bi sam/ shAr bu stsal la/ sa / rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o// nAmaHsazlas pa pU b+h+ya sa nag te
33b2(rgyud): oM badz+ra hr-i da ya/ badz+ra ma taM gi sAt+ma/ sIng la'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarbas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba thA/ oM hU~Md ha da ha/ kiny+tsi rA ya si/ An ya shIk+Sh+mAM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha
33b3(rgyud): duSh+TA na da ma da ma swAhA/ phyogs bcing pa'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM dun du na ma hA pA sha kha T+wAM ga d+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHbke'i rtags kyi'o// na maHsarba sa
33b4(rgyud): pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ga ga na gan d+hod b+hu ba/ ma hA sa ma ya/ pa ri pU ra ke sAd+de/ dri'i phyag rgya'o// na me d+h+yasarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/
33b5(rgyud): oM bi shud d+ha dz+nyA na rA dzi saM b+ha bi ga ga nA nAn hAHswA hA/ ma mo'i phyag rgya'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shud d+ha d+harma tai/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sarba sa pa
33b6(rgyud): ri pU ra kai b+h+yaHswAh+ma/ gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o// na s+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU re ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM shud d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+hA baM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha mahA na ye sAH/ bdug pa'i 'o// na maHsarba sa
33b7(rgyud): pa ri pU ra ka~M b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ga ga na bi krAn ta gA mi ni ma hA shud d+ha na ye swA ma tog na sos pasarbas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ha na ha na/ pa ra ma bi shud d+he
34a1(rgyud): d+ha rmums pa'i dU ke b+h+yaHswAhA/ zhal bas kyi'o// namaHsarmas pa'i bur ge b+h+yaHsarba tan ga te b+h+yaHsarbaT+Ta/ oM a pra tig don na ta ma dang / surba d+hA/ sa pa
34a2(rgyud): pU ra ke b+h+yaHswAhA/ dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o// na maMHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ba~M shud d+ha bi shud d+ha/ sakra swa b+hA be A na ya/ ma hA na ye swAhA/ byang chub
34a3(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ru ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi shud d+ha swA hA/ ha na ha nA/ da ma da ma/ ma hA na ye swA hA/ nyan thos spyan drang ba'i'o// na maHsarba
34a4(rgyud): sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM badz+ra kaR+Sha ya/ shI g+h+raM/ da ha da he/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma hA pa ri wA re srahA/ pho nya pho mo spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA
34a5(rgyud): ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM ma tha ma tha A na ya A na ya/ pr-i be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba de baM/ ta ma ta me/ ma hA na ya/ pa ri wA re swAhA/ 'jig rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'i'o//
34a6(rgyud): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yeHsarba thA/ oM sa t+ya sa t+ya/ mahA sA d+h+ya ye/ da mad ma/ ma hA da ma/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ A d+ya bi ma hA na shud d+he swAhA/ drang srong spyan drang ba'o//
34a7(rgyud): na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ mahA sat+ya ba ti ni/ sarba hi ti swAhA/ srin mo rnams spyan drang ba'o// na maHsarbi sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+ya
34b1(rgyud): sarba talda ka te byangs pad+ha/ oM hri trad/ ma thum tha/ dmangs/ phanas/ mdun sa/ sar ba / bzhan mamornams ldan drang ba'o// nam bcas pa byu b+ha bas rba tan gte b+h+yaHsa rban o /
34b2(rgyud): badz+ra dz+ra paT/ sarba duN+Da graha~M/ mthAs thA/ \u0f7fny+dzab+haSh+Ta/ sarba bi stan dam da ma/ sarba duSh+Than mo hU~M Ta swAhA/ nang stabs tshas ngas gyi sngags so// namaHsarbas pa ri b+hai re khyAHsarba ta thA ka tiHsa rbathA/
34b3(rgyud): AHhUM/ A kA shA ga ge na spar/ khaM swehA/ 'o thug 'bur ba 'bru sna tshogs// spos dang me tog la sogs pa// ci 'byor 'byor pa'i gtor ma ni// sngags des spro zhing spel bar bya// na maHsarbas pa
34b4(rgyud): ri pU ra ke b+h+yar+thasarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM swa b+hA ba sarba thA b+h+yo baM swAhA/ na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM liSh+NI sarba ga ga na lab+hA ya swA hA/ na maHsarba sa pa rI pU ra ka~M b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
34b5(rgyud): sarba thA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi/ dA d+ha mi haM swAhA/ byin rlabs bzhin du bsgyur ba dang // kun gyis thim par bya ba dang // 'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang gang // grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no/
34b6(rgyud): gza' chen brgyad dang rgyu skar yang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags// na maHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba thAHA di d+yaHsauHa~M gi raHbud+d+haHbri ha swa ti/ shu thaHsha ne sh+tsa raH
34b7(rgyud): rAhuHke tuHkr-it+ti kA/ r-i hi NI/ mr-i ga shi rA/ ar+d+ha punarba su/ puSh+ya a shwe ShA/ sar+b+bA purba palgu nI ut+ta ra phalgu nI/ hastA/ tsit+ka sAsti/ bi sha khA a nu rA d+hA dz+yeSh+Ta mu lA/ pUrbA ShA D+ha/ ut+ta rA ShAn+ta
35a1(rgyud): shra baN a b+hi dzi ta/ sha ta b+hiSh+Tha d+ha niSh+Tha/ pUrba b+ha dra pA dA ut+ta ra b+ha dra prA dA raM ba tI/ a shrI nI b+hA ra Ni/ oM dang swA hAr bcas pa ni// rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te// gang 'dod
35a2(rgyud): las kyang sbyar bar bya// mchod pa'i rigs kyang tha dad bya// na maH sa san+ta kA ya bAk+tsi t+ta badz+ra NAM/ oM a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA re Sha Na s+pho TA ya tra ka Sha haM sau ka/ na maHsaman+ta kA ya bAk+tsi tI badz+rA NI/ oM badz+ra ka btsu drug
35a3(rgyud): oMn maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yaHbi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba li/ sarba ta thA ga te pu N+ya ni rdza te/ hUM hUM tra thA/ a pra ti ha te swAhA/ khro bo spyan gcig drag shul can//
35a4(rgyud): srung dang bcas par mchod pa dang // sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub// ci 'dod las la tshe gas sbyar// lag g.yas gung mdzub gzhi bas te brkyang // srin lag mthe'u chung
35a5(rgyud): mtheb mos mnan// shugs drangs tshul phyung mkha' la 'phyar// ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms// g.yon pa khu tshur sdigs mdzub bsgreng // slar sbyar byed ba zhags pa'i rgya/
35a6(rgyud): gung mo mthe'u chung so sor sprad// mdzub mo ming med nang du dgug/ mthe bong ga zhibs pa gung 'gram sbyar// snying kha bkod de go cha'i rgyan// sor 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam// mtheb
35a7(rgyud): gnyis cung bsgyur mgo thod bya// g.yon pa'i khu tshur mthe bong ni// g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas// mthe bong g.yas bsgreng tho ba'i rgya// phyogs bcur brdung ba ltar bya'o// g.yas
35b1(rgyud): bas cung dkrung po bsred// spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tugasu g.yon pa sa tsung krung mdzub basbeng / bka' rtags phyag tu rtag tu 'byar// khu tshur gnyis gzhibs s+ho sna ba/ rlobalta bu'i phyag rgya'o//
35b2(rgyud): g.yas pa sa tshur snying bar gan / snying brgyan pa'i drug rgya'o// las gnyis song mo sa sor btung // phyogs bcu bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag sbya gung gnyis dang bcug gi dri yi drug rgyur bshad pas/
35b3(rgyud): khu tshur rgyab spang gung mthe bong // mthe bong gung mdzub sprad dang 'khyud// gtor ma sbyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// thal mo khong sdong shugs ltar gdon/ bdug spos 'bul ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag
35b4(rgyud): gnyis so sor gung srin bkug/ mtheb mnan bzhag brkyang me tog rgya/ thal sbyar gung srini mdzub mo bkug mthe'u chung mthab brkyang zhal zas rgya// skyil krung 'dug ste snyim bzod// mthe bong gnyis
35b5(rgyud): ninang du bzhug/ sor gzhibs nas g.yab byed pa ni// dpa' bo gtso bo spyan drang rgya// thal sbyar mdzub bkug mthe bos mnan// byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya// snyim bskyed mthe'u gshibs te brkyang /
35b6(rgyud): lha ma brgyad po so sor dgug/ nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can// ma lus thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya/ khu tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng gzhag/ mdzub gnyis brkyang ste so sor dgug/ cung zad spyod par byed pa ni/
35b7(rgyud): pho nya pho mo 'gugs pa'i rgya// khu tshur rgyab sprang gung mdzub ni// so sor drang por gshibs te brkyang // mtheb gnyis cung zad sprad de dguga'ajig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya// g.yon min g.yas pos de ltar
36a1(rgyud): !/ s+yA nags yong sa/ gra ga/ sa gas / lags sa pa/ //
36a2(rgyud): sa smra pa sa sgru 'ag
36a3(rgyud): de ga so kyang cu nagasas/ zlum pa'i rnams kyis de kun thog/ ba chogs 'joms shing nal 'byor srung // lag pags ni byin du drung // gsod bsring 'i gyigs sadzu hA/
36a4(rgyud): nang gnyis smad nas rnyed pa rdams/ hU~M rjod drug ga mdu dus// sa gsum g.yo byed sngags stabs// rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i skyabs dang ni// gas brjod cing zhapas rgya bcings// ben tshun bsnol
36a5(rgyud): rnas pashegs pa brdzun// yong sa phyi sa dang// ning gsas byung ba'i skabs dang ni// de rje thal mom lam bsgrun// ldan ma macu na// yan lag gnyis sa sa sa ga sa/
36a6(rgyud): d+d+harmAca/ lag gnyis sdigapa ju gyus 'o/ nang gnyis sa nyam du dag ga las/ gsas kyis g.yon bsgor ste ba yin/ bdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon
36a7(rgyud): chos gsum gsum mdan pa ni/ rtse gsum yin te rtsa gsum rgya/ lag pa steng brgyad dbyig bsgreng skar// bgegs la bsnun zhipa bru tshugs blta/ g.yas su tho bcu
36b1(rgyud): brjod brdeg g.yon pa snying kha'i sdig mdzub ste/ gnyis ka sprad pa 'khor lo bya// nub bltas rkang pa mnyam bzhag nas/ mdun g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogs su/ g.yon
36b2(rgyud): pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing // rim pas me dang ral gri dang // sdigs mdzu bgags pas phyogs bzhir bcing // ha hUM drag brjod brjid gnon rje/ rkang gnyis pus 'bur ldag
36b3(rgyud): pa gnyis// gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan// bgegs bskrad phyir ni 'bru tshugs blta// rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su bcad// rkang pa g.yas g.yon res kyis bskor// lho byang g.yon te
36b4(rgyud): shar nub g.yas// btsong shing drug tu brdab par bya// rgya banas drang dang tho ba dang // rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i d+ha// phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs// phyag rgya dang ni stang stabs kyis// phyogs skyor
36b5(rgyud): rnams kyang skrag byed na// 'byung po'i tshogs 'joms spos ci dgos// thams cad dbang du sdud par byed// de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yi// rkang stabs khyad por bshad par bya// shar du rkang pa mnyam pa
36b6(rgyud): yis// rdo rjel maldan du 'dig/ sbyor ninang rting sman de ga dang // hU~M sgogathal mo du tu bsgyur// nub tu rkang snyid lagru pa gnyis// sa sor sdigs mdzub sted du btung // khyang du rim gro'i phyag rgya dang /
36b7(rgyud): gang pas gcigs pa bsgog/ cung dzus bya thal pas so// gang gnyis sa sa kyi kyis bya/ pa rgya rdzo posam/ bya mi zugs pa rtse// cu ma
37a1(rgyud): chung mche ba'i rgya// rkang pa res bteg shar lhor bye// lho nub rkang gnyis res kyis brdag// zhags pas 'debs dang ral gris gcod// nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang // laH
37a2(rgyud): gnyis mtheb spyad 'khor lo bskor// yang nam che gtsigs phyag rgyas gdag// stang snabs thams cad hahU~M sgrog/ de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yi// phyag rgya chog pa shad par bya// khu tshur gung po brgyad rtse spyad/
37a3(rgyud): mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcad // sngags dang phyag rgyu thams cad kyis// lha klu srin po gnod sbyin dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po mi ma yin// gsod dang sprod de me ltar mdzad// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i
37a4(rgyud): rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud la// sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / bla na med pa'i ras ris sku// cho ga de nas bshad par bya// bris sku 'dod pas thams cad du
37a5(rgyud): dge ba'i ras bzang btsal nas kyang // bkrus te sngags kyis bsrung byas la// ngur smrig tu ni bsgyur bar bya// rgyud bzang dal zhing dul bag yod// chos thos ri mo mkhan la sprin// srid chung
37a6(rgyud): yid gzhungs khro med pas/ sen rtsi shun kan tshwa la sbyar// spang dang mu zi kan ltar ldang // ba bla kra ni bla na ser/ li khri sgo nga mtshal lpags dmar/ rams dang mthing shun bru nir sde
37a7(rgyud): spyig dang a dza nag po ste/ she tra dag kyang dkar por 'gyur// sa snod so btang skags snyig byug pir 'jam rab 'bring tha ma bri// rgyal dngas rinam gru dang // snron snrubs smin
37b1(rgyud): drug lnga mtshams shis// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la// dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung // gser mdog 'khor lo sgyur ba'i chas// chos 'chad phyag
37b2(rgyud): rgya ngur smrig bsnams// logs su 'dab bzang rgyal po gnyis// snyim pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs// g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar// ngur smrig gon pas thal mo sbyar// de yi zhabs
37b3(rgyud): su mi g.yo ba// spyan gsum khros pa klu yis brgyan// na ra'i stod g.yogs stag smad dkris// rin chen rgyan can do ker can// rdo ba dmar po'i khri stengs na// ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang //
37b4(rgyud): g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs// gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs chal// rdo rje 'dzin sngo ngur smrig can// rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang // de yi 'og tu sgru ba ni// pus btsugs spos kyi khang bu
37b5(rgyud): 'dzin// gtso bo zhabs su khro bo che// nag po khams gsum bstan pa yi// lag gnyis rin chen khri la bteg/ gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste// 'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang sgrub pa'i
37b6(rgyud): sngo// yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig/ klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis// spang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad// zhi brgyas pa dbang gi phyir// de nas bris sku yang dag pashad// dbus su shAkya hUMH
37b7(rgyud): padang / g.yas su 'phags pa'ajami dpal te// g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o// bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni// shin tu bas dka' gsus po che// zhal gcig phyag bani bla mis brgyan/
38a1(rgyud): sagakha nas khrag 'a dag lce 'dril ba/ mche gcigs hrIHsA cher sgrog pa// spyan gsum nyim shar kA 'od// ngur smrig bsnams bcar smin mdo// sku 'thod rnon 'phreng ba
38a2(rgyud): can/ dbu lathod pa char bzhis brnyan// gso du ni chen zur bu 'byung // bzhal pa'i 'du ba ba yis// phyogs kyi gags tshogs sdig par man// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje/
38a3(rgyud): pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang // g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags// gnyis pa sdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad// rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su// bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang // g.yon brkyang ba yi/
38a4(rgyud): gar gyis gnas// de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byad// spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po dri// ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya// mngon spyod sgrub pa'i ras ris ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dur khrod
38a5(rgyud): rus la mi g.yo ba// mdog nag spyan gsum zur mig lta// ngur smrig gis gyon khro gnyer ldon// ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'tshang // bris nas bdag gi khrag gis ni// spun phye gsol ba btab par bya//
38a6(rgyud): ri mo 'dis ni rig 'dzin kyang // sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos// yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir// mthing kha na ra'i rgyan can ni// brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri/
38a7(rgyud): dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras ris ni// gser mdogo khro bo mi g.yo ba// mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste// ral gri zhags pa dang
38b1(rgyud): po 'dzin// ri bo che dang sdigs mdzub 'og zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying kha ro// de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyi/ ras ris bri ba yang dag bshad// mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa// mdangs bzang zar
38b2(rgyud): ma'i me tog mdog/ ral gri zhags pa sdigs mdzub can// pus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni// sal cung zad btsugs par mdzad// mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis// dbugs 'byin mdzad pa
38b3(rgyud): nyams dga'i gzugs// g.yas su rnam snang mdzad bris te// g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o// de mdun sgrub pa nyid kyang bri// gang yang ris ma thams cad la// mchod de me tog gtor nas kyang /
38b4(rgyud): spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te// rten 'brel sngags kyis rab gnas bya// de rjes smon lam btab pa ni// oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi// bsod nams grangs med gzhal mi lang // des ni
38b5(rgyud): 'gro ba ma lus pa// bla med go 'phang thob par shog/ sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang // yi dgas gang dag grangs med rnams// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// thams cad bde dang
38b6(rgyud): ldan gyur cig/ gang yang lha mi dbul 'phongs dang // mi nad su ge dgra tshom sogs// bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni// de dag thams cad bral gyur shog/ ji snyed sems can thams cad/
38b7(rgyud): rnams// de nyid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun// sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas// 'ga' yang sdug bsngal med par shog/ sems can gang dag lus ngag yid// mi dge spyod pa bral gyur nas// dge ba
39a1(rgyud): #/ phran tshogs spyod gyur te// kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog/ de nas rgyal sras kun btud de// lag na dri dang me tog sogs// mchod pa'i yo byad kun thogs nas// bla 'og tha/
39a2(rgyud): dadang gsal bya'i phyir// bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod// oM bde gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das// skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams// bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir// rgyal ba sras
39a3(rgyud): bcas la mi mnga'// bdag don grub par 'gro ba la// brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod// de nas gtor ma me tog dri// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams// dngos grub dam tshig gnod spangs phyir// lag
39a4(rgyud): pas reg par mi bya ste// gos kyi phur ma la sogs pa// ci bde bas ni phyags nas kyang // skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas// chu bo la ni dor bar bya// 'bras dang 'o ma sha ka dang // mar dang bcas
39a5(rgyud): ba bskol byas te// 'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu// dga' skyed phyir na dge 'dun dang // bram ze la ni ston mo bya// de nas bris sku brtan par ni// gsang ba'i gnas su mchod par bya// khyad par tshes
39a6(rgyud): brgyad dus su mchod// bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang // mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min// sems can ma mos spang bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la nges
39a7(rgyud): bskyed de// the tsom le lo spang bar bya// rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir// khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas// gos bkra dri ma med pa bgo/ zas kyang 'bras sogs dri med la// nyung ngu bza' zhing
39b1(rgyud): btung bar bya// rmongs pas gnyid dang le lo dang // dri nga ba ni skyed par 'gyur// tho rangs dang por langs nas ni// srod thal bar du brtson par bya// nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe// 'grol ban bya'i
39b2(rgyud): sems kyis nyal// 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// bris sku'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad pa ste/ lha sgom pa yi rim pa ni/
39b3(rgyud): rang gzugs stong bar byas nas su// yi ge 'phreng ba'i 'khor lo las// sgra grags pa ni rig pa che// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang // der son pa ni rdo rje sogs// rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no// de las
39b4(rgyud): gyur pa'i sku mchog ni// 'ja' tshon shar ba ji lta bar// mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan// brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang ldan// sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni// byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra//
39b5(rgyud): rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni// gzugs mdzes lha yi ji lta ba// khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste// skra dang kha spu la sogs pa// spu sogs ser zhing rtsu ba la 'khril// sna tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni// rtsub cing /
39b6(rgyud): blo ldan rab tu khros// na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni// steng gi khyams su yod par mdzad// ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kye// ngar skad 'brug sgra sprugs glu ni// ri rab 'bum snyil tshal chom ltar// lus rab ltos 'gros
39b7(rgyud): brgyan pa ni// gzi ldan 'khyud cing phu sgra 'don// 'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi 'bum dus me'i bskal pa 'dra// rab gdug mo tshon cha du ma ni// lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ba/
40a1(rgyud): thams cad yi ge hUM sgra can// ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams// bye yig drag po'i bdag nyid can// thub pa yi ge muM las bskyed// rgyal sras rig mnyan thos dang // 'jig rten
40a2(rgyud): skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba saM skar pa ri shud+d+he d+harmA te ga ga na/ sa mud ga te sa ha pa ri shud d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wI swA hA/ rang gi lus
40a3(rgyud): la sems bcug nas// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi// ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung // rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas// drang srong rdzu 'phrul can du 'gyur// gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na//
40a4(rgyud): rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos// rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams// gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan kha dog ni// dkyil 'khor ram ni ris ma las// gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya// de nas mi g.yo
40a5(rgyud): khro bo che// rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas// dag cing gsal la snyan pa yis// tshig gis yang ni 'di gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das// gtum mo mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/
40a6(rgyud): nga yi mtshan nyid khyed bshad nas// de tshe rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas// rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis// gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to// dag pa'i
40a7(rgyud): sems nyid hUM rdo rje// mthing kha'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin// mthing kha brkyang bskum khri sems can// na ra'i rgyan bcas 'jigs byed sku// gyen sgra kha spu gyen ser dmar// pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni// me yi nang
40b1(rgyud): bzhugs rdo dril 'chang // nam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po// bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa// lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi// me yi sabon dgug pas mnan// bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin// gsum pas
40b2(rgyud): btig go hU~M phaT banas// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'dis// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang // khyad par du ni 'byung po sel// klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che// nam mkha' lding gi cha bya che// grub pa'i gter
40b3(rgyud): gyi don du ni/ ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi// dmar po dang ni ljang nag dag drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang // tshe ring ba la shes pa'o// lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni/ 'byung por gyur
40b4(rgyud): ba'i de ma thag sa stengs thams cad mun nag 'phrigs/ bdud rnams thams cad rab tu tshig/ ye shes me 'od chen po 'di/ bzod par bra la gcig ma mchis/ bgegs chen log par 'dren
40b5(rgyud): pa rnams// dog pa'i sems kyis thag ring 'bros// gsang sngags yi ge hUM sgra can// glog 'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra// klad par yi ge haM gi gzugs// gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can/
40b6(rgyud): 'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas// bgegs tshogs sreg cing 'bros par byed// bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs// ro langs ma lus thams cad kun// ha hUM brjod cing 'bros par byed// rlung gi
40b7(rgyud): g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs// gyen thur haM gi 'phro 'dra dang // khro bcu sa bon yi ge hUM// me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar/ mngon sum rtsa la me bzhin du// rnying gi hU~M gis 'das nas kyang / glang po'i hUM
41a1(rgyud): gis sreg par byed// 'dod dang phug r+b+ha lga yi sku// bskrad dang bcing dang myos byed pasam// seng ge dang ni klung chen 'brug/ drag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags
41a2(rgyud): zlos pa ni// bgegs dang log 'dren ma lus pa/ sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog snying nang snying po bstan pa ni// 'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs// du ma rnam kyang zad par mdzad// lus ngag
41a3(rgyud): yid brtan 'khor lo sngags// oM dang AHdang hUM phyor gyis// dpal 'phel dbang phyug skyed pa dang / go cha chen po ston par byed/ nasas+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA na~M/ ta thA ga tA nA~M haM go cha chen
41a4(rgyud): po'i gsang sngags 'dis// rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar gyur na// bgegs rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos// sa ma ya s+t+waM aM haM gaus// ye shes lha dang 'brel bar bya// rgyal bas dbang bskur
41a5(rgyud): sbyor bas ni// ye shes dbu rgyan btags par bya// gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can// 'khor kun mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya// bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su// me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni
41a6(rgyud): mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya/ sdang ba hU~M gi sgra las so// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas
41a7(rgyud): yang dag pashad byag// sngags spyod tshul gyi cho gnyon// dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing // byang chub sems las ma bskyed de// dbang bskur rjes gnang ma thob la/ sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi
41b1(rgyud): gas sngags dang le ba ni// byis bsngags seg me pa 'ang/ rdzog pa med nga bu ba'i snor// deni slob dpon 'di ska yod// oM/ skyugs mchog tu 'dzi na sa r+tha/
41b2(rgyud): padu mar bsags pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems su byed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na kA ya bA kutsit+ti bi sho d+ha na a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM/ oM/ sangs rgyas
41b3(rgyud): kun gyis bsngags pa yi// rin chen sngags las byung ba yi// dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis// dbang bskur rin chen mchog tu 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+hA ra shrI badz+ra sa ma yai s+t+waM a haM/ rat+na mu ku/
41b4(rgyud): Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje chen po bla na med// bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te// rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // oM sarba badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dril bu dbyangs snyan blun
41b5(rgyud): med/ sku yi rdo rje rab tu bskyed// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // khams gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// oM sa ma ya g+har+b+ha badz+ra a b+hi Shits+tsha hUM// oM/ snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya// gang gis
41b6(rgyud): thos pa nang gi su// de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur// rtag pa'i ngang gnas blang bar mdzod// oM badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba
41b7(rgyud): che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgya// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad// rtag tu khyod kyis bzung byas nas// byang chub mchog
42a1(rgyud): thob rgyal bas gsungs// oM// shes rab ral gyiza na med// gang gis 'chung brgyal 'gyur te/ gabadun kyi dpung ni gshegs nas kyang // mapa' la ye shes 'od 'bar
42a2(rgyud): gyur// oM s+yarba ta thA ka ta badz+ra dz+nyA na lanA a b+hib+hin+tu hUM/ a/ rdo rje zhags thugs rdo rje rngan// nyon mongs sgyid pa'i sdong bu rnams/ thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang // srid pa'i 'ching ba las/
42a3(rgyud): grol mdzad// oM sarba ta thA ga tA badz+re pA sha na a b+hiShiny+tsa hUM/ dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing // dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la// bla ma mnyes par mi byed na// sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro// log
42a4(rgyud): lhacan kang b+ha ma tshe// dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges// 'dir nyams pas ni nad yams dang // dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tshe// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// chu klung mtsho 'gram ri ljongs dang /
42a5(rgyud): 'bras bu me tog skyed mos tshal// kun dga' ra ba khang bzang mchog/ bzhi mdo ri sul shing gcig drung // phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang chen bres// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang // chu gling mtshe'u
42a6(rgyud): 'gras ne'u gsing du// bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang // dur khrod sogs su las rnams sgrub// las kyi dkyil 'khor khru gang ste// dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa/
42a7(rgyud): yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya// gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du ba// yang na lnga 'am bdun du bya// gza' yi dkyil 'khor khru gnyis te// yang na phyed dang gsum par bya// kun tu bzhi cha bo drang ste// khang pas tshad kyi phyed
42b1(rgyud): yin te/ khang pa gnyis pacha gsus pa// rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o// lha rnas pani ma dag tu 'gyur// thub pa'i sgon pazhi yin te// gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang gi so// chos ni nub rdo
42b2(rgyud): rdo rje lho// gza'adung 'jig rten skyong sogs shar// dbang sbyar lnga yi gnas rnams su// bum pa phyag rgyar bcas pa'am// srub pa rang rang phyab rgya gzhag/ thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad dkar
42b3(rgyud): steng du lhung bzed do// gtso bo'i sa ni sor drug ste/ lha sa rnams ni sor bzhi'o// rigs kyi mtshan mas yang yang bskor// byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni/ pad dkar rdo rje gdangs por bcas/
42b4(rgyud): dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i 'o// shar du 'jam dpal ut+pal sngo// mer ni kun bzang yid bzhin no// lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te// nub tu pad ser rdo
42b5(rgyud): chos// nub byangs snying pad+ma dmar// gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char// gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing ngo // shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste// mer ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo//
42b6(rgyud): rdo rje rtse gcigag shin rje lhor// bden bral ral gri stobs po che// nub tu rta mgrin pad+ma ste// byang du bgegs dgra rdo rje rgya// nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste// dbang ldan du ni mi g.yo ga/
42b7(rgyud): de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni// shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang // mo'u 'gal bu dang 'od srungs dang // rgyal mchog dang ni sa stengs sbyong // rta thul dang ni baglang bdag/ drag shul dbang chen tshangs bu
43a1(rgyud): can/ b+ha rad+h+wa dza lteng rgyas dang // dga' bo nye dga' sgra gcan no// de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do// de nas yang dag bshad byag/ 'jam dpal
43a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzang po yi// dbus su ral gri me 'od can// rin chen rdo brag steng du bri// byang du rdo rjes mtshan ma yi// bum pa bri ba byams pa'o// shar du kun bzang po yi// rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya//
43a3(rgyud): lhor ni me 'od ldan pa yi// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri// nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste// pad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri// yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can// rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri// mer ni rab
43a4(rgyud): 'bar rdo rje yi// bgrang 'phreng pad+ma la gnas bri// bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i// go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya// rlung du mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha// rin chen sgron ni bri bar bya// steng du rtul phod ces khro bo'o//
43a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi// 'og tu khro rgyal mngag gzhug gi/ rdo rje drag steng zhags pa bri// khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi ni// tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya// brtan pa zhes pa'i pho nya mo'i// chu gri byang du bri bar bya//
43a6(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// mkha' sor ma ni shar du'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi// rnam 'jigs ma ni lho ru'o// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// mdzod spu ma zhes rin 'phreng 'dzin//
43a7(rgyud): rin chen rdo stengs shar lhor bri/ shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa// 'khor le me 'bar rdo rje bri// 'bar ba'i gtun shing bden bral du// 'joms pa'o tho ba rlung du bri// thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug
43b1(rgyud): pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang // sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHhUM hUMHba ba/ maM mr-i swAhA/ spyan drang gshegs su gsol ba dang /
43b2(rgyud): srung ba mchog gi sngags yin no// na maHsarba ta thA ga b+h+yaHsarba bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHhe he he A dz+nyA ba ra mer ga gan/ A gats+tsha gats+tsha b+ha ga bAn shi g+h+ra~M swA hU/ bsten pa 'bum la byin brlabs dang /
43b3(rgyud): sgrub pa dang mchod pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid// pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba'o// shar du don yod zhags pa ni
43b4(rgyud): bgrang 'phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o// lhor ni nam mkha' dri med de// rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o// nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma// byang du thugs rje shugs po che/ rdo rje nig po 'dzin pa bri// sgrol ma khro gnyer
43b5(rgyud): ral gcig dang // yid bzang ma ni mtshams su bri// khro bo dang ni pho nya mo// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rim pas dgod// de nas phyag na rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya// dbus su phyag na/
43b6(rgyud): rdo rje nyid// rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o// shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin// lhor ni pad 'dzin mA ma kI// nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar// byang du sgrol ma ut+pal 'chang // phyogs bzhir nam
43b7(rgyud): mnga'adri med dang // shugs po che dang rdo rje tog/ bsnyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams// rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o// der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams// rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya// de yi cha rgyab
44a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la/ drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni// dpung bzang la sogs rdo rdzaldan// brgyad po byung gi phyogs su graM// tshogs 'chang ba shes gnyen lo sbyong dang // mthong dkar
44a2(rgyud): rigs byed bden bral med// ngan spong brgyad de drang srong shar// lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma// rdo rje tho ba drag shul ma// rta rnam dang khro gnyer ma// ro langs ma dang lcags sgrog ma// mthong dka' ma ste
44a3(rgyud): brgyad po bri// dug se la rma bya 'od zer can// nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma// dbyangs ldan dril sgrog brgyad nub phyogs// kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can// sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba// thub pa'i
44a4(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi// brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor la'o// rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub pa// gzhan mi thub pa spyan ras gzigs// nag mo che dang
44a5(rgyud): uts+tshud+tha// gzhon nu 'phrog gter 'dzin gyi// khro bo mi g.yo skyo bzhi la// nag po che dang dga' byed dang // ngan spong dang ni tshogs bdag go// mi g.yo dbang skur dgyes pa yi// dbus su khro bam/
44a6(rgyud): g.yo ba'i// ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o// phyogs bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o// 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha bya can// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang // ge yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang /
44a7(rgyud): rin chen brag la sku bzhugs nas// zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o// mtshams su khro mo bzhi po yang // gtso bo dang mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams// de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu// sku 'am phyag rgya'i 'phreng ba
44b1(rgyud): bri/ dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can// khros pas rang rigs 'khor bcas bri// bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri// dri bzang chus bkang lha grangs sam// bcu gnyis
44b2(rgyud): sam ni drug kyang rung // kha rgyan dang bcas gzhag par bya// bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan// yon chab bdug spos me tog dang // sgron me byug cha ba zhal zas dang // gling bu sil snyan na bza'i tshogs/
44b3(rgyud): gtor ma dri bzang sman dang bcas// yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom tshogs// dkyil 'khor spras nas mchod par bya// sa la spus mo tshad brjod nas// 'bu srin shing rdo dum bu sogs// skyon mnga' bral nas sa
44b4(rgyud): yis sa dgang // ba li rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar// me tog gcal bkram mchod sogs bkod// lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang // dge dang mi dge'i rmi lam brtag/ rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas/ ka sa bdag mo
44b5(rgyud): la sogs pa gdab// khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod// bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi// tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// dus
44b6(rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams// mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pa// ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes// skyob pa shAkya seng ges kyang // gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis// bdud sde
44b7(rgyud): shin tu mi bzad pa// dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom// 'jig rten 'dul phyir chos rnams kyi// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu khyod blo gros 'di gyis
45a1(rgyud): shig/ u dum pa ra'i me tog ltar// brgya laman ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste// skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che// rnyed dka' rnyed par gyur na yang /
45a2(rgyud): gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba// shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir// sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las// myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las// sa stengs gsang sngags
45a3(rgyud): non bu 'dra/ na nad 'chi 'jigs spong ba dang // nyes mdzad grogs gcugs mthun 'dod dang / mu ge dgra choms bral ba de dang // zas skom gos rgyan longs spyod brtag bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob pa dang /
45a4(rgyud): myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yis// gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ dam pa
45a5(rgyud): bdag gis bskyed par bya// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// deng nas mchog tu brtan par gzung // 'gro la lhag
45a6(rgyud): pa'i sems bskyed nas// bla ma la ni yon phul zhu// yid bzhin nor 'dra bla med sku// zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'bang thob// srog gcod rku brdzun mi tshangs spyod// myos byed 'thung dang glu gar rol/
45a7(rgyud): rgyan byug mal chen mtho ba dang // phyi dro kha zas spang ba ste// brgyad dang bcu gcig bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni gnam stong la// dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon// sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon//
45b1(rgyud): sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du// g.yengs med bsdams te bsrung bar bya// gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya// lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas// dmyal bdud 'gro yi dgas gnas// thob gnas
45b2(rgyud): spang dka' de dag ni// nam yang thob par mi bya'o// bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri 'chang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas// bka' las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams/ dum bu phye mar
45b3(rgyud): 'gas par 'gyur// slob ma gzung phyir theg mar ni// bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu bskyed bya// longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma bstang // bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson//
45b4(rgyud): bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas// gtong phod dul zhing chos spyod mkhas// nad med bzod des snying rje che// sngags sgrub brtson dpal shes rab can// brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am
45b5(rgyud): bdun// dang brtson ni dul bla ma bkur// sdig 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang // dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa gzung // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// skye ba/
45b6(rgyud): gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub che// gzhan du med pa phul byung ba// rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par
45b7(rgyud): byas// min rin chen dang po ste// gang gang sgrub pa de dang de// 'grub par gyur gyi gzhan du min// ral gri sngags sam shing la bya/ sor bzhi pa'i sa sor brgyad bya// yu bar rigs kyi rgya lawaM/
46a1(rgyud): ba yi rnam lnga dri zhis chus// bkrus te dri dang me tog mchod// drug sngags bzlas khro ba sgom// ral mi rdal 'brul 'od du 'bar// blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro 'gyur// tshon par
46a2(rgyud): gyi bskal pa ste// lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs// sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur// gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa'am/ shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub// rgyal mtshan nor bu gi'u wang
46a3(rgyud): gdugs// lugs kyu rnams kyang de bzhin sgrub// lha rnams sgruban thang shing la// gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te// sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa snga/
46a4(rgyud): klu la nA ga ge sar shing // gnod sbyin la ni gser las gzugs// dri zal ni 'o ma'i shing // mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis so// srin po la ni dur khrod shing // gang yang gzugs byas rkang
46a5(rgyud): be ni/ g.yon pas de ni skemanan te// sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong // ci 'dod sbra tshe dgos pa blang / shar du ras ris kha sprad drung / dus gsum khrus byas gos rlon gyon// sum 'bus
46a6(rgyud): bzlas na mar ngo yi// brgyad la 'byung po gtor ma sbyin// maN+Dal steng du ro bzhag nas// rang nyid rin chen khri steng du/ snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur// mi skrag kha yi nang du lce/ pad+ma la phye
46a7(rgyud): lte can mthong / bcad na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur// lha yi gzugs kyis tshangs pa yi// 'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu// gi'u wang bdun bzlas thig les ni/ skye bo kun gyis
46b1(rgyud): mi mthong ngo // mi g.yo pus mo btsugs pa'am/ 'jam dpal ris ma'i drung du ni/ 'jas dpal sngags 'dis ya bzlas// nyal khyad par mchod pa byas/ mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i
46b2(rgyud): tho rangs nas// dang po rtags sa g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed// phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po// ha ha 'brug skad grag par 'gyur// gsum par mkha' la rig
46b3(rgyud): 'dzin rnams// me tog char 'bebs chun 'phyar sbreng // de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang // 'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas// khro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan gyis// ci 'dod bu khyod gsung
46b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs// ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya// grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can// rgyan bzang lag na ral gri thogs// lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas// rig
46b5(rgyud): 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu// sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i tshe/ rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas// mchod pa chen po thob 'gyur te// bskal pa du mar tshe gnas 'gyur// ut+pal sngon po
46b6(rgyud): lig pu mig/ ru rta zangs snod ril bu gzhag/ zla ba gzas zin par bzlas nas/ mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur// bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu
46b7(rgyud): drug/ ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te// tsan dan dmar dang dri bzang phyug/ cho 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar// mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni// mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de// sku sha khras
47a1(rgyud): kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje lag gnyis bzung ma thag/ dud 'phrul 'od du 'bar nas kyang // 'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// 'khor los sgyur bathob par 'gyur// 'khor lo
47a2(rgyud): bdun brdzogs mtshon chu dang // gser dang mal lham tshangs srud sogs/ dngos po thams cad de ltar sdug/ sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung // chos gcig nyid par sku gzugs kyi mthe bor dza ta
47a3(rgyud): sngags brjod brdeg/ stong phrag brgyad kyis mthe bong las// 'od zer phyung nas reg ma thag/ dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas/ 'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po thob// sus kyang mi thub lus
47a4(rgyud): grub 'gyur// tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas// sa la pad 'dab brgyad pa bri// bum pa skud pa nag pos dkri// tsan dan gyis byug dris kyang dgang // pad ma'i stengs gzhag pad stengs 'dug/ stong phrag
47a5(rgyud): brgyad bzlas sa gzhi gus// pad+mar snang shing sa gzhir snang // chu des gtor la khru gang brko// blangs pas bskal pa'i tshe tshad thob// grog mkhar sa la seng ge bya// gi'u wang gis byugs dkyil
47a6(rgyud): 'khor gzhag/ g.yo 'gul bar du mchod cing bzlas// seng ger gyur nas rgyab zhon nas// 'dod gzugs lha gnas kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur// tshe lo khri phrag gcig
47a7(rgyud): bskor nas// rig 'dzin chen po'i gnas su 'gro// dir gsungs pa'am ma gsungs pa// sngags dang lha 'dis sgrub pa yis// rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams// ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
47b1(rgyud): 'gas pa don ba'i rdul po tshon pa'i rtog pa bsdus pa las// rig 'di sgrub pa'i leb ste bdu pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad byab// phra chegs las kyi sbyor ba saso/
47b2(rgyud): gza' michog 'di yin te/ gnod pa sel ring ban skyed mdzad/ kha yin ma lngas byugs pa'o// dkyil 'khor dbus su parnyani/ kha dog sna tshogs nyis brtseg gi dbus su sangs rgyas de
47b3(rgyud): bzhin kyor// chos ni rdo rje chos dkar po// shar du dashi na ltung bu'o// nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar// byang du phyag na rdo rje ste/ byang shang du ni 'jam dpal ser// mer nig shin rje gshed
47b4(rgyud): ngoganag/ dbyug 'chang sa bson pa'o// mi g.yo mgon po srin po phyogs// rtamagrin rlung gi phyogs su'o// dkon mchog gsum pa chos 'chad rgya// sems dpa' khro bo rang rtags so// kun kyang
47b5(rgyud): rin chen zil thugs rgya la gas zhums te// shad du kyis dkar se ni/ rtal zhon te pa 'chang // du na ba dgang po ni// kusu du 'jung dang panon/ stor na mig das
47b6(rgyud): kha dog dmar// ril ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams// lhag pa mdog ser ut+pal 'chang // byang du pad stengs bzhugs pa yi// phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thogs/ shar lho phyogs
47b7(rgyud): su klu la bcibs/ pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang // lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs// byang shar spen pa mdog gnag ni// tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa thogs// nub byang sgra gcan dud ka ni//
48a1(rgyud): sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin// rnon po ljang lu ral gri 'ang // gtso bo drung du phyung steng bzhugs// namaHsarba ta thA ga te d+ha sargas pa'i bur te b+ha sA thA oM
48a2(rgyud): b+ha kin swAhA ka nyi ma'i snying po'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM sarba tra ya~M a swAhA/ zla ba'i'o// nasaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+ya
48a3(rgyud): sarba thA oM a bIr+yA ya swAhA/ rnon po'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA oM su bi shud d+hA swA hA mig dmar gyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+ha sarba
48a4(rgyud): sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM bi su Ta pa ka ya swA hA/ gza' lhag gi'o// oM na maMHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarba thA/ oM b+hi ka mya d+hA ya swAhA/ phur bu'i'o//
48a5(rgyud): namaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHsarbaM b+h+ya/ oM sud+hArmAr+Na ra ho swah+mA/ pa wa sangs kyi'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+ya sarban+tu/ oM kr-iSh+Na paN+Da paka
48a6(rgyud): swAhA/ spen pa'i'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbas pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHoM sarba thA/ oM bi kr-i da la ku ru tsi swA hA/ sgra gcan gyi'o// sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas// ci 'byor mchod de gsol ba
48a7(rgyud): gdeg// longs spyod spel cing 'jigs pa sol// nad med bgegs rims 'joms par 'gyur// rims sogs gzas zin nad la yang / sku yi drung du gsol btab sel// zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba/
48b1(rgyud): de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa// skabs gtum gnas su dgra khyim sba// dgra bo nad skyed nor rnams brlag/ rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu/
48b2(rgyud): dgra bo'i skor sras bskrad par byed// ne'u lenag po wa sbal rus// rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams// gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor snga// dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar 'gyur// mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni/
48b3(rgyud): thod pa so can nang blugs nas// gang gi sgor gzhag khang pa 'jig/ ku sha'i gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan// dbang byar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na// rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na// 'byung po
48b4(rgyud): gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la// rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te// rkang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla// gang dang gang yang nges par 'grub// sa la bgegs
48b5(rgyud): kyi gzugs bris te/ sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur// 'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te// gdab cing brdungs na sel bar byed// phur bus gdab dang mtshon chas brab
48b6(rgyud): rdo rje ri rab ldog brgyad ldan// sa la byas pa'i thams bar du/ gzugs brnyan bcug ste rkang pas mnan/ gzas zi ni nub mo pa'i maN+Dal// dri bzang me tog sil ma bkram// pha rol
48b7(rgyud): byin pa'i glegs pas bzhugs// dngas ma'i snod du mar bzhag ste// seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya/ dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang / gter mthong ba yang 'dis 'gyur ro// khros pas/
49a1(rgyud): spyan gyi phyag rgya bya// hUM mtha' gsang sngags drag tu brjod// dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa// gdon gyis 'dzin nas bran du 'gyur// de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags/
49a2(rgyud): kyi cho ga bshad par bya// ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum// brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin// des ni rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur// mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod
49a3(rgyud): nas// brjod pas sprin rnams 'dral bar byed// dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs rnyan la// rkang g.yon mnan bzlas lcags phur gdab// bka' nyan 'gyur ro gtubs na shing // skud pa ser po bcings na ngag
49a4(rgyud): spang leb mnan na mnan par 'gyur// ra lpags brabs na bka' nyan 'gyur// sred bu yungs kar la bzlas te// 'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH
49a5(rgyud): sarba thA/ oM tsaN+Da mahA ro sha Na hUM traM thA ma hA tsaN+Da/ a tsa la ka na hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta ta thA ga ta dz+nyA/ s+pha ra hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du// tsan dan sbags pa'i pad+ma ni
49a6(rgyud): sngags bcas ji tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs// gsar gyi dong tshe rnyed par 'gyur// bram ze'am ni dge 'dun ras// rgyal po'i ras sam gro ga la// pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri// lte bar oM hUM ming dang bcas//
49a7(rgyud): ts+tshaN+Da mahA ro ShaN/ phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod// mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te// gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri// dri dang me tog sogs mchod nas// skabs kyis dril nas lus la bcang /
49b1(rgyud): gdon dang nad dang mu ge sel// g.yul du phyin na rgyal bar 'gyur// yang na ral gri sor bzhir bri// 'od kyi ri mo nang chud pa// ya d+harmA la sogs kyis bskor// dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi//
49b2(rgyud): snying po sngags ni khrigs su bri// 'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur// mtho lngas 'khor ba'i bar du ni// mthe gang 'phang du yod pa bya// nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags// mgo ni gyen du
49b3(rgyud): bltas pa bri// kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags// spra tshil las byas dgra yi gzugs// dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas// ming yig gsad par bcas pa ni// ling gi'i snying khar bcug byas
49b4(rgyud): te/ dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi// dbus su mtho gang brus byas te// nang gzhag steng du spar bu sbub// ji srid mar gyi tshes gcig nas// zla ba mi snang zhag bar du// nyin mo
49b5(rgyud): rten 'brel sngags bzlas te// mtshan du khro bo spyan gcig pa'i// sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya// mtshams dang ji srid mtshams bar du// g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags// drag
49b6(rgyud): cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su brjod// 'jam dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung // bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni/ mchod rten la ni gseg shang gsil// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang /
49b7(rgyud): sngags la 'phya zhing sems can 'tshe// log lha log par spyod byed cing // sems can la'atshe byed pa ni// rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang / 'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi// mchogs gza'
50a1(rgyud): dang rgyu skar tshogs// bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol// rgyu gzhan dag la grags pa yi// bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod// dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni/ nag po gru gsum
50a2(rgyud): khru gang ba'i// srog shing nag po gsum pa la// bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas dkri// gur kum li khris bris pa'o// mya ngan med shing gru gsum la// rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'/
50a3(rgyud): laM staM b+ha ya nan pa brgyad// phyogs brgyad bri ba'i rwa dbus la// nye snying ming dang bcas pa bri// de yi lte bar snying po ni// gsad pa'i ming bcas bri ba'o// tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod//
50a4(rgyud): ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras// sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod// ji srid gsum dang bdun bar du// le lo med par byas gyur na// dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang // sdom
50a5(rgyud): brtson de ni ldan gyur te// sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste// khyad par sbyor ba cung zad
50a6(rgyud): bshad// yungs kar bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros// ser ba srung na 'khor lo 'am// rnga dang dung la bri bar bya// g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs// nad la 'khor la chu yungs kar// thod la kor
50a7(rgyud): gyis sa phor la// bris ti sgor sbas spre'u srung // spra tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa// dur khrod thal bzlas sgo stengs gzhag/ nad pa gdon las srung bar nges// snying khar ming sngags spel bcug nas//
50b1(rgyud): tsher ma par zhugs dag rengs byed// sring la badrugs nas thos pa'i// na tan sems kyis gsod par nges// ling gas brtags ba nus pa med// yang bas cad thod pa la// ming sdugs
50b2(rgyud): bris te mi khrag bkang // rabs chad dur sbas rigs rgyud 'chad// khyi na ga rjod par ming sngags bcas// dug bkang klu gnas sbas mdzes 'dzin// dgra yi sbyor sbas 'byed par byed// zhing du
50b3(rgyud): sbas na lo nyes byed// phyugs gnas god 'byung zla dang 'byed// chu dong sbas na chu skems 'gyur// me dur spras na rims kyis 'dzin// yang na dgra ming khrag gis bris// spra tshil gzugs kyi snying
50b4(rgyud): khar bcug/ mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i// nang bcug dong gzhag lhung bzed sbub// bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing // nag po tshes nas phyis skor zhing // bden pa'i mthu brjod gzugs
50b5(rgyud): brnyan sreg/ dgra bo shi 'gyur the tsom med// gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag/ ka tra ta yi ltem ma la// ka ro ki yi dus su ni// gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bri// rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur//
50b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin no// mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la// sngags dang yul lha'i ming spel bri// lha yi gnas bcug de steng du// sngags bzlas phur pa snying khar gdab// gdug pa'i char ma'i
50b7(rgyud): hom thar te// mi rta ba glab khyim he// sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod// lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser pog// med na bskal par khyod nyid sreg/ de rjes dkar dang mang mchod do// 'phags pa rdo rje khros
51a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las/ sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas sbyin sreg las rnams kun// myur 'grub thabs
51a2(rgyud): ni bshad par bya// mngar gsum dur ba bsregs pa yis// gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed// yas shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing // gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed// 'o ma can gyi
51a3(rgyud): yam shing la// 'o ma dur ba til dang 'bras// snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na// gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// ga pur mngar gsum 'bru thams cad// dur ba dkar po'i
51a4(rgyud): yam shing rnams// 'o ma can gyi shing la sreg/ nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi// 'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad// phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur// dur ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas//
51a5(rgyud): bsregs pas rta phyags nad zhi byed// shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni// dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub// khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi thab// sor bzhir kha khyer rim pas gtang // sems dpa'
51a6(rgyud): pad+ma'i rdo rje dang // gcig pus ni rgyas dbang drag 'grub// de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg ni// ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya// pad+ma'i chu ba 'bum phrag gcig/ rgyal po 'thob ste blon po ni/
51a7(rgyud): ku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum// zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o// a bo marga'i 'bras bu dang // mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob// ri bzang 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni// yid la
51b1(rgyud): ci 'dod thob par 'gyur// dur ba til dang 'bras sogs sreg/ bud med bu bzang thob par 'gyur// nor 'dod pas ni rkun po yi// lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas/ mchod cing gsol ba btab
51b2(rgyud): pas ni// nor rnams myur du thob par 'gyur// yang na rgya yi pags pa la// gur kum gi'u wang yung bas ni// byi ba che brjid ser po bri// shar na mdzod phugs bltas par gzhag/ zas kyi
51b3(rgyud): lhag mas mchod bya zhing // gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur// pad+ma'i ze ba ka li ga/ pri yang ku ni nor rnyed do// 'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen thob// ku mu da yi 'bras sogs sreg
51b4(rgyud): longs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob// pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar// sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba// gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar gsum bcas// 'bum
51b5(rgyud): phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni// rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur// mar dang nyungs kar dkar pos ni// nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na// snying po snying pa rgyas par 'gyur// nas la sogs
51b6(rgyud): pa'i 'bru rigs rnams// gang bsregs gsol btab de rgyas 'gyur// gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can// me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur// spos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel/
51b7(rgyud): zho mar seng ldeng me la stong // bsregs na nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur// de nas dbang gi sreg thugs bshad// til dang 'bras sogs phub ma bsregs// bud med dbang du byed pa'o// pri yang ku li
52a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis// byis pa rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// 'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i// shing la bsregs na lha dbang byed// gsum po de dang gu gul sreg/ gnod sbyin rnams ni
52a2(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur// mya ngan med pa'i yam shing gis// gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du 'gyur// rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas// bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// de nas drag po'i
52a3(rgyud): las grub pa'i// sbyin sreg yang dag bshad par bya// ming bcas tshad dang nim pa sregs// bstan sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi// dgra ming dug gis nim pa la// bris te dug dang lhan cig tu/
52a4(rgyud): sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas// thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste// lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas// gsum ni sgyed bu gnyis brtsegs la// khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas// sngags brjod
52a5(rgyud): thal bar gyur bar du// nyin phyed bsregs na dgra 'chi nges// 'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun// ra khrag nyungs mar tshwa rgya skyegs// tsha ba'i bud shing yas shing la// bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa
52a6(rgyud): sreg/ stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi// bzhis ni bu dang chung ma 'chi// drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun rlag/ brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chad// gal te skyabs su 'ong 'gyur na// 'o ma stong bsregs/
52a7(rgyud): rnam du pos// khrag dang dug phyen mi pa'i 'bras// yungs mar la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad// myos byed la bsregs dam po 'chi// yang na rus phye nim pa'i wa// rang gi khrag gas yungs sar ldan
52b1(rgyud): sag rkye tse dug dang ni// nim pa'i 'bras bu gas par bya// yang na mi khrag gis bsregs pas// byad ma byur du gsod par 'gyur// nim pa'i snga dang khrag su// drim lnga bcas gdugs spri yang// sing
52b2(rgyud): yig bcug nas phur bus gdab// rig sngags byad ma nyid ldog 'gyur// rgya stegs mi rus phyes yis/ mi lpags rnon la dgra gzugs bris// dug dang ske/ tshe cung zad byug/ nim pa'i mi 'khros pas
52b3(rgyud): bsro// bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi// dur ba'o mas sos par 'gyur// dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang // mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams rlag/ tsha gsum lan tshwa du rang sgyur// yungs mar ro
52b4(rgyud): skra sbrul shun dang // nim lnga dang mi rus phye// skye tshe dug phye sgog btsong dang / sgog skya tsher ma'i me la sreg/ dgra bo khrag tu skyugs te 'chi// rgya skyegs lan tshwa ba glang mkhris// bsregs na
52b5(rgyud): mchin gas nad kyis 'chi// sge'u ga sher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum// gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/ mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du sreg/ thig nag gis ni gsod par 'gyur// 'o ma can gyi
52b6(rgyud): yam shing la// dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur// dri chus spangs pa'i sa las ni// thabs khung byas te dug gis byug/ nim pa'i 'dab mar dgra bo'i ming // ra khrag gis bris rgyas
52b7(rgyud): pas dkris// tsha gsum shing gi mer bsregs pas// rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges// dug khrag lan tshwa tsha bgasum// ming bcas gzugs brnyan nim pa'i mer// bsregs na dgra bo dmu
53a1(rgyud): rdzing ngam// mdzend kyis ni gsod par 'gyur// tsha gsum nim padug dang dur// khrag dang lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan ni// lan tshwa nim pa tsha ba'i mar// byugs nas
53a2(rgyud): ana'i shing la bsregs// mdzen chen pos bzung nas 'chi// ra khrag tsha ga sum nyungs mar spos// nim pa'i lo man le shAm// nyungs mar dug bsregs tsha bas 'chi// ne'u sha'am dug dang tsha// dA ru rardza
53a3(rgyud): tsha ba gsum// sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya// nyungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi// tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i 'dab la dgra ming bri// thod par dug nyungs lhan cig
53a4(rgyud): gzhag/ da ru ra lnga btsos na 'ching // ri sa ma byang du bltas nas kyang // rang nyid lho phyog blta bar bya// tshangs pa la sog lha tsho gra dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can// ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs// sa bcu'i dbang phyug
53a5(rgyud): byang chub sems// rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson// sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro// chad lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom// bstan la sdang zhing sems
53a6(rgyud): can 'tshe// mtshams med can 'di sbrul du gsol// rlung gis 'dar shing char gyis gsher// mes gdung rdul tshub skabs 'dir skye// seng ge mkha' lding stag khro bas// bcom zhing 'bru sbrang bud
53a7(rgyud): rgod kyis// khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer// mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtan no// de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa// mi rus phye mtsho ske tshe// gnod sbyin 'khrig pa dug shing la// tha dad ming
53b1(rgyud): bcas bsregs pas ni// bskad dang dbye dang spro bar byed// dur ba 'o mar bcas pas sos// da dur yan lag lnga 'bras su// tsher ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed// tsha gsum lan tshwas
53b2(rgyud): tsha rims bskyed// yang na shing skam lta bur bsgoms// dzam pa'i ra dang rang skyur bcas// dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs// khwa'i sgo e raN+Da'i mar khus// blugs pa dadur me la sreg/
53b3(rgyud): lag stobs khwa ta lta bur ni// dgra bo sa mtha' kun tu 'khyam// ske tshe mi ru se len tsha dug/ nyungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg/ dgra bo rtag tu 'thab pa dang // nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par
53b4(rgyud): 'gyur// dur khrod thal ba sol bar bcas// dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum bur mnan// tsham rngam phur bus 'debs pa ni// phol mig nad ngan skyed par byed// bya rgod 'ug pa byi la sha// ne'u le'i/
53b5(rgyud): bu rnams khyer ba'i mer// drug cu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis// mthun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges// khrag can ras la gzugs bris nas// rkang g.yon skar mnan tsham rnga ma bcas// 'dod bcas sngags
53b6(rgyud): ni drag po yis// brgyal dang rims nad mcher nad bskyed// dgra yi sgra dang rkang rjes sa// dgra gzugs dug dang ske chos byug/ chos mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur// dgra yi pha rus dug rab sbyar/
53b7(rgyud): gzug rgyad nis pa'i mid bsregs na// das po gdon canan dkyis 'das// phag tu rtsus mna'i shing // tsher mes bsregs nam go 'khor 'gyur// nebu sa kyil byi tser sla// badregs bud maud bu drag
54a1(rgyud): 'gyur// mi dang ne'u le khA rus pa// yungs mar nim pa'i me la sreg/ grong dang grong khyer bskrad par byed// stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu// sa ha me tog na le sham/ nim
54a2(rgyud): pa'i so mdug bsregs byed// nim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tshwa// da dur 'bru bsregs nad skyed byed// dug khrag de dur 'bras bu yis// nim pa'i shing la dgra ming bri// tsha gsum lan tshwa khrag gis
54a3(rgyud): byug/ lcags snod yungs mar nang bzhag nas// nim pa'i shing gi me yis btso// dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur// mi khyi bya rgod rus phye dug/ ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang // nim pa'i lnga
54a4(rgyud): dang skags lan tshwa/ tsher mes bsregs na nad kyis 'debs// ske tshe dug sbrul tsha ba'i mar// gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung // char ches pa dang thog 'bab 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal
54a5(rgyud): po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las// sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar
54a6(rgyud): nas kyang // snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do// a ma sangs rgyas thams cad la// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med// thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni// mtshungs me rgya che dam chos
54a7(rgyud): gsungs// dug gi 'jigs pas sa stengs 'khrigs// nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi// bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'di gus na// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stongs par 'gyur// de nas tshangs
54b1(rgyud): sogs 'jigs rten skyong // rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas// ngam zhing ched du brjod pa 'di// snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol// e ma sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ sems can kun la
54b2(rgyud): sman par dgyes// skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yis// mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs// gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skyong // 'gro la sman
54b3(rgyud): mthong bsgrubs pas ni// lhag pa'i bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do//
54b4(rgyud): e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// gdod nas thugs su 'gro don chud// rtog med rang bzhin las grol nas// bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang gsungs// 'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod// gnyis pa
54b5(rgyud): mthong chos dngos grub byed// de rjes 'jigs med nga yi med// dogs pa spangs na zad par gyis// sa la bzhugs nas sems can don// ma bsams thogs pa med par byed// gsang sngags rgyal po
54b6(rgyud): skyo kun la// sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste// nam mkha' chu ser dag pa ltar// skom pa bla med yid rgyas byed// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang // gcol
54b7(rgyud): me tog gtor byas te// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// 'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i// cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang // snying
55a1(rgyud): rje'i dbye bas rgyas gyur nas// mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi// 'jigs rnams lnga brgal pad+ma ltar// rnal 'byor can de mdzes par spyod// de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i/
55a2(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas// shin tu dam pas snyan tshig gis// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab// 'khor ba'i mun pa
55a3(rgyud): chen por ni/ bying bas blta dka' rtogs pa yis// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang // blta dka' 'byung po drag po rnams// lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur//
55a4(rgyud): de nas rig pa'i lha mo che// spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams// ngo mtshar gyur nas sman gdangs te// snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do// e ma sangs rgyas rmad du byung // e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che/
55a5(rgyud): e ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab// chos rnams skye med 'gag pa med// sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol pa ltar// sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa// spros pa dang bral spros pa ltar// sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar
55a6(rgyud): mdzad// de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// stong gsum mi mdzod 'jig rten khams// gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas// 'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la// ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni/
55a7(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'dis bstod do// oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa// ser sna rnam par dag nas yo byad dbang thob dang // gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// rab dga'
55b1(rgyud): se shes khro bo 'ams gsus nas rgyal 'dud/ tsaN yig dri bzang tsan dan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshel dbang ba dang // las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen/
55b2(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang nI// dri med ye shes khri rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo// Da yig tron mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i ni gnas dang // bzed pa dag pa skye ba la dbang pa dang // mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes
55b3(rgyud): bya'i stobs dang ni// 'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 'tshal lo// ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang // khams kyi
55b4(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni// 'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshal lo// hA yig ma chags shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che// bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob
55b5(rgyud): dang / thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni// sbyangs dka' ye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag 'tshal lo// ro yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob// bsam gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin
55b6(rgyud): dang ni snyoms zhugs pa'i// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stobs// mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo// Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang phyug chen po rgyal// stobs
55b7(rgyud): chen dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang // sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'khyil la 'dud// Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso/
56a1(rgyud): smon lam dag pas smon lam chel dbang pob dang // dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs// migayo ye shes khro ba stobs chen phrag 'tshal lo// hU~M yig tu la smin
56a2(rgyud): gdengs 'brug sgra gad rgyangs can// thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs// legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hUM mdzad 'dud// phaT smras
56a3(rgyud): bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs// ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang // zag pa thams cad yang dag zad pas mkhyen pa'i stobs// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod
56a4(rgyud): mdzes 'dud// de nas chos rje thub pas ni// ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas// 'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs te// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus// lag na rdo rje mthu chen la/
56a5(rgyud): snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// mi gang bsod nams dman pa 'am// mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang // rgyud 'dir/
56a6(rgyud): zhugs pa'i de ma thag gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsi bzhin du// log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang // rtog med bde ba'i skur byung ste// rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin du// rnam 'phrul sna tshogs
56a7(rgyud): cir yang snang // mu mtha' med pa 'khor ba'i mtsho// bskal pa'i gzings chen bla med 'di// chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni// khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya/ lag na rdo rje stobs pa ches/
56b1(rgyud): ston pa la ni 'di gsol to// rgyud 'di phyung ma thag tu ni// gdul dka' ba ni rab tu ni// sa steng sa na dang gdon mu ge/ bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral// slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir/
56b2(rgyud): gnu bor bdag gis gzung bar bgyi// dpa' bo ma kha' 'gro drag po rnams/ yid kyis brtul zhugs phyung nas kyang / rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang / lha dang 'jig rten pa dang n-i/
56b3(rgyud): ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma// sha za gnod sbyin srin po rnams// rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed/ rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed// ston pas gsung ba rdo rje 'dzin/ legs so shin tu cher
56b4(rgyud): legs so// rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de// rgyun du srung zhing blo 'phel mdzod// de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas// byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang // mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong //
56b5(rgyud): lha klu gnod sprin dri zar bca'// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams// dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i// mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i btson ra nas// lha klu 'bum phrag
56b6(rgyud): 'tshe bral dkar po dge ba'i kun slong rnams// skyes nas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad byung mtshar// rgyas pa'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang // 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i
56b7(rgyud): rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las/ mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / 'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so//
57a1(rgyud): rgyag skang du d+yagatu ba tin ma d+hAr Ni bod skad du 'dags pa gse na zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
57a2(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das lces ma lta bun gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la
57a3(rgyud): bder song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
