57a4(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha ma yin gyi sgra dang / rig sngags rnams dang gsang sngags dang / sman bdag gis pas
57a5(rgyud): par gyur pa mkhyen lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs rtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgra dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags/
57a6(rgyud): dang sma na rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i slad du/ rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ lha'i
57a7(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na rig sngags rnams dang gsang sngags rnams dang sman
57b1(rgyud): rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir 'dir rig sngags brjod par byaste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad zlog par byed pa/ gsang
57b2(rgyud): sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang sman thams
57b3(rgyud): cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du/ gzhan mu
57b4(rgyud): sngags can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas
57b5(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tsha ba rnams kyi sgyu dang rig sngags dang
57b6(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen po de ngas bshad par byas/ ko'u shika khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir/ gsang
57b7(rgyud): sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig
58a1(rgyud): sngags chen po gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to// tad+yathA/ oM hi ni hi ni/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ hi mi li/ ni hir pA ni/ kar+N+Na nA pa ti/ lo kA ma te
58a2(rgyud): b+hU te b+hU ta/ man+ta/ a d+hi kr-i te bede be de ta man+t+ra/ a d+hi kr-i te/ ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ya bi dza ye/ dzastA ni/ stas+thA ni ban d+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ a ma
58a3(rgyud): g+he shak+ti d+ha re Ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kA Da ma mAn si/ dzam+b+ha ya dzap+tA ya/ b+hany+dza la bAny+dza ya/ stam+b+ha ya stap+ta ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+har+N+Na ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgyu dang / klu'i sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / srin po'i
58a4(rgyud): sgyu dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgyu dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgra dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgra dang /
58a5(rgyud): drang srong gi spu dang / sems can dang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi spya dang / 'byung po'i spu dang / sgyu thams cad ra lar la radzA radz+dza/ d+hu ma d+hu sa/ d+hu d+hu ma/ rU ba rA ba rA ba na/ tsakrAn tan/ glan rdza ni
58a6(rgyud): ha na ha na/ sarba bid+d+ha/ shatA NAn/ stAm+b+ha ya/ b+ha yun stam+b+ha ya/ sUr+ya na stam+b+ha ya/ so nan stam+b+ha ya/ ba ru Na na/ stam+b+ha ya/ ag+nin stam+b+ha ya/ u da nan d+hi ti d+hi ti/ d+hA ra Ni/ pA sha ha ste/
58a7(rgyud): be+eSh+Ta ma pA shen/ gang dag bdage la phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan par
58b1(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad han ha na/ da gad ha/ btsa pa tsa/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya / stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo hA sa/ ma hA mo ha ni/ b+ha ga ba ti swAhA
58b2(rgyud): bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig phaT swAhA/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ rgyal
58b3(rgyud): po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes su dran par byed na/ de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // de'i sde la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so// lhas ma yin/
58b4(rgyud): klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/ mi 'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin// mtha'
58b5(rgyud): 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol
58b6(rgyud): g+hi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang / dug dang / rig sngagra dang / gsang sngag sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so// gang gis
58b7(rgyud): sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba de nyid la sngar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong dge slong
59a1(rgyud): ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la lan bdun bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na/ bdag gi lus
59a2(rgyud): srung bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang sman thams
59a3(rgyud): cad dang / byad thams cad las shin tu bzlas par 'dod pas/ gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang
59a4(rgyud): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'dul bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o// lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba 'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas pas
59a5(rgyud): bdag bsrung bar bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te 'chang bar bya/ mgul du gdags par bya'o// yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags
59a6(rgyud): g.yul du zhugs na/ dge ba dang bde bar thar par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dag pa dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur ro// ma grub pa
59a7(rgyud): rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas/ srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor na/ bcings pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// sgyu rengs
59b1(rgyud): par byas par 'dod pas/ dur khrod kyi sa la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na/ sgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed pas/ zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos
59b2(rgyud): nasmra ba thams cad kyi lan thabs par 'gyur ro// bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gang gis byas par
59b3(rgyud): gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o// srud bu btags sam/ chus bdag bsrung bar byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams
59b4(rgyud): cad kyis mi tshugs so// ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi/
59b5(rgyud): rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
59b6(rgyud): dran shil dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang btsos nas gtan la phab pa/ 'i phag
59b7(rgyud): be sU n-i ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// namaHsarba
60a1(rgyud): bud+d+ha ba bo d+hi satwA nAn/ sa man+ta a mo g+ha/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nAn/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA yA/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/ badz+ra satwA ya/ badz+ra bi pu lA ya/
60a2(rgyud): pad+ma saM b+ha bA ya/ pad+ma yon ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM hrIHka ra/ shrI kar pra b+ha ka ra badz+ra satwA/ badz+ra saM b+ha bi/ pad+ma saM b+ha ba pad+me sA ga ra/ pad+ma go tsa ra/ ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ka ru Na saM b+ha ba hUM hUM/ d+ha ra
60a3(rgyud): d+ha ri/ dar der/ ba ra bar/ ma hA kA ru NaM ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwa swe hA/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
60a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan
60a5(rgyud): po legs so legs so// 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o// gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa
60a6(rgyud): des ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bdag po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing 'jig rten gyi khams gsum po
60a7(rgyud): kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
60b1(rgyud): la sa'i dbang phyug dbang po rnam par brtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba/ srid gsum ma lus yon tan chen po'i bdag/ dri med
60b2(rgyud): skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/ rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa'o// bskal pa bzang po rnam par zhi ba'i mchog/ shin tu rnam dag yon tan
60b3(rgyud): chen po'i bdag/ rnam dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod// rab mchog srid gsum dag gri mig gcig pa// mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes// dpag med pas kyang dpag med
60b4(rgyud): bskal par 'byung // skyabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing sel bar mdzad// nor bu'i thod can rdo rje las byung ba// srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan// thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun pas
60b5(rgyud): dpa'// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog/ snyan cha 'gul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams// dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i thor tsugs can// tshul bzang yon tan skyed du 'tshams pa'i
60b6(rgyud): gzugs// 'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can// dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa stsol ba'i rgyu// tshul gyi longs spyod pade can mchog gi rgyu// dkyil 'khor mchog gi spyod yul rgyu gcig pa// srid gsum
60b7(rgyud): sgrol ba'i zam pa gcig pu lags// dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa// gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur// sa brnyas 'od zer rgyas
61a1(rgyud): brgyan 'phreng mngag/ chen po'i che ba thogs pa med pa ste// snga ma mun pa kun pas la nyon mongs med// dge bu dag pas spyod yul rnam par dag/ tshul gyi dkyil 'khor yangs
61a2(rgyud): shing rnam par dag/ srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung ba// srid gsum bde chen yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste// dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab
61a3(rgyud): mchog yangs// nor bu'i rgyun te rdo rje'i rgyan du thogs// pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba// dge snod yon tan chen po'i snod gcig pa// bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdagasmon lam rgya
61a4(rgyud): che rgya mtsho ldan pa ste// 'gro ba srid par ltung ba 'grol mdzad pa// sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad// bskal bzang bskal pa stong gis gnang ba po// rdo rje mchog gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor
61a5(rgyud): can/ yon tan rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor ba// dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsa la mnga' ba// de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can// cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan// lha
61a6(rgyud): chen brgya mnga' sum cu gsum bdag dbang // lha dang lha min dbang bcas rnams kyis btud// brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsa la stobs mnga'// bsod nams brgya mang mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/
61a7(rgyud): pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung // dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste// chos brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po// sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa// bskal pa rab 'byam
61b1(rgyud): mang por mkhas pa ste/ dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po// rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// rab dga' bsgyings pa
61b2(rgyud): 'thor mdzad me tog thod/ na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad pa// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa lags/ cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes// dpa' bo'i nyi ma 'od zer
61b3(rgyud): rgyan mnga' ba// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing // nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa// me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags// gtsug pud gsum pa tshangs sras skye
61b4(rgyud): dgu'i bdag / btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes// rang gi rigs gsal dbang chen dkyil 'khor ba// pad+ma bzang po'i rigs mchog thig le'i mtshan// spyan bzang dge ba'i
61b5(rgyud): lha rnams rten gyur pa// gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po// tshogs chen 'dun ma 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags// spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor mdzes gyur pa/
61b6(rgyud): ka la bing ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul// mda' dang rus gzhu stobs chen mtshon chu bsnams// stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul// rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste// rgyal
61b7(rgyud): ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod// tshogs mchog dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa// chu srin 'dzin khri 'jigs las rab grol mdzad// gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa//
62a1(rgyud): lha yul grol ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can// mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'// stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan// 'jig rten nang na
62a2(rgyud): mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs// sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can// 'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes// nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa// mtha' dang bral ba
62a3(rgyud): kun tu gzigs pa ste// rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can// don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba// theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags// dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa
62a4(rgyud): brnyes// skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom// blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po// bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can// bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzod// rtag tu
62a5(rgyud): dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa'o// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo// bde la longs spyod che 'byung dri ma med// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa// ming dang srid med brgya byin lag
62a6(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po// stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags// sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs// dge 'dun
62a7(rgyud): mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'// khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs// khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i// rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag
62b1(rgyud): 'tshal lo// pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/ zor tsugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs// spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun
62b2(rgyud): sel ba// rnga chen spa ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa// mchog chen rdo rje'i glu la bstod pa yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mnga'// ci ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/
62b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa// des ni ring po mi thogs yon tan gyi// longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur// mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la// spyan ras gzis
62b4(rgyud): dbang dam pa sbyin par byed// sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur// 'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob// de ni sdig pa'i dri mas ma gos te/ lam srang bzang por dmigs te 'gro bar 'gyur//
62b5(rgyud): srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma skyes// de 'dra'i chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur// de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing // gang zhig rtag tu bde bar 'dod pa yis// 'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag
62b6(rgyud): po spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis// bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
62b7(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
63a1(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas rang gi snying po gsungs pa na ma s+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAn sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ tad+ya thA oM swa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru
63a2(rgyud): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra ma hA b+ha ra/ kasma kas+pha/ ma hA kam+ba hU~M/ ma hA s+pha ra Na/ d+harma a gra sA gar swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
63a3(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma gzungs chen po ni yon tan che ba ste/ mtha' yas par khyab pa bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston/
63a4(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pagrangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa// sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang // 'jug pa dang // rmi lam ngan pa dang
63a5(rgyud): ltas ngan pa thams cad las thar par byed pa'o// sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa yongs su thar par byed pa de shin tu dkon pa'o// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pas
63a6(rgyud): nor bu'i non pan gyis bsgyings pa/ rgyan 'phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/
63a7(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa// rgyal tsha ba mi yi bdag po ste/ 'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal// dar ba chen po mngon par rgyas// tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste// de bzhin
63b1(rgyud): gshegs shing rdul dang bral// dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa// sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon/ rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon// yon tan 'od rgyas
63b2(rgyud): bsgyings pa ste/ nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa// srid gsum dgun dpa'i bo'i sku// rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can// spun po zla 'byin ti se yi// rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po//
63b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa// rab tu dga' ba de bzhin des// yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha// che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing // sangs/
63b4(rgyud): rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// ti sa zla 'byin bzhin du gnas// sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa// rdo rje'i pad+ma
63b5(rgyud): legs par skyes// chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod// sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'// snang bar mdzes pa 'byung ba'o// srid gsum ye shes nyi ma lags// gtso bo chen po cher grags pa//
63b6(rgyud): seng ge chen po stobs po che// cha lugs chen po zhal che ba// skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul// rdo rje pU ru bai DUR+Ya// nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs// byu ru gser gyi gcal bkram la// sku chen
63b7(rgyud): zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs// zhal gdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi// lcang le cod pan dbu thod can// rigs sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la gtugs// rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod// nor bu rgyan
64a1(rgyud): 'gul 'od zer gyis// brang gi phyogs rnams dag par byas// cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba// nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan// rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing // dri med
64a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro// rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi// 'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can// 'od zer mang pos phog pa yi// phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa// brjid pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa yi
64a3(rgyud): 'od kyi zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod// dpung rgyan 'od zer spel bar bkod// tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher// lhun po phrad cing 'khrug pa ltar// ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrog/ rdo rje chen
64a4(rgyud): po'i rtse mo can// shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos// btsan pa kun las rnam par rgyal// snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste// mtshon cha chen po shin tu
64a5(rgyud): 'bar// byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can// kun nas dpa' ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// ma pham thub med dam pa ste// sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che// byams pa'i snying po snying po che// byams
64a6(rgyud): pa'i pad+ma las byung ba// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can// rdo rje'i bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ba// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud// de bzhin bsten cing bstod pa'o// grub pa chen po'i rig
64a7(rgyud): sngags grub// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad// thams cad grub mdzad grub pa'o// sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen lags// gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges// mdo sde'i
64b1(rgyud): bkod pa mdo sdud pa// nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sngon gyi// snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad// 'bar ba rtsa mur 'od snang ba// dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste// gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos dbyings dang //
64b2(rgyud): nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges// swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog/ 'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad// stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa// nyim 'dra ste snyoms pa lags// stobs byed rgyal ba'i
64b3(rgyud): longs spyod ldan// mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can// dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad// rdo rje chen po rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med// dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston// rlung
64b4(rgyud): chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yis// g.yo dang 'brug sgrog sgra ldan pa// sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste// de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes// mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes// khyab bdag sangs
64b5(rgyud): rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nas sa'i dbang phyug po// byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la// bstod nas kun mkhyen gnod bral ba// thub pa'i nyi mas bka' stsal pa/ kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad
64b6(rgyud): mchog/ ming gi yon tan 'od ldan la// bde dang phun sum tshogs sgrub pa// thabs chen bla na med pa ste// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// 'jig rten kun gyi bde byed pa// 'di ni ba
64b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi// byams pa bstod pa'i gnas po la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis// rmi ni la la gang bstod pa//
65a1(rgyud): de la lha la sogs kun dang // lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams// rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun// gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog
65a2(rgyud): myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni// sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te// 'di la the tsom yong med do// nang por mal nas langs nas ni// gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod// de la byams par rtog
65a3(rgyud): pa yi// byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur// de phyir dri ma thams cad rnam par sel byed cing // sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi// ming brgya
65a4(rgyud): rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs// 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / oM AHmai traM ma~M swAhA/
65a5(rgyud): 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'di 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil
65a6(rgyud): dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i spyod yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// oM swa sti ka mA lak+Shi bi bu la sam+b+ha ba d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swAhA/
65a7(rgyud): gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa'ang g.yos par gyur/ rje bo che dag gi sgra'ang grag par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs
65b1(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil
65b2(rgyud): 'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
65b3(rgyud): cad kyi ma rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la/ shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma lta bur
65b4(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gas so// nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad snang bar byed do// zla ba lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad rab tu sim par byed de/
65b5(rgyud): nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so// sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te/ mtho dman med do// lhun po lta bur 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyis
65b6(rgyud): bskyod par mi nus so// thar pa lta bur 'gyur te/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so// de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrangs pa tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang /
65b7(rgyud): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rjed pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gang ci'ang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod
66a1(rgyud): byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jigs
66a2(rgyud): pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / mgon med pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la ka bde ba dang /
66a3(rgyud): 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod pa dang / ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang gzha bton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang rgyan sna tshogs/
66a4(rgyud): bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam
66a5(rgyud): mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog/ 'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'// sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog/ thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel// kun mkhyen
66a6(rgyud): tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen// thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen// lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen// dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen//
66a7(rgyud): 'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog/ lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog/ rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang mi 'dzin mchog/ dag mchog stobs mchog mchog/
66b1(rgyud): dang mchog min mchog/ zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab// 'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rgyan gyi rab// rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab// mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab/
66b2(rgyud): legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min sgron// thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron// dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu 'od kyi sgron// rgyu skar zla ba'i rgyan las shar ba'i sgron// mchog 'od
66b3(rgyud): yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od// legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/ 'od chen gti mug rab tu 'byed pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba// rdo rje'i dbang po'i 'dren dbang
66b4(rgyud): sems can dbang // rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgyan dbang po// rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun chad med dbang // dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid gsum dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo 'od
66b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas rgyan/ rdo rje'i 'od can rdo 'dzin rdo rje drag/ rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang // na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/ sku mdog sngo zhing sde
66b6(rgyud): ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams// mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs// lha gzhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar// rab tu dral le 'od zer 'phro
66b7(rgyud): shing 'gyur// sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed 'phreng mchog can// glog gi stobs kyis snang bas sgeg la brten// ral gri mtshon thogs dang ldan mthu stobs mtshon// rdo yi mtshon thogs mda'
67a1(rgyud): dang mdung thung 'jigs// 'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul// gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms pa// bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag
67a2(rgyud): rdo rje dbyug/ sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan// grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad// mu tig 'phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis// sku mdzes brnyas shing phun sum tshogs
67a3(rgyud): pa brnyes// rab 'jam mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes// mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la// rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa// bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren
67a4(rgyud): pa// cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren// byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren// legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying brtse can// dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs
67a5(rgyud): 'bar// rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can// 'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen// longs spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug/ sku dmar sku mthon sku mdzes sku
67a6(rgyud): bzang ba// sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku// sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spun legs sku// rigs sku rig sngags 'chang po rin chen bsnams// gtsug gi nor bu gtsug can cod pan mchog/ cod pan
67a7(rgyud): can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog/ dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog/ sngags bzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs// rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu// srid gsum nyis
67b1(rgyud): gcig du 'od stong mnga'// ri rtser 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa// yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags// nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od// nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar//
67b2(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu// nam mkha'i dkyil nas nor bu gcig snang ba// sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags// srid gsum bsrung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog
67b3(rgyud): zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os stag/ skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad+ma skyes// kun nas 'od bzang legs bshad chos mnga' ba// dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag/ blo bzang 'od
67b4(rgyud): bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang // mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan// zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas// 'od kyi byung gnas bde mdzad dbang du mdzad// legs 'byung
67b5(rgyud): shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa// snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad// rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo// blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags//
67b6(rgyud): kun tu longs spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog/ blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs// sangs rgyas pad+ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal// dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thud// snying po/
67b7(rgyud): gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul// ngo bo nyid kyi rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba// spyan zur mda' ni rab dul gtad legs pa// 'jig med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra// mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog/
68a1(rgyud): mtshon cha rdzogs// drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes// rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris pa sba// rab tu drag pa gnyen rab gser mdog can/ lA
68a2(rgyud): chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams// spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel// 'od bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'/ na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tsha bas cher
68a3(rgyud): 'phen// legs bris sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mda'// na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal// zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra// zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad//
68a4(rgyud): bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mda'// zhal mdangs rgya mtshogs la mdzad lam me ga/ dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin// sgra snyan snang
68a5(rgyud): bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/ blo gros chen po blo gros rna ba'i mchog/ rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras
68a6(rgyud): 'phreng ba bzang // stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid// skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags// mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris skyed pa'i rgyu// rgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda'
68a7(rgyud): dang rdo rje can// mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan// ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs// gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad// brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/
68b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags// gcig pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen// rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes// dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas/
68b2(rgyud): gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags// skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang // sdig 'joms mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/ bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/
68b3(rgyud): 'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang // nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi// mdun 'dug nang bar bstod pa 'di brjod gang // de ni srid gsum sems can mchog 'gyur zhing // dri ma'i
68b4(rgyud): gnas kun las kyang thar par 'gyur/ g.yul dang 'thab rtsod da shin tu mi bzad dang // mu ge'i gnod pa mi nang byung ba na// mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed nas/ nam mkha'i snying po la ni bstod
68b5(rgyud): byed pa/ de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang // sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol// des ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/
68b6(rgyud): bde 'thong longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am/ rgyal srid 'tho ba deng byad gzugs nor 'thob dang / rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi ga'i sgrub phyir/ bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tso ba med/
68b7(rgyud): de bying ci ste nag tu 'did pa de sum 'dod na 'gre bkun la gcig dpa' ba/ nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum mgon po la/ rtag tu brtan cing sngags kyang bstan par bgyi/ 'phags pa nas
69a1(rgyud): mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya
69a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po kun tu bzang po nam mkha'i dkyil kun rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal
69a3(rgyud): bar brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid bsgres pa// gzugs sna tshogs can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang rab mchog
69a4(rgyud): dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i skus kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can
69a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po snyoms par zhugs
69a6(rgyud): ma thag pa de'i tshe/ stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i
69a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang
69b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs te bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig
69b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog/ lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do//
69b3(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na ma s+t+ri/ b+hu ba na/ shwa re/ mahA/ b+ho gA ya/ a sa ma sa/ a mr-i ta sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ban sam/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra mAr+tha sa ma/
69b4(rgyud): swa b+hA ba sa ma/ tarba tA sa ma/ a ra dze sa ma/ shud+d+hi sam/ bud+d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA nA ya sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+he/ A lo ka/ hI hI/ lad+d+ha lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya/
69b5(rgyud): badz+ra/ oM/ pra sa g+ha tA/ nA ma na ya/ has/ ni rid+hiShAn/ se b+ho ga/ oM a na la ya la ya/ d+harma ar+tha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dzaya/ hUM hU~M/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swAH/ de nas rgyal ba'i sras ky-i thu /
69b6(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ sa'i dkyil
69b7(rgyud): 'khor g.yo bar byas nas 'di skad ces smras te/ 'jig rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so// de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor
70a1(rgyud): nas 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la/ rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra byung
70a2(rgyud): te spras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing /
70a3(rgyud): sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i
70a4(rgyud): bag chags sel cing nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skams la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par
70a5(rgyud): bsags shing / bde bar gshegs 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyi sa bon ma bsgrubs la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa
70a6(rgyud): rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na gzung ba dang bklag pa dang / kun chub par bya ba lta ci
70a7(rgyud): smos gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka' 'o// kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o//
70b1(rgyud): 'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o// yon tan thams cad yang dag par
70b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'o// 'di lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las thur par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod/
70b3(rgyud): patsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'chag
70b4(rgyud): bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// shing gcig bsgrengs kyi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// 'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sems/
70b5(rgyud): can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po thob par 'gyur la/ nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
70b6(rgyud): pa kun tu bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pa mchod nas lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du
70b7(rgyud): nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pa de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de chos kyi snang ba chen po'ang stsol bar mdzad/
71a1(rgyud): do// 'di skad du/ rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so// khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/ khyod tshe brjes nas sa chen po thob par
71a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung ngo // de nas lus bde ba dang sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro// mthu che ba dang
71a3(rgyud): che bar grags par yang 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo // nang par langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o//
71a4(rgyud): sems can thams cad la'ang phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom pa
71a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro// lha la sogs pa'ang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed
71a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i gtsug pud la sogs pa steng gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang /
71a7(rgyud): spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje'i zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen
71b1(rgyud): morna mas dang / rin chen du ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo grol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang dang chen dang /
71b2(rgyud): gzugs bzang dang shin tu bstan sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon rnams dang / gno nu rnams dang bra rnams dang bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'phyen chen po rnams
71b3(rgyud): dang / sus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams drang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog med la sogs
71b4(rgyud): pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi
71b5(rgyud): snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi bdag/ rdo rje chen po dgyes pa
71b6(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po stobs po che// gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/ khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/ rdo rje chen po rab tu bshad// sgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/ rol mo chen
71b7(rgyud): bos rnam par rol/ rab dga' chen pos 'dul ba po// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag sa stengs sa 'og sa la dgyes// de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa// dul/
72a1(rgyud): dang sbyin pa'i go rims thabs// rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags// bshes gnyen can te bzod la dgyes// brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che// brtson 'grus
72a2(rgyud): bcu dang thabs bcu pa// stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste// mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang // yongs su ldan zhing bcu sol ba// rdul sel rgya mtsho chen po ste// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ba/
72a3(rgyud): rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs// cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang // shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa// snying po chen po las byung ba// nyon mongs bral ba thub par
72a4(rgyud): dka'// sa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' dang // rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can// gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs// rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra// rmugs dang spro ba zhi bar mdzad// thub par/
72a5(rgyud): dka' ba'i chen mongs 'jil// g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes pa ste// g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa// gsung bzang ngang pa'i mdangs su bzhad// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/
72a6(rgyud): dbang po'i las lhag thub dang mnyam// chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan// rab dra ga'i bun longs ni mdzad pa// nyon mongs 'das rdzab skams par mdzad// dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sel// khro ngan
72a7(rgyud): dregs pa rnam par 'joms// gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang mnyam// mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang // mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das// sangs rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig/ byang chub snying po
72b1(rgyud): rgyartser rol// rim par baspyo dge ba ste// sman pabang dus sum tshogs pa dge / bcang ma las bzang sbyin mdzad pa// dag mdzad sreg mdzad mchog sbyin po// 'joms byed bgegs rnams rnam par 'do/
72b2(rgyud): 'tho ba mdzad depe med gsung ba po// rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba// skyes pa dud med tshogs kyi bdag/ nges par yon tan 'byod mdzad pa// sems can 'khor ba'i mdzad pa// brtan po sdig pa rnams dang
72b3(rgyud): bral// kun tu rgyus rgyal snang ba po// kun tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor can// kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad// kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags// mi bzang sa 'og rnam par dkrugs// de bzhin zad mdzad thug
72b4(rgyud): bar mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs// nyon mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad// 'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phrog mdzad pa// rgyags shing dodo zhi bar mdzad// rdo rje chen po stobs bskyed pa/
72b5(rgyud): sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms// pha rol zhugs pa'i sdig sel ba// dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can// dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin// 'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa// ye shes sbyin zhing
72b6(rgyud): bsod nams sbyin// longs spyod sbyin ning rgyal sbyin pa// dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin pa// nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can// gzugs bzhin dbang po rnam par rgyal// dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/
72b7(rgyud): bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs// sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po// dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa// 'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad// rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam// sgron ma mun sel
73a1(rgyud): gas pa na/ yon nas shes ceg gyiman/ ban 'chog che pa'i chos da na// gsung bachen po shes rade/ sangs rgyas tshul nir bston pa// mchod pa chen po pos/
73a2(rgyud): chen gyi/ theg paza na med par dran/ bcod pa chen po'i chos che ga 'bras bu chen po chos kyi mchog smon mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po// zhi ba de bzhin ni mdzad pa/
73a3(rgyud): bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid// kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad pa// snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen// snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs/ dus
73a4(rgyud): chen rnam par dag par mdzad// mtsho mchog dang ba rab mtho ba// rtsod chen 'das pa spyod yul can// skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa// rnyed par dka' ba'i dal 'byor can// kun tu spyod pa khong dge
73a5(rgyud): gdaga' ba'i dam pa sbyin pa po// kun tu yul kun mnga' ba ste// zhes bzang po rtag tu mnga'// dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lags// zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs//
73a6(rgyud): mkhas brgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen// spyod yul gcig la gnas pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mkhyen// slob dpon chen po grags pa che// dam pa
73a7(rgyud): nyid de bla na med// gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad// de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni// yon tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas// dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs// yon tan 'byung ba rig sngags rgyal//
73b1(rgyud): gtsu nor du thogs sa sogs// bachog rnams kyis ni bskyod nas kyang // sdug bsngal chu ba bcom pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs// kye ma bsod pa chen po brgya// ming brgyu/
73b2(rgyud): brgyad dum pa sbyin// mi rnams la la gang zhig gis// sdig pas la kun tu dbang po la// snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na// des ni sangs rgyas nyi kyang 'thob// gang zhig ming brgyargya brgyad 'dos/
73b3(rgyud): mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing // de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi// ye shes ma lus smra bar nas// de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spobs las nges par 'byung 'gyur zhing /
73b4(rgyud): yon tan sna tshogs byung dang 'jig rten no// yan chad dag gis yon tan rgyas rnams lus// bstod pa chen po rnams byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyid re bstod byas na// gobs bcu mnga' ba'i phur
73b5(rgyud): 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
73b6(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' semadas chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang
73b7(rgyud): gi snying po smras pa/ oM badz+ra tsaH/ sarba du dz+nyAn ta// han dag pa tsa hU~M phaT/ de nas gzungs 'di bshad ma zag tus chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams kyang /
74a1(rgyud): sgrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to// lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang rgyan gyi char
74a2(rgyud): chen po phab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du/ rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas dka' stsal pa/ snang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag bcang skrag par ma byed cig/ rdo rje 'chang gis
74a3(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba legs so// rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang
74a4(rgyud): dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang /
74a5(rgyud): stobs skyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa skyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'joms
74a6(rgyud): pa dang / snang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dugasal ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang
74a7(rgyud): nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / nongs par bgyis pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pazhi par bgyid pa dang / mtshams
74b1(rgyud): ma mchis bzlog pa dang / drilas ngan pani bar byed pa dang / bkrami shis bzhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal skyed pa dang / skal ba bzang por bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar
74b2(rgyud): bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi gnod pa
74b3(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byang stems dang / ro langs kyi
74b4(rgyud): sbrer ba chen po dang / spyod pa dang / srog 'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jig pa chen po byung ba na/ nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la/ bcom
74b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur zhing / grub pa chen po'ang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du'ang rgyal bar 'gyur te/
74b6(rgyud): sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyobs pa dang / sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so// de nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas/ rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa
74b7(rgyud): brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che// rdo rje snying po stobs po che// rdo rje 'khrug pa zhags pa che// snying rje chen po stobs
75a1(rgyud): po che/ rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje hUM gi hU~M lags te// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs pa po// chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che// chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/
75a2(rgyud): phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste// spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags// rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che// mthon mthing dbus spras brgyan pa lags// ral gri sngon po ral gri che// dkyil 'khor sngon po'i
75a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor can// mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sdeb// 'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang ldan// rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs// rdo rje spro ba'i stobs che ga// khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che// sel mdzad che ba'i rgyags
75a4(rgyud): pa sel// khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu gtod// khro bo bgegs ris sel bar mdzad// gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams pa ste// rdo rje'i mdas ni nges par 'gums// dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/
75a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms// rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog rab tu khro// sna tshogs sku ste thig las bris// gzi brjid skyed pa glags mdzad pa/ bzod par dka' ba reg
75a6(rgyud): mi bzod// sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa// drag po chen po rdo rjekhro// skyel byed drag po skyel bar mdzad// gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs// rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'// rgya mtsho ldan
75a7(rgyud): po'i dpung dang ldan// dam pa'i ti sa lhun po'i ri// gang rgyangs chen pos bkang pa po// spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum// rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje rngan// rig sngags 'chang chen mangs
75b1(rgyud): bdag lags/ na bza' gong rtsa dmar gsol// mthon kan bza' mngon la dgyes// srin po srung badrug po ste/ me tog 'phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes/ nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od// 'od zer brgya phrag
75b2(rgyud): rab tu byed/ grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po// rab mchog rab mchog rnams kyis mchod// mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngob// mgur babang kal bzang dam pa lags/ cod pan chen po rdo rje'i
75b3(rgyud): 'o// phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa// ye shes che ldan srung ba che// rlung mar lags te spyod yul ring // gtso bo sbol mdzad pa rol gshegs// 'jigs las sgrol ba rab 'jigs pa/
75b4(rgyud): rgya chen gtsug na nor bu thogs// mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon// 'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig/ gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug phud gsum// 'dod pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshon// za ba po
75b5(rgyud): ste 'jigs par mdzad// mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa// tsham tshom med de srin las byung // rtag par dkar dgyes dus 'byor pa// rgyu skar rgyal ris 'phel bar mdzad// rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste
75b6(rgyud): bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa legs// be DUn ltar dri med su// mdzes shing sto bas skyed sna tshogs stobs// dga' bskyed pa dga' bar mdzad/ dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog/ lha chen dpa' bo
75b7(rgyud): chen po ste/ brtan pa dpa' bo lasam pa// bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod// dam du 'ching ba'i rtsa la mnga' ba// mtshon cha che rdzoms cod pan can// rig sngags 'chang gi tshogs dga' ba/ bad+ma chen po phyag ring /
76a1(rgyud): pad+ma las byung bad+ma'i mdog/ nag po chen po 'byung po che// gtum chen thog thog chen po ste// rlung chen bshad mo 'byung ba dang // rdo rje mtshon chab rgya rdzogs pa/ rtul po thub pa
76a2(rgyud): brtson pa ste// 'byung po chen po tshogs kyi rje// zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon// brag gi rtse mo rnam par 'gems// rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje lcags mdas sreg mdzad pa/
76a3(rgyud): rdo rje mdas ni rnam par spyod// rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje bzang po rdo rje rdul// ye shes dam pa theg pa che// thabs brnyes snying rje chen po lags// rdo rje chen po rjed mo can// spyan bzang rnam par
76a4(rgyud): gzigs pa po// rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan/ mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen// rdo rje chen po dgon pa po// rdo rjes 'og 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje chen po gang rgyangs sgrog/ me tog/
76a5(rgyud): chun po 'od gsal ba// dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras// des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags// sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog/ rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje gtsug sdud shes rab
76a6(rgyud): can// rdo rje bkod pa rab tu mdzes// mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag/ bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags// dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang // rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed// gsang ba pa skye
76a7(rgyud): gsang ba gsung // skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba// rdo rje thog thog sgra chen srog/ rdo rje'i sgra de rnam par 'joms// rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ nor bu spras pa'i na bza' gsol/
76b1(rgyud): spos dang me tog 'phreng gis brgyan// dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags// sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po// rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// dbang phyug chen po grags pa che// dkyil 'khor slob
76b2(rgyud): dpon dkyil 'khor ban// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po// dbu rgyan con pan kun nas bcings// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag
76b3(rgyud): gis bstod// de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa// rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi// rdo rje brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/ ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad
76b4(rgyud): ba 'di// dad pas gang zhing 'chang byed pa// grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // nyes pa kun las rnam par grol// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rje'i
76b5(rgyud): yon tan che// gang zhig nang bar langs nas brjod// de ni sdig pa kun las grol// ngan 'gro kun las thar par 'gyur// gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di// su zhig nang par langs nas brjod//
76b6(rgyud): rgyal po blon po grong khyer pa// gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur// bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa// 'jig rten thams cad de dbang 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / tshe dang bsod nams
76b7(rgyud): 'phel bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa bzhin// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ gang zhiganang bar langs nas ni// lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod// de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang // ldan 'gyur
77a1(rgyud): 'di la the tsom med// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // 'jigs byed rgyal po rnam kyis kyang // zil gyis mnan par mi nus so//
77a2(rgyud): shes rab can ni gang zhig gis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang // bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di// nges par gnas
77a3(rgyud): shing gtsang mar 'don// mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi// bde ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
77a4(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha'
77a5(rgyud): dag ma lus par khyab cing / mchog tu rmad du byung ba'i rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/
77a6(rgyud): yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis rgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs brten gyi pad+ma la lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tsugs dang cod ngan
77a7(rgyud): kyi rtse mos gtugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ho/
77b1(rgyud): mahA ma Ni ru tsi ka lA pa bi tsid+d+ha/ muk+sha dAm a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ pa ra ma sata mo tsakA/ tathA ga ta mahA d+harma/ koShad+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harmA/ lab d+ha/ bi dza ya/
77b2(rgyud): su rata/ bzlog pa dang sha ka/ kle sha gar pra sha ma ka/ shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba/ a nu swa ni/ mahA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/ ba ra ta/ ba ra Na da da/ oM mahA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa
77b3(rgyud): ma sam/ anan+ta sa ma sa man+ta/ b+hadra/ sa man+ta san+d+ha ra/ sa san+ta A ka raM/ saM man+ta pra sa ra/ sar sa ra/ he he man+dA ra ba/ mahA badz+ra ma hA lan/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hiH
77b4(rgyud): bi ra dza bi ra dza/ karma a ba ga ma ka/ ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+had+ha/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA/ ma hA mahA/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hI ma b+hI ma/ na dan da
77b5(rgyud): sa ra sa ra/ ma hA be d+hi satwa/ mo tsa ya/ mA ma nA tha/ ma nu sri ta/ a bA ya duHkhan su khaM da ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ a nA pro haM/ duHkhi te haM/ sa ra dzo haM/ u pad dru to ha/ a bi bak+to haM/ ku sI do
77b6(rgyud): haM/ mA ra Na d+harmo haM/ tA na b+ha ga bAn/ duHkhi tA nAn/ su khan da dA/ a nA dz+nyA nAn/ sa nA thA ka ra/ sa re dza saM/ bI ra dza ska ra/ u pad dru tA mAn/ sa ro pa tra ba/ pra sha ma ka/ a bi big tA nAn/ ku shwa
77b7(rgyud): la sam+b+ha ra/ pa ri pA ri yi tA/ ku si dA nAn/ ma hA bIr+ya da ta/ ma ra Na/ d+harmi Na/ ma mi ta/ ba dA dA tA/ ma ma bi b+hi ga ban/ nA tho b+ha ba/ shA ra NAM/ pa ra yA nAM tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni/ me pre sha ma ya/
78a1(rgyud): sarba kle shar dzi si mi/ a ba na ya/ sarba san/ sa ro pa dra ba/ duHkha ni ma/ nA sha ya/ sarba ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ra ma me/ ku ru/ sarba karma/ a bA ra Na/ kle sha pa rat+na
78a2(rgyud): mami bi ki ra/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa si bi d+hi bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo gam+be/ sin+na yo dza ya/ A ba ra Na/ d+harma/ bi rA ga par dza/ sany+tsa ha pra dza ha/ d+ha ri Na/ sa mkhas ma dza la ni d+hi sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ mahA
78a3(rgyud): d+hI satwa Da ba rad swAhA/ rig sngags don kun grub pa 'di// 'jas pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// de ma thag tu sems can rnams// skye dang rga ba zad par gyur// ngan 'gro thams cad ni gyur nas// bdud
78a4(rgyud): kyi snga rnams rab tu 'dir// lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'// log 'dren rnams ni skrag par gyur// sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi// gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang // grangs med phrag ni dung phyur
78a5(rgyud): snyed/ 'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrubs shing // gang tshe rig sngags bshad pa na// brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas//
78a6(rgyud): rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i// sa gzhi de yi tshe na g.yos// sangs rgyas 'od kyis snang ba yis// sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // srin po mi bzang gzugs/
78a7(rgyud): can rnams// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes// skad phyung tshig ni mthun par sla// lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can// thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ gang na rdo rje ral gri che
78b1(rgyud): de yi drung lhags spras pa ni// phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la// shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can// bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/
78b2(rgyud): sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang // sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag/ shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs// drag po drag po rab 'joms pa// gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i
78b3(rgyud): dpal// dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe// rdo rje can de snying skyer ba// mi shes pa yi rab rib sal// sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba// skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes// gaT
78b4(rgyud): stobs can la phyag ring ba// nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad// mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// me tog 'phreng rgyan sna tshogs can// spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste// dgyes
78b5(rgyud): shing na bza' sna tshogs gsol// 'jam pa'i dbyangs te rab tu bshad// dkar gnag 'byed pa'i spun mnga' ba// ha ha'i sgra ni rab tu bsgrags// rab tu dga' ba ston par dga'// rgyan chen gser gyi
78b6(rgyud): mdog dang ldan// rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can// tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste// sdang ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad// cha lugs sngo ba sa skyong ba// lha yi bdag po dga'
78b7(rgyud): bar mdzad// 'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel brtan// rgyal po 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa// brtan po rnams la brtan par grags// yon tan dag gi phyogs su bzhad// btud pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/
79a1(rgyud): rtag tu mchod cing rjed pa lags// stobs po che la shugs che ba// phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba bo// sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste// mdzes shes rab srung ngo tsha shes/
79a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po ston pa po// dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags// dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/
79a3(rgyud): zhabs la rjed pa'i tshogs dang ldan// ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba// mchod pa chen po sa dang mnyam// hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po// lha dang lha min rnams
79a4(rgyud): kyis btud// de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyis// zhabs 'bring gad rgyangs chen po can// rlung drag mun pa sel bar mdzad// 'jig rten gsum du snyan par grags// gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur
79a5(rgyud): ba// drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba// mnga' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can// 'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu spyod// spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od mdzes pa/
79a6(rgyud): nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba// nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'jar khugs bzhin// tha ler bzhugs shing rgya cher bdad// mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad// nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sprin//
79a7(rgyud): dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin// gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa// dpal ldan dpal mdzad bgegs gnon ri// kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad// 'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs/
79b1(rgyud): ba/ zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa// dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can// nor bu'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron// rab rib sel bar
79b2(rgyud): mdzad pa po// son pa skyon mdzad skyong mdzad pa// dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog/ 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste// 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/ dkar ba sngog
79b3(rgyud): 'od bzang bya// mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags// ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba// de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston// shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad// stong nyid chos
79b4(rgyud): ni lhur 'dzin pa// byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen// rnam par grags pa gsan pa nges// rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod// rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// shin tu rnam rgyal
79b5(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur// 'jigs med blo gros shes rab can// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dzin pa// mgur bzang du mdzad zhi ba ste// zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa// lha dang lha min bcas pas bkur/
79b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad// sems can kun la rab ston pa// brtan pa sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi blo la mkhas// sred med bu ste drag shul stobs// me yi 'od dang
79b7(rgyud): 'dra ba ste// byis pa'i sku mchog mchog sbyin la// rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad// phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad// bdag gir mi mdzad rtul med brtan// mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas pa/
80a1(rgyud): bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po// mi mchog brtson pa skyed du med// de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ mya ngan med cing gnas pa med//
80a2(rgyud): 'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang // dpa' bo dgra rnams rnam par 'joms// tshad med nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa gnon pa khyad par gshegs/ mgon po rgyal ba'i sras
80a3(rgyud): kyi mchog/ gshin rje 'pham mdzad skye dgu srung // las dang nyon mongs rab srogs pa// ston mdzad nyon mongs sel ba lags// lags pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan// brgya rtsa brgyad
80a4(rgyud): pa rab gsal zhing // dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di// lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad// bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang // gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang // mdangs 'phrog rkun po
80a5(rgyud): rgod rnams kyis// de ring legs par bstod par gyur// 'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gi rab// bsgyings pas lha yang bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun la bltas nas kyang // 'di skad du ni tshig smras
80a6(rgyud): khyod kun rtag tu bgegs med cing // nges legs thar pa thob gyur la// 'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog/ nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig/ de nas rab tu cher bzhad cing //
80a7(rgyud): 'brug chen sgra ltar sgrog pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas// shar phyogs gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul// sems can gti mug
80b1(rgyud): bsal ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams kyi bsod nams tshogs/ shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur// kye ma bsod nams cher bcas pa'i// sems can rnams ni rab sbyangs phyir// dam pa sbyin pa'i/
80b2(rgyud): grub pa'i gzungs// 'jam pa'i glog gis rab tu bshad// la la gang zhig mnyim bzhag nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bA yi// grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa 'am// yang ni nyan tam
80b3(rgyud): sems kyang rung // de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal kun las thar par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa// de yis nges par 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyis chen
80b4(rgyud): yang // ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis// rab dga' shin tu dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur// ring du song
80b5(rgyud): dang mi g.yo ba/ legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// sa chen dam pa de dag kyang // gang zhig nges gnas 'don pa yi// sems can chen pos mi thogs par// tshe zad nas ni thob par 'gyur// sdig
80b6(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam dag dang // sems can kun la sdug pa dang // spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang kun skyed pa dang // sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing /
80b7(rgyud): bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di// sor mo bcu yi thal sbar nas// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su// nang par langs
81a1(rgyud): nas su brjod pa// de la rig sngags 'chang kun dang // de bzhin lha'i bdag po rnams// gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag/ rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed// de bzhin
81a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sras kun dang // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang // de bzhin rdo rje'i mchog 'chang rnams// de la nges par srung bar byed// de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing // mnyam
81a3(rgyud): par bzhag pa snang bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams// bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag/ dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis// rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal// de phyir
81a4(rgyud): bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas// 'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so// lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang // bsod nams mnyam par thob par 'gyur// shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ nyi
81a5(rgyud): zer mtshan mchog brjod byas na// dri ma med cing rab dag la// rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang // sems can thams cad dga' ba yi// yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob// mtshungs pa med cing
81a6(rgyud): stobs skyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang // 'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing // yid 'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi// gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa
81a7(rgyud): yin// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
81b1(rgyud): ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mr-i ta/ bin+du dza pra/ ma hA su
81b2(rgyud): kha swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba tshim
81b3(rgyud): par mdzad nas bka' stsal pA/ yon tan rin po che'i tshegs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di byung bas/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
81b4(rgyud): gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de'ang
81b5(rgyud): sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo chos brgyad dem// tshes bco lnga la spang bar 'dug cing / gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang
81b6(rgyud): bdug pa dang shamar me dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng dang / brug pa la sogs pas mchod la// bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjed byas na/ dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur to// sdig pa thams cad dang /
81b7(rgyud): sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par
82a1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed do// de nas rdo rje me tog thed chen po sa gsum gyi
82a2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis
82a3(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa// sems can kun gyi gtso bo che// byang chub sems dpa' tshul che ba// nye mongs dri ma kun las 'das// chos dbyings khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib pa kun las nges
82a4(rgyud): par grol// nyon mongs dri ma kun sel cing // nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba// skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lam srung gcig pu'i tshul ston cing // theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa/
82a5(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te// theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// snang chen por snang ba brnyas// yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag/ zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba// 'jig rten 'das pa khyod
82a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// theg pa chen po dag du che// sangs rgyas theg pa rtogs gyur cing // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams grags pa// rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/
82a7(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po nyon mongs chom// bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste// rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal// zla ba chen po nyi ma che// lhun po chen po dbang phyug che// lha chen mgon po
82b1(rgyud): chen po ste// 'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing // sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// rnam sel khyod la phyag/
82b2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyod yul bzhugs pa ste// chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa lags// yeng shes dbang phyug ye shes che// sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mdzes yon tan
82b3(rgyud): snying po mkhyen// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan// sangs rgyas la mo ste don yod che// ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// bstan pa gnas dbang bdag po ste// bde mdzad thugs kyang zhi ba ste/
82b4(rgyud): yangs pa dri med shes rab can// snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal// zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon// zhi ba 'jig rten dag par mdzad// ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na// dpa' btsan khyod la
82b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// skal pa chen po nyin mongs bcom// 'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste// zhi bzhi mdzad bde 'byung ba// chu bzhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal// thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che// bde 'gror
82b6(rgyud): gnas pa dri ma med// rnam dag thugs mnga' zhi ba mkhyen// nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtse mo yangs pa rnam par grags// sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa// snying po chen po dkyil
82b7(rgyud): 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog/ dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra// rnam gsum mkhyen pa brnyes pa'i bdag/ rnam thar
83a1(rgyud): gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi// 'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes// bskul pa dag na grangs med par// tshogs chen bsags khyod
83a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes// sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// yang dgas 'dzin las byung ba// ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo// ting nge 'dzin la mngara' brnyes pa/
83a3(rgyud): nyis gsum spong zhing sdig pa sel// ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba// mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal// mgon po chen po snang ba che// sdug bsngal chen po dri ma sel// zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad
83a4(rgyud): pa// yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa// chos kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs// dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa// rin chen mtha' yas
83a5(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje chen po dri med mchog/ rdo rje mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'// nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan// ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'// de bzhin gshegs/
83a6(rgyud): dang yul gcig pa// sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong // shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras// sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang /
83a7(rgyud): rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal// rdo rje snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen chen po rin chen blo// rin chen rdo rje'i 'od che ba// rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung // rin chen bstan pa srung mdzadapa
83b1(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes shing // ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston// stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan// stong nyid mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mtshungs med shes ras na/
83b2(rgyud): dag pa rnam dgas dang bral/ chos gcig las byung snang ba bo// 'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags// 'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa// 'jig rten chos las snang bar 'das// 'jig rten
83b3(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes// rgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag/ nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste// phyag chen skye bo kun la phan// sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
83b4(rgyud): dga' mkhyen dga' la longs spyo ba// dga' ba'i rigs mchog rnams kyi mchog/ dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can// dga' ba ldan pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sgeg chen 'dzin zhing dgongs par ldan
83b5(rgyud): rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan// rdo rje rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog/ sgeg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che// theb pa chen po'i
83b6(rgyud): tshul la gnas// bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad la// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis// ming brgya
83b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// rdo rje bstan pa rnam grags pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yis// dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba// gang zhig ming
84a1(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad pa// 'di dag so sor rjod byed na// nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing // rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang // nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis// sgrib pa thams cad
84a2(rgyud): sel ba la// blo ldan gang zhig bstod byed pa// de yi sdig pa med par 'gyur// gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog/ nang par langs nas rjod byed pa// snang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/
84a3(rgyud): bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su btang // sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang // de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang // ye shes rgya mtsho longs spyod cing // sa mchog chen po thong
84a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// gang zhig nges par gnas byas la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa// des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas so// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// rgyud chen ldan zhing blo cho ga/
84a5(rgyud): gang zhig ming mchog 'don pa ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bstan pa la// ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya
84a6(rgyud): brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor
84a7(rgyud): gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha/ ma ru tA/ a mo g+ha/ badz+ra satwa swA hA/ de nas
84b1(rgyud): yon tan sbyin pa yi// gzungs 'di bshang mthag tu yang // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// ti sa'i gangs bcas g.yos par 'gyur// sA'i snying po tshogs dbang la/ bcom
84b2(rgyud): ldan rdo rje can gyis smras// skal ldan chen po legs so legs// sa stengs khyod kyis yangs par byas// khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing // yon tan dpag med mchog bskyed pa/
84b3(rgyud): sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal dang // nyes pa zlog cing thos pa 'di// 'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na// nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te// ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag/ 'dam gyi nyes pas me gos
84b4(rgyud): bzhin// lus can dag la su yang rung // khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa// de dag las ni gcig tsam yang // byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig gzugs sngags mchog
84b5(rgyud): thos nas mos par byed pa dang // nges par yon tan thams cad kyang // thos par 'gyur te the tshom med// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor// langs te sa yi dbang phyug po// sa yi snying pos mchog la/
84b6(rgyud): ming brgya rtsa brgyad spras pa ni// sa yi snying po gtso bo che// glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// con pan can te sa brnyes pa// phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog/ rigs ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i gnas/
84b7(rgyud): gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po// gzhi bcas ldan pa'i klung gi tshul// swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab// thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog/ snying po snying po mkhyen par grags// gsang sngags rol cing
85a1(rgyud): rgya cher rol// sa yi dbang phyug gar stabs can// sgeg po zhal bzang bar mkhan ldan// 'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po// rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen// snying po brnyes
85a2(rgyud): pa 'jigs pa med// mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba// shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs// 'dod chags la sogs skyon bsal zhing // gar stabs chen po ston pa po// ston pa dpag bsam
85a3(rgyud): shing dang 'dra// nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa// nyi ma chen po nyid yin te// dbang phyug chen po 'bar bskor// yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa// sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can
85a4(rgyud): chos kyi longs spyo longs spyod che// yon tan rgya mtsho'i gang chen mtshe// yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog/ thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste// theg pa/
85a5(rgyud): chen po 'jigs pa med// mchod pa chen po sgra che ba// zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can// rdo rje 'chang chen mtshon brgya pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor me tog thod// blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/
85a6(rgyud): pad+ma chen po stobs po che// sngags 'chang chen stob cher ldan// sa ga'izhi chen po lhun po lags// lag na rdo rje yon tan nges// nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan// mnyam nyid 'byams la longs spyod pa/
85a7(rgyud): rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can// rdo rje'i 'od lnga rdo rje ldan// sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin// sa la longs spyod longs spyod che// mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs// rab 'byams snod ni rnam par grags//
85b1(rgyud): spra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa// spun rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste// me tog sngon po'i thos kyis bcings// spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/ brtan pa brtan pa bde sbyin pa// ded dpon dpal bzang
