85b2(rgyud): chen po ste// gangs can lhun po lta bu lags// dbang po gshin rje rgyal chen dang // btsan po khyab 'jub stobs dbang phyug/ 'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs// de bzhin nyid
85b3(rgyud): tshul spyod tshul can// rin chen tog ste cher bzhad pa// dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol// gzigs pa ring ba sun yangs pa// nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa mang / thogs pa med dpogs
85b4(rgyud): rin chen gtsug/ srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgya// dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal// dag pa gtsang ma gso sbyong can// rnam par gnon pa yul las 'das// ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying
85b5(rgyud): rje che// stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba// bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can// dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed// sdang ba rnams kyi snying 'joms pa// mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan/
85b6(rgyud): dga' ba rgya cher rab 'byung ba// rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen// rigs kun tu ni spyod pa lags// rgyal po rigs chos skyed pa'i rten// rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor rgyan// rdo rje sa 'og rab grags pa// rig/
85b7(rgyud): sngags 'chang ba stobs po che// mngon par 'phags pa khyad par mchog/ mgrin bzangs nad dang bral ba lags// skyong mdzad ston pa dag po ste// sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa// sgrol ba smin mdzad sdud par
86a1(rgyud): mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams kyis btud// rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas// rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten// grub pa sbyin pa rnam dag mchog/ tshul dang /
86a2(rgyud): tshul min rtog pa po// dkyil 'khor rtsa sder mnga' ba ste// 'od zer ljang khu'i 'od dang 'dra// ser la na bza' ser po mnabs// dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan// spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/
86a3(rgyud): nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba// rdo rje rgya yi stobs kyis spro// mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med// sku yang dag cing na bza' dag/ dag pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan// dag pa'i chos mnga' dang ba ste/
86a4(rgyud): 'byung ldan srid pa sel mdzad pa// 'khor bzang mdzad shes rab can// tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba// rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags// rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che// 'byung ldan rab
86a5(rgyud): 'byam shes rab can// ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba// sa yi snying po snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren// dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs// khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la
86a6(rgyud): gnas// zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil// dga' ba dang bskyed pa ste// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba// rlug gi drag shul lta bur grags// drag po/
86a7(rgyud): lags te drag sel gtsang // rgyal bar byed cing rgyal la'i// rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad// sun po ti se sa la yas// spyod yul zab mo nod pa ste// rin chen rdo rje snying po che
86b1(rgyud): sa gzhi spyod yul mnga' ba lags// rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// de bzhin gshegs pa lhur dgyes pa// shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/
86b2(rgyud): rang gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste// phyogs cha'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che// de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni// rdo rjes
86b3(rgyud): gsum dbang mchog smras// yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing // nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan// sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa
86b4(rgyud): 'di// thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste// sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang // dri ma kun bral yon tan nges// de phyir sgrib pa thams cad kyis// phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis// ming
86b5(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di// rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis// ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// bsam pa kun dang 'byor pa yi// gnas mchog bla na med pa ste// dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yi//
86b6(rgyud): yid ni shin tu dang ba yis// sa yi snying po mtshan gsal ba// 'dod pa thams cad rab sgrub pa'i// yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang // dpal yon rgya cher 'dzin pa yi// ming brgya
86b7(rgyud): rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa// sdug bsngal kun las myur du grol// 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs
87a1(rgyud): so// / ts+tsha/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri pra ti dz+nyA na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gadz+ra
87a2(rgyud): dbyen mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal dbyams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yU ya/ namo b+hag pa te kyi mun ya~M/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aH te/ sa myaka sa bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/
87a3(rgyud): oM a dzi te a dz+r-i te/ a pa ra dzi te/ a dzaM tany+dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ mai ti a ba le ko te/ kar ka ra/ ma hA sa ma yA sid+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi maN+Da dI dza/ s+phA ra s+pha ra
87a4(rgyud): Asma kaM sa ma ya bo d+hi be d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swah+ma rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so// oM mo hi mo hi ma hA mo hi srah+ma snying po'o// / oM mu ni mu ni sma ra swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam
87a5(rgyud): dang klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la sems pa dang / bsgoms pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
87a6(rgyud): gyur pa na bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i ri dgas dang bya rnams
87a7(rgyud): kyi rna khung du sgrog par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo// 'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du'ang ngan song 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song gi dri mas kyang
87b1(rgyud): migos so/ ma'i mngasal du'ang mi bya'o// wA'i bskal bstod du 'bor los spyad pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji sAr bsams shing do du
87b2(rgyud): gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'thung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bsrud par mi bgyi lags so// nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas de ji ltar gyur kyang rung
87b3(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o// 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
87b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta saN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
87b5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri mu 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na byang chub
87b6(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ledze ra
87b7(rgyud): nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo
88a1(rgyud): sbyar ba btad de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom
88a2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
88a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs
88a4(rgyud): par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs
88a5(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid pa 'tshal na/ des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang
88a6(rgyud): skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir// rigs kyi bu khyed spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste legs so legs so//
88a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byang zhing / dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig/ oM mu ne/
88b1(rgyud): hU~M ma hA bIr swA hA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mdzad do// i pri hU~M pad+ma pri ya swAH/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o// oM me hAr NA swA byams
88b2(rgyud): po'i sring po'o// oM a gar+b+ha ya swAhA/ nam ma kha'i snying po'i snying po'o// oM ma mr-i hi rA dza ya swA hU~M/ kun tu bzang ba'i snying po'o// oM n+d+ra ru bin ra ba swAH/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ oM shI
88b3(rgyud): ai raM ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o// oM ni sA raM ba sU hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// oM k+Shi tri ha ra dza swAhA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// byang chub
88b4(rgyud): sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lani cig brjod na/ de'i don thams cad 'grub par
88b5(rgyud): 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
88b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po de dag sa rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
88b7(rgyud): gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ @
89a1(rgyud): gar skad du/ a mr-i ta b+ha ba na sa d+hA ra Ni bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
89a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/ 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang mi rnams kyis
89a3(rgyud): bskor nas bzhugs so// de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la spos dang
89a4(rgyud): sman dang zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nasabacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba 'di rnams sems/
89a5(rgyud): can rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
89a6(rgyud): du raM dkar po la chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang
89a7(rgyud): yo byad du gyur to// yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje ltar byas te
89b1(rgyud): gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM sarba d+harma tA badz+ra sid+d+ha hUM/ oM a mr-i ta hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba g+hAla~M u ga t+ye s+pha rA Na/ i maM ga ga na khaM swAH/ oM na maH
89b2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga da a ba lo ki te sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra hU~M/ oM nu ru sU ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsA ne sarba ar+tha sad+ha ni swA hU~M/ zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nusag 'phags pa
89b3(rgyud): thams cad mnyes pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gyur gyur to// de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas
89b4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis 'phags pa thams cad kyi pho brang dang /
89b5(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi bden
89b6(rgyud): pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
89b7(rgyud): te chos kyi sbyin pa dang / bdag gi bang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang dga' bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag pa'ang skyong legs so// dka' ba'i spyod pa
90a1(rgyud): 'di lta bu byed pa legs so// nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan
90a2(rgyud): pa'i 'khor dang khyim bdag bzang skyong rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to// bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs
90a3(rgyud): so @/ yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas na dge
90a4(rgyud): slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba la chos ston to// de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag
90a5(rgyud): nas 'dug pa las/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba/ gzugs byed mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skem pa/ kha nas ma 'bar ba/ mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba
90a6(rgyud): sgra 'dzings pa/ sen mo dang mche ba ring la rno ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ dgra' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod da ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te/ yi dgas
90a7(rgyud): kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// dga' bos des smras pa thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ yi dgas de la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag tshe'i dus byas nas yi dgas kyi khams su
90b1(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ni byas na sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ de nas yi dgas des dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te khyod kyis sang gnyis la yi dgas bshA'i
90b2(rgyud): klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stang snod la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchog dam pa phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la
90b3(rgyud): mchod pa byas na/ tsha ring zhing yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lngar skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe dga' bos yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba lus mi sdug pa dang / shin tu rid cing skam pa dang
90b4(rgyud): khanas me 'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab la skye 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba ring zhing rno ba'ang mthong la yid du mi 'ong / mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas lus spyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag
90b5(rgyud): nas 'dug pa las langs te/ myur bar bcom lda 'das ga la ba der song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/
90b6(rgyud): lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag pas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las
90b7(rgyud): yi dgas la nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba des bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// khyod da ste zhag bdun nas nges par tsha'i dus byas te yi dgas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// bdag gis de la
91a1(rgyud): thabs ci bgyis na yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar par 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma
91a2(rgyud): byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur yi dgas dang drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi
91a3(rgyud): kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod 'jigs par ma byed cig/ khyod kyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze
91a4(rgyud): dang drang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs ngal yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la
91a5(rgyud): gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya
91a6(rgyud): stong snyed dang bram ze dang / drang srong la sogs te mang po'i kha zas dang gtor ma chog par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas brgal ba'i
91a7(rgyud): bre bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bo nga'ang bram zer gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba
91b1(rgyud): las gzungs 'di thos pas na de'i dbang gis yi dgas tshad med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po la kha zas dang gtor ma byin par gyur te/ yi dgas kyi khams su skyes pa de dag kyang sdug
91b2(rgyud): bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhur skyes par gyur to// dga' bo khyod kyis zung zhig/ bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
91b3(rgyud): dga' bo la gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to// na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba le ki te/ saM b+hu ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am ka rigs kyi bu mo
91b4(rgyud): gang la la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dum/ bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na/ rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ yang na dus thams cad du
91b5(rgyud): byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba med do// snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la chen nas/ phye 'am/ 'khur ba la sogs pa cung zad cig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag ste/ gzungs 'di
91b6(rgyud): lan bdun bsngags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i
91b7(rgyud): byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas thams cad skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa mi dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal
92a1(rgyud): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po byang gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan
92a2(rgyud): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'jam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis// yi dgas mang
92a3(rgyud): po'i sgom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'grangs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
92a4(rgyud): pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ yi dgas mang po'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te yi dgas kyi khams zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga'
92a5(rgyud): bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod de byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te/ gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste
92a6(rgyud): sa gtsang mar blugs par bya'o// de ltar gtor ma byin par byas na/ phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad
92a7(rgyud): mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro// kha bos de dag yi dgas kyi yid bzhin du za ba dang cho ga 'grangs pa dang yi dgas kyi khams spong ba dang mtho ris kyi
92b1(rgyud): lhur skye bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te dge slong pa 'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis lazas la bsngags te yi dgas la sbyin pa byin na
92b2(rgyud): bsod nams tsha med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de las sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams drang khyad par med de tshe ring bdang bsod nam dang /
92b3(rgyud): mdangs dang stobs skye zhing 'phel ba dang / dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas ma rungs thams cad kyis
92b4(rgyud): gtse zhing gnod par byed mi nus pa dang / gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gal te gang zhig bram ze dang drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang
92b5(rgyud): du bkang ste gzungs sngags lan bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas mchog dam par gyur te/ des na bram ze dang drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab
92b6(rgyud): pa'i zas thob nas sngags kyi byin gyis so so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams su yongs su 'gyur bas/ so so nas mthun par dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang /
92b7(rgyud): mdangs dang / stobs su ldan te bde zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so// gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong ba dang thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing / shes pa
93a1(rgyud): mi nor ba dag tshangs pa'i lha'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya
93a2(rgyud): sdong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ro// gal te dge slong pha 'am dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am
93a3(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu
93a4(rgyud): bzlas te/ dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang / rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi zhal zas du gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
93a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bstod pa dang / gsol ba 'debs pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas
93a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha mang pos rtag tu srung zhing skyob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dga' bo khyed kyis 'di rjes su chos bzhin yid
93a7(rgyud): la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro// yi dgas kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i
93b1(rgyud): gzungs rdzogs so// yi dugs mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
93b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skyan shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu
93b3(rgyud): bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pa na/ mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du yi dgas mo la
93b4(rgyud): 'bar ma 'dug nas spras pa kye kun dga' bo khyed gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/ yi dgas kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bos spras pa/ brtan pa'i thabs ci yod/ yi dgas mos smras pa kun dga' bo
93b5(rgyud): gal te nang par yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag la yi dgas re re la'ang zas dang skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo tsam byin te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la
93b6(rgyud): bdag gi ming gis dkon mchig gsum la mchod pa byas na/ dre sa na khyod kyi tshe'ang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/ bdag kyang yi dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur
93b7(rgyud): ro// de nas kun dga' bos yi dgas mokha' bar ma ridang cing mdag ngan la lus skem pa/ kha nas me lce 'bar ba/ lto dang kha bskams pa ral pa'i phung po g.yengs pa spu dang sen
94a1(rgyud): me ring ba mthong ste/ tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas skrag cing sngangs te spu zing zhes byas nas stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang / shin tu myur ba'i shugs/
94a2(rgyud): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'dar bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar
94a3(rgyud): gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis yi dgas mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/ khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na// bdag
94a4(rgyud): gis brten thabs ci mchis zhes smras na/ de'i mchid nas gal te khyod kyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas te/ bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim pa byas na/ de ltar
94a5(rgyud): na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
94a6(rgyud): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' glang gis khyod yi dgas rnams dang / bram ze'i drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyi ma 'jigs shig/ kun dga' bo thams cad du
94a7(rgyud): 'od dang ldan pa rgya chen shugs ldan zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod do// des byin pa tsam gyis yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par 'gyur te/ yi dgas dang bram ze'i drang srong
94b1(rgyud): re re la zas dang skom yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro// de ni sngon dbram zer gyur pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs
94b2(rgyud): ba'ajig rten dbang phyug 'ad las ngas bzung ste/ des yi dgus dang bram ze'i drang srong grangs su bgrangs pa mang ba dang ches mang bdag ngas zas dang skem gyis tshim par byas te de dag thams cad yi
94b3(rgyud): dgas kyi 'jig rteni nas shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyes so// kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la ngo lon gyis shig namaHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo gi te oM sa~M b+hA ra sa b+har rU kun dga'
94b4(rgyud): bo 'dis yi dgas kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ lag pa brkyang ste sgo drung du sbyin par bya'o// sel gol yang brdab par bya'o// de ltar byas na byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i
94b5(rgyud): yi dgas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma chag cig phrag 'dus zan gi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/ yi dgas re re la'ang yul ma ga d+ha'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang zos pa tsam gyis yi
94b6(rgyud): dgas kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu
94b7(rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad par khor zug tu bsnyad par bya'o// de ltar byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te tsherang ring bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'dum gyi bsod nams kyi phung po
95a1(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba 'byung po dang / ngag pa dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / yi dgas
95a2(rgyud): rnams kyi mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'grus dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// bram ze'i drang srong tshim
95a3(rgyud): par byed pa 'dod pa des ni/ mchod yon dang / dbul bar bya ba dang snod bkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'bab chu ga la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin par bya'o// de ltar byas na bram ze'i drang srong
95a4(rgyud): gtA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyur ro// bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang po tshim par 'gyur te/ de dag thams
95a5(rgyud): cad kyis oM bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin par byed la/ sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bram ze'i gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rtag tu tshangs par spyod
95a6(rgyud): par yang 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra thams cad shigs par 'gyur ro// me tog gam/
95a7(rgyud): bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ zas sam/ skem gyi yo byad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o// de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu
95b1(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang /
95b2(rgyud): chos dang / dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// bla mar byas/ rim gror byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
95b3(rgyud): cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kun tu srung bar yang 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo song la ngo lon yang gyis shig/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par ston cig dge
95b4(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o// yi dwags me kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / oM dz+nyA na
95b5(rgyud): ba le ki te sa man+ta/ s+pha ra Na rA shrI b+hA ba sa ma ya/ ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza la ni hU~M/ 'bab chu 'am mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu blugs la ye shes skar
95b6(rgyud): mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/ chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chu 'am chur gtor na sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i yi dgas ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang
95b7(rgyud): ldan pa 'thob cing / yi dgas re re'ang kha zas dang btung ba yul ma ga d+ha'i lnga bre bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par 'gyur zhing / chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad yi dgas kyi skye gnas las thar
96a1(rgyud): cing bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa yi dgas
96a2(rgyud): sam bya 'am/ chu la gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag thams cad sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ye shes skar mda'i snying po'o//
96a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thams cad mkhyen pa la
96a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan zhes bya ba ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad
96a5(rgyud): kyis bskor nas mdun du byas te chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la gsol ba btab
96a6(rgyud): pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul ba/ blo dang mi ldan pa/ yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol/ bshad pa/ hUM pi tsu pi tsu
96a7(rgyud): pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+ha bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swehA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / chung ngu'ang yi ge 'bru
96b1(rgyud): gcig tsam thos na'ang tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro// gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsa bas khyor gang la rig pa 'di lan bdun btab ste/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa
96b2(rgyud): gong 'dzin par 'gyur ro// lan cig 'brangs na lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin gcig pazhin du shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nyin de bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang yid gzungs par 'gyur ro// shes
96b3(rgyud): rab skyed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i
96b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thub pa la phyag 'tshas lo// tad+ya thA/ ma ti btu kye/ tathAg tA dzA/ dar she na pradz+nyA pata/ d+hI/ bo d+hi ma rbA sa ri Ni/ a d+hiHtado d+ha/ rib d+ha mAr+tha/
96b5(rgyud): dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pradz+nyA dI pa~M/ me d+ha pa din sarba a d+hISh+T+rIHsu ru su ru d+hu ru d+hi dre/ me d+ha A na ya swaiH/ cho ga ni nung re zhing bzlas brjod byas na lobs sbyin par 'gyur ro// sman bram gyi
96b6(rgyud): sbom par bcug ste dung pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te bos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// / sangs rgya
96b7(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
97a1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas/ chos thams cad bzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
97a2(rgyud): thams cad du'ang gnod sbyin de la srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed la/ de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do// s+yAd ya the dan/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ dza yot+ta ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/
97a3(rgyud): saM bo d+hi/ ma hA saM bo d+hi/ a d+hi bad bo d+ha ni/ ha la ha la ha la hau li hi li hi li hu lu hu lu hu lu sarba bud+d+ha d+harma a bi bo d+hi ni/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ni sarba pA pa ni/ bud+d+ha ad+hi/
97a4(rgyud): nin swaH/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa mA dze s+yA tA na na me mA hA sA traM/ bod skad du/ mdo chen
97a5(rgyud): po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong
97a6(rgyud): lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes
97a7(rgyud): pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de// de'i
97b1(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas tshangs
97b2(rgyud): ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shakya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na// dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra
97b3(rgyud): bcom pa/ zag bzad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
97b4(rgyud): ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
97b5(rgyud): rten gyi khams dag na dbang che bar grags pa dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyi/ bdag cag kyang song la/ bcom
97b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gror ma chag snyam mo// de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang
97b7(rgyud): ba 'am/ brkyang ba la bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigs su
98a1(rgyud): bcad de gsol pa/ 'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi// lha tshogs kun nas lpags gyur pas// gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la// blta ba'i slad du bdag cag mchis// tshangs ris kyi
98a2(rgyud): lha gnyis pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di na dge sbyong rab brtson pa// kha lo pa ltar mig blangs shing // dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid// tshangs ris
98a3(rgyud): kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dbang phur 'od pa'o bas 'dra ba'i// phur bu rab bcom bkrir mi tshugs// de dag srad bral dag spyod cing // 'dren pas glang po gzhon lngar btul//
98a4(rgyud): tshangs ris kyi lha bzhis tshigs su bcad de gsol ba/ gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba// de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing // mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang // lha yi lus ni thob par
98a5(rgyud): 'gyur// tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid na bkra bcum ste 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas dge slong rnams
98a6(rgyud): la bka' stsal pA/ dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yin no// dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
98a7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga yi lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag
98b1(rgyud): 'dus par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/
98b2(rgyud): dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas/ lha rnams kyi ming dag zung zhig/ gang dag sa la gnas
98b3(rgyud): pa dang // gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du tha dad la// sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing // kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni// spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin/
98b4(rgyud): gang dag sa la gnas pa dang // gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams// seng ge bzhin du tha dad la// sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing // kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes// byed pa bdag gi
98b5(rgyud): brjod par bya// yid byang dag cing rab dang la// rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i// lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod// slob ma lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang /
98b6(rgyud): gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang // stong phrag du ma rnam dag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag/ mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing // phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur pas// sangs rgyas
98b7(rgyud): kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dka' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur gyis// nges par
99a1(rgyud): rtogs shes bka' stsal pa// tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis// de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyi// rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// nga yis bshad pa mnyan
99a2(rgyud): par gyis// ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyi// gnod sprin stong phrag bdun po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus
99a3(rgyud): par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gsar can stong phrag drug po kun// kha dog
99a4(rgyud): sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog/
99a5(rgyud): ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni// ri dwags stong phrag gsum po dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi
99a6(rgyud): nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams
99a7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang
99b1(rgyud): gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus
99b2(rgyud): pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i 'ab// yangs pa la ni rtag gnas shing // brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi// gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor
99b3(rgyud): rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// /
99b4(rgyud): kun tu bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha// gang dag de gnyis 'khor rnams dang // de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog
99b5(rgyud): ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs mngon par spyod byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/
99b6(rgyud): dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul
99b7(rgyud): ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming
100a1(rgyud): mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus
100a2(rgyud): par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lho phyogs mngon par skyong byed
100a3(rgyud): pa// rgyal chen grugs dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang
100a4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de/
100a5(rgyud): brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /
100a6(rgyud): de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhin grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// nub phyogs
100a7(rgyud): mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal cheni grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de
100b1(rgyud): mi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge sbyong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon
100b2(rgyud): bar dugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'byed par// kun tu gzhan
100b3(rgyud): gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'odra dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge sbyong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /
100b4(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya// de ni nye du lhan cig
100b5(rgyud): tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams
100b6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// de la bu ni mang yod de// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang zhes bya stobs po che// lha dang lha
100b7(rgyud): min g.yul 'gyed par// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags
101a1(rgyud): ldan rnams/ dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ nub
101a2(rgyud): phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs pa'i dag ni skyong bar byed/
101a3(rgyud): gang dag dri yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i
101a4(rgyud): tshul du mngon par zhugs// de dag gi ni khol po rnams// mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa// sru byed g.yon can sgyu ma can// sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang / ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu
101a5(rgyud): de tshe rdzu 'phrul stor cing lhags// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grag ldan rnams// dge slong rnams
101a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / dmag dpon 'di dag kyang de kun nas lpags te/ 'dis
101a7(rgyud): ste/ dbang po blang chu lha dang // bar dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang // sba rab dang ni ni lnga dang /
101b1(rgyud): ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldang ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung
101b2(rgyud): ring dang ma ldan dang // tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po'i 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro nas ji skad yod pa yin// gang dag de yi 'khor
101b3(rgyud): rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/
101b4(rgyud): lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni// 'jog po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs// la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog drag/ srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags// klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni// yul 'khor srung
101b5(rgyud): dang glang po che// 'jigs byed che dang sa srungs bu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs// gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang
101b6(rgyud): ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len// stobs ldan mig rno 'dab chags bya//
101b7(rgyud): de ming 'dab bzangs khra bo yang // mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs// de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin// ston pas 'dab bzang bde mdzad cing // gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la// sangs rgyas skyabs su//
102a1(rgyud): nye bar song // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang 'dus pa'i nang du'o// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal
102a2(rgyud): zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing // rgya mtsho rten pa'i lha min rnams// thams cad nor lhas skrag gyur cing // mtsho la skyabs su 'du shes pa// thag bzangs ris
102a3(rgyud): dang rab bkra dang // rab sim byed dang btang bzung dang // stobs ldan bu ni brgya po kun// rnam snang byed bu'i bu rnams dang // stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang // dpa' chem khyod kyi dus lags shes/
102a4(rgyud): dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du// go cha bgos te lhags pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags
102a5(rgyud): ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// chu lha mo dang bu mo dang // zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs// mdza' bshes ma yang chu lha can// lha mo grags
102a6(rgyud): ldan nyid kyang 'ongs// sa dang chu dang drung gi dang // me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan tshegs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dang // ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar
102a7(rgyud): byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi'i lor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /
102b1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// khyab 'jug lha dang gzhon can lha// mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur// zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis// zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar// nyi mar gnas pa'i lha rnams
102b2(rgyud): kyis// nyi ma nyid du mdun bdar cing // char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag/ rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lhags// thams cad bzang po rdo rje can// brgya byin khyer 'jigs 'ongs gyur te// bcu tshan phyogs bcu
102b3(rgyud): de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/
102b4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par zhugs// lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni// me lce'i
102b5(rgyud): rtse 'dra mchi ltas can// zhi ba mo dang dka' bzlog ma// me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing // rgyu ba mo dang mtshan chings bzang // 'chi med rnam pa du ma dang // gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa/
102b6(rgyud): 'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams
102b7(rgyud): dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// sngo bsangs
103a1(rgyud): / sngo bsangs chen mo dang // mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang // rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du// yid rab 'khrug ma'ang 'ongs gyur cing // phag mo phag mo chen mo dang // spong ma nges
103a2(rgyud): ma lhan cig lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag
103a3(rgyud): kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// dkar mo rgyags byed
103a4(rgyud): snying rje dang // gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing // skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang // gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur// 'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang // spel ma rnam pa du ma dang // dag pa dang
103a5(rgyud): ni 'od can ma// ma mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang
103a6(rgyud): dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhin 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal
103a7(rgyud): du mngon par zhugs// bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang // nag po btab pa du ma dang // lum bi ni dang lum bi mchog/ skar ma zhes bya lags smon dang // 'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin
103b1(rgyud): du// dbang sgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur// bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang // gang dag de
103b2(rgyud): yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshul du mngon par
103b3(rgyud): zhugs// lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun// kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag/ ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni// snang bar byas de 'khod pa dang // gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus
103b4(rgyud): bar lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag
103b5(rgyud): gi / tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba// kun 'gyed gzhon nu skar rgyal te// so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang // lhan cig 'grogs te der lpags pa// gang dag de yi 'khor
103b6(rgyud): rnams dang // de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par
103b7(rgyud): zhugs// dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo// kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang // bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor zhing // de dag rnam kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/ gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang // de yang
104a1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i tshal du 'ongs// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams// dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing // 'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs//
104a2(rgyud): dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas// skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi// lha rnams de dag der lhags shing // dge slong rnams kyang der lcags so// nag pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos/
104a3(rgyud): 'dod chags kyis ni 'di bzung la// bcing ba gyis dang khyed la legs// 'di dag kun nas yongs sdud la// 'di dag gson por ma btang zhes// de na nag po sde bo che// sde rnams la ni skul byed
104a4(rgyud): cing // khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas// rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te// lag pa sa la brngubs nas ni// shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ste// de nas lha yi sprin 'phrang dang // glog dang bcas pa'i
104a5(rgyud): char yang phag/ sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas// de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te// de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i// nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag/ bdud sde mngon par
104a6(rgyud): lhags gyur kyis// nges par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa// brtson par byed pa de dag gis// sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni// de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas// de dag chags bral yin par rtogs/
104a7(rgyud): rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni// slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'// de dag g.yul nas rnam rgyal zhing // 'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin// bar gyi sdom ni bdun stong
104b1(rgyud): gser can ri mnyam dang // de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang // kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams// dri bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang // klu dang 'dab bzangs lha sin dang // chu lha mo dang khyab
104b2(rgyud): 'jug dang // tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang // dkar me ba byed dbang phyug dang // kun 'gyed gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang // dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo //
104b3(rgyud): de nas gsang ba'i lha'i bu shin tu dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas// de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo shad do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi
104b4(rgyud): kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing // yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA te dze te dza ba ti/ tsita tre tsiH/
104b5(rgyud): tA ba ti/ ta le ta la ba ti/ kha me kha ma ba ti/ k+She ma k+She ma ba ti/ b+had dre b+had dra ba ti/ ya she ya shra ba ti/ dU de dU ta ba ti/ tsa ba le tsa pa la ba ti/ kha tse kha tsa bA ti ti/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang
104b6(rgyud): ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gseng sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na// de ni ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'gyur
104b7(rgyud): po thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der dag par 'gyur
105a1(rgyud): zhing / de la dgung lo bdun du srung bar bgyid par yang 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyi dgung char 'dab par yang 'gyur// chad par yang 'gyur/ dpung sar/
105a2(rgyud): 'bebs par yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad la khyab par bgyis sam// chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na/ des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas
105a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i rigs gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di lags la/ gsang
105a4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig zhib mo'ang 'di dag lags te/ 'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ b+hA le b+ha la ma le/ dur du le/ hi me/ phub pi se kA tsak+Shi ku tse sI/ mI mI
105a5(rgyud): ne She ra tho ra NI/ bam pi baM po ta sta ka/ ta ra ka gu ru ga ro Ta/ gug gu mi ti/ ta ra rak+Sha/ sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mdo sde
105a6(rgyud): 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid na/ de la mi dang mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing / gdug pa'ang mi mchi/ sbrul yang mi mchi/ dug kyang mi
105a7(rgyud): mchi la/ de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung ba thams cad las bsrung bar gyis par yang 'gyur
105b1(rgyud): lags so// gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang na par bgyid pa de la dpung lo bdun du bsrung bar bgyis par 'gyur lags so// chub la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/ de'i dzin
105b2(rgyud): thams cad na badrani par thur 'gras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bded de'i bdage po thams cad kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/ mdo sde 'di yong/
105b3(rgyud): su gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so// tad+yathA/ lin de li pI lo po pa pe pang ke ka me/ kA tsa kA tsek+Shi/ kA tsa ping ga le/ dum du me du ma/ ta Te traT/ trad tra Te/ tra TAk+Shi/ ko la
105b4(rgyud): ko li kaM ki ka ko li kr-i/ sA d+hA sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/ ud gri tA tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang
105b5(rgyud): ma nyams par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// 'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// ji tsam 'tshal ba de tsam gyi dgung char yang
105b6(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/ chad par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar par yang 'gyur lags so//
105b7(rgyud): dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so// cha ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/ des bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan
106a1(rgyud): 'das la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di'ang de bzhin du/ mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing
106a2(rgyud): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyid la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ bI re bI re ba ti/ to Te tro Ta ba ti/ b+hang
106a3(rgyud): dre b+had dra ba ti/ go ne go na ba ti/ me b+he me g+ha ba ti/ dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/ b+hu te b+hU ta ba ti/ kho ra de kho ra da ba ti/ e dan sU tra ma nu gr-ih+Na thA/ a nu pA la ya tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di
106a4(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung bar bgyis par 'gyur lags so// de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga'
106a5(rgyud): yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so// de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga'
106a6(rgyud): yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so// de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lags so// gang du klog par 'gyur ba der
106a7(rgyud): dgung le bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so// 'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar par yang 'gyur lags so// dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so// bro nad thams cad
106b1(rgyud): sel bar yang 'gyur lags so// skud pa 'am cha ba la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na/ bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po//
106b2(rgyud): chen zhis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags 'di'ang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyid pa lags so// rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa// tad+ya thA
106b3(rgyud): ku re ku ru NI/ me re mo ra NI/ ka tsi ka tse NI/ kri mi kri mi ni/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ bu re/ bai re/ pu ra tA/ he re ho ra nI/ pra he re/ ho ra nI/ ho ra nI/ 'phags skyes pos gsol
106b4(rgyud): pa ke she ke sha pa ti/ ke sha NI/ ma kye sha the ti/ tho ba ni/ mi ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/ tsak+saM tsakrA NI/ tsakrA bA ki/ ni b+hi ti ri/ tirmi ni/ she me shi mi/ sha mA ne te/ bcom
106b5(rgyud): ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po zhes brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ba'i dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/ de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar
106b6(rgyud): du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so// de la 'byung po thams cad dang bre nad thams cad kyang skur mi ldog par 'gyur lags so// gdug pas zin pa dang dug thams cad las thar par 'gyur lags/
106b7(rgyud): so// skud pa 'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/ cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha ma yin dang rlung lhas
107a1(rgyud): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di'ang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so// tad+ya thA/ ga le/ gagag le ga ga le ga NI/ khi ni khI ni/
107a2(rgyud): g+hu she g+huSh+Ta/ b+hu g+huSh+Ta / kha ne/ kha kha ne/ kha na kha ne/ li be lu pe/ lu pa lu pe de/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing ma bkol bar bzung na ji srid
107a3(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur lags so// de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas
107a4(rgyud): gtsang ba'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su bzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis
107a5(rgyud): rig sngags dag smras pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing kun tu gzung ba dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag legs
107a6(rgyud): par bshad du gsol/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khyed kyis gsang
107a7(rgyud): sngags kun tu bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin te/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di grub pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste/ nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o//
107b1(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo sde chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa
107b2(rgyud): dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa 'di yin no// tA le ta la
107b3(rgyud): tan ta la ta to ta le/ me te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i grub pa ni 'di yin no// sa le saM sa li tI/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// la Ta la Te/ lo le ti dgra bcom pa
107b4(rgyud): rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+hu bu d+hA pu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ka tsaM bi kA tsi/ ka tsa bi ka tse ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no// d+hu ma d+hu me/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha so d+hi so d+ha re/ d+ha d+ha re/
107b5(rgyud): des brgyang ba ni yusams sacad pa ni rlom //
107b6(rgyud): glu g+hu Sha/ ya ma dad+hA d+hI/ bsdud pa ni 'di yin no// pe khe sa d+ha ya tu tu le sa/ d+ha ye tI/ zhag gsum spyang pa byas pas chos bco lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde 'dris
107b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bsrung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la mdud pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing /
108a1(rgyud): lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// zla ba lar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/
108a2(rgyud): skud pa de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams bcad par byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro//
108a3(rgyud): lho phyogs nas ce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/ de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o// des de bzhin du srung ba byas te/ tshes bco lnga'i nyin par khrus byas la/ bcom
108a4(rgyud): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te skud pa blangs te nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/ bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa
108a5(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad byas la skud pa lag tu blangs te/ rig sngags thams cad lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrub pa byas na char pa chen po dang rlung chen po'ang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol
108a6(rgyud): tu phyin zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/ skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/ lan bdun gyi bar du'ang brjod par bya'o// de nas lha'i bu sprin ces bya ba dang / sprin bzang zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/
108a7(rgyud): de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / grub pa sbyin pa dang rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro// de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sprin ni ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o// sprin bzang gi ni
108b1(rgyud): 'di yin te/ ka ra kar kAr ra zhes bya'o// tshig 'di dag dang skud pa lag tu blangs pas/ mdo sde dang gsang sngags rnams bsams na/ gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur
108b2(rgyud): ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu'am spyad pa la bzlas na/ gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de/ lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i
108b3(rgyud): bar du bdag dang gzhan dag srung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
108b4(rgyud): bstod do// 'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams/ skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing // nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ mdo
108b5(rgyud): chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing
108b6(rgyud): zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya kar skad du/ ur+ya d+harmA sA ga ra nA ma~M d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
108b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das wA rA NA si na drang song smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong lnga brgya
109a1(rgyud): tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das
109a2(rgyud): la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha phra ba/ brtags pa/ mkhas shing shes pas rig
109a3(rgyud): par bya ba rtogs so// ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi
109a4(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor to// ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa
109a5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung
109a6(rgyud): gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni myur ba kho nar chos lnga
109a7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing / chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros
109b1(rgyud): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang / don dang / tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can/
109b2(rgyud): rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/ chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
109b3(rgyud): bzhag go// da ltar nga'ang 'jog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/
109b4(rgyud): des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro// thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams
109b5(rgyud): ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do// tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na med pa'i tshig gi
109b6(rgyud): rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o// de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtan par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags
109b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de
110a1(rgyud): lazas kyi rnam grangs rnams dang sman rnams sbyin par 'gyur ro// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/
110a2(rgyud): pa lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis mnos pa bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig/ khyed
110a3(rgyud): phyis 'gyod ta re/ s+yAd ya the dan/ karmo ke ta ma nud tse/ ra ti ru ta gran+d+ha ma/ thu man/ nI la ta/ a saM ku la s+thA bu mi a nu smA ri/ aM shaM ga ma i shra s+t+ra/ kle na a nu ga te yA mu la
110a4(rgyud): gum b+he/ pa b+ha ma gur ba ya ba/ a s+ya bAkya s+ya bi laM ga/ be la ma tha/ shrI ba ba rI pany+tsa ka/ pra sa te/ a ba be la/ a gr-i ba la/ ni shi khu u tse dzu me/ u dze dzu me/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni
110a5(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa thub pa dang / gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs mthong la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/ ris blo'ang byed byed pa rnams
110a6(rgyud): 'ching ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin bab pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung zhig/ kun dga' bo gang la la gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang
110a7(rgyud): 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams/
110b1(rgyud): dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas
110b2(rgyud): so// kun dga' bo byang gi spu mi snyan gyi gling na ni gnod sbyin rnam grags zhes bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas tre kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de
110b3(rgyud): dag gis rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dang pa thob par gyur ro// dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro
110b4(rgyud): bar byed do// kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni de bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog/ srog chags
110b5(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// kun dga' bo de la nga'i phyin 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so// s+yAd la
110b6(rgyud): the dan/ dan d+ha ra ma hA ha ra/ ha ra ma ba ra na/ rud dra tra/ ku ma ti dwi tra/ in du man tu ke/ a ba te/ sa hA rA/ sa d+hA ma ti/ i la la ba ma ti/ a bi ta/ ta ra pa ra/ yi biSh+Ta sa da biSh+Ta
110b7(rgyud): a ba tiSh+Tha/ pa ri brta/ i sha brta/ sa da brta/ kra ma kra ma ti ran/ a si ba ma la bi na ha thi/ tha sha su ra/ d+hur d+hu ra/ ug+ma mug+ma/ ug+na ba ti/ bi sa re gra ma ti/ thams cad dang
111a1(rgyud): ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / klu dang / dri za dang / sha za gnas pa/
111a2(rgyud): gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du zhugs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs/
111a3(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung zhig/ phyis 'gyod ta re/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag ni// gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya/
111a4(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba// de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag
111a5(rgyud): nyams par gyur pa de la ston// dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang // mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang // zab cing don dang ldan pa yi// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya// 'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste// de dag
111a6(rgyud): mkhas rnams nyan par gyis// drag po dag gis thos nas kyang // phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste// gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med// de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa 'di chags pa med pa ste/
111a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab// chags pa med par bstan pa yi// bsam yas sa de theb gyur nas// nyi ma sprin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa steng de bzhin snang // 'di la kye mched phung po rnams//
111b1(rgyud): bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang // dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsungs ci yang yod// de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang // nams kyang chung zar mi 'gyur te// ma thos chos rnams
111b2(rgyud): de dag thos// nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas// rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ mig bzang rnams kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa// de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags// /
111b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la// the tsom mi mnga' bden pa gang // bden des bdag la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas
111b4(rgyud): gnas pa'i bden pa des// rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la// ston par rab tu gnas gyur cig/ gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ ma dad pa dang dad par bstan// gang la rtogs pa mi
111b5(rgyud): snang ba// de la de kun don sngon 'gyur// gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang // glang chen snang dang khyad par stobs// drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang // zla ba mgo med lus gsod pa// dpa'
111b6(rgyud): sde dang ni lag dpa' dang // srin po dang ni sa 'dzin pa// ljang khu kha dang sna bzang dang // ral gri'i spu can bong bu rnams// thams cad grub par byed par shog/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la/
111b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin srin po de dag ni// spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed// rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang // nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang // yi ge rnams la mkhas/
112a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// lung mnos pa yang chud mig// rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 'gyur// rtag tu don dang yi ge la// de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum lnga rnams
112a2(rgyud): dang / mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang // de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams// de yi mod la dran par byed// s+yAd ya the dran ka/ hu ku na/ mu kun ha ra na/ bi ha ra na/ i sha sa kra ma na/ oM su
112a3(rgyud): mu kha/ ta ka Na/ a ga Na/ a pri ya/ u s+thA me/ ko ba ha re/ u ru pa/ pra ba Na tan/ saM gra me bi ha dza ga re/ pra shi ga re/ gu d+hA ba na/ ud ta na/ bi ku Na/ i sha kun a tu la
112a4(rgyud): tu la/ a Ti ba Ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha/ ha ra/ dza gai ta/ a ba saM pra mu khe/ a ga b+ha re/ Sha hu sa hu/ i ti ya/ thA hu/ tsa tur dI bi ka yan/ Tha hu ma hu.ug+ma hud+ha ra sa hu si rba
112a5(rgyud): hA/ a bin gra ha/ a bin gra ha/ pradz+nyA prad d+hi ye/ tha hu sa hu/ ka ra ku ru/ d+ha sa hu/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de ni thos la rmongs pa med//
112a6(rgyud): de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur// skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin// zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang // mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang
112a7(rgyud): sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// sAd ya the dan/ tsa ra d+he bi tsa ra d+he/ a maM ku te/ a ti mi ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+ha Na b+he/ hi pa ra me/ mA hA pra ti bA hA ne/ dza ya dza ya/ ma nu ke/ ba la pa la/
112b1(rgyud): ug rba ba ti/ swa ra stA ra/ a bi sa re/ ku kun dwe/ pra bi badz+rI/ sa me/ a dza ta dza ya/ nupras su/ khos su san d+hi ni kum no// sak+She/ rA patsA pe/ tsu pa/ tsu lu tsus+sa
112b2(rgyud): bu lu prA srA/ bya ba pra sa rA/ kA ra ka b+hin d+he/ bi dzI bi dz+r-i/ a prA tI san d+hi/ nAnA nus ti/ bran nu ma te/ a ri da si/ dzeSh+TA nu ba ni de/ a sarba a ba ti/ rig sngags bsdus pa'ogs
112b3(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus la thogs te 'chang na/ gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za gnas pa de dag thams
112b4(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / dbang du mgyur pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ des chon
112b5(rgyud): ni 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o// de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa
112b6(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang
112b7(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzung rdzogasaso// /
113a1(rgyud): gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
113a2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ad+ya bi g+h+nAn bi na ya ka ra tI d+ha ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
113a3(rgyud): yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' re ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi
113a4(rgyud): bdag pa'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ na mo stu sta/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ti ma Ta/ da ra da ra/
113a5(rgyud): Da ha Da ha/ gr-ih+Na/ b+hany+dza bany+dza/ na mo stu ste/ ru ru tsa tsa ye swA hA/ a b+hu trA/ bin duHkhan mon tsed d+ha ba ra sa ma gats+tsha ti/ ha ha ya/ ma hu ha stid k+Sha ta nan/ pra gau ba ye mo/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru
