113a6(rgyud): mu ru mu ru/ na ma na ma swA hA/ nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas la/ chu khyor ba gang stang dang 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang / bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags
113a7(rgyud): sgrub 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// bgags thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// gang na tshogs kyi bdag po
113b1(rgyud): snang ba der sngags 'di lan cig bklags na'ang bgegs rnams par chad mi byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/ lha dang / mi dang /
113b2(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
113b3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ A Ta nA TI ya ma sU tran nA ma ma hA sU tAM/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon
113b4(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sprin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas
113b5(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin
113b6(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po
113b7(rgyud): rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa
114a1(rgyud): 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// tho sngan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa// lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
114a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas gung dag 'das pa dang // da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong
114a3(rgyud): dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de nas
114a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma
114a5(rgyud): lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gzhug mar gnas pa gang dag
114a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen
114a7(rgyud): ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad
114b1(rgyud): par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar shing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa dang pas
114b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bar gnang
114b3(rgyud): bar mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan
114b4(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to// skye bo gang dag gtong /
114b5(rgyud): phod cing // phra ma ma mchis ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags// gang gi char la brten nas ni// des na nyin mor brjod pa yi// nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor
114b6(rgyud): can// nyi gdugs grang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu//
114b7(rgyud): glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dri za rnams kyi yongs bskor cing // dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags//
115a1(rgyud): / pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas
115a2(rgyud): nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la
115a3(rgyud): dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de sprad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag tshol cig
115a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tsho la mchi/ de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ rgyal chen
115a5(rgyud): grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi dgas zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi shA 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi spyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/
115a6(rgyud): rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing //
115a7(rgyud): grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul
115b1(rgyud): babyed pa/ kun du gan gyis mi thung labs/ de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ skyes mchog myongs phyag
115b2(rgyud): 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ bdagul dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du
115b3(rgyud): thos// de sad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phrag tshol cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi/ dwe sar b+h+yo/
115b4(rgyud): yi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags she skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par sbyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa kho na las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi// nyim chen po
115b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdug gang du nub 'gyur ba// de na mtsho chen zab mo ni// shin tu 'da' ba dka' ba ste// de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi// phyogs de mngon par
115b6(rgyud): sbyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nyi du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams kyis ni yongs
115b7(rgyud): bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha
116a1(rgyud): min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/
116a2(rgyud): skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge ba'i gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad
116a3(rgyud): yang dang yang du thos// de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tsho la mchi/
116a4(rgyud): de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen blta
116a5(rgyud): mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni// brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la// gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // nges par
116a6(rgyud): yongs su spyod bgyid cing // zas su sA lu kha dog dang // dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ker bskol bgyis nas/
116a7(rgyud): tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min// gang na ma lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yin// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal
116b1(rgyud): bo ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bkas// de la bu ni/
116b2(rgyud): mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag
116b3(rgyud): rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni//
116b4(rgyud): rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa
116b5(rgyud): rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma khyod la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes
116b6(rgyud): skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyog/
116b7(rgyud): na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po sde bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur
117a1(rgyud): mchi ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu// de dag ni chibs rta tang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / rwa dang / lug dang / sbrul dang
117a2(rgyud): bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing / phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing // phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi
117a3(rgyud): lags so// chi bas rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing /
117a4(rgyud): phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag
117a5(rgyud): gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang // sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa stengs kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs
117a6(rgyud): can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi bdag lags so// byang phyogs na mtsho ka bing ka zhes bgyi ba'ang mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang gos can dang /
117a7(rgyud): gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// chabargyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ 'dzin pa zhes bkyi'i
117b1(rgyud): mchis te/ chabatsun pa dang de las 'byung // de las dgung rangabab par 'gyur// btsun bzod khyer u shri ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na// lus granas dang ni gnas sangs dang // debs gnas sung
117b2(rgyud): rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mkha' la bya ltar ganga'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi// pha ros byang gi phyogs can// 'dun sa bya dkar can shes bgyi ba de mchis
117b3(rgyud): te/ drer ni gnod sbyin rnams 'dra zhing gnas lags so// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang // 'jigs rung ste spu can dag mchis// de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rmya bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / khu brug
117b4(rgyud): sgra skad chen po dang / shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang // ko'u kum pa dang chun lag dong // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dka'// lus ngan
117b5(rgyud): pe dwe krugar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na/ rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor bu khrung na mchis lags so// bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun
117b6(rgyud): sa don numachog can zhes bgyid/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes pagyi lags so// de lagasang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tAd+ya/ i yi mi li/ i ma ma yi/ keTi mu sa
117b7(rgyud): hi li ki Te mu le hu du me hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan d+hA ri/ ge do ha ni/ oM ke me ke swAH/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang
118a1(rgyud): dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod mos dga' bas myos pa dang // klu yis myos pa spun dang ni// 'phreng bas
118a2(rgyud): myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang // ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang // rnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra// tum bu ru
118a3(rgyud): dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gsar can dang // pa wa sangs dang phur bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o//
118a4(rgyud): dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka yi
118a5(rgyud): dog pa bzhin// de mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lags so// tud+yathA/ kun+d+ra le kun le kA/ kun+du le/ kun+da le/ e hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti// sAr+b+ba b+hA rmA ri ni /
118a6(rgyud): tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta pA to si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/
118a7(rgyud): rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug ba rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgad po 'am/ dri za
118b1(rgyud): rgad mo 'am/ dri za'i bu po 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lha zhing
118b2(rgyud): glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na// glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyis dri za 'dra ba'i nang du mardzir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang
118b3(rgyud): lcang le can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/
118b4(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don
118b5(rgyud): par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgad po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/
118b6(rgyud): sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing
118b7(rgyud): gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyis sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so//
119a1(rgyud): de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tud+ya thA/ hU me hU me hU mi lI/ hU mi lA/ ba tI ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis
119a2(rgyud): grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon gyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mau sha/ rtsib legs
119a3(rgyud): che dang gsus po che// lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang // sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrog/ ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid
119a4(rgyud): sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed// la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang // tshon kun dang ni mig bkrab bo// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te//
119a5(rgyud): de la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum
119a6(rgyud): gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// ta d+ya thA/ si re bi si ra/ si ra bi sa ra/
119a7(rgyud): si re bi sa re/ kr-iSh+Na tsa ga le/ ka rA DI/ ba~M ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge gasnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang
119b1(rgyud): kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul
119b2(rgyud): bum mam/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgang po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu po 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/
119b3(rgyud): grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa dang / grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tsha bar byed pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na
119b4(rgyud): glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyis grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa
119b5(rgyud): bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i
119b6(rgyud): mdo rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo 'am/ yi dgas rgad
119b7(rgyud): po 'am/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu po 'am/ yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor po 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi
120a1(rgyud): / mngag gzug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/
120a2(rgyud): yi dgas rnams kyis yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing // rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngag
120a3(rgyud): kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ yu mi yu mi/ yu mi le/ yu mi la ba tre ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang
120a4(rgyud): dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang // ser po dang ni zhon dang // dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang // mya ngan
120a5(rgyud): med dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag/ ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdud rgyal// gdangs ka tshwa dang skar dga' dang // nag po che dang lag 'gro dang // rwa skyong dang
120a6(rgyud): ni 'jog po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang // sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag
120a7(rgyud): la 'tshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i glu dag dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ legs par smras pa 'di
120b1(rgyud): thos na// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ tsi li bi tsi li/ gai ri gan d+ha ri/ ma taM gi/
120b2(rgyud): tsaN+Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen num/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/
120b3(rgyud): rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgad po 'am/ klu rgan
120b4(rgyud): mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba li la
120b5(rgyud): zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyis klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi
120b6(rgyud): 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu
120b7(rgyud): rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te
121a1(rgyud): lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgang po 'am lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po
121a2(rgyud): 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lha zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/
121a3(rgyud): nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la lus srul po rnams kyis lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lung lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/
121a4(rgyud): de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ A pe ba ha ni/ ma hA na ba tri ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan
121a5(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste
121a6(rgyud): dbang po zla ba chu lba dang / ba ra dwa tsa skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang // mgrin ngan dang ni 'gul nges dang // stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang
121a7(rgyud): ri mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng lding ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang / rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni// lcags mdung ring dang
121b1(rgyud): maldan dang / tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ de dag ni bdag gi
121b2(rgyud): sman lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag le 'arje'o// gnod sbyin 'dri ni bdag mi gdeng ngo'isum chi 'ong / de dag lago bar brjod lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang /
121b3(rgyud): bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na// Ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'grus// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA
121b4(rgyud): hi li mi li/ hi le me le/ kIrti mU le/ hi li kIN+Di mU le/ oM tum+be tum+be/ oM tup+pa tum+be/ oM g+he mo ga/ go do he/ b+h+r-i ga re/ ri She set+ta me swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong
121b5(rgyud): ngam dge sbyong ma 'am/ dge brnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
121b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lus mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nas/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgang po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am
121b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags
122a1(rgyud): tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du
122a2(rgyud): mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang ljang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam
122a3(rgyud): dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba
122a4(rgyud): 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgang po 'am/ srin mo rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor
122a5(rgyud): po 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lha zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis
122a6(rgyud): par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyis srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa
122a7(rgyud): bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ he li hi li/ hU lu hU lu/ yu me yu me li/ yu mI la ba tri ye swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus
122b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas
122b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'dras pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de'idi
122b3(rgyud): la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin
122b4(rgyud): dum dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / ngag la ba der 'ongs
122b5(rgyud): tau phyin nas/ nga'i dbus la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam dzes kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen ngos gsal bar
122b6(rgyud): gyur to// rgya po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// rdo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa
122b7(rgyud): snga rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang // dkar byung dang mabyon pa// thams cad la ni ba ga phyag 'tshal// cod la bdag ni srubs su
123a1(rgyud): mchi// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang nags 'das
123a2(rgyud): dag dang bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gzhug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang
123a3(rgyud): mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin
123a4(rgyud): dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang /
123a5(rgyud): dge slong ma rnams dang dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma
123a6(rgyud): lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags
123a7(rgyud): pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang srung ba dang / sug pa nang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs legs so zhes gsol ba dang / dge slong/
123b1(rgyud): dgangs rtul po chen po rnam thos kyi bul cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i nabs la mgo bos paga' sa/
123b2(rgyud): nyan rdza sa rje ba dang / kun tu rtsub pa yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / drung ba dang / mug brkang bal phyag 'tshal dar 'thur ba'adi nyidang tu cher gsos te/ skyebasas
123b3(rgyud): dag gtong por cing // phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa// mi de rnams kyi rnyed pa lags// gang zhig 'char la brten nas ni// des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/
123b4(rgyud): nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ ming ni yul 'khor
123b5(rgyud): srung zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mad mchis te/ brgyad cu dang ni
123b6(rgyud): bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs
123b7(rgyud): rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal
124a1(rgyud): lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi mi phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang drang yang du thos// de skad bdug ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol/
124a2(rgyud): cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/
124a3(rgyud): phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na yi dwags zhes bgyi ba// rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can// srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa// 'jungs shing mi
124a4(rgyud): snyan smra bgyid pa'i// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar
124a5(rgyud): gyis rtag tu rtse// grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po
124a6(rgyud): zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/
124a7(rgyud): kye mchog rtsod la phyag 'tshal nas// mi yis phyag dgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang
124b1(rgyud): du thos// de srad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u tam rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tsho la mchi// de ltar lce yi
124b2(rgyud): phyogs de ni// bzung ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par sbyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang zhig nub pa khon las// des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi//
124b3(rgyud): nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can// nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba// des na mtsho chen zab mo ni// shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste// da ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes// skye bo rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i/
124b4(rgyud): phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// klu rnams
124b5(rgyud): kyis ni yongs bskor cing // klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas// de la bun mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig/ de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang
124b6(rgyud): lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas// skyes bu cang shas khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la
124b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du
125a1(rgyud): thos de snad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol
125a2(rgyud): mchi// de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan// dga' zhing lhun chen
125a3(rgyud): lha mdzes dang // gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni// brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing // de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la// gshol yang 'chang bar mi bgyid cing // tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang // nges par yongs su
125a4(rgyud): spyod bgyid cing // zas su sA lu kha dog dang // dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang // dri dang me tog tshogs 'dra zhing // lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal// na li ker bskol bgyis nas// tshod mar de 'tshal srun tshod
125a5(rgyud): min// gang na ma lce rtse 'dra ba'i// sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni// gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste// ming ni lus ngan po zhes
125a6(rgyud): bgyi// de ni nye du lhan cig tu// glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse// gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing // gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas// de la bu ni mang mchis te// brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig
125a7(rgyud): de dag ming mthun grags pa ni// dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa// kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags// de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen
125b1(rgyud): mthong nas// skyes du cang shes khyod la 'dud// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes// mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni// rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags// bdag la dge bas gzigs su
125b2(rgyud): gsol// khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba// de skad yang dang yang du thos// de skad bdag ni 'di skad ces// 'dren pa rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ go'u ta ma rgyal la phyag tshol cig/ sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs/
125b3(rgyud): ldan pa// mya ngan 'das la phyag tshol mchi// de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni// bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi// phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa// rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags// shar phyogs
125b4(rgyud): na ni yul 'khor srung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang // byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag/ 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul
125b5(rgyud): chen po stobs po che// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing // phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam
125b6(rgyud): par rgyu// de dag ni chibs rnga dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing /
125b7(rgyud): phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing // phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so// chibs rta dang / rnga ma dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang /
126a1(rgyud): lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing / phyogs phyogs dag tu'ang mchi lags so//
126a2(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che// gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams// gzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid// rgyal po dag gi grong khyer dag/ sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba
126a3(rgyud): mchis// 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes
126a4(rgyud): bgyi ba dag lags so// byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bing ka zhes bgyi ba'ang mchis lags so// nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang
126a5(rgyud): pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so// chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa// 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te// chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung // de las dgung char
126a6(rgyud): 'bab par 'gyur// btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na// lus gnas dang ni gnas yang sa dang // de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can// rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang // bar snang mnga'
126a7(rgyud): la bya ltar gda'// btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol// byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so// rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang //
126b1(rgyud): 'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis// de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag/ rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang // khu byug sgra skad chen po dang // shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing // rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang // ko'u dum/
126b2(rgyud): padang chun lag dang // bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing // me tog sdang rtsi'i ro la dga'// lus dran po da glu gar gyis// pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse// btsun pa grong khyer ljang lo can gyi pha rol na// rgyal
126b3(rgyud): bo dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so// bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so// de la gsang
126b4(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i le mi le/ ki Ti mU la/ hi li ki Ti mU la/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ kau ri gan d+ha ri/ gau do ha ni/ oM kre mo ke swA hU/ btsun pa
126b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ 'dod mos dga'
126b6(rgyud): bas myos pa dang // glu yis myos pa spun rnams dang // 'phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos// me tog myos pa spun rnams dang // rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos// nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang /
126b7(rgyud): ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang // rnga 'dzin dang na 'u byug sla// tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang // gser spyod bu mo gser can dang // pa wa sangs dang phu bu dag/ 'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags// de dag bdag
127a1(rgyud): gi spun lags te// de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang // bdag
127a2(rgyud): mi gtong ba'i dri za yis// legs par smras pa 'di thos nas// ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ ku tu la
127a3(rgyud): ku tu le/ ku tu la/ ku tu le/ e hi e hi/ sA d+ha ma ti ke sA d+ha ma ti ke sA d+ha b+harti ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bA to si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
127a4(rgyud): dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher
127a5(rgyud): lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la// gal te dri za'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgadang po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu po 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor po 'am/ dri za'i 'khor
127a6(rgyud): mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lha zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags
127a7(rgyud): mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri ba rnams kyis dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lung lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas
127b1(rgyud): lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nus dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyud dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i
127b2(rgyud): mdo/ rig sngags dang srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha ba'i'am/ sha za mo'am
127b3(rgyud): sha za rgad po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha ba'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor po 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma
127b4(rgyud): 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyis sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir
127b5(rgyud): mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA
127b6(rgyud): hU me hU me hU mi le/ hU mi la/ ba tri ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag
127b7(rgyud): dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ rtsib legs che dang gsus po che// lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu// g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang /
128a1(rgyud): sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang // rna ba ring dang 'brug sku sgrog/ ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang // srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi// 'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/ la ba
128a2(rgyud): bzang ldan gsum po dang // tshon kun dang ni mig bkrab bo// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o// grul bum 'di ni bdag
128a3(rgyud): mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing / de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/
128a4(rgyud): de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ si re bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ si re bi sa re/ kr-iSh+Na tsha ka li/ ka ra Di/ pi ga le swA hA
128a5(rgyud): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags
128a6(rgyud): dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgad po
128a7(rgyud): 'am/ grul dum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor po 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi
128b1(rgyud): nga ga gdum ma 'che bar bgyid du/ gras ga shing rnagras tshol ba la lazhig nye bar mchi nying/ nye bar byung dus nyebadu chis phur byud / thags mid cing gnas mi rnye la/ thus phus bas/
128b2(rgyud): kyis hrul bus 'dra ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal de'i pho zang lcang lo can du nga gnas mi 'thong ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdud du 'grus lags so// btsun pa bci ldan 'das
128b3(rgyud): kyisan thos dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bldan ma gang la la kun tu rgyub dang / kun tu chub ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i bde/ rig sngags dang / srung dadang / sreg pa/
128b4(rgyud): pral phyag 'tshul bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing bden par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dgas sam/ yi dgas mo'am/ yi dgus nad po lang/ yi dgas rgan mo 'am/ yi dgras kyi bu po'ang/
128b5(rgyud): yi dgas kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi 'dor pa'am/ yi dgas kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dgas kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lnga ning glags tshol
128b6(rgyud): bal la zhiganye bar mchi zhing / rke bar 'byed dam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dgas rnams kyis yi dgas 'du ba'i nang du chir mi chung cing rgyal
128b7(rgyud): po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thodab de/ de'i mgo ma dz+ra ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// taHthA/ yu ma yum/
129a1(rgyud): su mi li su mi khA ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang kluchen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag
129a2(rgyud): dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di la sde/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang // nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang // ser po dang ni zho rna dang // dbang po lag dang bkra shis dang //
129a3(rgyud): mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral// rab grol dang ni rgyal po bdag/ ngos yungs po dang ngos bkra dang // yangs pa can dang bkra bdun rgyal// gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang / nag po che dang lag 'gro dang
129a4(rgyud): ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang // g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang // sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags// de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di
129a5(rgyud): ni bdag la 'tshe'o// klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing // de dag la go bar bgyid lags so// bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na/
129a6(rgyud): ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'grus// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ gau rI gan d+ha ri/ ma taM gi/ tsaN+Da li swA hA/ btsun
129a7(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo// rig sngags
129b1(rgyud): dang srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgang po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu'o//
129b2(rgyud): 'amaklu'i bu me 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ blugs su zhing skyugs tshol ba la la zhi gtse bar mche zhing /
129b3(rgyud): rke bar 'greng ngem nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyis klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i
129b4(rgyud): mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu
129b5(rgyud): rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/
129b6(rgyud): gal te lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo'am/ lus srul rgad pa 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor po 'am/
129b7(rgyud): lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tsho bar bgyid pa/ glags la zhing grags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng /
130a1(rgyud): dam nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la lus srul po rnams kyis lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang
130a2(rgyud): lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ar+dz+dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so// tad+ya thA/ a pe/ ba ha ne/
130a3(rgyud): bah+ma nA/ ba tI ye swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang // gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams
130a4(rgyud): kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so// 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang // ba ra dwa tsi skye dgu'i bdag/ dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang / mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang // stobs ldan nor
130a5(rgyud): bu nor spyod dang // sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang // rI mnyam gser can gang po dang // seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang // gnod sbyin pa skyong 'brog gnas dang // rgyal ba khyu mchog mi rgyal po// dri za sna tshogs/
130a6(rgyud): sde dang nr-i// ljags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang // tshigs ser po yid dga' dang // gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas// 'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum bya// 'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/

130b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang // bdag mi gtong ba'i gdod sbyid kyis// legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ ardza ka yi dag pa bzhin// de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'grus/ de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags/

130b3(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang /

130b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gtsug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi

130b7(rgyud): rnams kyis gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// btsun pa

131a3(rgyud): rgang po 'am/ srin po rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am// srin po'i 'khor po 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma

131a5(rgyud): ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du'ang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so// de la gsang sngag kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so//
131a6(rgyud): tad+yathA/ hi le hi le/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu me le/ yu mi lA bi tri ye swAhA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong
131a7(rgyud): dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par
131b1(rgyud): nga / smon pa du garna pa byang dang des pa dab bu'i phyi ga tu dang / ku rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / snang ba dang / lug bkang pa la phyag 'am
131b2(rgyud): zung ba 'dri nyid song zhig/ drang shi/ ngas shi/ lhogs shig/ bcom ldan 'dres kyis de gad ces bka' sas nas/ dge slong de dag yi'ang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la bangon
131b3(rgyud): par bstod do// / bad sdom ni/ i kI/ pusi yutsi/ a hi hi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang / go rims bzhin du sbyar ro// mde chen po kun tu chub dang /
131b4(rgyud): kun tu chub ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mde zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradra ba dang / bu chen gyi lo tsa ba bani d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bskur
131b5(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ @rgya bar skad du/ Ad+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
131b6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga'i gnas na/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor
131b7(rgyud): chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'
132a1(rgyud): dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'dzeg po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang /
132a2(rgyud): sa srungs kyi bu dang / mdongs bu dang dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog gi 'phreng ba dang / gtsug na nor bu rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug
132a3(rgyud): pud can dang / gtsug pud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po can/
132a4(rgyud): dang lag gi 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu brtan dang / mgul na nor bu dang /

132a7(rgyud): dar dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa da ra da ra dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang
132b1(rgyud): phrin bu gnas pa nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po de dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'das bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gre lding dang / rab mdzes dang / grang chen sna dang / rnon po dang /
132b2(rgyud): se s+yA dad/ klog pa dang tho ga 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu gobs dang / kwa'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / rin d+ha'i 'od can
132b3(rgyud): dang shes mdog sgra dang / gser 'od dang / rdza ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / ni 'od dang / 'chang ba dang / bslang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkur po dang / nag po dang / grwa shin rje dang /

132b5(rgyud): sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang mis byin dang / rnam par dul ba dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra'i gdung dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po
132b6(rgyud): mur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang / 'jug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po/
132b7(rgyud): bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che dang / bim bi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang /
133a1(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po smug byed dang / 'od 'ang dang / mgo bdun pa dang / sdong chen dang / mthong dgra' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med ga zi brjid dang / mig pang
133a2(rgyud): dang drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shu la can dang / rin chen chu sprin chen dang / chu sprin sprin chen dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas
133a3(rgyud): 'thung dang sprin zla dang rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen po dang ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang /
