133a5(rgyud): dang sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpa' dang chu 'dzin dang sprin gdugs dang / oMng gi ra'i gdong dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / sprin las mngon 'drung dang / klu'i rgyal po gos
133a6(rgyud): stabs mtha' yas las dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyang lho dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser ngang can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug drag dang / dbyangs snyan
133a7(rgyud): dang ku'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'brug sa dang / rnga spa dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug rdzogs dang / dpa' sde dang
133b1(rgyud): sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i glong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
133b2(rgyud): de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te spyan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
133b3(rgyud): btud nas bla ma la gus pa dang phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / brug pa dang / phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
133b4(rgyud): ba dan dang / dar gyi lnga lding dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang rin po che'i me tog dang rin po che'i lnga ldi dang mu tig gi
133b5(rgyud): 'phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go
133b6(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
133b7(rgyud): rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba
134a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la'ang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med
134a2(rgyud): dpag tu med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang lus re re la'ang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon
134a3(rgyud): par phyogs pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres
134a4(rgyud): pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di ste ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho'i sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med grangs med/ bsam gyis
134a5(rgyud): mi khyab gzhal du med tshad med brjod du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis
134a6(rgyud): ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od zer stug po dang nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rin po che thams
134a7(rgyud): cad kyi 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pargya mtsho sprin rnams dang phye ma dang shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod
134b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya batsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon
134b2(rgyud): pargya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab
134b3(rgyud): gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par
134b4(rgyud): bya'o// yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub dpa'
134b5(rgyud): rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// thams cad kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams
134b6(rgyud): dang rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
134b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma
135a1(rgyud): 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug
135a2(rgyud): ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
135a3(rgyud): rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu rgyal po rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/
135a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che dang spos dang / me tog sna
135a5(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams
135a6(rgyud): dang khwa rin po che'i sgron ma dang spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
135a7(rgyud): me tog thams cad kyi me brgya mtsho smin rnams dang rin po che'i 'phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis rnam mapa'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byed
135b1(rgyud): gyis brdabs nas phyogs bcu kun tu 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis rab tu brgyan/
135b2(rgyud): pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa 'ang pa brtsegs pa rgya tsho sprin rnams dang bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang sgo kun tu
135b3(rgyud): me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du
135b4(rgyud): bya'o// tha mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi cho mtshom dang 'phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i rdzi rje mtsho
135b5(rgyud): sprin rnams dang / me tog ltar snang ba sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri
135b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri
135b7(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho
136a1(rgyud): #sprin rnams dang 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i
136a2(rgyud): snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od
136a3(rgyud): zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams
136a4(rgyud): cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spos dang nor bu sna tshogs pa thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar
136a5(rgyud): ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad
136a6(rgyud): kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i sprin shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba
136a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
136b1(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma lngar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
136b2(rgyud): sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rin po che 'a dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng gre'i khri rgyu mtsho sprin
136b3(rgyud): rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi sing
136b4(rgyud): ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron pa'i 'phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po
136b5(rgyud): can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spros dang / me tog dang / pad+ma thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
136b6(rgyud): gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po
136b7(rgyud): che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi se ga'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs/
137a1(rgyud): dang rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas brgyan pa nyi ma snang bar byed pa snying po can gyi seng ge'i 'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te
137a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod bar bya'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin
137a3(rgyud): rnams dang / an da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyis me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i smon
137a4(rgyud): ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dung / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa
137a5(rgyud): thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla ra rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tig thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu rgyas par 'grengs
137a6(rgyud): pa'i dra ba bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi ze bcan gyi 'od zer
137a7(rgyud): snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu
137b1(rgyud): khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o//
137b2(rgyud): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs
137b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs
137b4(rgyud): rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i
137b5(rgyud): gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong bu yi yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spros
137b6(rgyud): dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang // tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po snang
137b7(rgyud): bar byed pa kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor/
138a1(rgyud): bya'o// mchod par bya'o// rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya
138a2(rgyud): mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil
138a3(rgyud): 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po
138a4(rgyud): che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams
138a5(rgyud): dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu
138a6(rgyud): 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/
138a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang
138b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas
138b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pargyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtseg
138b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems
138b4(rgyud): can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa
138b5(rgyud): thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mdzod
138b6(rgyud): par bya'o// rin po che 'od 'phro ba kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen
138b7(rgyud): po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro brgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams
139a1(rgyud): cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin/
139a2(rgyud): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres
139a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// spros dang /
139a4(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi
139a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin rnams
139a6(rgyud): dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rgya mtsho
139a7(rgyud): rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi
139b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o// bla mar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
139b2(rgyud): bskor ba byas te zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod ngo // de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stabs
139b3(rgyud): can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba
139b4(rgyud): dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te
139b5(rgyud): byugos phrag pa gcig tu gapar nas/ pus me g.yas pa'i ldangs btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de legs su thal mo sbyar nas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
139b6(rgyud): to// gal te zhu bzhus na lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag
139b7(rgyud): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po
140a1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//
140a2(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol
140a3(rgyud): to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
140a4(rgyud): dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ rtse dang / shing gel ba deng/ sman dang nags tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams
140a5(rgyud): cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas
140a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin
140a7(rgyud): gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// klu'i bdag po
140b1(rgyud): chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o//
140b2(rgyud): klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi 'tshog mtshon gyis mi tshugs chus mi khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis/
140b3(rgyud): mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrungs par 'gyur/ bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/
140b4(rgyud): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thag thogs med par 'gyur sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang rab tu
140b5(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi'i byams pa la gnas
140b6(rgyud): pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go/ klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o// klu'i bdag po
140b7(rgyud): gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/ 'dzam bu'i
141a1(rgyud): gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do// klu'i bdag po
141a2(rgyud): de la badre ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra ni d+ha ra ni/ u d+ha ra ni/ sam pra tiSh+Tha tA/ bI dza ya brna sad t+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra hA/ dz+nyA nA ba ti/ ud de pA dA ni
141a3(rgyud): b+hin+da nA ni/ a b+hi she tsa nI A d+hi d+ya hA ra/ shu d+ha ba ti/ A dzi ma du/ e hI ku ma pA la ni/ b+hUhA hu ra kle shan/ d+hunA pA bam/ sho d+ha ya margan/ ni ka/ d+harma tA shud+d+hi/ lo ka bi ti mI rarA rA dzas
141a4(rgyud): du khA/ sha ma nA sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka nI a d+hiSh+Thi te/ pradz+nyA dzA b+he swA hA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis
141a5(rgyud): brlabs pas/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par bya'o// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul pa snang
141a6(rgyud): bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa/ gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang rigs kyi de bzhin
141a7(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o// de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang klu'i tshe rigs thams cad dang
141b1(rgyud): klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad drung / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad d+hun
141b2(rgyud): gcod par byed/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do// klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
141b3(rgyud): par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba sprin gyis rnam par mdzes pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
141b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
141b5(rgyud): chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
141b6(rgyud): nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsa la
141b7(rgyud): dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das
142a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
142a2(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin
142a3(rgyud): chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor
142a4(rgyud): phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil byung mi dga' rab 'jom sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
142a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bdal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
142a6(rgyud): rtsal gyi spra ni ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin kun tu ston la
142a7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spra ni rgya chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de
142b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lngar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
142b2(rgyud): pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
142b3(rgyud): sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la
142b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
142b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin
142b6(rgyud): chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo//
142b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
143a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
143a2(rgyud): gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
143a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spa 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
143a4(rgyud): pabasnyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
143a5(rgyud): gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom lnga 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa
143a6(rgyud): na sprin gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
143a7(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// klu'i bdag po
143b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam du'i gling 'dir dus dus su thar ba'i/
143b2(rgyud): rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang le tog thams cad skyed par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ stong gsum
143b3(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das sdad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus nu
143b4(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab
143b5(rgyud): ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang /
143b6(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang dag klu thams cad la yang dag
143b7(rgyud): par bskul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig
144a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar
144a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par
144a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/
144a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi
144a5(rgyud): brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
144a6(rgyud): gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon yid la zung zhig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa/ dpa' ba'i tog ces
144a7(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa rjes su yi rangs pa bshad par byaste/
144b1(rgyud): de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/ char ches na gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad skul bar byed/ lU thams cad snyim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms/
144b2(rgyud): par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do// tad+ya thA ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+h+re sa ni/ shA~M ti dzi la ga sI Di Ta bi kramA/ badz+ra sa hA ta ni/ pa ra ma bi rAdza
144b3(rgyud): nirma la gu Na ke tu/ sUr+ya pra b+he/ bi ma laM ga yaSh+Ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha raM/ dri dum buha ni ha na/ ma hA pra b+he daM d+hu ta ma hA mo ha aM d+ha ka re/ pradz+nyA gra shud d+he/ pa ri pU ra Na mi tra/ mai tri bI ra
144b4(rgyud): man skan d+ha/ mai tI ma bud+d+ha re/ dza la dza la/ dz+wa la dza la/ dza lam bu d+ha re dza lam bu d+ha re/ bo d+h+ya ga ku su me/ da sha ba le/ tsa tur du baM shA ra d+hi/ aSh+NI da sha a be Ni ka bud+d+he d+harme shu b+ha ma ti pu N+ya
144b5(rgyud): rA shi/ shuk+Sha d+harma sa ma nI ti/ gam b+hi ra bi ra bi ra dzi ske/ bi ma lo/ bi she Sha pra pa te/ ni rA pra b+ha d+harme/ sarba le ka dz+yeSh+Te/ dz+yeSh+Te ba ra pA ba re/ a nu ta ta re/ a sang ge/ d+ha rad+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
144b6(rgyud): shan ta ma te/ shAn ta pA be/ tsA ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru kapa ra ma bud+d+hA nu mA te/ mahA pradz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal
144b7(rgyud): lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
145a1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char ba'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o// srA ma the dan/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru ka na kun nu/ dza badza ba/ dzi bidz+ri bi/
145a2(rgyud): dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag tshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur shog/ kye klu chen po
145a3(rgyud): dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig/ ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o// byams pa'i sems dang
145a4(rgyud): snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos/
145a5(rgyud): klu'i bdag po dag tshur shogasangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ d+hi ri b+hi ri/ d+hu ru b+hu ru
145a6(rgyud): chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin gyi chu 'chang ba tsun lag gis 'gro ba chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur shog/ ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig/ g+haT g+haT/ g+hi Ti s+t+raiT
145a7(rgyud): g+huTu g+hu Tu/ drag shul can le bo shugs chen po dang ldan pa dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas tshur shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i
145b1(rgyud): gling 'dir char po bcig swAhA/ ta Ta ta TA/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams/ dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyi
145b2(rgyud): rlabs dran par gyis lardo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swAhA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa/ sprin chen po brtse kra
145b3(rgyud): pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams tshur shog/ byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
145b4(rgyud): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gis 'gro ba thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden
145b5(rgyud): bas/ g+ha ma g+ha ma/ g+hi mi gI mi g+hu mu g+hu mu swAhA/ klu thams cad dgug go/ byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri kra nu ru nu ru s+yAH/
145b6(rgyud): yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa mgo stong pa mgo dang mig dmar ba/ stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o// kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/ bsod/
145b7(rgyud): nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Da~M/ gu DA gu Du swA hA/

146a2(rgyud): shu ru swa hA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi rigs dang cho rigs dran par gyis la/ ma bshol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob cig sA hA

151a3(rgyud): cig tu bzhugs te de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos nam mkha' la di ri di ri spogs shing rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te/ bcom ldan 'das
151a4(rgyud): la sri nu bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lcags so// kye klu chen po dag/ klu dag tshur shog/ mu lu mu lu tsa ta tsata paT paT/ ma Ta ma Ta swAhA/ glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing rdzi char chen
151a5(rgyud): po'i rgyun thong la char po bcig kye kye klu chen po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig/ kye klu chen po dag tshur tshur tshur shog
151a6(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob cig/ b+hu DA g+hu TA/ mu n+ya mun+d+ha hi hi hi hi hi/ tsur+Na tsur+Na/ ma hA na ga hri da ya sarba nA kA naM AM kat+t+wa sats+tshed yo/ shi thA n+da ra swAhA/ sI chen po rnam par
151a7(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i rgyan bkod pa dag gser snam gyi mtho'i rin po che thams cad tshon gyi lnga ldi mdzes pa mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprini dag dang lha'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal med
151b1(rgyud): khang me tog rab tu 'byung ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dgra gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs la rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing lha'i ras bcos du mang po mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng rgya
151b2(rgyud): mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sna spogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam
151b3(rgyud): kyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i rin po che bshod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis rlobs/ sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sdod
151b4(rgyud): ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla re dril bu'i sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa rgya mtsho
151b5(rgyud): chen po'i sprin drag dang rgya mtsho sprin chen pos spra cher sgrogs shing / lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la mu tig gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / gser srung
151b6(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun tu khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis nam mkha' kun tu khebs
151b7(rgyud): par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang / snang ba dang ldan pa'i rtse mtsho chen po'i sgras kun tu lebs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig/ klu dang klu'i
152a1(rgyud): rgyul phyos pas drung // pa 'i drugs sog shing bar yo // d+hA rabatu po sa na ba / nga rdzog /
152a2(rgyud): grog chen po snang b.rab tu phyung zhig 'du zhing kun tu 'dul tog yar dang dir zhing 'dug ste/ klu'i skad chen po yid du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyangs chen po rab tu stegs pa dag 'dzam
152a3(rgyud): bu'i gling dun rab tu pa bcig maT/ Ta TiTi hu dz+ra/ b+h+ya g+hu kr-i TA kaN/ ki Ti ki Ti/ maHmaT/ tsaT/ baT dAn/ kye su dang sdechen pong
152a4(rgyud): chung tshur tshur shog tshur shog d+hu d+hA d+hu d+hu/ hA hA hA d+ha/ dI hri hUM hUM 'brug chen po spogs shig/ rlung chen po rab tu gtong ba dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
152a5(rgyud): char rab tu bcig swA hA// kye kye klu dang klu'i rgyal po dag klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul gyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling du char pob cig/ g+hur+Na b+huT/ phaT phaT/ hA hA/ hwe he/ klu chen po
152a6(rgyud): dga' dus shig/ sa'i stang du char rab tu phab cig g+hu ru g+hu ru ki ri ki ri tsi ri tsi ri mi ri mi ri/ di ri di ri ki li ki li zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru dang /
152a7(rgyud): shing ljon pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sma na thams cad rab tu skye bar gyis shig byams pa'i sems kyis tshur shog/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang chos kyi bden pa dang / dge
152b1(rgyud): 'dun gyi bden pa dang lag na rdo rje'i bden pa dang / klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu chen po dag tshur shog tshur shog swA/ rtswa'i rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par bskul lo// sangs rgyas kyi
152b2(rgyud): bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig sAhA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo// chos kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu thob cig sAhA/
152b3(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par bskul lo// dge 'dun gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho ba cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo// lag na rdo rje/
152b4(rgyud): bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAh+ma/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bskul lo// tshangs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po
152b5(rgyud): dpal mgrin la yang dag par bskul lo// dbang po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo// khyab 'jug gi bden pas
152b6(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bcig sA ng+ku/ klu'i rgyal po 'phreng ba can la yang dag par bskul lo// drag po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu po bcig swahA klu'i rgyal po gzi
152b7(rgyud): can la yang dag par bskul lo// drang song gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pho bcig swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po skrag 'bros byed la yang dag par bskul lo// lha'i bden pas mdzem bu'i gling
153a1(rgyud): ra 'dir char rab tu pho bcig sngan/ kwa'i rgyal po gzi can chen po la yang dag par bskul lo// klu thams cad kyi bden pas 'dza bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phobacig spahA/ klu'i
153a2(rgyud): rgyal po rab 'joms la yang drag par bskul lo// gnod sbyin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu byeng sdig sa/ klu'i rgyal po madros pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ srin pa'i
153a3(rgyud): bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swAhA/ klu gong ma thams cad kyi bden pas char rab tu ngob cig cher phob cig ma 'phyi ngar tshur shog tshur shog/ kye kye klu chen po dag/ klu thams
153a4(rgyud): cad kyi snying po la yang dag par bskul lo// kun nas drang ngo // sar sa ra/ hA hA/ d+hum d+hu ma/ hA hA hA hA/ hi hi tsi ha~M/ e h+ye hI tha tha tha/ tsa tsa tsa ratra
153a5(rgyud): zhing thams cad kun tu gang bar gyis shig/ 'bru thams cad kyi char phob cig/ rlung chen po rab tu thong zhig/ druM druM/ g+hu g+h+raM/ puM pAM/ Ta Ta Ta/ ni dA ra Ni/ sta~M b+ha ni/ mo hA ni/ dzaM g+hu li
153a6(rgyud): puk+ka si/ pra hA Ne/ ma taM gi/ dza ya bi dza ye/ hA hA/ swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rab 'joms dang /
153a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'byung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun tu 'gegs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dang / de bzhin/
153b1(rgyud): gshegs pa sprin rjen rgyas mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par ldog pa'i sna'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa/
153b2(rgyud): smin srung dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnga sA dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin/
153b3(rgyud): chen dbyings snyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen tshub ma'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rjen shin tu brtan pa'i/
153b4(rgyud): rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sprin brtan pas dga' bar mdzad pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'ur 'ur sgra dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs pas
153b5(rgyud): 'jigs mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thog tog rab 'bebs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang // de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bkra shis kyi ched
153b6(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo// dkon mchog gsum
153b7(rgyud): gyi bka' lung gis/ myur du shig cig/ kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag tshur shog tshur shog/ hu lu hu lu/ su ru su ru/ d+ha pa d+ha pa/ b+ha ra g+ha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma'i phyi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden
154a1(rgyud): pas tshur shog/ chos kyi bden pas tshur shog/ dge 'dun gyi bden pas tshur shog klu thams cad dang klu chen po gong mgong ma dag gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir
154a2(rgyud): chur po bcig/ a lnga la zhes gar byed cing a la la zhes glu len pa dang a la la zhes glu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po byed cing 'dul char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs shing klu chen
154a3(rgyud): po rnams kyi chos kyi sgra yid du 'ong basbyin pa dug/ gu lu gu lu/ nA ge nA k+She/ tsaT tsaT/ nA kai nI/ hA hA/ hrI hrI/ nA gan gri nin ge/ sar+b+ba nA ga~M/ bat+ta ma b+ha ni/ nA ra NI/ mA ra
154a4(rgyud): ta re Ni ka ta re/ ta rata ra/ ta re/ ke bi la ke sha/ bi kr-i ta daMSh+Ti/ b+hU yAM nA ke/ A kraT D+ha/ A kaTi D+ha/ mA bi lim pa tha/ bi d+ha dz+wa re/ g+ho ra rU pi Ni/ kA le/ a kA le/ gardza ta/ sarba me g+ha bi
154a5(rgyud): kurba Ni/ sany+dza da ni/ sarba k+She tran/ a pU ru Ni/ tsak+Shi tsakra badz+ri/ hrI ri tir/ b+h+re gra d+ha gai/ s+phar sU rA/ kA li kA li/ ma hA kA li/ hr-i da ya/ pa bi sha/ a taM/ matre/ sarba nA ga yAkaR+Sha Ni/ dUr ya duH
154a6(rgyud): ya hUM hUM/ rat+na tra ya bi kurbi te/ badz+ra Ne/ badz+re badz+ra pA ni/ kA la she d+hi ra/ nA ga tu bi ni/ su ru pa/ b+ho ge b+ho ge/ ma hA b+ho ma hA b+ho gi/ b+ho ga ru pu/ ta ya ba la/ paR+Sha Ni/ sarba nA ga sany+tso da ni swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra/
154a7(rgyud): yA ya / na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ya/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ su ru pe/ kA la ru pi Ni swA hA/ chos smra bas thog mkho nar srung ba'i cho ga byas la/ chos gos kyi grwar lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa bor nas/ rlung gi
154b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying ngo zhes bya ba 'di zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyun ma chad par bklag par bya'o// shar phyogs su ni ba lang gi sgribs klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor/
154b2(rgyud): dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// lde phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po rab tu rgyus byed ces bya ba ga lnga pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug pud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun
154b3(rgyud): pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po sprin bskul zhes bya ba mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o// bla re dang / gos sngon po dang rgyal mtshan dang
154b4(rgyud): lha bshos thams cad kyang sngon por bya'o// klu thams cad la dbab pa ni mngar gsum gyis bya'o// mngar gsum gyi dgang blugs bdun yang klu'i snying pos sbyin sreg bya'o// sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang
154b5(rgyud): bris te/ char gyi rgyun 'bebs te phan tshun thug cing mthar glog 'gyu bar bya'o// 'dir dbab pa ni 'khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / pan tse dang / sha dang nya sha dang / sbrang rtsi las byas
154b6(rgyud): pa'i zas mchog rgyas par bya'o// de nas chos spa ba gtsang rnying gos gtsang ma bgos pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po bklag par bya'o// de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nas
154b7(rgyud): brtsams te/ di ri ring sgra sgrogs par byed cing sgra yid du 'ong ba dag 'byin par 'gyur te/ le'u 'di la the tsom dang brnyas par mi bya'o// gal te rgya mtsho dus ched las yol na/ 'di'ang char
155a1(rgyud): las yol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i
155a2(rgyud): rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
155a3(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin bdal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jug bsgrags la phyag
155a4(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kun tu ston la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
155a5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin rnam
155a6(rgyud): par rgyas mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi yan lag mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
155a7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
155b1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'bru bskrun la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'phreng ba can/
155b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas smin 'thod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
155b3(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin 'dzin
155b4(rgyud): kha phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
155b5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyis byin la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra rnam par sgrogs la phyag
155b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi chu ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
155b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug nges par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs
156a1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad bde legs su gyur cig/ 'byung po thams cad la byams par gyur cig/ dud 'gror gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa
156a2(rgyud): med par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar gyur cig/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs
156a3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga 'di grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ sU tra sU ta/ sU ta sU ta/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta sAhA/ char mi 'bab pa'i tshe dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan nam/ dge bsnyen ma
156a4(rgyud): gang la la zhig gis mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gang shegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi gleng bris nas gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/ pog por bdun
156a5(rgyud): gyis nam mkha' la gyen du 'dug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun ma chad par byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro//
156a6(rgyud): 'phags pa sbyin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yanA/
156a7(rgyud): garA bI pri na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
156b1(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs te/ de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can la dag shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa nas sros
156b2(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyir nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri
156b3(rgyud): 'di na/ ring po dag dge slong rnams la 'tshe na/ de la bdag gis ji ltar mi 'tshe bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka'
156b4(rgyud): stsal to// klu'i rgyal po legs so legs so// 'di lta bu ni khyod kyis bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag de'i phyir dug dang sman
156b5(rgyud): chen po bcwo brgyad po 'di dag gi ming zung zhig/ tad+ya thA/ pan+ta rA/ kA ra Te/ ke yu re/ pe dang gA ma te/ bingad du ma te/ a ra Ta/ ta ra ta rA ta ru tra/ da ha dAn/ a ta
156b6(rgyud): daha/ dze le dza la/ pa le/ sha Ta sha Ta/ ku li na ku li e kar shI ta raM gA pi sh+tsa/ drage slong dag su zhig dug dang sman chen po bcwo brgyad po de dag gi ming 'dzin pa de'i
156b7(rgyud): lus la rims kyis mi tshugs dug dang / mtshon dang / byad stems dang / ro langs dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pas mi tshugs so// de la/
157a1(rgyud): ring po dag 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di dag 'dzin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / klu'i rgyal po/
157a2(rgyud): gzi can yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis nus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
157a3(rgyud): chu gar skad du/ prah+ma mA tra~M kan mad+har Ni/ bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi sum zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
157a4(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
157a5(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / pa wa sangs dang / phur bu dang / gza' lhag pa dang / spen pa dang /
157a6(rgyud): sgragacan 'dzin dang / mjug rings rnams dang / rgyu gar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod pa/ rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brnangs kyis rdo rje'i dril bzhugs so//
157a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dum dang yang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang
157b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /
157b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan rus gzigs dbang
157b3(rgyud): phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
157b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i
157b6(rgyud): dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to// bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba theg mar dge ba dang / bar du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba dang / tshig 'bru bzang
157b7(rgyud): bo/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlangs kyis/ bcom
158a1(rgyud): ldan 'das la lan brgya song du mas bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bsnyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas/ 'khor de dag la
158a2(rgyud): 'gying brag tu bltas te/ rdo rje'i thul mo rang gi snying khar bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzung ba/ mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ drag shul
158a3(rgyud): can gyi sems dang ra/ khro bo'i gzugs can dag/ sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ mtho 'tsham par bgyid pa/ mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid cing / kha cig nor zas 'phrog
158a4(rgyud): par bgyid/ kha cig srog 'phrog par bgyi dra/ sems can tshe ring ba kha cig ni thung ngur bgyid do// de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du/ bcom
158a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas
158a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen pos kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni legs so legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang
158a7(rgyud): gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can shin tu khro ba dang shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchod pa dang / mchod yon dang / bzlas brjod bzang po gsang babs kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do//
158b1(rgyud): de dag bachod pas mchod gyur cing // gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa// gza' de kun gyi 'dog dang // ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams dang ni lha min dang // mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang
158b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang // mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin// drag po gzi brjid chen po dang / thos pa ni bar byed pa de'i// gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du
158b3(rgyud): bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs kha nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so// de nas de'i mod la
158b4(rgyud): nyim la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsug so nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom
158b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
158b6(rgyud): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang
158b7(rgyud): mtshon cha spang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol// de nas
159a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAg thub pas gapa' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang sngags bka' stsal to// oM me kyog s+yAswA hA oM shrI tA~M sha be swA h+mA
159a2(rgyud): oM rak+Sha/ oM ga ku mA rA ya swAhA/ oM b+h+yo ga b+hU ta ye swAhA oM a su rod ta mA ya swAh+ma/ oM kr-iSh+Na mar+Na ya swAh+mA/ oM a mr-i ta pi yA ya swAhA/ oM dz+yo tiSh+Tha te swAh+mA lag na rdo rje
159a3(rgyud): 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas grub pa yin te/ khe dog dang mthun par spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o// kham pa 'am/
159a4(rgyud): zangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser ram/ dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas/ re re la'ang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i
159a5(rgyud): gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o// de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dbul po'i gdon las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa las tshe ring por
159a6(rgyud): byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam
159a7(rgyud): du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod par bya ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang
159b1(rgyud): yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba'ang sel bar byed do// de nas bcos/
159b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shukya thub pas bza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo//
159b3(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gza'i khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
159b4(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+re/ pad+me pad+me/ sa ra sa ra/ swa ra swa ra sa ra s+pha ra swA hA/ na maHpad+ma d+hA ra ya/ na maHsarba gra hA NA/ sarba sha ba ri pu ra kA tAM mo R+Shat+na NAM na mo d+hA da sha ra shI nAM
159b5(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM bud+d+he d+haH/ badz+re badz+raM/ pad+me pad+me/ sa ra swar/ swa sar sA sa ra/ sA re s+pha ra/ bi kr-i Ta/ bi kr-iT/ mA ra mA ra/ mArda ya mArba ya/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba bid+hin/ ku ru ku ru/ ts+tshin da
159b6(rgyud): ts+tshi nad/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ k+Sha pa yak+Sha pa ya/ shAn te shAn te/ dan te dAn te/ dA pa ya dA ya/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol// bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can
159b7(rgyud): cad la srung du gsel srung du gsol/ gza' thams cad dang rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa zlog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol
160a1(rgyud): bdag gi sdig pa rnams sam du gsol/ tsan ni tsan ci/ tu tu ru ga cin po can TI/ su mu su mra/ mu tsu murba / b+ha ba d+ha pe
160a2(rgyud): pre u pra ru bA/ pU ra ya pU r+ya s+ya ma ma sarba satAn rgya mnor thi/ sarba ta thA ga a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ya swA hA/ oM swAhA/ b+h+yaHswA hA/ hrIHsAhA/ d+huHswA hAHd+hiHsAhA/ pad+ma d+hA ra ya
160a3(rgyud): swAt+ma/ I di d+hA sa sa~MT+Ta/ sau mA sa sA d+na/ d+ha raNI sutwA ya swAH/ b+hi ha swa ta sa~M swAH/ shu krA ya swAny+dzi/ shIn+ti sh+tsa rA ya swAH/ rA ba bi s+'uH/ ke te be sAn+de/ bud+d+ha ya swehA/ badz+ra d+ha ra ya
160a4(rgyud): swad+d+he/ pad+ma d+hA ra ya swAhA/ ku mA ru ya swe hA/ sarba gra he b+ha swA hAM/ sarba na kA tre b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba dI de sha rA shri ni b+h+ya swAh+ne/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswAhA/ oM sarba bi d+h+ye hU~M hUM phaT swAhA/ phyag/
160a5(rgyud): na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyi gzhi yin no// phyag na rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chung
160a6(rgyud): sar gyi de'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/ tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzung bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags
160a7(rgyud): na de dag la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // gza'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//
160b1(rgyud): gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gapa' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/ legs so//
160b2(rgyud): legs so zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to// gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ pra ha ma tri ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni/
160b3(rgyud): bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'breg
160b4(rgyud): gnas kyi grong khyer na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang /
160b5(rgyud): zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / pa wa sangs dang / phur bu dang / gza' lag dang / sman pa dang / sgra gcan dang / mjug rings dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs te mang po rnams kyis
160b6(rgyud): bstod cing / rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gis byin gyis brlabs kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
160b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
161a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje gzhu can dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang / byang chub
161a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs
161a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras
161a4(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
161a5(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun du bltas pa la chos ston te
161a6(rgyud): bkod pa chen po rgyun gyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa
161a7(rgyud): yongs su byung ba'i chos ston to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas/ bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar
161b1(rgyud): bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas/ 'khor de dag la 'gying pag tu bltas te/ rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying par
161b2(rgyud): banag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces to// bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa// khro bo'i gzugs can dag sems can rnams la 'tshe
161b3(rgyud): bar bgyid// mtho btsam par bgyid/ mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid/ kha cig ni nor rdzas 'phrog/ kha cig ni srog 'phrog par bgyid cing sems can tshe ring po rnams ni tshe thung bar bgyid pa ste/
161b4(rgyud): de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid pa de'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi mam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/
161b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gung yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed nas/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gsang chen pas kyang chos gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar
161b6(rgyud): byed pa de ni legs so legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/ shin tu khro bo/ shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyi mchod pa dang /
161b7(rgyud): tshod yon dang 'as brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do// de dag mchod pas mchod 'gyur zhing / gnod par byed pa gnod byed pas/ gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang /
162a1(rgyud): ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang // lha rnams dang ni lha min dang // mi'am ci dang kru drag dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang // mi rnams dang ni srul po dang
162a2(rgyud): drag po gzi brjid chen po dag/ khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i// gsang sngags dang ni mchod pa dag/ rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyis thugs
162a3(rgyud): kanas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so// de nas de'i mod la nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
162a4(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/
162a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag
162a6(rgyud): cag rnams tshogs pas/ chos smra ba rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsang
162a7(rgyud): pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang / gsang
162b1(rgyud): sngags bka' stsal pa/ oM mag+hon ya s+'uH/ oM shI t+taM shwad swAt+ma/ oM rak+ShAM ga kum+ba rA ya swAH/ oM bAd+d+ha ya swAhA/ oM b+hog swA yA swAhA/ oM a su rota mA yA swA d+hu/ y-i gaSha bar rdzas stan
162b2(rgyud): oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swAhA/ oM dz+yo ta shrI bi swAhA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas 'grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu
162b3(rgyud): gnyis byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o// kham pa 'am/ zangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser ram/ dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul bas/ re re la'ang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad do// lag na
162b4(rgyud): rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o// des ni gza' thams cad srung bar byed par 'gyur ro// dbul ba'i gdon thams cad las thar par
162b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tshe zad pa las tshe ring bar byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs
162b6(rgyud): gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod pa byas te/ nyin gcig
162b7(rgyud): bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba'ang sel bar
163a1(rgyud): byed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'chang la
163a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gza'i khyim bcu gnyis
163a3(rgyud): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badz+re badz+ra/ pad+me pad+ma/ sa ra sa ra/ swa sa ra/ swa sa ra/ sma ra sA ra/ bi kra Di/ bi kra Di/ mA ra mA ra/ mdzamarba/
163a4(rgyud): g+hA ta ya/ b+hU ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn/ ku ru ku ru/ ts+tshin+de ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+na/ k+Sha pa yak+ShA pa ya/ shAn+te/ dAn+te/ dA ba ye/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdag yid myur du bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
163a5(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul chen po rnams 'dul du gsol/ bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol/ tsaN+Di/ su mu su mu/ mu tsu mu tsu/ b+hu ba b+ha be/ u gre/ rU pe pU ra ya/ pU ra ya/ ma ma sarba satwa nany+tsa mno ra \u0f7f
163a6(rgyud): sarbata thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta sa ma ye swAhA/ oM swAhA/ puHswAhA/ hrIHd+hu swAhA/ d+hi swAhA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swAH/ Adi tA ya swAhA/ d+ha ra NI su ya swAhA/ bud+d+hA ya swAng+ga/ br-i ha sA dA ya swAny+dza/ shukyA ya sAH/
163a7(rgyud): kr-i bar rdza ma sAH/ rag be bAh+ma/ ki ta be AH/ bud+d+ha ya sIH/ badz+re d+ha rA ye swAH/ bid+yA d+ha rA ya swaH/ ku mA rA ya swA Te/ nek+Sha ta tra NAn swAH/ dA da shar shI na swaH/ sarba u pA tra drA ni sAH
163b1(rgyud): oM satsa'i ti hU~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'dri dag son zla bachung gi yang ngo chos bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/
163b2(rgyud): tshechos bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzung bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nya ba'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na de la lo dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// gza'i
163b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa dang / skar mnga' ltung ba dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// kuza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//
163b4(rgyud): gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa smin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/ lags so legs so zhes gsol nas mi snang bar gyur to// gza'
163b5(rgyud): rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba sud+hA ra nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun
163b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham bin tsher ma can zhes bya
163b7(rgyud): ba'i nags mchog chen po na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rab
164a1(rgyud): mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i rje ko'u sham pa'i grong khyer chen po na/ khyim bdag thub bzang po zhes byabya/ dbang po nye bar ni ba/ yid nye bar zhi ba bu po dang /
164a2(rgyud): bumo mang ba gza' mi mang po dang ldan pa/ dad cing cher dang pa zhig gnas pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo//
164a3(rgyud): lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas
164a4(rgyud): zhub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags
164a5(rgyud): so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang khyod kyis ji ltar dris pa'i/
164a6(rgyud): dri ba lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la legs so'is gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
164a7(rgyud): mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dbul por gyur pa las/ ji ltar dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur zhing / bro nad kyis thabs
164b1(rgyud): nabang byed ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ khyim bdagra zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdug khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du bri/
164b2(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul ba dang / groso ba mang ba dang bu pho dang bu mo
164b3(rgyud): mang ba/ bza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags te/ de'i slad du gang gis sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bro nad kyis thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis
164b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdug pa dang / yid du mchis pa dang / mthong na yid du 'thang
164b5(rgyud): pa dang / dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba dang / sbyin bdag mdzod pas mi 'tshal zhing / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor dang / 'bru'i mdzod dang / bangad+ma mdzod rnams dang / nor bu dang bu
164b6(rgyud): tig dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul bsam 'tshal cing 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi bu smad dang / bzu' mi rnams
164b7(rgyud): brtan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad/
165a1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// khyim bdag 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
165a2(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba/ bla ni med pa lha dang mi rnams
165a3(rgyud): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de las nor gyi rgyur zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di
165a4(rgyud): thos te/ bzung zhing bcangs/ bklags kun chub par byas rjes su yi rang bar byas shing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu de yang
165a5(rgyud): ngas de bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i mthus mi rnam par mtho 'tsham pa mi byed do// mi ma yin pa rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// gnod sbyin rnams rnam par mthe 'tsham
165a6(rgyud): par mi byed do// srin po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// yi dgas rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// sha za rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// 'byung po rnams
165a7(rgyud): rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// grul bum rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// brjed byed rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// gnon po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi
165b1(rgyud): byed do// lus srul po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// lha rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// lha ma yin rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do// zas su mi
165b2(rgyud): gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag zab
165b3(rgyud): rnams dang / zas su rkang zab rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su dbugs rngub pa rnams dang / 'byung ba za ba'i
165b4(rgyud): bar rnams rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ner gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/ snying la yod dam/ lag na yod dam/ glegs bam du
165b5(rgyud): chud dam/ thos par gyur tam/ kun chub par byas sam/ bklags sam/ bzung ngam/ rjes su yi rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
165b6(rgyud): bume de la yun ring po'i den dang / phan pa dang / dge ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro// su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun
165b7(rgyud): gyi gdungs 'di na pa phye na lan gnyis sapa/ lan gsum pas/ lan bani bton de'i lha yi rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba dang / chos bdags pa byas pas dga'
166a1(rgyud): ba dang / dge 'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / chos smra ba la dga' ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid 'ongs te 'bru'i char 'bebs so// na mo badz+ra d+ha ras
166a2(rgyud): gar nir g+ho ShA ya ta thA ga tA ya tat+ta thA oM su ra be b+ha dre b+hA dra ba ti/ aM ga le/ maM ga le maM ga la ba ti tra/ a le.a tsa li/ A ra le a tsa ba le/ ud ka tA ni/ ud b+h+yAM
