166a3(rgyud): da ni/ pa s+yA pa ti/ dAn pa ti d+ha ma pra ti/ shrim ti/ pra b+hA ba ti/ a ma le/ bi mra la/ nrirma la ru ru su ra pre/ su rU pa maM le/ bi ma le/ tsa le/ a tsan ste/ a nan te twe/ bi na na ste/
166a4(rgyud): bi shwa ke she/ bi sha ni shi/ aM ku re/ maM ku re/ pra baM ku re/ bI ra ma/ bI rA me/ bi d+ha me/ ri ri me/ du du mkha kha me/ ta ta reta ra ta ra/ ta ra ta ra/ badz+re badz+re badz+ra ba me/ Ta ke Ta ka/ tha ka/
166a5(rgyud): tha ke/ u ka ke bu ka ka/ Thake ThA ra ki/ a bar+d+ha nri/ baR+Sha nI 'ad ni badz+ra d+ha ra sA ga ra na ri b+ho Sha Na/ ta thA ga ta ma nu sA ri sarba ta thA ga tA/ satwa ma nu s+pha ra/ d+ha thas t+ya ma nu stA ra/ saM b+ha saH ma nA sA ra/ da tad ta/ pu ra
166a6(rgyud): bur/ d+ha ma dU la/ dur Ni/ thar d+ha ra Ni/ a lI/ sum ga le/ shUn tam ti/ shuHmA d+hi/ maM ga la d+ha ni/ ma hA sa tI/ b+ha ba ti/ prab+ha ba ti/ sutsan+d+ra mad+d+hi/ A gats+tsha/ sa ma snum du k+Shar An+tu/
166a7(rgyud): A ba ra Ni ma Na s+pha ra swA hA/ pra b+hA ba ma nusma ra swA hA/ di di ma nu sma ra swA hA/ te dza ma ru sma ra swA hA/ bi dza ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ hri da ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ sarba satwa bi na ya me nu sma ra sAhA/ oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/
166b1(rgyud): yang su shri ye swAhA/ sris su hA/ oMng su swAhA/ rigs kyi bu 'di na nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs 'di'i mthus bu bye dang / nad dang 'chings 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
166b2(rgyud): rigs kyi bu su ni ga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rung gcig bton na
166b3(rgyud): de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim mam gnas gtsang ma'i bang mdzod dam gnas glang du'ang rung bar de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
166b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan dun gyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te nub gcig bton na rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru dang /
166b5(rgyud): gser dang / dngul dang / yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshad tsam gyis gang bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khod de'i
166b6(rgyud): phyir rab tu bsgrims la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ ston cig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu stan cig dang des khyed kyi yun
166b7(rgyud): ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das lags so zhes gsol te/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs
167a1(rgyud): 'di thos nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
167a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lags gzungs su zin lags bzung lags bklags lags
167a3(rgyud): kun chub par bgyis lags/ rjes su yi rangs par bgyis lags so// gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so// de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i
167a4(rgyud): bang mdzod rnams yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
167a5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba
167a6(rgyud): bzang po'i khyim nor dang 'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzod chen po dang bang mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom
167a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas ko'u sham bi'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas zhugs pa dang / nor dang 'brus yongs su gang ba
167b1(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa dang rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po dang bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang /
167b2(rgyud): tshim zhing dga' la mgu mi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dgra' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun draga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing
167b3(rgyud): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang byang mdzod rnams kyang
167b4(rgyud): nor dang 'bru phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dad cing mchog tu dad la
167b5(rgyud): dge pa'i bsam pa can des/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung zhing rab tu bton te/ blangs shing bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rangs par byas shing / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang
167b6(rgyud): dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di long zhig/ chongs shig/ lhog shig/ ston cig/ zung zhig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la rang
167b7(rgyud): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang
168a1(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang
168a2(rgyud): dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lnga dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcus pa'i 'jig rten na ngas mi mthong ngo // lan gnyis su bton tam lan gsum du bton kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni
168a3(rgyud): gnas med do// kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi phyed pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur na/ glegs/
168a4(rgyud): bam la yi ger 'dri ba dang / yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can dbul po dang / nad sna tshogs kyis//
168a5(rgyud): gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rangs pa
168a6(rgyud): dang / rab tu phye ba dang / bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan par
168a7(rgyud): brjod pa dang go bar mdzad pa dang / bsnyad pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di
168b1(rgyud): dag gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags// bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dang rnams kyi// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags
168b2(rgyud): zhib ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen// chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba// ye shes pha rol bgrod pa byon gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bro khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
168b3(rgyud): tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/
168b4(rgyud): ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gter
168b5(rgyud): zhes bya bar yang zung zhigade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
168b6(rgyud): bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de drag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te
168b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan
169a1(rgyud): 'das ma nor rgyud ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/ dang po re zhig dpyid zla tha chung gi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo song ste/ de nas nu ma'i bar du chu'i nang du
169a2(rgyud): nub par byas te 'dug la/ nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par yongs su brtags la ji snyed gnas kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// bza' ba thams cad spangs te nyon mongs shing smra bcad byas te/ nub bdun du bzlas
169a3(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku'ang dbu skra ma gtogs par gur kum dang tsan dan gyis byug par bya ba ni nub mo snga bar langs te/ chur khru bdun/ zheng du khru gsum ste/ khru bcu dang bcas
169a4(rgyud): pa la tshon sna ma lus pa gsong sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos bcom ldan 'das ma mdog ljang ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa phyag g.yas pa na 'bras bu chen po bsnams pa phyag g.yon pa na sgrub
169a5(rgyud): pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog mu tig dang / rdo rje pha lam dang / bai DUR+Ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan pa bya'o// steng du lha'i bu rin po che'i char mngon du 'bebs bzhin pa bya'o//
169a6(rgyud): g.yas logs su dpal chen mo pad+ma'i phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgos pa la gnas pa bzhin pa bya'o// g.yon logs su pad+ma'i dpal rin po che'i snyim pa gang ba bya'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag
169a7(rgyud): can pa'o// de nas thang sku sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogs su kha bstan la bkram ste/ de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhes pa'ang dbul zhing dri zhim po me tog
169b1(rgyud): gis mchod pa chen po byas la/ tsan dan dang a ka ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o// zhun mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o// de nas stan gcig la gnas la bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal la dmig
169b2(rgyud): la nub mo mtshan yal bzlas pa byas na de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun 'bab cing khang pa gang bar 'gyur ro// yang na mtshan mo phyed na
169b3(rgyud): chu'i nang du zhugs la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// zla ba gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te/ mi shes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro// yang na rgyal po'i dkor mngon
169b4(rgyud): par 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing / mtshan mo'i byed na til gyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs las rnyed pa chen po 'thob bo// yungs kar mar la bsres nas sbyin sreg
169b5(rgyud): byas na rgyal po dbang du byed do// kun tu ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed do// kha cig gis ni sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas ni sprin
169b6(rgyud): bdag chen por 'gyur ro// yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/ cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ zas ji srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod
169b7(rgyud): rten gyi drung na thang ka nub phyogs su bstan la dgram zhing / nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag cing / mtshan mo bstan gcig la gnas pas nub yal gyis bzlas pa byas na nor gyi phung po chen po rnyed de/
170a1(rgyud): 'thor gnod byas kyang 'dzad par mi 'gyur te/ lha khang chen po bya'o// cho ga 'di'i cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob cing / bcom
170a2(rgyud): ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngos su mthong zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// ji ltar de ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing kha na ma tho ba'i zas tshong dang nya sha la sogs pa spangs shing mtshan
170a3(rgyud): mo bzlas pa byas na dbul por mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang / zla ba bzang po yongs su dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsung ba la mngon
170a4(rgyud): par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA su d+ha re swA hA/ snying po'o// na mo rat+na yA ya/ oM bA su shI
170a5(rgyud): swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM bA sU swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i yang nye ba'i snying po'o// thal mo sbyar te gung mo gnyis dang / de nas srin lag gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te
170a6(rgyud): sdigs mdzub phan tshun sbrel la/ mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bsnol te// rtse mo gnyis rgyab spyad de khab lta bu byas la/ gung mi rtse sprad pa la mtheb mo zung gcig de'i 'og tu sbyar te/ reg pa bcas pa ni
170a7(rgyud): rab tu bzung ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/ las thams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das mnor rgyun ma'i gzungs 'di/ thub pas gsungs pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM shrI yi shrI ka ri/ d+ha na ka
170b1(rgyud): ri d+ha na ka ri swA dru/ bsgrub par bya ba'i sngags so// rigs pa 'di'i dang po de'i gdam tshig gi phyag na ni sor mo rnams bral mo sbya ra la mtheb chen dbus su gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das su'i dam tshig gi
170b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// oM sa ma yai/ sem sa ma ya kA ri/ ma hA sa ma ye swAhA/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags so// phyag rgya de nyid la gung mo dang sdigs mdzub kyi tshogs gsum pa bskul zhing mthe'u chung gnyis
170b3(rgyud): cung zad phyir phyung ba ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'di ni dbab pa dang / bsdu ba dang / bsgrub bya'i sngags kyis bya'o// phyag rgya de nyid la sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya yin te/
170b4(rgyud): oM drA sud+d+he swAH/ me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo btung ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya yin te/ sngags ni// oM bA su d+ha re swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la ming med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/
170b5(rgyud): sngags na/ oM dA su d+ha me ti shrI ye swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la mthe'u chung gi sen mo mtheb chen gyis bkab de/ sor mo gzhan rnams ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni mar me'i
170b6(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM ba su d+ha ri Ni swahA/ sen mo gan kyal du byas la mtheb bong gnyis logs su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags ni oM drA su d+ha re Ni swa
170b7(rgyud): lkog ma nye bar spyod pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i sngags kyis thun mong gi phyag rgya'am/ sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing / sgra'i nyams pa med pa srur
171a1(rgyud): pa ma chad pa'i ras zheng du mtho gang gi tshad nyid la ring du mdzod byas te/ steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/ g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bya// g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/ bcom
171a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi 'og drang ka'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma bris te/ gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gros srab mo'i sham ka gau mnabs pa/ de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod
171a3(rgyud): g.yogs can/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi sham thabs dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'og phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sbrabs gos gtsang mgyon te/ gso sbyong yan lag
171a4(rgyud): brgyad bya'o// de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byas la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas sgrub pa po dang ldan pas spring ba byas te/ zhing gi dbus su thang sku bzhugs su gsol te// dri dang //
171a5(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o// thang ka'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig gis sngags byas pa'i bum pa chus yongs su gang ba
171a6(rgyud): gnag par bya'o// bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang shing / glang bu dang thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bar bya'o// glang bu'i mgul ba dang thong 'dzin gyi mgul bar me tog gi 'bring ba gdags par bya'o//
171a7(rgyud): rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu'i rgyun zhing la lan g.yas logs su bskor bar bya ba ni sngags pas mdun du 'gro zhing / sngags pa'i rting ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o// phyis sa bon 'debs pa'i dus su//
171b1(rgyud): cho ga 'dris brgyad brgya bsngags la sa bon spar ba gang la lan bdun bzlas te zhing la gtor bar bya'o// sa bon gdab pa'i cho ga'o// de ni zhing rnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o// cho ga lhag pa ni
171b2(rgyud): 'dir dge slong bzhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod kyi ston mo byas te/ de nas sngags pas tshong pa bdun bzlas pa byed cing rnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba bya ba'i cho ga'o// da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya ba'i
171b3(rgyud): cho ga bshad par bya ste/ g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsang ma gon la shar du zhal bstan te/ sku gzugs bzhugs su gsol la dri dang / me tog dang /
171b4(rgyud): bdug pa dang / yang na nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la bzlas pa byas te/ 'bru'i phung po mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bag ma byas shing khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/
171b5(rgyud): de snyed kyi mthar zad pa med par gnas so// de nas skyes bus 'bru 'jal zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgos par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags de snyed du smra bcad byas la bzlas pa bya'o//
171b6(rgyud): ji snyed du sngo la bltas na gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de snyed 'das pa bya'o// de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'chings pa'i mi la sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa 'am/ dge 'dun la sbyin par
171b7(rgyud): bya'o// g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o// da ni 'bru bang mdzod du 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ dang po re zhig mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po gnyis gcer bu gsus pa 'phyang ba// dngong po 'phyang
172a1(rgyud): ba/ g.yon pa'i lag na 'bru'i snod bzung zhing 'bru sdug bzhin pa/ gser gyi mdog rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o// mdzod kyi khang par yang dri dang / byug pa dang mcho/
172a2(rgyud): yon sbyin zhing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i mdzod kyi nang du gzhug par bya'o// de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun gtor bzhin pa'i sngags pas 'gro bar bya
172a3(rgyud): zhing de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o// de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzod khang du phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o// de nas mdzod kyi khang pa'i sgo ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang / me tog dang /
172a4(rgyud): bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do// nor rgyun ma'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par bya'o// gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ka'i mdun du de nas skyes bus 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan
172a5(rgyud): 'das ma dang 'dra bar bsams la gur kum gyis grog la sngags bris la spyi bor bcings la kha gos kyis bkab la nyi ma re re ning 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o// mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyi ni re nor rgyun ma
172a6(rgyud): zhes pa'i gzungs kyi mdo bklag par bya'o// sngags pas bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas pa bya'o// ji ltar rnyed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun pa'i rtog pa
172a7(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya ga Na pa ti hr-i da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/ sangs
172b1(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis/
172b2(rgyud): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun
172b3(rgyud): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la la tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dzin na de'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzung bas dgos
172b4(rgyud): pa 'grub cing / gsang sngags thams cad kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ na mostu te ma hA ga Na pa ta ya swA hA/ oM gaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaH/ oM ga Na pa ta ya swA hA/ oM ga Na d+hi pi
172b5(rgyud): ta ye swA hA/ oM ga Ne shwa rA ya swA hA/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ d+hA da d+hA bA/ b+hany+dza bany+dza/ s+t+wam b+hasta ma b+ha/ dza ma b+ha dza ma b+ha/ me hi mo ha/ de hi de hi
172b6(rgyud): dA dA pi ya dA pa ya d+ha nA di sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra na mostu te ma hA ru dra tsa na ya swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM su ru su swA hA/ oM mu ru mu swA hA/ pA pa shAM ti ba su puSh+paM ku ru swA hU
172b7(rgyud): oM a b+hu ta bin du k+Sha b+hi ta tsit+ta ma hA sa mA gats+tsha ti/ ma hA b+ha ya/ ma hA ba la/ ma hA pa rA kra ma ma hA hasta/ ma hA dak+Shi NA ya/ pra b+ho de dA mi swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ oM tu ru tra ru swAhA/ oM gaH
173a1(rgyud): gcag cagaci gaHgtu gaHgas/ oM na mo na ma swAhA/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'ams dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam ka dge bstan
173a2(rgyud): ma gang la la zhig tshogs kyi bdag po/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying nge di rtsom zhing gsang sngags bsgrubs pas/ dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan du 'gro 'am rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
173a3(rgyud): du 'jug na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas te/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags na las thams cad grub kyis 'di la the tshom ma za zhig
173a4(rgyud): 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / yul 'khrug pa thams cad kyi nang du'ang dran par byas na/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du nang par langs nas tshig tu
173a5(rgyud): bton na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing / zag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur
173a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
173a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshegs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/
173b1(rgyud): nAn pa/ bod skad du/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i rgyud ces drabya/ 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal lngar tshogs bdag che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tsog bdag
173b2(rgyud): dgyes// gzugs brnyan baN+Dal gru bzhir gnag/ zla bi drug tu mchod par bya// lha yi 'khor los sgyur ba dang // tshe 'di nyid la skal ba mnyam// bsod na pas chen de thob par 'grer// longs/
173b3(rgyud): spyod lha dang mnyam pa dang // tshe yang ring ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// mi la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bu yang bran bzhin 'gyur// bdag gis bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur// klu yang de yis bsgo
173b4(rgyud): ba nyan// bran bzhin las rnams byed par 'gyur// lha yi longs spyod mnga' ris las// 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ba can// gdul bya dbang gis sku sprul
173b5(rgyud): ga lha rjen tshogs bdag chen pos bya// dngos grub dam pa mchog sgrub na// mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // longs spyod yid bzhin 'phel bar byed// 'jig rten pan mdzad lha yi
173b6(rgyud): lha/ gang gis mchod pa dngos grub yi// lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud las// dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u sde dang po'o// / de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni/
173b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gru ba ni dag bya ste// ba yi lci bas legs par byugs// 'jam zhing mnyen la dbus mtho bo'i// dbus su tshogs bdag sku gzugs bzhugs// me tog dkar pos de la gtor// bdag
174a1(rgyud): nyid gcer bur byung byas te// log 'dren gzugs kyis yang dag mchod/ khar tag zla ba drug gnyin re bzhin du dus gsum du/ gsang sngags brgyani rtsa brgyad bzlas/ yid la reb
174a2(rgyud): thams cad rdzogs// bsam pa thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur// oM ni bkra shis dpal dang ldan// gsang sngags mgo la gzhag par bya// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi// dngos grub ster byed yi ge yang /
174a3(rgyud): de 'og gral la gzhag par bya// nyi mas bu'i yi ge yang // dro yi rjes la bkrug par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po// yi ge'i mchog ni blang bar bya// gsal byed yi ge dang po yang // de yi 'dzum
174a4(rgyud): tu brjod par bya// rin chen yi ge swA zhes bya// las kyi yi ge hA zhes bya// dngos grub 'dod pas gsang sngags bzlas// lha chen dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud las/ lha'i dngos grub kyi gsang sngags bstan
174a5(rgyud): pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas tshogs kyi bdag po bshad// tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdog dkar// glang po che yi mgo bo can// mche ba ya gcig chag pa dang // phyag g.yas
174a6(rgyud): la phub bsnams pa dang // byi ba'i gdan la bcibs pa dang // rin po che yis sku brgyan pa// zla ba tshes pas dbu brgyan pa// 'od gsal ba/ 'od zer 'phro ba/ mdog bzang ba kha dog bzang
174a7(rgyud): ba/ gsus pa che ba rgyan gyis sdud pa'o// dngos grubasgrub pa'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi bdag po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas skar ma rgyal gyi 'in/
174b1(rgyud): par me tog dkar po blangs te tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs bris te/ kha dog dkar po glang po che'i dbu can phyag g.yas nal phug bsnams pa/ g.yon pa na rin po che'i nor bu bsnams paka gsuH/
174b2(rgyud): bache ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pA/ zla dang byi ba'i khril bzhugs pa mkhas pas bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus bdag la zhal phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid log 'dren gyi gzugs
174b3(rgyud): kyis yang dag par mchod do// tshogs kyi badrag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su tshogs kyi bdag po dkar po
174b4(rgyud): glang po che'i mgo can/ byi ba la zhon pa/ mig gsum pa/ zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa/ g.yas na la phug dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa tri shU la dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yon pa
174b5(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang la mdzub mo bkug la gud mo'i tshigs su gzung bar bya ba ni tshegs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga
174b6(rgyud): pa'o// / de nas gsang sngags bstan pa ni// e ni dpal ldan mgo la gzhag/ de nas yid bzhin nor bu ni// rin po che yi yi ge bri// sde tshan gsal byed dang po yang /
174b7(rgyud): de yi rjes su bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po// dbyangs yig brgyad pas mdzes par bya// gsal byed dang po yi ge yang // blo yis blangs te yid kyis bri// sde tshan gsum pa'i gsum pa la/
175a1(rgyud): dang po'i bzhi pa sbyar bar bya// sde tshan bdun pa'i gsum pa la// gsum pa'i dang pos 'og tu sbyar// yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// bzhi pa'i lnga pa zla ba gzhag/ dbyangs yig gsum
175a2(rgyud): pas brgyan par bya// bzhi pa'i gsum pas de nas brjod// dpo bya sgrub pa'i yi ge ni// de yi rjes la bri bar bya// gsang sngags drag po'i yi ge yang // kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi
175a3(rgyud): dngos grub ni// 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid kyis byin// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// tshogs bdag chen po'i gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas
175a4(rgyud): gzhan yang gsungs pa ni// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yi// mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba'i// dngos grub sgrub po'i snying po ni// dpal dang yA gi yi ge ste// oM zhes bya ba mgo la
175a5(rgyud): gzhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge las// nyi ma'i yi ge 'og tu smraspras// dbyangs yig drug pa'i 'og tu sbyar// thig le nA das brgyan par bya// mtshan gyi dang po'i yi ge ni// de yi rjes la brjod par
175a6(rgyud): bya/ bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas sbyar// lnga pa'i dang po bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge yang // dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan pa ni// de yi rjes la bri bar bya// zhi ba'i
175a7(rgyud): yig 'bru gnyis pa yang // kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya// mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba// 'dod pa thams cad grub byed yin// mtshan gyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
175b1(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshang bar bya// skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni// me tog dkar bre'i rtsa bu blangs// tsan dan dkar po dag las ni// tshogs kyi bdag de'i sku gzugs ni
175b2(rgyud): mthe bong gi ni tshang tsA ba ba// gsus pa che la phyag bzhi pa/ ma khas pas byas te legs par bya// rin po che yi snong du gtsug/ dkar chen mngon par gsal nga'i tshe// nang gi cha ris sku khrus gsol/
175b3(rgyud): gsal zhing dang la yid du 'ong // dri dang ldan pa'i bum pa yis// me tog dkar pi'i dri yis ni// bdag chal ldan pas khrus bya'o// de nas de ma thag tu ni/ dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drangs la// me
175b4(rgyud): tog dkar po dbul ba ru // la phug la dur bcas pa yi// gtor ma chen po'ang de nas dbul// spos dang dri dang mar me dang / lha bshos dag gis mchod par bya// gsang sngags 'dis/
175b5(rgyud): la phug dang // la du deng chu dang / dkar gsum gyi gtor mas tshogs kyi bdag po la phul te/ spos dang me tog rnams kyang dbul de ltar byas na phyis bgegs byed par mi nus so// tshogs
175b6(rgyud): kyi bdag de'i mchod pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / de nas la phug ces bya ba// re brgyad ldan pa'i nyung ma ste// zas rnams kun gyi mchog kyang yin// ro mtshig brgyad dang
175b7(rgyud): ldan pa yi// kha dang sgur dang bska ba dang / mngar dang tsha dang lan tshwa'i ro// bdun dang bra mche ge che ba yang // nad sna brgyad kyi gnyen po yin// mabris pa bad kan 'das pa dang // khrag dang chu sar
176a1(rgyud): mjug// rlung dang rims na kun la phan// 'di 'dra byung ba'i kha zas med// lha rnams kun gyi mchu srang 'gul// dngos grub 'grub pa'i zhal zas yin// tshogs kyi bdang /
176a2(rgyud): po mchod par bya// la du zhes bya'i zhal zas ni// mngar gsum 'bras bu gsum pa ni// de bzhin zhim pa'i spos kyis bran// bag zan gyi ni ril bu bya// 'o ma mar du bcos byas la// tshogs pa'i gtor ma chen po bya/
176a3(rgyud): mar dang 'khur ba mngar gsum dang // mthun pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs kyis// tshogs bdag chen po mchod par bya// de ltar tshogs kyi bdag po la'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs lag pa g.yas
176a4(rgyud): pa'i mthil du bzhugs la/ sems gzhan du ma yengs par bzlas brjod 'bum bya ste/ la phug la sngags kyis btab ste tshogs kyi bdag po mchod na/ tshe 'di nyid la 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bson
176a5(rgyud): nams mnyam par 'gyur ro// me tog dkar pos mchod na rgyal po la sogs pa pham par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po la sogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa bdag gi dbang du 'dus
176a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dngos grub sgrub pa'i zhal zas bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas cho ga bshad par bya// dngul zhes bya ba'i rin chen la// tshogs bdag chen po'i gzugs
176a7(rgyud): byas te// yid bzhin nor bu leg na thogs// dkyil 'khor chen po khru gang tshad// rin chen me tog dkar po bkram// gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas byas pas// nad dang sdug bsngal zhi bar
176b1(rgyud): 'gyur// shel drang dung las tshogs bdag su// mkhas pas ji ltar 'byor par bya/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar 'gyur// rin chen shel las tshogs bdug sku/ mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam bya//
176b2(rgyud): sen pra zhes bya dwa'i sngags// rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas te// shel gyi sku de rjes byas nas// sker ma rgyal gyi zhin par ni// bdag nyid shar du kha bltas nas// gos de kar gyon te khrus byas la/
176b3(rgyud): thal sbyar yid kyis gsol ba gdang // bdag la gnod pa'i bgegs gang yin// shel gyi sku dri ma long ste// mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu bzhugs// bdag nyid khrus pas shar du lta 'dzar ba
176b4(rgyud): dang rkun ma ni// gang yin me long nang du 'byung // de tshe de yis ngos zin 'gyur// tshogs bdag shel gyi sku de ni// mchod pa rab gsal legs byas la// na gA ku ru zhes bya ba'i// rig pa 'bum du
176b5(rgyud): bzlas byas nA/ khwa nad dang sdug bsngal gyis nyen la// sku de bsnun pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur// sdug bsngal las kyang zer par 'gyur// zhi ba chen po'i tshe
176b6(rgyud): ga yin// rin chen gser zhes bya ba la// tshogs bdag chen po'i sku byas te// rgyal gyi nyin par mig phye nas// mchod dang rab tu gnas pa bya// ba ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag gcig/
176b7(rgyud): tu bzlas pa yis// sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i khyim der ni// nor rnams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur// gser gyi tshogs bdag mthong ba yis// bgegs rnams thams cad ner 'bul 'gyur//
177a1(rgyud): bgegs kyis gnod pa mi nus te// rgyal po bzhin du mchod par 'gyur// gser gyi tshogs bdag gnas pa yis/ kas phyogs rin chen char pa 'bebs// gser gyi tshogs kyi bdag/
177a2(rgyud): po la// bgegs kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis// nor rnams thams cad 'bul ba yin// bdag nyid phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs mchog/ byas pa'i yon tan rnams la ni
177a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnams kyis gter kha 'byed// skye ba 'dri dang phyi ma la// rtag tu yo byad 'phel bar 'gyur// nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bus kha rgyal bu bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed// de nas dpal ldan
177a4(rgyud): tshegs bdag gi// sku gzugs dkyil 'khor gru bzhir gzhog/ b+ha ga zhes bya'i gsang sngags ni// bzlas pa 'bum du byas pa yis// tshe de nyid la dngos grub ni// ci 'dod pa ni sbyin par mdzad// lha'i rgyal
177a5(rgyud): po'i mnga' thang ni// sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad// shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas// dpal ldan tshegs bdag thugs rje can// thugs rje'i phung pos dbul bskyod// nor lha chen po'i bdag/
177a6(rgyud): nyid 'di// dar dmar res la legs bris te// rgyal gyi nyin par spyan phye nas// gang gi khyim du bzhugs pa de'i// sa phyogs de ni bkra shis 'gyur// zangs la tshogs bdag chen po'i sku// mkhas pas/
177a7(rgyud): lags par bzo byas te// tsan dan dmar pos byugs pa'i sar/ maN+Dal steng du legs par gzhag ban du ka yi me tog dang / pad+ma rAg rin chen dang // me tog dmar po kun gyis mchod// hUM zhes
177b1(rgyud): bya ba'i rigs sngags bzlas// rgyal po'i bu mo dbang du 'gyur// lha yi bu mo ku mo dang // mi 'am ci yi bu ma drang // bram ze'i bu mo mtshan ldan mo// mchog tu gzugs bzang gus par 'gyur// bran mo bzhin/
177b2(rgyud): du bso ba can// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ su gzugs dgal brten nas zug/ mchod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba yin// gnan yang tshogs bdag chen po'i sku// rin po che yi rgyu las byas// dkyil 'khor/
177b3(rgyud): skad du bzhugs byas te// rat+na sid+d+hi zhes bya ba'i// rig pa 'bum du bzlas pa bya// sa 'og gter rnams ston par 'gyur// ci dga' bar yang spyod par 'gyur// tshogs bdag cher po'i rgyud las// rgyal po la so/
177b4(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// drag po chen po drug shul can// sangs rgyas thugs la byol song dbu// glang chen gzhon nus
177b5(rgyud): 'aldi brgyan pa// spyan gsum mche ba bzhi dang ldan// phyag bzhi zhabs bzhi klu chen gdan// dbang po mche ba dkar po 'dzini// de 'og zhags pa g.yon pa na// dgra sta kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin
177b6(rgyud): mthing la gsus pa che ba'o// de lta bu yi tshogs bdag sku// 'khar ba khro chu dag la bya// rgyal gyi nyin par rab tu gnas// des na skom zhing sgrub pa ni// dkyil 'khor bya ba'i sa brtags pa/
177b7(rgyud): le'u tshe dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor bri// sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya// dbus su pad+ma 'dib brgyad la// tshogs bdag chen pos bsgrub bya mnan// zla bi'i gdan la yum dang ni// gnyis su med par dgod
178a1(rgyud): par bya// de'i ming a rtsi ka re ste// rdo rje phag gdong ma zhes bya// kladagra sA ban da lag na thogs// khrag gis gang ba gtsol stog/ shar phyogs kyi le'u tshe ser po la khams
178a2(rgyud): gsum gyi bdag po la phug dang gri 'dzin pa'o// lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe sngon po la gnod sbyin chen po rdo rje mchu ma hA de ba'i gdong can dbyug to dang tho ba 'dzin pa nag pa'o// nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe dmar po
178a3(rgyud): la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po sprin bdag ces bya ba dmar po chus gang ba'i sprin phung dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// byang phyogs kyi le'u tshe ljang khu la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po nor gnas zhes bya ba ljang khu dbyug to
178a4(rgyud): dang rin po che'i kha T+wAM ga thogs pa'o// byang shar gyi le'u tshe dkar po la bgegs kyi rgyal po bi na ya ka glang po che'i gdong mdung rtse gsum pa dang la phug thogs pa nag po'o// shar lho'i le'u tshe dmar po la yi/
178a5(rgyud): dgas kyi rgyal po drug po zhes bya ba dgra sta dang thod pa ril po thogs pa nag po'o// lho nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la sprin phung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba sprin phung dang glog gi 'od bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis thogs pa'o//
178a6(rgyud): bya nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la bgegs kyi rgyal po log 'dren sna yon zhes bya ba glang po che'i sna can rtse gsum dang thod bskam po'i nang du la phug dang shas bkang ba thogs pa'o// lha rnams la klu'i rgyal po
178a7(rgyud): brgyad pa gtan ga ni klu'i rgyal po a ba la dang / ba ru Na dang / dung skyong dang / 'jog po dang / rigs ldan dang / mtha' yas dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po rnams so// shar gyi sgor rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung /
178b1(rgyud): lde sgor 'phags skyes po/ nub skor spyan mi bzang / byang snor rnam thos sras rnams sku mdog dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar pabu dang / ljang khur shes par bya'o// lag na nor bu rin po che re re/ ral mi
178b2(rgyud): rerera'o// 'di rnams kyi chung mA ni ma~M brig+sa/ 'di ltar bris bu'i byang shur du gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum lan de'i nang du dgra bo'i gzugs spra tshal las byas pa ring pa/ gnag pa/ smra zed pa/ til mar
178b3(rgyud): gyis byugs te/ snying khar ming rus bris la gzhug go// de'i sker ro swA las byas pa'i thag pa gdagra so// de ltar byas nas gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la/ lo du dang la phug dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dang /
178b4(rgyud): gnod de sprin chen po brgyad la nya sha dang sgog btsong du sbyar ba'i dmar gyi gtor ma re re ba sham/ klu chen po brgyad la gtor mche ba gcig dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la re re bya/ gal te ma 'byor na che ba
178b5(rgyud): gcig byo/ lha ba shos re re dbul bar bya'o// gzhan yang drag po'i rdzas spang ki'i thod pa dang / zir nag po dang ske tshe dang nyungs kar dang / nyungs nag gzhag par bya'o// tshogs bdag chen po'i
178b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// sgom pa'i rim pa 'di lta bu// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas// shin tu gsang ste bsgrub par bya/
178b7(rgyud): yi yi rang bzhin stong pa las// snang ba'i rang bzhin hUM dang ni// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon 'byung // ming gi sngags las rab tu bskyed// khro bo'i sprul pas stong gsum bkang // 'od bsdus thog ma'i hU~M la
179a1(rgyud): 'dus// tshogs kyi bdag po chen po de// 'gro ba'i don du bzhengs pa ni// khro bo chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// yum dang 'khor yang rdzogs par bskyed// phu brgyad klu brgyud
179a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i tshul// rgyal po de bzhin khro bo'i tshul// yi ge b+he dang ming las bskyed// 'od zer tshul gyis spyan drangs la// dza dang dza yi 'phro 'du dang // hUM dang hUM gi gsang sngags dang // lcags kyu'i
179a3(rgyud): phyag rgyas spyan drangs la// nus pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya// mchod dang gtor ma btab par bya// ba liM grih+Na khA yi sngags// snying po dag dang spel bar bya// sgom pa'i rim le'u sde bcu gnyis pa'o//
179a4(rgyud): de nas ges sngags rgyal poni// dbyangs yig gsal byed dag las btu// dang po bani pade rjes bri// bzhi pa'i lnga pa bral la gzhag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge dang // de yi rjes su
179a5(rgyud): bsam par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po// de yi rjes su brjod par bya// de la dbyings yig brgyad pas brgyad// dgug pa'i yi ge dag dang ni// 'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar ba
179a6(rgyud): yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o// yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbar bar bya// nyi ma yi ni yi ge dang // bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas bri// de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan// gnyis po'i
179a7(rgyud): bzhi pa'i yi ge la// dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya// lnga pa'i bzhi pa'i yi ge la// gsum po'i lnga pa sbar bar bya// bzhi pa'i dang po'i yi ge la// dbyangs yog bzhi pas brgyan par bya// 'byung ba rlung gi
179b1(rgyud): dris/ de srog tu sbyang bdag/ ri po tshum yi ge dang / las kyi mi se mtha' mar brjod/ rdzogs padag chen po'i rtsa ba'i sngags/ 'dod pa bas cad rtsub byed yin// gdod sbyin brgyad sdigasang dkwa yi//
179b2(rgyud): sa la sogs pa// ma mashes pa tshogs dang // yinas bya bal sogs dang // bi sa gnyis byab la sogs pa dang // hUM shes byabs sogs pa dang // rjerjes pa ba dang / jis bya ste/
179b3(rgyud): spyan pol hUM dang rabagyis mabya rten pas srog gi snying po'o// rdzu mi sngags ni ming las bskyed/ yi nga du pacu dang ldan par bya/ rgyal po chen de'i gabang sngag ni/ 'i sa bya ba dang / nyizhes bya ba dang
179b4(rgyud): d+hanas bya ba'i sngags su gyur ro// gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi shesang sngags 'byung ba'i lo 'u ge bcu gsum pa'o// / bsgrub pa dgug pa'i sngags ni// ya dang k+Sha da dang la/
179b5(rgyud): ma dang hA dang b+he rad+he// tri dngar dang tsa dag gis// shA n+ti dza ni dza zhes// lan grangs mang du bzlas par bya'o// gnod sbyin brgyad kyi gsang sngags kyis// dgra bo'i bu rdo blang bar bya// de nas
179b6(rgyud): rderje bsreg par bya// de nas bla rdo mnan par bya// rbad pa'i gsang sngags rgyal po ni// ya dang k+Sha dang ka dang la/ ma dang hA dang b+hai ra be// de ba yak+Sha ya ma dang / na gan ga zum ri la yang // che ge
179b7(rgyud): mo dgra bo thum ri la ya/ ya ya zhes kyang bskul bar bya// de nas gsad pa'i gsang sngags ni// ma dang hA dang b+he ra be// yak+Sha la sogs gong dang mthun// de'i rjes 'di skad brjod par bya// na sha ya na
180a1(rgyud): galan gnyis so// sha ya ts+tsha/ tsU tra la ya// nA ga ya ka tra mA ra ya// han tsakra rim pa gnyis/ bi nA ya ka dzi b+hin d+ha// tan+ta kAr de nas brjod// che ge mo d+ha ra ya zhes pa// hUM hUM
180a2(rgyud): phaT/ drag pos gsad pa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'i pa'o// / de nas yang ni drag po'i sngags// oM big+h+na bI ba bI sarba bi drA bi nA sha ya hri da mi ta ya/ hU~M tsi tu ra dz+ra/ pra ma ru tA ya
180a3(rgyud): ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ btsa pa ts+ya/ brah+ma brah+ma/ prad+d+hA ya prah+ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ 'bar ba'am yang na zangs dag la// log 'dren chen po'i gzugs byas la// de la rabye gnas mchod pa bya// dgra de'i
180a4(rgyud): gzugs brnyan 'og tu gzhug/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i stan du bya// dgra de 'chi bar the tshom med// yang ni sbyor ba'i las rnams ni// dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs so// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku tsan dan
180a5(rgyud): nam rin po che la byas te/ rab gnas byas la mchod pa phul te/ ser ba gcod par 'dod na/ ser ba'i bdag po rlung lnga dang chu lha'i gzugs byas te/ sprin gyi gzugs dang / 'brug gi gzugs byas
180a6(rgyud): la tshogs kyi bdag po gdan du mnan par bya'o// bdag nyid kyis kyang mnan par bsams te/ hi ka tsan+da zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas na sar pa chod par 'gyur ro// yungs kar yang phyogs su
180a7(rgyud): gtor bar bya'o// ser ba 'bebs par 'dad na// chu dang sprin gyi maN+Dal mngon par bris te/ tshogs bdag chen po 'brug la zhon par bsgoms te/ bdag gi bka' nyan par bsam/ gsang ba'i rdzas
180b1(rgyud): su ba ba la// lugs phye gser ste 'du bya rnams// gnam chu 'bras kyi phyes smras te// ser ba ji tsam 'dod pa'i dbyibs che chung byas la khrag gis byugs la bdun dang bdun phrag mang du byas te/ ka dkri
180b2(rgyud): ku'i thod pa'i nang du thugs te/ sprin gyis dgab par bya'o// ka ku'i thod pa la sngags bri bar bya'o// rim pa gsum mo// rten gyi rdza sgo kyang gzhag par bya'o// bru~M druM b+h+yo sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags
180b3(rgyud): 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa dang / ka ka'i thod pa'i nang du ser ba dngos su gsum mam/ bdun nam/ brgyad byung ba dang / dgra'i yul du bskyal to/ sngags zlog nas bzlas pas 'bab bo// gal te ma
180b4(rgyud): bab na tshogs kyi bdug po'i sku dbu thur la bstan/ zhabs gyen la bstan pa dgra ba'i yul gyi dbus su spro'o// mod la sar pa 'bab ste/ bya ka lan ta ka'i sgo nga tsam dang / dbyibs dmar po sha ba'i rlig 'bras
180b5(rgyud): tsam pa yun ring po 'bab bo// lo tog 'joms pa'i sngags ni bri zhes bya ba'o// de gcod par 'dod na ni sku dang ka ki ma phyung ba'i bar la nyi ma re rer 'bab pas dbyung bar bya'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku la
180b6(rgyud): mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// gsang sngags kyang dbu zhabs ma nor bar rin po che'i 'phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// sku khrus gsol ba bdag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol lo//
180b7(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ tshogs kyi bdag pos byed pa yin// phyag 'tshal deng la ldan tshogs bdag da gyes// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag che// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan
181a1(rgyud): 'i khro che// dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las// tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud dngos grub 'byung /
181a2(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dri paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas/ 'jig rten dngos grub ched du ni// rgya gar yul nas bsnams nas byen// rgyal po'i 'byung gnas la
181a3(rgyud): gtad nus/ rgyud 'di bsam pas grub pa yin/ rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ka la tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/ dbang
181a4(rgyud): gI rta mchog sku la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ shar lce'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas shing tsan din gyi nags kyi tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mim/
181a5(rgyud): yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du// dpal nag po chen po zhes bya ba bi na ya ka la sogs te 'khor gdug pa can rnams kyi dbus na skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i nag po chen po/
181a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba gcig yod de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na mthar byed rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/ dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge
181a7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM hu lu hu lu hUM ba~M/ zhes brjod pas/ dur khrod ha ha drag tu dgod pa'i gnas nas nag po chen po rang dbang med
181b1(rgyud): bar mthar byed d+ha'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di mdongs gsol du phul ba/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+Shi k+She trA bitsA bi nA ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces phul lo// dpal
181b2(rgyud): nag po chen po'i rgyud las/ gleng gni l-i'u sna dang po'o// de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang gis/ mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma prad+ma khros pa'i ngang/
181b3(rgyud): nag po chen po drug shul can/ gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol// mgon po bsgrub par bya ba gang // gsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang // ma grub shis bstan pa dang // mgon po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams//
181b4(rgyud): rta mchog chen pos bdag la gsol// zhes zhus pas/ de nas pad+ma khros pa yis// nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung slad du// gza' skar
181b5(rgyud): tshechos grangs shis pa la// dur khrod la sogs shing gcig tu// bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la// nag po chen po bsgrub par bya// phung sa'am sa nag dag la ni// stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas ni// dri spos
181b6(rgyud): khrag gis chag chag pa// dbus su gru gsum zla gam ldan// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ de dbus thod chen nang du ni// sha lnga snying sgyus brgyan pa yi// gtor mu bshos bu khru gang tshad// de la mda' gzugs
181b7(rgyud): dmar nag dar// gr-i snying tsa ka lo yang gzugs// de nyid mgon po'i rten du gzhag/ Da ma ru yi pags pa'i ning // mgon po'i srog sngags bri bar bya// lho yi nang du bla rjes gril// spos dang rgyun gtor gdang /
182a1(rgyud): bar bya// dkon mchog spyil mchod pa bsham// de nas bad+mar bdag bsgoms la// thugs ka'i hri las 'od 'phros pas// bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa// rang gi mdun du bsam
182a2(rgyud): byas la// mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya// rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni// tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya// btang snyoms la sogs paM r-i tri// pad stengs yi ge hU~M las ni// nag po zhal gcig phyag drug pa//
182a3(rgyud): grigug 'phreng ba Da ma ru// thod pa mdung dang zhags pa rnams// g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o// sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgya ni// sku sprad pa ti khra bo gsol// stag lpags zhing gi sham thabs can//
182a4(rgyud): gtum po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs// dpral bar dri yi thig les brgyan// spyi gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku bstan// de lngar bdag mdun gsal bsgom nas// spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa bya/
182a5(rgyud): gter ma pU dza la sogs pas// nag po che la sbyin par bya// mgon po'i thugs ko'i hUM las ni// srog gi yi ga g.yas nas bskor// khror yug dag gis bzla ber bya// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+ShaM k+Shi tra big+h+nAM bi
182a6(rgyud): rA ya ku hrI hUM phaT/ de skad ces ni rab brjod pas// nag po grub pa'i rtags rnams 'byung // dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las// bsnyen cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
182a7(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang // rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams// nag po chen pos bsgral 'dod na/ stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang // drag po e yi nang du ni/
182b1(rgyud): ngolo bas cad thod pa'i nang / gzugs ni til dgas bya// ming dus dag nI bgod nas kyang / gsad dang na bsabs dang snar / mgon pa'i sla dang ngam rdzas rnams/ 'dapa'a' dgod padug nga sod
182b2(rgyud): nadang dru rdza sa byu// rtag tor rgyun gtong g.yas dang gal m-i gas sngags 'di yis gsad par bya// oM badz+ra ma rtag la k+Shi k+She 'i sngo ba na yaka tu hU~M co oMm dag sa la shAs swa swa pa pa 'i NI e/ pam pa sh+tsi ma sa/
182b3(rgyud): a yi yi rA tra~M ya a ba kA ri Ni ya di pra ti dz+dza s+yA ra si tatra i daM/ dz+ya Sh+Ti la ga hi khA hi/ mA ra mA rA/ kr-ihA br-iH/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ han ha ne/ de ga dgra/ btsanga? tsa/ di ni ma kan de bo mA ra ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M bin ma
182b4(rgyud): bi las tra~M bi hri hU~M dza sim bu bi nA yaka a mu ka bri srob bur thum dza mA ra sarbed// drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis drang // zhag bdun bar du smra mi bya// de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// dpal nag
182b5(rgyud): bo chen po'i rgyud las// lus srog dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas yang dag par bshad bya// las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gi brtul// gru gsum dbus su gdug
182b6(rgyud): pa'i shing // dbus su nag po 'khor bcas bskyed// ling ga gtor ma dam rdzas rnams// nag po'i zhal du dbul bar bya// sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya// ag+na dz+wa la raM las rdzogs//
182b7(rgyud): thal ba rlung dmar dag la bskur// a mu ka ni myur du rlag/ dpal nag po chen pa'i rgyud las mtha' brtul ba'i le'u sta bzhi pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad
183a1(rgyud): byug/ de ltar bsgrubs kyang mgrung na// gcig dang gnyis lanan tan bskyed// de ltar byas kyang mgrung na// sa gsum khrag gsum du gsum la// khru gang pa yi bzugs/
183a2(rgyud): kyi tshad/ chugasum dbus su nag bye'i gzigs// spyi tshar dag tu ldid du gzhug/ bris skud ma rdzas rjo pas// rang gi glu gsum mal gyi 'og/ dug dang tshor mas steng nas dgo // thun rdzas
183a3(rgyud): zab cing sngags 'di bzlas// oM badz+ra krod+b+ha ha ya thai br-i hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ phaT hUM hU~M ka ya nA bidz+ri bitri k+She kI la ka hA ma badz+ra ai// de skad brjod cing thun gyis drab// de la rtags rnams rje gas

183a5(rgyud): skad bsnga la gnas su ni// mgo po'i gzugs kyang spos chus bkru// gru gsum dbus su blangs byas la// dragra bo'i ming rus snying khor gzhug/ zhig bdun bsgrubs la dgra la bskyal/
183a6(rgyud): a mu ka ni myur du rlag/ dpal mgon po dag po'i rgyud las// ma grub ra spogs pa'i tshig dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bye ba// bya nag
183a7(rgyud): 'phur zhing lding ba dang // modan pa a tsa ra dang ni// dge ba shes ban d+hi slob dpon dang // 'od dang sgra dang khang pa'i tshig/ mgon po'i sku dag dngos su mthong // dgral dmag drangs
183b1(rgyud): sems can pasad/ srin ga dag la sring stobs dang / mdze po dang ni sprang po dang / byunag padu la ltung ba 'byung // dpral mthon do nas po'i rgyud las/ rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug bya'o/
183b2(rgyud): de nas yang dag pashad ba bya// ser ba dbang pa'i las byan// min nam mdzen rdo thod par+ye// 'khor lo rtsibs pani dris nas kyang // rigs lngak+Sha yi suM dri na dgod/
183b3(rgyud): rtsibs mchen ser srun ming rus dang // yul du pob ces bya ba bri// de mthar la ngar lo rdo bas dgul// dregs pa'i sngags ni bri bar bya// rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang // drung gi snying po dri bar bya// bdag
183b4(rgyud): tsidapad+ma thos par bsgom// gsang sngags 'di yos gnadu la bor// oM badz+ra ma hA kA ma k+She k+She tra dr-its+tsha bi na ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT/ nA ga srid gzer/ phu bur thum dza khro sha dril blo// de sa ng+ge ces ni rab brjod la// nyungs kas
183b5(rgyud): ngas naka ske tshe dang // khrag dang bug gis thod par brab// lo 'bras rlung khyer rtags byung na// dgra yi yul du dbyib par bya// gal te 'jig rten phung ba'o// dpal mgon po dag po'i rgyud las/ serab dbab pa'i/
183b6(rgyud): le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas yang dag ngos gsungs pa// e mA 'khor 'dus ngo mtshar can// ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na// dum tshig la gnas sdom pa gzung // gtor ba dag
183b7(rgyud): la brtson par bya// dam rdzas bu rdo lus la bsrel// zhes gsungs pas// rgyal po mig mi bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs nas/ nag po chen pos bstan bsrung bar bas blangs nas
184a1(rgyud): mi snang bar gyur to// dpa' nas po chen po'i rgyud las lerul du rdzogs so// rgyug kyis ngan po su mon badz+ra dang / khyod kyi ljo bur bu'od kyis
184a2(rgyud): bsgyu ro/ khar nyid du/ Ar+yA shrIs b+hA kas nA mAd+hA ra tiNi/ bod ska du/ 'phags pa dpas dgon po dag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs
184a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i ga nas bdud tul te/ mngon par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nas ring po
184a4(rgyud): lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po'i tshogs kyi bdag po/ ma hA kA la dod khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang sgyur ba dpal mgon pa
184a5(rgyud): nag po chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig po 'bul gyis bzhes
184a6(rgyud): su gsol/ nang thams cad dang / rims thams cad dade/ gdon thams cad dang // mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang /
184a7(rgyud): shes par bkas pa rnams snyed du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed 'jug pa ma da bcing // 'og tu ni sems can dbul pa la thug pa lan med bcing ngo // zang gar lo khor su btanar lathug btsun chad bcing /
184b1(rgyud): ngo// gzhan yang / oM shrI ma hA kA la gAn gu te swA hA/ na maHshrI ma hA kA la gA ne gu ti shA yA/ na mo yo gi na Nin/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi le hi le/ ki te ki te ni/ tsi de tsi de ri swA hA/ 'di bton pas
184b2(rgyud): gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing / rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra lha/ bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug/ srin po ling ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan
184b3(rgyud): nas rlog pa/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma snying rdul du rlog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas so// 'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs
184b4(rgyud): rdzogs so// / 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nang thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
184b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// nag po chen po skyes bu gnag sar mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen po/ rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa brjod par bya ba ste/ phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la
184b6(rgyud): rims nad med par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na/ rA dzA d+hA te na/ da ha da ha/ rA dza d+hu te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA dza d+hu te na/ ba hu shra be ba hu pa ri bA re/ ba hu pa ri she d+ha ne/ i pany+tsa ra tsaN+DA lan/ ha nu ha na
184b7(rgyud): oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha/ shi r-i mush+tsa/ tsak+ShiHmuny+dzA/ sho tra muny+tsa/ g+hA Na muny+tsa/ dzi hA muSh+Ta/ kar+N+Na muny+tsa/ grI ba muny+tsa/ priSh+Ta muny+dzA/ kA Ti ka muts+tsa/ kuk+Sha muny+tsa/ u ru mush+tsa/ dza no muny+tsa/ hi sta muny+tsa/ pA do muny+tsa
185a1(rgyud): a~M gu l+ya muny+tsa/ oM gra pra t+yaM ga muny+dza/ ab sa ra/ ar+ya sI muny+tsa/ gats+tshaHdz+wa ra pu to si/ bdag la swA hA/ e dz+wa la mA aM gu le hUM/ sarba dzA ra nan phaT/ 'phags pa nas/
185a2(rgyud): po chen de'i gzungs/ rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar par byed pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA ra rme dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bani d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
185a3(rgyud): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ de bi ma ny+dzu kA li na ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag me chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
185a4(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so// de nas
185a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo/
185a6(rgyud): nan me chen mos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
185a7(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lham mo lha mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o// 'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar
185b1(rgyud): bya'o// thang kar khor khor yug tu ni ril thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o// de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM ru ru bi tiSh+Tha ba te si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha dwA to si swAhA/ 'dir ton pas rims
185b2(rgyud): dang nad dang mings dang / nyes par bltas pa thams cad dang / mdze dang / phol mig dong / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// swA hA/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzung
185b3(rgyud): rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi kA li pra ma rA dza tan+ta ka li/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod nga rgyal po'i rgyud/ rig sngags dang
185b4(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na
185b5(rgyud): rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/ nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so// 'khor ni brgya byin dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / ma mo'i tshogs bye
185b6(rgyud): dadung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshen dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa// nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i ldum srin sde brgyad nyon cig/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi yung
185b7(rgyud): gshin rje'i sring mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ khyed kyis de la mchod pagyis shig/ bstod pa gyis shig/ ngas kyang khyed la byin gyis brlab bo zhes
186a1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / 'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan las langs te/ dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/ sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol
186a2(rgyud): na// dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher spangs nas// lam gyi khyad par gong mo rab rdzogs kyang // mtho ris skyes gnas rnams la dge bcu yi// tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol bsgyur ba yi// dpal ldan
186a3(rgyud): lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'das pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas// sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byed phun sum tshogs// gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i rkyen dang ldan// 'chi bdag 'joms
186a4(rgyud): mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma byin len pa'i tshul la rab spangs pas// bsod nams tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshogs// gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes// / sbyin pa'i
186a5(rgyud): gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mi tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams srung ba dang // mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 'phags// srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste// dge sbyong
186a6(rgyud): chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nyon mongs brdzun tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis// gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso// gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te/
186a7(rgyud): bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan// nyid la rnam par 'dul ba'i 'khor gyis bskor// lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma// dkar
186b1(rgyud): me'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ngag 'khrul spangs pa'i yon tan sbyin pa yis// ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs// dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma/ khyis/
186b2(rgyud): ba 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal khengs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis// zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs snyan ma// tshig rtsu ba ga she ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste// ngag rtsub
186b3(rgyud): 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni// 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtag so// bdag med rtags su song gis rna ba brgyan// brnab
186b4(rgyud): sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par spangs// phyi rol yul 'di gnyis med chos su gzugs brnyan khyod// gang la gnod sems yang dag
186b5(rgyud): spangs pa'i rtags// sbrul gyi rna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod// log par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod// de lta rnam par dag
186b6(rgyud): pa'i ngang tshul can// spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag/ ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan song grub// dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub//
186b7(rgyud): las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas// gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang // dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan// gdug pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzad ma// bstod par 'os pa
187a1(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la// gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/ dam
187a2(rgyud): pa rnams bgrod pa'i khyad par ni// tshogs kyis sbyangs pa'i don dam mthong ba yis// gnyen po shes rim par sgom pa la// mthar phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags// de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan
187a3(rgyud): nyid ni// 'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te// dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas// dang po sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin brnyes// rab tu dga' bu'i sa la don dam ni// rnam par mi rtog skye med
187a4(rgyud): tshul gyis gzigs// dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni// rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas// de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son// rang sems bzhi pa'i sa la cher
187a5(rgyud): bsgoms pas// lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son// rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas// bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son// rang sems brgyad pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas//
187a6(rgyud): dpal ldan lha mo nag mo'i smon lam nyid// dgu pa la yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub// de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phen par 'grub// 'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni// sangs rgyas pa la smin/
187a7(rgyud): papa'i smon lam can// sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma// 'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston cing // gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub
187b1(rgyud): shog// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon parta mgo can gyis// dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo gnyis su med pa ste// don dam spros/
187b2(rgyud): bral chos nyid 'di las btsal// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden// 'khor ba mya ngan gnyis su med pas zab// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags// las dang rnam smin gnyis su
187b3(rgyud): med pas bstod// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin// yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi dang // spos dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis bsdus// bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs
187b4(rgyud): chen te// mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod// bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig/ gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu// mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing // bzang ngan
187b5(rgyud): gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod// bskyed med rdzogs pa gnyis me lhun grub mchog/ sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de// sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i ngang // bdag gzhan gnyis
187b6(rgyud): med tshul mchog gcig gis bstod// yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i don// stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang // gyur dang 'gyur med
187b7(rgyud): rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod// sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang // lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig pa'i tshul// rtsol byed rtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas// rnam par spros med
188a1(rgyud): don dam dbyings kyis bstod// mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med don rtogs te// sring dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas/
188a2(rgyud): thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gi dang // sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul// snang dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong // gnyis med don
188a3(rgyud): mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di dag rnams ni don du ma zab mo'i tshul// spros pa med pa'i don dang 'brel ba ste// 'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal// 'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog/
188a4(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur dud lnga pas// dpal lha mo la 'phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa// sems nyid 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i khyad par ni// sems nyid gud na med cing
188a5(rgyud): sems kyang med// don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems// 'thun par bstan pa'i zhi ba dpal lha mo// zhi mdzad ni 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can// zhi ba'i 'khor gyis/
188a6(rgyud): bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu mdangs// kun tu ni mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod// mthun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo/
188a7(rgyud): rgyas mdzad rgyas 'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can// rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid// kun tu rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi bsod nams/
188b1(rgyud): ye shes rgyas par mdzod// mthun par bstan pa'i dbang gi dpal lha mo// dbang mdzad dbang sgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can// dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog dmar po
188b2(rgyud): shin tu brjing / kun tu dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod// mthun par bstan pa'i drag po dpal lha mo// drag mdzad dag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can//
188b3(rgyud): drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni// rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid// kun tu drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams drag pos sor// khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma
188b4(rgyud): grub la// 'di ltar 'dzin nyid cir yang snang ba ni// 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags// bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grung nas// khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog/
188b5(rgyud): / de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la// klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma// yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag 'tshal ni// don du snang ba med kyang
188b6(rgyud): gdul bya'i phyir// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar bstan pa'o// khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon// mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mnga'// bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan// gzhan don
188b7(rgyud): phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris// byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug sa rgyas gsal// shes rab rtogs phyir lte banyims brgyan// dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang // bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan
189a1(rgyud): ne'u le bsnams// dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral pa'am nag sdug/ nyon mongs 'dren phyir rjod pal mche ba gtsigs// 'khor ba sngags la bkar phyir dkan spa 'debs// gdug pa zhi
189a2(rgyud): la gnon phyir sdang mig bgrad// thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar// snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// sku gsung thugs rtags/
189a3(rgyud): phyag rgya la T+wAM gsor// sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshub mas brgyan// nyon mongs sreg phyir me phung nang na bzhugs// 'dod khams bskyang phyir yongs
189a4(rgyud): 'du shing la brten// lha min 'dul phyir rdzing gi dka' bzlog ma// dpa' brtan brtan phyir stag gi sham thabs mnabs// bstan pa srung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs// nga rgyal dbang sdud bdag med sgra sngogs
189a5(rgyud): phyir// thabs kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng ges brgyan// zhe sdang dbang 'dul dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir// shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyis brgyan// 'du byed mi rtag rtags su dril bu sgrogs// chags phyir rngam
189a6(rgyud): mdzad rak+ta'i dra glong 'thung // dam tshig srung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad// tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phrul// nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas// ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams
189a7(rgyud): shar ba'i phyir// rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na brtan// dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u zhon// nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir mi yi tshul// mkha' 'gro ma mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod
189b1(rgyud): de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas// dpal lha mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa/ don dam gnyis med byang chub sems yin yang // srid gsum 'dul phyir rtags kyi/
189b2(rgyud): phyabargya ni// rang sems rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang // rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil ba las// keng rus thod 'phreng zhing gi rgyan dang ldan// sku mdog gnag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal// sngon mo ral pa 'dzing/
189b3(rgyud): pa'i sprul 'gyed pa// sku yi sprul pa dpal ldan na ma Ti// gru gsum sor nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs// yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad// 'dzin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod// gsung gi
189b4(rgyud): sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti// gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs// dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum ma ste// dbang gi 'phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod// sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho/
189b5(rgyud): ma// drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon// 'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// bstan pa rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlabs//
189b6(rgyud): de nas dpal lha me la/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/ spos bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang // thugs kyi thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum/
189b7(rgyud): gdong nas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni// dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyang par gsal// 'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la// byis pa rnams kyi bstod pa byed pa ltung // thun po rnams kyis dngos por rab
190a1(rgyud): brtags nas// gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig/ rgyal ba'i don yangs thugs chud khyod nyid la// tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams// rnams kyang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid
190a2(rgyud): min// gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma gtogs par// khyod kyi smon lam brtags kyi cho 'phrul la// don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams// khyod la brten nas thams cad btub par 'gyur// gang zhig skye ba
190a3(rgyud): med par shes pa dang // gdod nas gnyis med snying po bsgom nus na// gang zag des ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin// khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis// bskal pa grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang // khyod kyi gzug
190a4(rgyud): dang kha dog mthong mi nus// gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong // sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa thams cad kyis// khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te// 'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni//
190a5(rgyud): khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos// gang zhig lus ngag dge pas khyod sgrub pa'i// blun po de yis rnams kyang khyod nyid spangs// lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas// mchod na dngos grub de yis
190a6(rgyud): gter thob 'gyur// khyod ni rgyal ba mang po'i yon tan sdud// chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mo la// zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir// mi mjed 'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir// phyi rol tshul gyis
190a7(rgyud): thams cad 'dren mdzad ma// khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa// sgrib pa mang po stong nyid dang du gshegs// stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod// stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod// 'di
190b1(rgyud): ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grangs pas// khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang // byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod// / de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig
190b2(rgyud): can gyis/ dpal lha mo la bstod pa/ dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba'i don// thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mkha' la spyod// byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la// sgo gsum rdul sbed dbyangs
190b3(rgyud): kyis phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma bsgribs kyang // dpal ldan dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la cher babs pas// mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang
190b4(rgyud): po rgyal gyur cig/ dpal ltaran khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste// bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs// khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab bshags na// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod// khyod kyi
190b5(rgyud): khyad par yongasu 'phags pa ni// 'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs// dga' 'thun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni// rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul// 'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni//
190b6(rgyud): nag mo bzang mo 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum kun tu 'gro don la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs// yang dag khyod kyi yon tan sku mchog ni// gdug pa 'dul zhing
190b7(rgyud): bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni// mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsel ba gdab// 'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rangs bskul zhing gsol
191a1(rgyud): btab nas// dge ba 'di yis ngan song stongs gyur te// thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo// de nas dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la// nam mkha'i lha bran
191a2(rgyud): rnams kyis bstod pa/ bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i grong dkyil na// rlung nag dgu pa'i grong 'khyil pho brang nas// ma cig 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// bdud kyi yum lagashin rje'i lham gcig ma/
191a3(rgyud): dpal ldan lha mo rem ti// nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can// mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can// khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni// don dam dbyings kyi spyod pa med pa'i rtags// dbu sA g.yas
191a4(rgyud): nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni// yul gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil ba ni// don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtogs/ ral pa'i gseb nas me stag
191a5(rgyud): 'phro ba ni// thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags// dbul thong rngon 'phreng ba bcings pa ni// thugs rje'i sprul skas 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags// g.yas na seng ge 'gying zhing mchod pa ni//
191a6(rgyud): sman mo thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags// g.yon na sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni// zhe sdang ba spangs dbyings su dge ba'i rtags// snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni/ sangs rgyas kun la
191a7(rgyud): bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags/ spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig bgrad pa ni// srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags// zhal gyi drag po hom khung gdengs pa ni/ bsten pa 'jig pa'i ru tra sgrol
191b1(rgyud): ba'i rtags// rno gdug mche bzur gsum gtsigs pa ni// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sa la sgrol ba'i rtags// sku la zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni// yang dag chos dang don dam ldan pa'i rtags/
191b2(rgyud): glang chen ko rlon snams phyed dkris pa ni// theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags// re lde nag pos snams phyed dkris pa ni// 'jig rten 'di na che btsan ldan pa'i rtags// lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma
191b3(rgyud): 'char ba ni// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i rtags// spyi bo'i gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni// dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags// zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khril ba ni/
191b4(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags// phyag g.yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni// sdug bsngal skye shi rtsed nas gcod pa'i rtags// phyag g.yon thong rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug
191b5(rgyud): bsngal khrag lngar 'thung ba'i rtags// bong bu gru ba phyin phyogs zhon pa ni// log par lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags// srin po'i o ga mas snga ru byas pa ni// srin yul lang ka pu rangs 'dul ba'i rtags// sbrul nag
191b6(rgyud): chun pos gong rmed bas pa ni// zhe sdang dbang gis dgra bgegs 'joms pa'i rtags// rus sbal nag po'i phob bu btang ba ni// klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags// snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khram bab ni/
191b7(rgyud): dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags// phyi shar nad kyi rkyal ba btags pa ni// bstan pa 'di la gnod pa'i dgra bo la// nad ka 'bebs shing dal kha bsgyur ba'i rtags// don dam bcud kyi
192a1(rgyud): rtags su zhag gi zo ris btang // thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta'i thig les brgyan// 'dul byed 'phrin las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mas gdab// ma mo 'bum phrag phran/
192a2(rgyud): du khol ba ni// khams gsum khyab par 'phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags// macig la nas me 'bar rgya mtsho sems// rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs por 'phen// bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod/
192a3(rgyud): denas yang gshin rje nag pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/ lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni// rgyun du til mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste// ro nye rna chas bsgyings shing cha
192a4(rgyud): lugs mang po 'chang byed ma// rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags la byas pa gcig gis rkang pa mdzes par brgyan pa ste// mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yid par shes/ ral pas bdag nyid mdzes
192a5(rgyud): par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes// 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag dang zhag 'dzag du ba 'phrul ba na// nag mo mche ba mi bzang khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig
192a6(rgyud): tsam du bzhugs par 'gyur// lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes// khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan med cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril
192a7(rgyud): bu'i sgra yang sgrogs// khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcad g.yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa yi// mgo 'phreng lag na thogs shing gar stabs bskor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che// rkub tshos che la klu dbang
192b1(rgyud): gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings shing lag na mdung dang ni// ba dan thogs shing khrag gi chang gis re ro myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas// mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba'i lha mo khyod ni 'byung po phal chen kun gyis
192b2(rgyud): mthong // rkang pa'i gos ni ko rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snams kyi phyed ni re ldes dkris// mi yi rgyu ma gsar pas zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing khrag zhag tshome bus thig ler brgyan// mi sha so sar che ma
192b3(rgyud): che ma za yin mi ro'i cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste// bdag la skyob pa'i drag mo mi sha thogs khyod snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong na// bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig sngags shing khyod la
192b4(rgyud): 'dud// lha mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la ni// brgya byin sogs kyis bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud// lha rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams
192b5(rgyud): 'jug phyir rab brtul bas na rna ba ya gcig la// brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdengs ka sdong dang ldan zhing phung sgrogs gcig gis brgyan nas rgyan du byas// ya gcig la ni seng gre mtshungs med thogs shing rgya
192b6(rgyud): mtsho bskor zhing sa gzhi gnon pa'i steng gi ni// phyogs nas rgya ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo khyod kyi rkeng nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon// rgya mtsho glong nas me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed par nus pa'i bud
192b7(rgyud): med thams cad zhi mdzad ma// lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' bzlog nag mo mi nang phyugs nad kun la 'jigs pa med// ma cig dpal ldan lha mo khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing
193a1(rgyud): bstod par bgyis/ de nas dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la / bram ze mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa/ macig lnga mo dpal lha mo// rdo rje lha monag/
193a2(rgyud): mo che// mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis// bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas// yid myur gzugs chen kun tu grags// ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong // dpa'
193a3(rgyud): rtul drag spyod brtson 'grus che// 'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal// gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod// gos su dar gos sngon po gsol// sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs 'chang // sman mig mthong na mi sdug
193a4(rgyud): kun tu sdang // dad cing tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud// re 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas// re 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas// re 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas// lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'tsho'// gnas de ri dang tshal
193a5(rgyud): dgon du// rtag tu lha mo khyod bstod na// de yi dgongs pa skong bar byed// bdag gis rtag tu bstod byas na// bdag gi bsam pa grub par mdzod// rma bya'i sgro la rgyal mtshan byas// gang zhig rtag bsten srung bar
193a6(rgyud): byed// gnag lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed// seng ge stag dang spang ki yis// rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang // rdo rje dril chen snyan par sgrogs// byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs// lan 'ga' lag na
193a7(rgyud): tri shU la thogs// lan 'ga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon 'phyar// mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na// de yis dus su mchod pas na// lha mo khyod las lhag pa med// bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston// dgra dang
193b1(rgyud): 'brang tsho d+hal bar byed// bung med nang na mchog smin te// tshig drung 'jig rten mgon po 'dra rgyal po'i 'ban pa d+ma 'dra// zhal bzang thu bas pa'ang // chul nas na grubs tha 'phongs pa rnams
193b2(rgyud): kyi gnon pa shes 'od// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe// lha mo khyod kyi skye ba la// lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas// lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas// lha me yin rnams pham par byed// lag na mdung
