218b5(rgyud): thub pa ches// 'khor la legs so legs so zhes// oM A hrIHhUM swA hA bcas// yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs// lcags kyu can gyis nya ra nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar// dge sbyong kun slong dkar/
218b6(rgyud): pos ni// byang chub rin chen gling 'jog mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas
218b7(rgyud): bcom ldan thub pa che// mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// yan lag cha shas thams cad las// 'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag/ drug cu
219a1(rgyud): drug cu'i mtha' gnal ba// grangs med dag ni dgye bar mdzad/ zhing khams grangs med bdun gyi mtha'// phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du// 'od kyis gang nas 'od de las// sman pa'i tshigs
219a2(rgyud): bcad 'dri sdang ngo // sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa spangs// le lo che dang spyod pa mchog 'dzin spangs// 'gyod dang chos lam nges 'byed pa spangs// rgyal che dang 'dod chags spyod pa spangs// 'gro rnams med na byang
219a3(rgyud): chutshuchu lam med de// 'grol brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur// byang chub che lam thugs rje chen po ste// 'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur// de skad grags pa'i de ma thag/ phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras/
219a4(rgyud): brjod kyis mi lang gtso bo mchog/ spyan ras gzigs dbang grags med gtso// thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// mi mjed zhing 'dir lhags par gyur// 'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams ni// grangs med bdun gyi mtha'
219a5(rgyud): nyid nas// zhing khams seng ge spungs par ni// sangs rgyas seng ge rol pa yi// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra// mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag
219a6(rgyud): bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// dngul gyi me tog du mas gtor// bde bar gshegs/
219a7(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas/ 'od rer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmed byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom// shes rab mtha' yas gsal bar mdzad/
219b1(rgyud): bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di thor grogs bgyid do// oM hrI si ha nA hU~M phaT/ snying po de skad bul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs
219b2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// lho yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog// grangs med bdun gyi mtha nyid kyi// zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas rin chen dpal bzhugs pa'i// drung du byang chub sems
219b3(rgyud): pa'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi// nor bu 'khor los sgyur ba che// gser gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du
219b4(rgyud): zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// rin chen gser gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs
219b5(rgyud): se rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung che ba'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad// sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas
219b6(rgyud): gter chen rdol// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM pad+ma d+hA ra hA ke hU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas
219b7(rgyud): dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs kyi ning khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams pad+mo brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas
220a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i 'byung gnas bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can// pad+ma nite shwar gtso// pad+ma rA ga'i ri 'dra ba// byang chub sem/
220a2(rgyud): tshogs bye ba phrag bcu dang lhan cig mtha' la gshegs// zlog 'bru bzhin du ning 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor bdum byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// pad+mA rA gA 'i/
220a3(rgyud): me tog no// rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od cir ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmang byung chen po'i tshigs bcas kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba
220a4(rgyud): 'dod chags 'dam rdzab bskams// tshul khrims byug spos char du phab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM pad+ma nr-i te shwa ra hrIHhUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang /
220a5(rgyud): thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams rdo rje
220a6(rgyud): bkod pa na// sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs med bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// thugs rje chen po mi bshol ba// rin chen mar gang ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems
220a7(rgyud): tshogs byed phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// man ta yi me toH/
220b1(rgyud): ni tu che du pa 'thor bar mdzang/ bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ 'od bar ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / rdzang byung chen po'i tshogs bshad kyis/ snying rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur/ 'gro ba'i lelam
220b2(rgyud): nags tshal bsregs// brtson 'grus bskul ba'i ma dpung sngar// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid thogs bgyid do// oM rat+na a gra a pra ti haH hUM phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // rngub
220b3(rgyud): pa'i grwa la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs mang bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams
220b4(rgyud): gter chen brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun don yod zhags pa can// shel gyi
220b5(rgyud): ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba// byang chub sems tshogs bya ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan tsog mkha' la gshegs// glog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas//
220b6(rgyud): 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// rin chen shel gyi me tog ni// rgya chen du ma 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshogs bshad
220b7(rgyud): kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri bo bcom// bzod pa'i nyi ma lhang nger mdzad// bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM hrIHdri'o//
221a1(rgyud): bi dza la a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIhrIHbahU~M phaT swAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsun
221a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// shar lde'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi// zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas sman gyi 'byung gnas bzhugs//
221a3(rgyud): drung du byang chub sems dpa' gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun ha la ha la che// pu shar ka'i ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la
221a4(rgyud): gshegs// glog 'argyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// pu sha ra ka'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed//
221a5(rgyud): bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshogs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdong sprul// bsam gtan/
221a6(rgyud): bdud rtsi rgya mtsho rlabs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM ha la ha la hrIHpad+ma gar+b+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i gal de logs su//
221a7(rgyud): 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs mad bdun gyi mtha' cing na// zhing khams pad+mas brgyan pa na// sangs rgyas/
221b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po bzhugs// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun pad+ma rgyan gyi lung // zangs mthun gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag/ bcu dang /
221b2(rgyud): lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// zangs mthun gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma
221b3(rgyud): 'thor bar byed// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshogs bshad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba rmongs pa'i thibs po bcom//
221b4(rgyud): sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM pad+ma a laM kA ra hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su//
221b5(rgyud): 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus gtsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// nub byang phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams stong brgya zhes bya bar//
221b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhugs so// drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug/ nor bu dung gi kha dog 'dra// byang chub sems
221b7(rgyud): mchog bye ba phrag bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byen// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// spug gi/
222a1(rgyud): snying po'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed// badre bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par/
222a2(rgyud): g.yos pas gyur// 'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa bsal// mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes btab// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do// oM badz+ra d+harma d+hA tu hUM swA hA// snying po/
222a3(rgyud): de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog/ grangs mede bdun gyi mtha'
222a4(rgyud): nyid na// zhing khams gtsug tor brtsegs pa na// sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs// drang du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// mgon po spya na ra sa gzigs dbang ni// ha ri ha ri ha ri la// zhon zhes rab tu grags
222a5(rgyud): pa li/ rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor de// in+d+ra nI la'i ri bo'i mdog byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mtha' lagashegs// zlog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po drung
222a6(rgyud): pal// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// in+d+ra nI la'i me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad
222a7(rgyud): byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel// dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo bskor// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid
222b1(rgyud): grogs bgyid do// oM b+h+rUM hrIHha hUM swAhA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus gtsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// 'og gi phyogs kyi
222b2(rgyud): zhing khams mchog/ grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na// zhing khams za ma tog mdzes na// sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so// drung du byang chub sems dpe'i gtso// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang
222b3(rgyud): ni// rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal// an da rnyil gyi ri bo 'dra// byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag/ bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs// glog 'bru bzhin du zhing 'dir byon// bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/
222b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi// an da rnyil gyi me tog ni// rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad// bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang // rmad byung
222b5(rgyud): chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis// zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par gyur// 'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags sel// ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs// bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus// 'phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid
222b6(rgyud): do// oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang // thub pa'i ga la de logs su// 'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs// spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus/
222b7(rgyud): nas// rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang // gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i// shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun// phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzum pa'i
223a1(rgyud): mdangs kyis legs so byin// nam mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang // de'i tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi// khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams// sa stengs thams cad gar gyis bkang // g.yas/
223a2(rgyud): brkyang g.yon brgyad bla ga ma dang // zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros// mchong dang byed mchongs dril po dang // rdebs dang btsi ba'i tshul gyis su// bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad// lag pa thal
223a3(rgyud): sbar phye btsums bkyed// sor mo gcig bsnol gcig 'khyud dang // kun bsnol kun 'khyud kun gdangs dang // rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'khyud dang // mes res 'khyud bsgrengs kun bsgreng dang // mnyam gzhag
223a4(rgyud): deng ni mchog gi rgyu// sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs// phyag rgya du ma bgegs stsol mdzad// gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs// ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams// gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya
223a5(rgyud): ba/ snga na med pa'i rig sngags rmad// ngo mtshar byung zhes thos ma thag/ lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas// rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lpags te// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gas/
223a6(rgyud): gang zhig gdong bcu gcig pa yi// rig sngags len cing 'dzin padang // rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed// 'jig rten mgon po spyan ras gzigs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshigs 'di rnams// gang gis yid la byed
223a7(rgyud): pa'am// yang na ji tsam dran yang rung // dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyis sras// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes// rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab// byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin te//
223b1(rgyud): bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs// skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste// bsod napas rnams kyi gter ldan zhing // de yi tshul khrims ral ba med/ mi de skye ba don yod de/ lha gnas dga' gnas spug sa tu/
223b2(rgyud): ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud// 'jig rten 'di yi nang rigs dang // gdon rigs ji snyed yod pa 'am// rig sngags byang stems ma lus pa// de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis// tshangs
223b3(rgyud): pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang // shi ba sems rgyal med par ni// gnas 'bo tshul gyis mtho ris 'jug/ rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang // rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing // rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig
223b4(rgyud): tu// stobs dang mi 'jig kun brnyes te// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas// skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du// 'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing // zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
223b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ lha byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin// bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la// phyag 'tshal phyogs
223b6(rgyud): su 'khod nas ni// gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun// rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon// 'gro ba thugs ba
223b7(rgyud): chen po yis// snying po byin rlabs ldan la gsol// rmad du byung ba'i snying po la// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang // rig pa 'dzin rnams 'thun par dgyes// 'on kyang 'gro mang gzung ba dang // dngos grub
224a1(rgyud): thams cad myur ba dang // snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir// mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyi// byin rlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags// 'dren pa de ring ba shad du gsol// rig sngags te
224a2(rgyud): ma zla ba'i 'od// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sa sprin bral byed// 'gro ba thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // bdag la phan pa'i don slad du// rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral bas// rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du
224a3(rgyud): gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// sdig kun myur sgrol bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las// spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra// rtsa ba'i
224a4(rgyud): rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ne ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM e ka Te bi kA Te/ ni ka Te/ Ti ka Te/ ka Ti ka Te/ ka re Ta
224a5(rgyud): bIr+ya swA hA/ yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun/ rig sngags 'dis ni nges par skyed// khyad par du ni mdze nad la// rtsa las byung ba'i me bzhin no// rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi// sbyor phyin maN+Dal
224a6(rgyud): lham pa brgyad// ba ser skya yi bdud rtsis byugs// yan lag bcu gnyis mgor btsos pa'i// sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas// lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya// cung zad lce la myang bas
224a7(rgyud): ni'adus dus sum brgya drug cu'i chad// nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni// lo gcig dus su rtog ldan 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dpal skyed 'tsha ba zlog pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
224b1(rgyud): zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya// ma hA satwA ya
224b2(rgyud): mar+tha kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsakra warti pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dz+wa la ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+Tha dz+wa la A kaR+Sha ya hrIHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// glo bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir// bdun phrag
224b3(rgyud): sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i// nyung kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad// rang gi lus sa pa yan lag la// mched dang bcas pas gdags par bya// de la yang yang gsol ba gangs// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// khams
224b4(rgyud): gsum dbang du bya ba yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po pad+ma gar dbang gi/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ki te shwa rA ya/
224b5(rgyud): bo d+hi satwa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba satwa bA sa nA gA d+hi ni/ na maHsarba satwa pi sa na/ A ha ra Ni/ na maHsarba satwa bA yo d+ha ra NA ya/ na maHsaM b+ha pra sha ma nA ya/ na maHsarba satwa bo d+hi tsit+ti ka sa ra ka rA ya/
224b6(rgyud): na maHsarbe satwA ban+d+ha ra ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwa pi sa ni/ A ha ra Ni/ na maHsarba an+ta kA ra bi d+ha nA pa kA ra/ na maHsarba bi d+hA d+ha ra rA dza pra sha pra ta ye ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya/ ha sa ha s+ya nAM ya/ na maskr-i tA i daM Ar+ya
224b7(rgyud): a ba lo ki te shwa ra pu Shod gIr+N+Na ri shi bi ba ri dA/ nA ga yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ shAkya brah+ma le ka pA la ya/ biSh+Ta pa he shwa ra/ nA ra ya Na skan da/ ku be ra/ a su ren+d+ra/ mA tri gaH/ na paskr-i ta tra/ badz+ra khu Na sa
225a1(rgyud): rji la/ rji nam la mdzi sa/ mA la d+hi Sh+Tha mi a ba pra ma yo sa ka sa \u0f7f/ sarba bi nA ya ka~M a moH/ sarba wamA d+hiSha / bi nA ya krAn/ 93/ o rul/ nra
225a2(rgyud): gi rul/ sarba bi ga/ sarba zung d+ha nga ni/ prad t-i da/ yan la'i sA wi/ ya thAs ke shAnas/ mthob phra nas/ badz+ra 'u nid+hA tita/ tsa li ba tha pung bal/ brjod ga 'i
225a3(rgyud): mdzuto ga ldan ma/ bkA bar d+da wi d+ha la gas d+ha kan kAr/ sarba bing+ga ba N+DI sha kAr/ pa mA k+ShaN+Di kAr/ brang bo d+hA yam ti/ drug pa gra ma bas dza d+hA dza da yA/ ma rti ma hA
225a4(rgyud): la ho ro dra/ mang/ rek+SharaNI / et+mas si tan ma d+ha / sid d+ha sar+the/ sarba ka ma me/ sid d+hi sidan+te/ de hi daM Ni/ u be sha u be sha/ pra be she ya pra be sha ya/ serba pra he Sh+Ta a pra Ni
225a5(rgyud): d+hun d+hud+ha/ bi d+h+ye bi d+han/ mAHsaH/ pra ma tha bram the/ sarba pa rA tham kr-i rmA rba/ gakho dur mig tsa/ ma shi/ gai grAta/ sA sha Sh+Ta/ bi latsu/ yog a d+hi tsa ra/ ba shIka raH
225a6(rgyud): uts+tsha ne/ tsa ku mo na c-i// mi she sa na kA ra/ nibya.a par br-i sha ka raH/ trA sa met+pa sa ya/ mahA bo d+hi satwa/ rin d+ha ri shan/ sarbad+d+he b+h+yaHsarbe sadz+nyAnA/ rak+Sha ra~Mk+Sha mA ma nud+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+hA a nu dzA ti ma
225a7(rgyud): shob+da/ ku ku rung/ gal TI phaT/ badz+ra TIgs gleng ba par sen pa ce/ me ga cing na ma mdzad shig gags pa min to/ ma tra ya~M tra sa ma/ rjel mi / rje na/ se rbe du 'o nga/
225b1(rgyud): taM tA ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra hoHswa nA ya ha ya grI ba sid+d+hi tu me man+da pa dA ni sA hA/ oM a mr-i tod b+ha bA ya hUM hUM phaT paT swAhA/ na maHsarba satraM sh+tsa sid+d+haM tu me man+da pa da ni swAhA/ gang zhig klus non spyi la ni/
225b2(rgyud): dung gi me tog sngags stong gis// byin gyis brlabs nas gu gul bdug/ lus la grogs na legs par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// thog se med sems dpa'i zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
225b3(rgyud): zhugs// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po thugs rje mi bshol ba'i// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya ma hA satwa ya
225b4(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba b+hI ma tsa ka raM/ sarba ro ga pra sha ma na ka raM/ sarba byA d+hi na b+ha ra ka raM/ aSh+Ta k+Sha Na ba di sa sa te b+h+yaHtA rA sa myaka tA rA/ NaM da sha dig bo d+hi satwe b+h+ya na maHsamya ka saM bud+d+ha
225b5(rgyud): ko Ti nA~M/ a he na ma s+t+rir Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwar shud d+had+hA ra NI ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a grA bi ts+yai ti/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ye/ a mran mdz+wa la sa ti kA ra/ ma hA kA ru dza b+hu ba sa ma~M ta ha ri tu tad+ya thA/ oM dzaH

225b7(rgyud): e h+ye hi/ tsata tsata/ tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ sarba bo d+hi satwa/ pra Ni d+ha na mr-ih+na/ kA ra a nu san+na ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ saM b+hu ba e h+ye hi/ ra la ra la/ ru lu ru lu/ d+hA na bi mok+Sha sa mA d+hi/ sa ma pa
226a1(rgyud): tI b+hi shwa ra a d+hi ti / tsa la tsa la/ tsi si tsi lI/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+ha ba d+hi/ e hi e hrI/ bung dro bung rje/ bud rgyas te sanams rkyen mas rkyen/ yi sne re swA/ sarba ma hA me tri b+hU tA ni paran+d+ha
226a2(rgyud): ma hA ka ru Na me g+ha mA ma sarba rAg ni ba ra yan+tu/ bun brun/ bi bun bi bun/ ma tha mtha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ oMT s+pho Ta s+dza/ e h+ye hi/ mA ma sarba sha pu yaM tu/ karma thi sho d+ha ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA par+Na
226a3(rgyud): nA dA ya/ pad+ma a pA ya sAhA/ shwe ta A dzAM u pa bi d+hA ya swA hA/ ka ru ri Ni swA hA/ shub+h+ra dz+nye swA hA/ tsakra NAM swAhA/ ya me swA hA/ aMd tse bi bud d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM s+tha tshe b+h+yo bud d+he b+h+yaHswAhA/ a du
226a4(rgyud): ba du ke b+h+yo b+ha d+bi sAhA/ bi de ke b+h+yo bAd+hi b+h+yaHsAhA/ be d+ha de b+h+yo b+ha de b+h+yaHsAhA/ swab ni pradz+nye ke b+h+yo b+hede b+h+yaHsAhA/ b+hu mi ai ti ri ka sha tsa re b+h+yo b+h+ra de b+h+yaHsAhA/ tad+ya thA/ au tra Ta tra Ta/ trati tra ti trutra
226a5(rgyud): trutu/ na mA ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarbo a badra be b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ gra sa gra sa swA hA/ ma tha ma the/ pra marba pra mtha/ ha na ha na/ had ha da/ pa tsa pa tsa na ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/
226a6(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ne kA ya/ A dz+nyA ba ya ti swAH/ shing ka ri yis bon lnga// stong du bzlas nas dri chu dang / lhan cig sbyangs la byug pa ni/ lkog nang drag po 'joms par byed// de nas
226a7(rgyud): bcom ldan thub pa ches// rig sngags sdod gtong gzhom pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po de na yod zhags pa yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di
226b1(rgyud): gsungs so// na mas+t+rai ya tA a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi Ne b+h+yaHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud d+ha Ad+ya shA bka saM g+he b+h+yo/ atI ta a nA ga ta pra t+yAta ban+de b+h+yo/ na maHsa myaka ga tA nA~M/ na maHsamyaka pra ti ban+d+ha
226b2(rgyud): nAM/ namaHshA ra dA tI putrA ya ma hA ma ta ya/ na ma Ar+ya mai tra ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta/ shai len+da rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHaHda b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yo d+ha ga bad d+hA
226b3(rgyud): na maHsu bar+t+ta bar+t+ta su pra ti b+hI se bi narti shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsaM ha bi kI Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHAr+ya a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta
226b4(rgyud): ra smAd ga ta shrI k+Sha Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pA sh+tsi ne ta thA gA tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shra b+hu dza ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tsha na dA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya
226b5(rgyud): na maHk+Sha sh+ya pA li ta thAka tA ya/ namaHshAkya sA na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ an te sa phyags bud d+hA sa/ tad+yathA/ oM mu ne mu re ma hA pun ye swAt+ma/ oM sa me sa mai ma hA sa me rak+Sha rak+ShamA~M sarba satwA kr-i sarba pA pa
226b6(rgyud): pra sha ma ne sAh+ma/ na maHsu pa ri kIr+t+ti ta nA ma d+he ya shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta a we b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHan+d+ra ke tu d+hA dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na pra b+hU saM shwa ra dzA ya ta
226b7(rgyud): p+la ga tA ya/ na mo a pra ti hata d+hi Shad+hi rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi kAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaMg+hA ya/ na mo a tI ta an ga ta pra t+yu pan+de b+h+yo bud d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bi ti b+h+yaH
227a1(rgyud): tad+yathA/ smr-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar+Na ni/ d+h+r-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra ti Sh+Than bar+d+ha ni/ sa maN+ya bad+ha ni/ pi pa sh+ya nA wa d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi pak+Shad+harma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ka la bud d+ha d+harma pa ri bA/
227a2(rgyud): raNI ye swAt+ma/ na mo rat+na tra yA sa/ na ma Ar+ya a wa lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA sa ma prAb+hA ye/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yon
227a3(rgyud): mas+thi tA i daM ar+ya a wa lo ki te shwa ra mu khong shwa ra mu khod gIr+N+Na a mo g+ha pA sha rA dza nA ma hI da yaM ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hA Shi taM ma hata par ShaM ma d+h+ye a ha ma dA ni ma brta yi Sh+yA mi sid+h+yAn tu me man+ta pa dAHsar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma

228a1(rgyud): bit+ta pa 'i ru // mas ngal/ mi la~M m+b+hi m+bi/ m+b+has su ma?/ Tatra/ []99/ wi rdo rje/ rbaTu rba zu/ b+hi 9/ b+h+yaHdz+dzar+tha/ e ne s+'uts+tshar+N+Na k+Shata pa ri kar/ e h+ye hi ma hA kArA Ni ka/

228a3(rgyud): Sha yai ni bA sin/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dzI pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dzA si ra si kr-i ta dzA TA mu ku Ta/ ma hA ad b+huta/ ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ d+hAn/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha a pra kam+bA/ ba hu satra
228a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ mi hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Ni bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba dzA dz+nyA na pa ri pU re ka/ sarba b+had+hi pi ri mo tsa ka/ sarba tra A shA ba ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa ma shA sa na ka ra na mo stu sa te swA hA/ oM mo g+ha ya swAhA/
228a5(rgyud): a mo g+ha bA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ye swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA su tAM ya swA hA/ mA ra san+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA swA hA/ a b+hu ya pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dzi yA ya
228a6(rgyud): swA hA/ dzA pA dI dzi yA swAhA/ ba ra d+hA ya swA hA/ bar pA da yA swA hA/ a kA li mr-i tri b+h+r-i sha ma nA ya swA hA/ idany+tsa me karma ku ru nas+yA te sU hA/ oM ra Na ra NA hU~M phaT/ oM dza ya hUM phaT/ oM dz+ra dz+r-i dzA swA hUM/ oM hUM dza sa
228a7(rgyud): swAhA/ oM hrI trai ye kyai ba~M dzaM ya a me g+ha pA~M sha a pra ti hata hriHhrIHhU~M baT sAr+tha/ oM bsu ba te swA hAM/ oM A ro l-i ka swA hA/ oM babu la~M ba gu le swA hA/ oM ai re li kahrIHwi/ hUM phaT swA hA/ ni ya tA a na~M ya ta be da~M ni la a/
228b1(rgyud): tsAn skyem zla nag du u dzom she la k+Sha sa ku ru swA hA/ yo badz+ra basmra sa swAng / oM rung tha rnam sams stuhA/ rabs chang thod par ro bsregs sa// zhungs kar ser po ji chur bcas/ bskyed de bu gus sngags stong /
228b2(rgyud): brjod// 'bras bral ni khri brjod bya// lus la thogs ni byeng ste mas sogs// nad dang gdod rnams myungar du sel// gzhan dag las rnams gang la yang // bdun bdud grangs kyi sngags kyis sbyar// de nas bcom
228b3(rgyud): ldan thub pa ches// ltos 'gro bas ni rang rgyal ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po ha la ha la yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// no mo rat+na tra yA ya
228b4(rgyud): na maHsarba bud d+ha be d+hi satwA ya/ sarba su re shwa rA ya/ na ma Ar ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma brAb+da/ Ar+ya mai tre Ar+ya many+dza shrI/ Ar+ya badz+ra pA Ni a d+hi kaM/ be d+hi satwa ma hA/
228b5(rgyud): sa b+h+yaHa te nA mA/ gri dz+ye/ b+ha ga d+ha~M/ Ar+yA bi lo kI te shwa ra tr-i hrid ya sarba karma bad// sarba gre hwe dz+yod/ nA ka ra/ b+ha ba a ma ra Ni bi nA sheka ba shrI ta/ s+yad yas+t+rai dza ha~M bo ha d+hi satwa ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ pra ya bo d+hi saH/
228b6(rgyud): he hA le Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ pa ra ma me tri tsi ta kA ru Ni ka/ ku ru ku ru/ k+Sha ma g+na ma bi ba~M ga ma bi ya ti/ ma hA bi dza san+ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tsa yaM tra mi tra/ na mo me d+ya d+hi/ sarba satwa b+ha ya/ prang sa
228b7(rgyud): ha ra ha ra/ ha ri b+ha bya nor b+ha/ bA dA bA pra/ thA bA nAg ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru pu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su pra sed+hi/ sa traM ma'i ma la/ pa la pha la/ mUrge/ Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwar
229a1(rgyud): yang par mu kA r+ya Ni ka k+tsiSh+Tadz+nyAn na/ dza na mu ku rba bi la maH/ pA la thA/ tsa le nA le/ ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ ha la ha lA/ galag la ga ta la ta tA/ da lang la/ na lan la
229a2(rgyud): tu lA tu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi l-i/ he bo d+hi satwA/ na ma s+yA nu/ d+huts+tsha n+tu/ hrIHku ru ku ru/ hr-i da ya/ a nu sAr/ sa ma ya a nu sma ra/ i daM mi kar+yaM ku ru / ma nor tha med/ ba ri pUr ya/ sid \u0f7f
229a3(rgyud): me mai tra pa dA ni swA hA/ snga bar khrus byas gos gtsang gyon// bcom ldan spyan sngar nyin re bzhin// bal+lI sa la ma lhung bas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa ni// bcu gsum bzlas byug par bya// lhag mas nad
229a4(rgyud): rnams thams cad la// byugs pa tsam gyis sos par nges// zla ba drug gis bdud rnams zhi// 'dod pa thams cad skongs gyur te// mtshams med lnga byas mis kyang 'grub// gal te 'grub par ma gyur na//
229a5(rgyud): bdag gis mtshams med las byas te// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bsrungs yin// snying rjes snying rje can 'grub 'gyur// sdang bas khros pa 'grub 'gyur te// rtag pa'i gnas 'dod blo gros can// rnam par mi
229a6(rgyud): rtog btang snyoms kyis// 'dod pa kun 'grubazhen pas byin// yid la byed pas 'ching bar 'gyur// se'u po che yi lcug ma la// ro bsregs thal ba khri phrag bdun// bsngags nas gtor bas char ches pa/
229a7(rgyud): char pa myur du 'chang bar byed// dri chug rtsir bcas pas ni// sbrul gyi gdug pa sel bar byed// lto 'phye'i rigs dang spang dgod sogs// 'jigs pa rnams ni 'grib pa'i phyir// de nas bcom ldan thub pa
229b1(rgyud): ches// shes dbu rnam grol zhes bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung Ti/ rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
229b2(rgyud): na ma A r+yA ba lo ke te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na ma Ad+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ana? te sa myaka saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prAd+hA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA/
229b3(rgyud): satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi buM la bi ma la/ su pra ti bu la/ sU r+ya shra ta ya/ sUr+ya sha ta sa ha/ a d+hi ke ra/ oM b+ha ba ti mUr+d+ha ye/ ma hA ma Ni muT kuN+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+hA re Ni/ b+ha ga ba ti pad+ma nA /
229b4(rgyud): sarbe lo ka a pA ya sha ma na ye/ bi bi d+ha mu kha sa ma be sha/ a bi sha sarba swatwe pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ b+hur+N+Na ba swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya/ na ma s+tha mi ra pa dra bi nA sha ka/ rA ga be sha mo hA dz+wa la sha ma ka sha sa ma sha na kA ra/
229b5(rgyud): rak+Sha ka sarba a b+ha ya durga tI pa sha man kA ra/ sarba sa ma sha na kA ra/ sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta saM bi d+ha na ka ra e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ pad+ma a ba lo ka si bud d+ho/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya
229b6(rgyud): dza T+Ta mu ku Ta/ a laM kri ta/ shi ra ma Ni/ ka na ka rA dzA te/ badz+ra be DUR+Ya a laM kri ta sha rI ra a ma ta ta dza na ka ma a laM kri te pra b+hA ra Na sha ta sa ha sra a pi la sha tak+Sha ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra de/ bi da Sha
229b7(rgyud): dam/ bai nAM sha ya bi nA sha ya/ ma hA yan+ta ma kle sha ka pa ta/ a ba bo d+hiH/ be d+hi yaM tra/ g+ha ra tsa ra/ ka pa ma than ka ra/ pu ru Sha pad+me pu ru Sha/ saM rba ra Na/ pu ru Sha si ha/ bi ra bi ra/ dza su tan+ta Da pa ri bri ta/
230a1(rgyud): / ma nas/ masas/ dzan du/ byugs mas tha gas pas/ #/ zar pa / ban+d+ha m+b+ha du/ 1 //
230a2(rgyud): su ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ d+hu nu d+hu nu/ bi d+hu bi d+hu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ga ya ga ya/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ ha sa ha sa/ prA hA sa pra hA sa/ nA ga bi bi d+ha ke sha sa san/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra sa ha ra/
230a3(rgyud): du ru du ru/ ma hA maM ga la ka ra Ni/ sha ta pra se/ ka ba a ba b+hA sa ta bi bi d+ha ba san sha sa ka/ rA ga kA ma ma ha bo d+hi satwa/ b+ha ra b+ha ra swAhA/ thub pa she dang shu dag la// khri phrag bzlas nas 'thungs
230a4(rgyud): pas ni// shes rab chen po 'phel bar byed// nad la mthun pa'i sman dang sbyar// pad+ma'i rtsa ba kA rar bcas// nyi shu gcig gam yang na bdun// sngags brjod snga bar ming bar bya// de yang dbyangs snyan
230a5(rgyud): shes rab 'phrul// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dgongs pa bla med ces bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la stobs zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po rdo rje chen po yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngag
230a6(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra lA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya// bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ne mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsan pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ar+ha te sa myaka saM bud d+hA ya/
230a7(rgyud): sarba Adz+nyA ya/ an+ta kA ra~M/ mA ma yi tra/ tad+ya thA/ oM sA d+ha ni sAd+ha ni/ singad d+hi sid d+he/ sid d+he d+ha ra/ b+ha ga ba te/ pa ba ra/ kle sha zin/ a dz+nyA she Sha ma Ni sha ma ya/ sarba pA pa bi shud d+he/ d+ha ma niH
230b1(rgyud): ma ni/ mA lA dzA go tsa re a paM go tsa ri Ni swa shaM bud+d+hi/ su kha ra pra te/ sarba kle sha da pa ni/ bi d+ha ma ni/ bi da ma ni/ bi nA sha bi nA sha/ bi nA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ pu ra sa bi ma la ba d+hi/ sa ra sa ra/
230b2(rgyud): si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sar bi sa ra/ A dzA ma i ti sa hA swa NAM/ tsit+taM kA rA ma/ a ba ra Na k+Sha pa yA ma ti suM b+hU ta bi sha ya/ pA sha bi da ni bA ra mi tA b+hU dz+nyA na go tsa re/ pA sha sha ba te/
230b3(rgyud): sha sha mA le ni kA ra Na go tsa re/ ma hA dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka ma ti su ba ni sh+tsi ta da d+ha/ he he b+ha ga ba te ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ku ru ku ru/ bi sha d+ha ma ba na/ ma ma sarba satwa b+ho ma hA ka ru No taM sA d+ha ke na/ sany+tsa sany+tsa/
230b4(rgyud): sa brta ya/ saM b+hu la pra ro hA ya pe/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ bi dzi ya pa ri shud d+hA ya/ a mu ka bi ku ru bi dza ya ne/ sa ra sa ra/ me g+ha ga te/ mA pA mA/ bo d+hi tsita taM sa maM bud d+he ma san+d+ha She/ bo d+hi mi ri kA ra Ni/
230b5(rgyud): bud d+ha b+ho d+hi prA de/ na ra ka pre ta tir+ya ka gi tu duHkhaM gu la ni/ de ba ma nuSh+ya ga ti saM bi da ni/ bi ga tai kle sha sarbA nu d+ha d+harma/ pa ri pU ra Ni badz+ra d+harma sid d+h+r-i tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ snga bar langs nas khrus
230b6(rgyud): byas te/ skyil krung mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can// yid kyis phyag 'tshal nyi shu gcig/ rdo rje chos la dad pas brjod/ brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la// gos gsar gyon nas gso sbyong blang // me tog tsan dan dkar
230b7(rgyud): sogs mchod// don grub sdig sel shes rab 'phel// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// bdud rnams 'joms pa rdo rje yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//
231a1(rgyud): kha'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya / tad+ya thA/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ a mi tA thA
231a2(rgyud): ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyag saM bud d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ha ri ha ri/ bi d+ha na d+ha ma ka/ bo d+hi satwA ye/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ i li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ tu le tu le/ ku ru
231a3(rgyud): me ku ru me/ si ri sa ri/ bi si ri/ tsa ra ya/ bi sha re/ g+ho ri/ gan ri/ tra mi Ni/ ma taM gi/ puk+ka si/ ka Ta ya/ mA la tsaN+De li/ hu ru ma li ni/ tsi mi tsau li/ grin sau ma dad+hA ne ku ru/ tsan+tu mu khi/ la b+hU ma Na ya ma te/
231a4(rgyud): Ar+yA dak+Shi Na bud d+he/ sarba bid+d+hA nAM/ mAm pra/ sad+hA ni/ sarba bid+d+hA nAM I shA ri swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA~M/ sarba A bai ri pU ra kAn/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi rI/ hi ra~M hi ri/ shri te pra shwe te/
231a5(rgyud): sarbe pI k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo kA ya kA ru Ni ka/ bo d+hi tsita ta ma na si ku ru ba ya lo kA ya/ ma ma smA ra sma ra/ si man+ta ya pUrbe/ sat+ya a d+hiSh+TaM na kr-i taM te ne sa t+ye na/ sa tsi ba tsi nAM/ sarba ak+Sha me/ pa ri pU ra ya/ bud d+ha
231a6(rgyud): k+She tra me/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma me ka sh+tsaH/ pi he tha nor+tha bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha naM sAhA/ tad+ya thA/ oM dze te dze te/ ma hA dze te dza te/ ma hA dze te yaM/ mA ma kA ya/ dush+tsa ri stam+me b+ha ga dush+tsa ri stam+b+ha ma no dush+tsa ri stam+b+ha/ d+ha ri ta/
231a7(rgyud): dzakam+b+ha/ ta ta sarba k+Sha pa ya/ A lo ka ya/ bi lo ka ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+ha riShA NA~M tsi ma hA bo/ k+Sha ming po da se da d+ha riSh+Tha dz+dza/ ma d+hu ma d+hu/ a ba b+hA sa me d+ha riShA Na/ sarba ma ku sha la a b+hi ba ra da da na maHsarba
231b1(rgyud): ta thA ga tA na na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sma ra pra ti dzA ma hA satwa si d+h+yaM tu me man+ta pa daiHswA hA/ sngags kyi gur kum tsan wan gyi// gro ga la bris sku'i mchod
231b2(rgyud): rten// sku gdung bcas par bzhugs par bya// yang na sku gdung bcas pa yi// spyan ras gzigs dbang sku la gdags// tshes brgyad nas ni \u0f85 yi bar// bum pa mchod pa brgyad bshams te// dri yi kha dog
231b3(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i// 'o thug zho dang 'bras chan mar// tsan dron dkar po dri ga pur// gtor ma dkar dmar bcas pa'o// gtso bo'i mdun du dpe med sa// g.yas su dung can 'jigs sam g.yon// sna ma'i
231b4(rgyud): me tog brgya rtsa brgyad// gtor zhing dus gsum mchod de bkru// sdig sbyangs rmi lam 'od du 'bar// bdud rnams zlog par byed pa la// rtse gsum sor brgyad tshad ldan la// thod pa skam po sor drug ste/
231b5(rgyud): dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa// seng ldeng yu ba khru gang ba// de yi rten yang sor drug ste// de ni zur brgyad ldan pa la// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri lcug kyu mda'// mdung rnams g.yas nas bskor bar
231b6(rgyud): bkod// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod bya ste// mtshan mo sngas su gzugs par bya// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// dug gi tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// rje btsun
231b7(rgyud): mgrin pa sngon po yi// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba le kau te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba ban d+ha nats+tsha da na ka rA
232a1(rgyud): ya/ sar+b+ba pA pa~Ms su dro ts+tshed na ka rA ya/ sarba prad+hi pra sha man ka rA ya/ sarba i d+hu pa dra bi bi nI shan kA rA ya/ sarba b+hi Sha trA nA ya ta s+yan ma s+t+rai ta/ i maM A r+yA ba le ki te shwa raH
232a2(rgyud): nI sa kAr+N+Nan mdzad sa ma bAr+ha siny+tsa mi sarba ar+tha sA d+hA ni/ shra bai dzin/ sarbas dz+nyAn/ bA byA man bi sho ni // taHthA/ a ba lo ga log sa ti/ lag ga ti/ ai h+ye he/ ma hA tsa d+hI sar+b+ba/ gi oM d+hi sit+ta h+ye/ ma hA dz+ren+ti
232a3(rgyud): sa/ oM la po rti sad+ha/ hi ma hA ka ru Ni kA/ sUr dre saM/ e h+ye hi/ AR+tha meb mo ti shwa bar ma me ti tsiH/ du Ni// ku ru ku r+m+ma dz+dza/ sar+b+ba sa s+yA d+hA ya bi d+d+ha/ de ni dzi ma/ a ga mags/
232a4(rgyud): ka mi ha sid d+ha/ yo gai shwa ra/ hu du hu du/ bIn+dan+te ma hA bIrIn+te/ ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ri Ni/ shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma lI ma la mai mut+te/ oMr+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ kriSh+Na dzi na mu kuM Ta laM skr-i ta sha rI ra lam+ba pA laM ba bi lam+b+ha ma hA
232a5(rgyud): s+'ud+d+ha shASh+Thad+har/ bal ba lam thAb la/ ma ma la marnams/ dz+wa la dza lu/ mdzadz+wal/ kr-i sa \u0f89\u0fa4 pa Sha~MSh+Ta hA its+tshatanA~M/ de bad+ma ha stA dza lakAr ti/ ci gyur/ (\u0f7fsarba sa tu yadz+nyo badz+dza/
232a6(rgyud): e h+ye hi wA rA ha puli/ tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na/ ba la rU pa be/ d+ha ra/ haN+Di la kar+N+Na/ he ma hA/ ha la ha la/ bai 'a ni rdzi ta/ lo ka s+ya rA ga bi Sha nA sha na/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha na/ mo hi bi Sha nA sha nra
232a7(rgyud): ni rmok+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa many+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ ha lA ha lA~M/ ma hA pad+ma nA d+ha/ sar sa ra/ si ri si raM/ su ru su ru/ bud+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ta wa nI la kit+t+wa/ e h+ye si nI la kar+N+Na
232b1(rgyud): d+he hi bA ma s+thi ti sa~M ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+tsa muny+tsA ma hA aT+TAn+ta nir+N+Na di ni/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA sid d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra/ ban d+ha ban d+ha bA tsa/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+h+waM/ s+pha ra staM b+ha ga ba~M/ lo ka bi lo kas
232b2(rgyud): ta thA ka tAM/ da dA hi medaR+Sha Ni/ pra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/ sid d+ha ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo gI shwa ra ya swA hA/ nI la kar+N+Na ya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ siM ha mu khA ya swAhA/ ma hA na ra si ha mu ShA
232b3(rgyud): ya swA hA/ sid d+hi bid+ya d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hasta ya swA hA/ badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+re ha sta ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyA ba bI ta ya swAhA/ ma hA kA la muM ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra
232b4(rgyud): A yud+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shaM kha shab+da nir+t+ti da na ka ra yaM swA hA/ b+ho d+hA na ka ra ya swA hA/ b+ha ma skan+d+ha de sha s+thi ta kr-iSh+Ta dzi nA ya swA hA/ b+ha ma hAsta b+hA g+ha tsarma ni ba sa nA ya swAhA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ ma hA lo ke shwa rA ya

232b6(rgyud): me len sbur len dang // shel dang bai DUR+Ya ka ram// gser gyi snod du khur bcas pa// maN+Dal dbus bzhag sngags khri brjod// mug khri rde yi keng bur ni// chur bcas snga dro brdar byas nas// nyi shu rtsa gcig
232b7(rgyud): sngags brjod de// khong du 'thungs pas dbyig dug dang // sbyar du ga lan cig skyes dug dang // bza' nyes tsam yang sel 'gyur na// dug rig gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sogs pas the tsom mi bya'o//
233a1(rgyud): dad can shes rab ldan pa'i mi// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags gang la yang // nan tan rtse gcig tu brjod na// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig dad pa'i lcags kyu dang // blo
233a2(rgyud): yir bar ldan pa la// lhaklu 'bum phrag mthus skyob cing // dkar po dge ba kun slong sems// byang chub rin chen gter thob par// sngags kyi mthus ni mdzad pa ste// sngags la nyes dang med pa la/
233a3(rgyud): bstan na rang nyid nyams par 'gyur// 'phagus pa spyanA ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rdu la pad+ma dra ba zhes bya bralas rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
233a4(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus pa'i dngos// 'jig rten mgon po bcu yi dang // stobs bcu rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can// pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub pa//
233a5(rgyud): sa bcu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu khyab mdzad pa'i// bcu gcig pa yi mtshan nyid yin// bsod nams skal bar ldan pa'i mis// rang gi lus la sngags dgod bya// sngags dang
233a6(rgyud): bcas pa'i lus la ni// sred med bus kyang mi tshugs na// 'jig rten gzhan lta spos ci dgos// byad dang sha za ro langs dang // 'byung po mtshon dang grib gnon dang // lhas ngan rnams ni myur du sel/
233a7(rgyud): bla ma las byung rim pas ni// myur du bla med byang chub 'gyur// bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni// nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// spyi bor yi ge oM dkar po// nan tan du ni bsam par bya// dpral bar yi ge/
233b1(rgyud): a ljang khu// de bzhin du ni bsam par bya// lce yi steng du yi ge mchog/ hrIHyig dmar po 'od ldan bsam// snying gi phyogs su hUM sngon po// lte bar ha yig ser po ste// de bzhin gsang bar ho ljang khu// bshad
233b2(rgyud): ba'i gnas su ho sngon po// pus mo gnyis la sa ser skya// rkang mthil yi ge ha ljang ser// lag mthil gnyis la hUM dkar po// lag ngar la ni hri sngon te// dpung par yi ge hUM bkod bya// yi ge'i tshogs kyis byin
233b3(rgyud): brlabs nas// gang dang gang yang rung ba yi// rtsol ba rnams la 'jug par bya/ rtsol ba de dang de dag kyang // sngags kyi byin rlabs las brtsal zhing // lus kyang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid// sngags kyis bskyed pa'i
233b4(rgyud): lus nyid ni// sngags dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur// sngags kyi lus kyi rigs rnams kyis// zhing khams du ma sbyangs nas kyang // 'gro ba rnams kyi lus su ni// 'gro ba grol ba'i spyod pa ni// kun bzang mchog
233b5(rgyud): dang mtshungs pa ste// 'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur// don de ma lus thob pa'i thabs// ngag gi rig par gyur pa yis// rig 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste// de la gang gnas de yi ming // rig pa 'dzin
233b6(rgyud): pa zhes bya ste// sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes// lhag dang bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni/ shin tu ngal ba nyid yin te// ngal ba nyid kyis gos pa'i lam// bgrod par dka' ba de spangs nas// shin tu bag
233b7(rgyud): yayangs bde ba'i lam// skal dman yang dag sgrub 'di la// nan tan du ni 'jug par bya// ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe// 'khor rnams dga' nas thal sbyar te// mkha' la me tog gtor nas kyang /
234a1(rgyud): mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso// thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te// bskor 'du ma byas nas kyang // gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i// zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la// 'dzum
234a2(rgyud): bzhin du ni bltas nas kyang // gsang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag/ pus btsugs thal mo sbyar byas te// phyogs bcur rang rang bde bar 'khod// de nas 'jig rten mgon pas ni// 'gro ba'i/
234a3(rgyud): don du rig sngags gsungs// bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs phyir// las kyi sbyor ba'ang tha dad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma a r+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA/ byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te
234a4(rgyud): sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ arbad b+h+yaHsamyag saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna mau Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA yaM/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri
234a5(rgyud): d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsA le/ pra tsa laM/ ku su me ku su me/ ba rI i li ma~M li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pan ya swA hA/ shud d+ha ye swA hA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swAhA/ 'di gsungs tshe nu sa chen dag
234a6(rgyud): rnam po drug tu g.yos par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pas// dngos grub ci dang ci 'dod 'grub// gzhan yang sngags pas kun gyi dbur// sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
234a7(rgyud): na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA byA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta prA ga te b+haHar+ha te b+haHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya/
234b1(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra/ i li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ khi le ha la swA hA/ dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug pa'i sa// chu dang gos la bdun bdun brjod// khrus byas gos
234b2(rgyud): gyon nang du 'jug/ snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang // na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra be ro tsa nA/ b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an te/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
234b3(rgyud): ar+had b+haHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ha ra ha ra swAh+ma/ bdun phrag re re btab pa yis/ spos bsregs/
234b4(rgyud): pa dang mar me sbar// na mo rat+ne tra yA ya/ na maM Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byA he rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyAka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHar+ha te b+h+yaHsaM myaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba/
234b5(rgyud): lo ki te shwa rA ya// bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si d+hi ri si d+hi ri swA hA/ me tog byug spos me tog 'phreng // bdun bdun brjed la sku gzugs la// gtor
234b6(rgyud): dang byug dang gdag par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa nA b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te/ samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsamyag saM bud d+ha b+h+yaH
234b7(rgyud): na ma Ar+yA ba lo kyi te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM swa d+he sA d+ha/ so hi so hi/ so du so du/ ba shos gtsang me tog 'bras bur bcas// nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas/
235a1(rgyud): ni// zhal zas rnams kyis rnam par mchod// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA gar bai ro tsan brA ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ An te sa myaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te d+hA
235a2(rgyud): and b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ do d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru NaM kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa mA d+hi si/ tse le tsa le/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru sAhA/ ma hoH/
235a3(rgyud): dkar po'i shing dum bu// sum cu bzhi mar sbrang rtsi ra ni// zhag gcig spangs nas nyin gcig gam// nang re nub par re re la// sngags re btab nas bsregs nas gzod// ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs na
235a4(rgyud): 'grub// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA gar be ro tsan d+yu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+d+ha te/ samyAka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te/
235a5(rgyud): shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM i li mi li/ bi li ti li/ tsi li ti li swA hA/ chu 'amathal ba yungs kar la/ lan bdun bsngags nas phyogs bzhir gau tor/
235a6(rgyud): sa phyogs nye ring gang du yang // mtshams gcod pa yi mchog lags so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sAM ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba
235a7(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+had b+h+yaHsa myaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hAM kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thAM/ oM bi ti bi ti/ ti Te ti Te/ be de be de/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+he ga bAn/ AR+YA
235b1(rgyud): ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba sar+b+ba naM swAhA/ sku sogs slar yang spyan drangs dang // rang nyid gnas nas ldog don phyir// chu la lan bdun btab pa yis// bkrus na dgos pa de dag 'grub// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
235b2(rgyud): na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHarbad b+h+yaHsamyaka saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
235b3(rgyud): ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re hUM hrIHhoH/ 'jig rten 'pho la rab dga' bas// zas skom byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che si// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/
235b4(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// mgon po zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i// rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hu ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa myaka
235b5(rgyud): si prad+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHarbad b+h+yaHsamyaka sa~M bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na ma sarba b+hU ha b+hi hi sarba a haM bud d+ho pra sa ke/
235b6(rgyud): saM g+he b+h+yo/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dzA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na b+hU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ ar+had b+h+yaHsamya ka saM bud d+ho b+h+yoH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA
235b7(rgyud): ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a b+ha ya d+ha na/ sarba pa ta g+ha ra tA na ka raM/ sarba Ar+yA ya ga pany+tsa pra sha ma na ka ra/ sarba bi shud d+ha/ kA la hi g+hA ba hA/ bi gra hA/ pra ma Na ka ra/ sarba pA pa nA/
236a1(rgyud): sha ya ka ra~M/ sarba b+hud btal/ bi sha ma d+he na/ dud swa d+ha na/ dur+Na mi tAM/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kAn/ bo d+hi satwA ka raM/ ba ra tsakra/ dur b+hek+Sha/ sha ke b+ha ya ni sa ra ka raM/ sA d+hi pa/ na ga
236a2(rgyud): yak+Sha/ kan d+harma/ a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin+da ra/ ma ho ra keHsarba ts+tshe da ka ra/ sarba bi shU tse ke Da b+ha/ su k+Sha d+ha g+had+ha/ krats+tsha ka li re pe Da li/ maM ga la/ binA shA kA ra ya / na mo nA thA ma hA ka ru Na/ a ka da sha
236a3(rgyud): mu kha swa/ tA sab+hu dze swAhA/ swe nA Da~M/ taHthA/ oM dza ka ri/ su dr-i hr-i ri ni bi tsi tra muSh+NI/ ai kA swa mu khA/ sarba sag+hA ma hA rA Ni dza mut+te/ sa ha swa b+hu dza ma hA ni d+ha~M/ mai hA shrI ni na laM kA ra/ ma Ni kur+N+Na ya san t+te/
236a4(rgyud): tsit+ta mU la d+ha ra/ tsan+na suMr+ya/ a ti ra ke A ka sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/ maM ga la she ri dzI mu te be bit+ta pI Na maM ga laM/ b+hu ri mi tra kA ra Ne/ tsu ru tsu ru/ she ta pA te/ mu ru mu rushat+te a ba nata te/ hu ru hu ru/
236a5(rgyud): b+ha poSh+Ti mu khi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsi tra mu khi/ A daM d+ya pA sha pa ra Ni ni/ dzi b+ha ni/ maM g+ha d+ha ni/ sarba pA Ni ni/ sarba par+ya ri b+h+re/ ma hA ni/ a mo g+hA pA sha hasta/ sar+b+ba b+hA ya pi tsa ye ni ra tsa di/ ag+na bi shwa/ u draka/
236a6(rgyud): pA me / prA ga ma na~M/ ka khi rad ni/ dAn/ oM hi ri hi ri/ dza ya ka ri/ ba la ka ri/ d+ha na ka ri/ te tsa sa ka rI/ b+hi badz+dzi/ pra sha ma ni/ yun+da na~M pa ra tsakra sha ma Ni ni pa ra s+ya/ bi na ni mu do tatA ra ni pra b+ha na \u0f7f
236a7(rgyud): la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA mA Ni/ ma Ni d+ha re/ tre lo ka A laM ka ka ri ti pUH ka re/ tri pAr+Na ga ra bi das ni/ bar d+hed/ pi ta tra pA Ni ni/ sarba bir+ya karma ti/ su da~MN/ sarba byang+ga d+hi ni/ pra sha ma
236b1(rgyud): byam pa smra/ ma mdan/ bol ba yistan/ sems sa smra/ r+b+ba d+hi nA~M wA/ sur+b+ba shA sa rdzu A/ smyo/
236b2(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa muny+tsa yai/ pra shrA ma ya pra shAM ma ya/ yu d+hod d+hA ra Ni swAhA/ tsit+ta nIr mA la ka ri phaT/ a sur narA ki ti ta phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/
236b3(rgyud): ti ri phaT/ sa ha swa ne tre phaT/ sarba b+ha dra d+ha ra na ma/ tre te phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mok+Sha Ni phaT/ ma ra tsakra na pa ra Ni phaT/ pa ra saM mya si grub pa Ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka ma si du ni phaT/ sarba b+hU d+hi pra sha ma Ni phaT/
236b4(rgyud): sarba b+hu d+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/ sarba gra hotats+tshin+di na phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ sarba bud d+ha be d+hi satwA nAM/ sa ba ra sa pa ra/ naM te tsa sha ri sa ma nAM/ sarba pra ya pra ti b+h+yaHsarba yut+te b+h+yaHdus+t+ri te b+h+yaHsarba trit+ta ka kho ra da/ sarba be she b+h+yaH
236b5(rgyud): sarba kA ya bAk+ShI ta te si tsi b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha mA sUh+ma/ sa ha sra b+hu dze/ sa ha sra ne tra e ke da sha mu khi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+waM tu me man+ta pa dA ni sAr+tha/
236b6(rgyud): rje btsun zhal ni bcu gcig pa'i// sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te// gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du// yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs// 'chang de klog par byed pa de// mtha' yas yon tan rnyed par
236b7(rgyud): 'gyur// nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang // khyad par du ni sdig kun 'byang // ba dkar me yi bdud rtsi lngas// maN+Dal 'jam po lnga byugs la// gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus su ni// shing sku ring
237a1(rgyud): bsrel ldan pa gzhag// gzhan yang ring bsrel ldan pa yi// sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te// tshad ldan pa yi bum pa ni// lnga po dbus dang mtshams su ste// rigs lnga'i mdog/
237a2(rgyud): dang phyag rgya can// sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang // srad bu thA dad bre bar bya// ci 'dod phyag rgya bris byas te// tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// 'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod de// bzhi khri rdzogs
237a3(rgyud): nas bco lnga la// 'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byas nas// ci 'dod myur du grub pa dang // bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang // rnam par 'tshe dang mi mthun pa// khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur// sngags
237a4(rgyud): brjod yon tan mtha' yas rnams// bsdus nas sgrub po la ldan 'gyur// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang // gshis ngan shi ba bco lnga med// skyes bzang
237a5(rgyud): bco lnga thob par 'gyur// mu ke rgyal po'i chud pa dang // dug dang mtshon dang g.yul 'gyed dang // stag sogs sbrul sogs gcan gzan gdug/ dug can zas dang me chus 'chi// srog chags bdun dang nyal
237a6(rgyud): nyes dang // g.yeng byed dang ni lha 'dres gtses// gsor mi rung dang bdag lce ba rnams// de la nam yang mi 'jigs so// rgyal po chos ldan yul skye zhing // 'phags pa bzhugs dang dus bzang yul/
237a7(rgyud): bshes gnyen bzang dang dbang po tshang // dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan// bran khol bzang ni nor mangs rtag/ gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor// sems bder 'jig rten skyong bas srung // /
237b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhal mthong don zab brtags// gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed// snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang // yon tan dran nas spro ba dang // dkon gachog gsum la dad pa dang /
237b2(rgyud): phul dul 'byung ba'i blo yis 'phel// tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang // bka' lung sde snod dang ba rnams// yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur// ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na// sngags 'di rang
237b3(rgyud): bzhin med par byas// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ 'dzin pa drag po'i blo byung tshe// sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA ra badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ gang gis lus ngag
237b4(rgyud): yid g.yon// sngags 'dis brtan par byin gyi brlabs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya dkri t+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ gang la gnod yod sems ldan dang // ngang gis sa gzhi 'gags yod pa// bsal
237b5(rgyud): phyir seng ldeng dkar po ni// brag las skyes shing gzhon pa las// sor drug tshad ldan phur phu ni// brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can// mgo bo rkeng pa rgya bdud tshul// sor tshad phyed phyed ldan pa la// zur ni bcu
237b6(rgyud): drug rked pa la// sor gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o// sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba// dpal mtho cung zad par reg pa// ngos dang skabs ni zab pa ste// sngags kyi byin rlabs ldan pa brgyad// khang
237b7(rgyud): pa'i zur dang phyogs bzhi per// g.yas su phyogs pa gzugs par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsan b+hu 'dzu ya/ na maHsarba ta thAg tA AHte b+h+yaHsa myaka sa~M bud+d+hA ya/
238a1(rgyud): na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na ma sh+tsa N+Da badz+ra kro d+hA ya / hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+hu ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/
238a2(rgyud): patsa ba tsa/ a mr-i te hUM phaT/ lhas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang // gnas khang byin gyis brlab pa dang // tshe dang longs spyod rtag pa dang // dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang // dang po thal mo sbyar
238a3(rgyud): byas te// phyis ni lag g.yon sdig mdzub bcas// oM dang a la la la ho// zhes ni brjod cing khang pa yi// nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas// de nas hUM sgras se go la gtogs// de nas oM AHbadz+ra dang /
238a4(rgyud): s+thA na pa Ni b+h+yaHa haM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT brjod// shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la ni// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis gnas// bsrangs te mig ni sna rtse ra phab// dal ba'i rlung ldan dkan la ni// lce yis cung zad reg/
238a5(rgyud): per bya// lte ba cung zad 'byam pa yis// sems ni bag yod gnas par bya// rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min// gtsang ba ma yin mi gtsang min// bde ba ma yin sdug bsngal min// bdag dang ngar min bdag/
238a6(rgyud): med min// blang dang dor ba'i 'jigs tshogs min// sems ma yin zhing sems byung min// phung khams skye mched med ma yin// yid min rtag mi chad pa min// mun pa ma yin shes rab min//
238a7(rgyud): 'gro min 'ong min gnas ma yin// sna tshogs sprin glog du ma ni// 'dod gzugs du ma sbyar byed pa// mkha'o byung nam mkha' la ni thim// 'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul ba// med mod na yang de ltar spyod//
238b1(rgyud): yul gyis ma skyes dbang po min// dus kyis ma yin gtun gyis min// rgyu dang de bzhin rten gyis min// gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med// de la sems pa'i sems srid kyang // gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi/
238b2(rgyud): gnas// gar yang ma song brtags na stong // brtag par byed pa rtog pa tsam// dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste// kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la// rten nas rang gi sems bzung na// drod kyi bzhi pa dang /
238b3(rgyud): bor gzung // phyung ba'i gnyis pa de la brtan// de la dang po gnyis pas bskor// dang po'i bco lngas mnan pa ste// bcu drug pa ni grogs su gzhag/ yi ge drug la grub pa ni// sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin
238b4(rgyud): te// 'od zer rnam pa drug dang bcas// rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas// yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug/ yul drug dag gi dbang byas nas// nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas// nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur/
238b5(rgyud): ba yin// phung po rnam pa drug dang ldan// phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni// yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur// yan lag rdzogs pa'i grib mas ni// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed// sgrib gnyis go bas/
238b6(rgyud): 'brug po ni// gsal ka'i ri bo dang bcas pa// rtag chad gnas su bzhugs pa'o// srog rtsol bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur// rtsol dang bral nas dga' skye ste// yi ge la ni sems
238b7(rgyud): gnas 'gyur// yi ge gsal ba'i da ze de/ spu'i khung rnams thams cad nas// sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste/ slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni// yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigs so// 'dzin pa de
239a1(rgyud): sa sos nas byung // myu rnas pa rjes dran bya// de sa gos na kyi 'dzin no// nyams pa med bzong par 'gyur// ting 'dzin deg na gyu nas ni// us 'di 'i ris pa 'dzi/
239a2(rgyud): bathog// rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni// dri maung byang chub de thob 'gyur// skad cig de la rdos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang // mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod// rten ni spyan ras
239a3(rgyud): gzigs dbang ste// lus ni 'phags pa lang ma dpal lo// yan lag phyag na rdo rje mAM// mgo dang thong ni mjam pa// gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid// nyi Ta kun tu bzang po ste// sar+b+ba me chung nas
239a4(rgyud): mkha' dang // rnam shes nyid dang bcas pa'o// thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste// bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir// stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya// sems klong bas ni nges par 'gyul/
239a5(rgyud): 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// dus ni rtag pa ma yin te// mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas// dus la tha dad mo rtog go// nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang // nam mkha'i phyogs ni ji lta bar
239a6(rgyud): sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya// gzhan ni go skabs mi 'byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra bi zhes bya ba las// thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i
239a7(rgyud): le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas drang srong gnas nas ni// sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba// bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' rig 'dzin zhig / rgya cher/
239b1(rgyud): rang gi 'khor bcas la// dkyil 'khor drung ngu lhags nas ni// rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni// ston pa la ni 'di skad
239b2(rgyud): gsol// oM/ mtha' yas spros la her zhi zhing // zhi mdzad du ni rab spyod mdzes// rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtog yongs zhugs// ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// zhi las zhi 'gyur mtha' 'byung ba/
239b3(rgyud): chos rnams kun mchog zhi chos che// spros med las spros dkar bcu bya// mtha' yas chos la phyag 'tshal lo// grol gyur grol mdzad dag pa che// dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon// tshogs rdzogs
239b4(rgyud): tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal// tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo// rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan// 'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o// rtag pa don chen rtag zhugs la// mgon po
239b5(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// khams gsum bag chags kyis dkrugs pa// thibs pa'i ling tog zhugs pa rnams// mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang // sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'// mngon
239b6(rgyud): sum med la rjod bral yang // lkog tu gyur pa smos ci dgos// lkog don mngon du byed pa la// phyag rgya dang ni 'dra' bag mchog/ mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang // don la sems kyi gsal ba skye//
239b7(rgyud): don gang yang yang goms pa las// sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste// bde gsal mi rtog the 'bras bu// sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa dang // blo dman rnams kyi 'jug pa dang // 'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang //
240a1(rgyud): non po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur phyir// gzugs parnyan byung tshul bshad du gsol// myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang / myur du byang chub cher 'gyur zhing // gzugs brnyan dge ba'i
240a2(rgyud): tshul 'byung can// 'dren pas de ring bshad du gsol// mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la// mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar// rnam rtog gi dkrugs sems la ni// su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur//
240a3(rgyud): dmigs pa'i mtshan ma gsal byed pa// gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste// legs par 'gyur ba'i ying 'jug cing // byin rlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gtses/
240a4(rgyud): ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas ni// gzugs brnyan dag pa'i tshul byung ba// nga las mnyan par brtson pa ni// legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog/ rig 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs// rtse gcig sems
240a5(rgyud): kyis mnyan nas kyang // legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog/ khyod la yang dag bshad bya ba// byin rlabs dgyes pa'i gzugs brnyan dang // tshon gyis ris su bris pa 'am// rin chen rigs sams rje/
240a6(rgyud): 'am// shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags// dang po'i las can sems can la// dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang // byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur// tsan dan dkar po gsal zhing drang // gzhon/
240a7(rgyud): shing chag gas med pa la// bas shing dud pas bdugs nas ni// dad ldan dang tshul bzang bas bzhag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku// bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la// gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste/
240b1(rgyud): rgyab yol sor chang drug gis bskyed// bzhengs te ldem bgarnams dga' ba// rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis brgyan// g.yas kyi dang po bgrang 'phreng ste// gnyis pa mi 'jig stsol ba'i phyag/ gson/
240b2(rgyud): pa dang po bad+ma dmar// gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs thogs// zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig la// mdun gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can// byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs// dkar po dkar ser/
240b3(rgyud): dmar skya'o// g.yon gyi gsum ni khro za'i zhol// sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste// dmar dang dmar ser le brgan no// kams su gtum pa'i khron la gsum// sngo dang ser dang ljang khru'o// rgyab tu khro
240b4(rgyud): gtum mdog dmar ba// rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal// khro ba'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs// mig gsum dbu skra ser po ni// gyen du thor tsugs bcings pa'o// steng du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal// b+hu ru bcag
240b5(rgyud): pa'i mtshon 'dra ba'i// dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su// 'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams// re re bzhin du bzhugs par bya// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang // rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang // lag rgyan sen/
240b6(rgyud): mdor bcas pa// do shal rkang gdubs rags can// rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas brgyan// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ris ma dag la dga' gyur nas// yid gzungs dal spyod khro ba med// sred chung shes/
240b7(rgyud): rab snying rje che// thabs ldan ri mo chung la mkhas// bsam pa bzang ldan tshul khrims bsrungs// 'dri chos bzo la gzungs pa yis// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri// gzugs bzang yid dal
241a1(rgyud): gtsang ldan pa'i// bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni// tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o// 'thas par bcags te 'jam bor bya// thig gi phyogs cha bshang nas kyang // ser s+ya
241a2(rgyud): tshon gyis gzugs brnyan ni// tshad lamakhas patshad ldan pa'i// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// dkar po wa yi shes yin te// dmar po sems rtsol le khrilo// sngon po rams dang mthing shing ste// ser po bzla dag
241a3(rgyud): pa yi// nag po snag tsha nyid yin te// ljang khur mas dang ldong ros sbyar// yang na spang ma nyid kyis byas// spug rtsi rams dang skyegs sbyar te// gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya// sbyin
241a4(rgyud): dang bral na grub par 'gyur// shing sbyin ser dang ka pi ta// lo mi ta dang than dza ra// de dag so sor sbyar ba yis// gsal zhing dkrugs med dag par byed// a ta pas ni snun par byed// gan to ha sa ni
241a5(rgyud): rtag par 'gyur// rgyas par gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa// yang na sgo gcig pa yang drung // dkyil 'khor cha rim gsum pa 'am// yang na gnyis sam gsum yang rung // dbus su gdong ni bcu gcig ni// mdzes
241a6(rgyud): pa'i lha mo bani ldan bri// sharang spyan ras gzigs dbang gi// dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso bo can// de yang spyan sogs lha mo ba'i// phyag bzhi pa dang bcas pa'o// lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/
241a7(rgyud): dkyi 'khor gag zub gtso bo can// sngags kya gags pa lcags sngos dang // 'dengs pa'i phyag rgya ldan po// nu tu rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// sems dpa' bani bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje dpang
241b1(rgyud): mo sang // mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste// gsas su rdo rje dang la 'byung ngo // chub tu rdo rje dpag med de// g.yon du rdo rje don grub bo// shar dul mo spyan ma ni// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'o// g.yas su rdo
241b2(rgyud): rgyal po'o// rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste// g.yon du rdo rje legs pa'o// lhor ni lha mo mA pra kI// mdun du rdo rje rin chen no// g.yas su rdo rje ni ma ste// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan no// g.yon du rdo rje bcad
241b3(rgyud): ba yin// nub tu na bza' dkar mo yang // mdun du rdo rje chos yin te// g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin// rgyab tu rdo rje rgyu zhes pa// g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o// byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang // mdun du rdo rje las yin/
241b4(rgyud): te// g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o// rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te// g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro// 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams// kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste// g.yas kyi dang po rang rigs rtags/
241b5(rgyud): gnyis pa thams cad skyabs sbyin te// g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang // phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i// sngags nor 'phreng yang 'chang ba'o// 'khor gyi lha mo de dag
241b6(rgyud): kun// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yon pa'i tham bum pa 'chang // lhag mgong ltar shes par bya// byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang // khro mo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o// dbus su rdo rje hUM byed de/
241b7(rgyud): sngon po ut+pal yi mdog/ mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste// g.yas su rdo rje drag mo'o// rgyab tu rdo rje brjed byed pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo// shar gyi 'khor lo'i chartsibs la// khre zo gshin rje
242a1(rgyud): gshed po nag/ mdun du rdo rje dbang zhal ma// g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jug mo// rgyab tu rdo rje gzhon nu ma// g.yon du rdo rje skul byed ma// 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni gnyis pa la// khro bo gzhan
242a2(rgyud): gyis mi thub ser/ mdun du rdo rjeganag byed mo// g.yas su rdo rje me chen mo// rgyab tu rje thab mo// g.yon du rdo rje rnon pos// rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug gtor gser// rdo rje khro mkhrag 'byung mo// rdo rje rung
242a3(rgyud): 'dzin chen po dang / rdo rje sdang byed mor bcas pa'o// nub kyi rtsigs la rta mgrin dmar/ mdun du rdo rje rmongs byed so// g.yas su rdo rje'i ba mo// g.yon du rdo rje tshol byed ma// lnga pa'i rtsibasal de bzhin du/
242a4(rgyud): khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ldang // mdun du rdo rje gser byed ma// g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo ste// rgyab tu rdo rjer langs pa// g.yor du rdo rje rengs byed ma// rtsibs drug 'khor ler bri ba ni/
242a5(rgyud): rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ldeng sngo// mdun du rdo rje chu dbang po// g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ma'o// rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo dag/ g.yon du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug/ de ltar rdo rje khro bo che mo rnams/
242a6(rgyud): kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o// rje bo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu bkang // g.yas na btson kha T+wAM dang // tho bo rdo rje rgya gram dang // 'khor lo gtun shing rdo rje rnams// rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang
242a7(rgyud): ba'o// ga yon na sdigs mdzub nags pa'o// kun kyang stag gi sham thabs can// khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// g.yas na kri gu cang te ste// g.yon na thong khrag 'adz+r-i // zhing lpags dag gi chos
242b1(rgyud): gos te// gzig gi pags pa sham thabs can// khro bo'i g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs// de rgya ba cha yi snam bu la// phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' ba ni// phyogs
242b2(rgyud): rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'i tshul// de bzhin sgo bzhir sems ma mchog/ lcags kyu zhags pa ljags sgrog dang // 'bebs pa rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas/
242b3(rgyud): gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma dang // gnyis pa dar gyi chos gos so// kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan par bri// de rjeb dkyil 'khor cha la ni// shar du brgya byin glang
242b4(rgyud): chen gzhon// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste// gnyis pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can/ g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste// gnyis pa rang mdog 'phreng ba bri// de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser// ngang pa'i khril
242b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa la// g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma 'chang // me phyogs su ni me lnga ste// mdog dmar ra zhon me dpung 'dzin// lho yi phyogs su gshin rje sngo// thod dbyug bzung ba ma he zhon// bden bral du ni srin
242b6(rgyud): po gnag/ rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon// nub tu chu lha dkar po ni// klu yi khri la sbrul zhags bzung // de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar// bum pa bzung sde rus sbal zhon// lha mir phyogs su rlung
242b7(rgyud): snga ldang // ba dan bzung ste sha ba zher// byang du gdang sbyin mi la zhon// ljang nig phyag na gter sbom mo// byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni// rtse gsum bzung ste khyu mchogazhon// sgo banir rgyal po chen
243a1(rgyud): khro bzhi// phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can// pi wang ral gri zhags pa can// rin che nu dbyug to g.yas kyis 'chang // gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste// g.yon pa pad+ma bgrang 'phreng ni/
243a2(rgyud): phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o// kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog/ rim bzhin stag gzig dom seng ge'i// khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa rgyan// rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni// srung brtson shin tu 'grus
243a3(rgyud): pa'o// kyil 'khor cha brgya khor yug tu// bza' shing me tog spos shing dang // mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshal gseb tu// mdzes pa'i bya tshogs dud 'gro dang // lha yi bu dang bu mo sogs// de bzhin klu dang gnod
243a4(rgyud): sbyin dang // dri za grul bum bu mo'o// rol mo byed pa du ma bri// 'di ltar dang na la las ni// 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang rol du// gza' dang rgyu skar sum cu drug/ rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri// smin drug pad+ma dmar po
243a5(rgyud): 'chang // snar ma yis ni mgo ut+pal// nab so pad dkar laka tri shU la// rgyal ni bgrang 'phreng skeg sbrul nag/ mchu ni pad sar gre mnyam gzhag/ me bzhi pad dkar da bo dbyug pa// nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras//
243a6(rgyud): sa ga po ti lha mtshams bum// snron ni rdo rje sgrub dbyug ste// chu stong ril ba chu smad pad// byi bzhin gser gyi 'khor lo ste// gro bzhin chu skyogs mon gru dang // mon gre shel sgong khrums stod kyis
243a7(rgyud): ral gri khrums smad ku pu da// nam grub dani tha skar gyis// shing lo bre nye dbyug sran no// zla ba ku mud dkar po ste// nyi ma pad+ma dmar po'o// mig dmar me yi phung po ste// gza' lhag ut+pal sngon po'o//
243b1(rgyud): zur bus chos kyi glegs bam mo// bawa sangs ni bgrang 'phyeng bzung // spen pa lag na ral gri 'chang // smag can bdud rtsi'i gnong bu'o// nang gi grwa yi char gtogs pa// bkra shis lha mo brgyad yin te/
243b2(rgyud): rtag dka' ma dang rgyal ma shang // don grub ma dang mi 'jam lhor// nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma// myur grub ma dang gtan ma byang // rtse lnga rtse gsum rdo rje dang // sngon po ser po rin chen dang // dkur dang dam
243b3(rgyud): dang ut+pal dang // ut+pal sngo dang ku bud// dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang // skyabs sbyin pad+ma bgrang 'phreng ni// lhag ma rnams kyis rim bzhin 'chang // de dag thams cad phyogs mdog go/ rgyas
243b4(rgyud): pa'i spros pas skyon yang // lnga bcu brgyad dam sum cu bdun // nyi shu dgu 'am nyi shu lnga// bco lnga dgu 'am lnga 'am gcig/ yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs// sprul pa'i sku yi cho 'phrul te// rang gis
243b5(rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa yi// sems kyi byin rlabs nyid du 'gyur// bde gshegs sku dang po ti dang // phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya// nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni// bkrus dang bshig nas dag byed pa/
243b6(rgyud): rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su// de la bsod nams dpag tu med// gzugs tshogs sngo bas sman 'gyur yang // de yis bsod nams mtho ba yas thob// 'phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba// de bzhin
243b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de// de bzhin nyid de stong pa nyid// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang // mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'o// sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni// yi ge brda'
244a1(rgyud): dang spros pa'i sku// longs sku bsod nams rgyu mthun 'bras// sprul sku las kyi rnam smin 'bras// kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan// dag dang mdag sbrul ldan la// khade gshegs/
244a2(rgyud): 'phrin las gzugs sku gnyis// tshogs gnyis la ni sku gsum byung // rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong // lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min// dmigs med nam mkha'i khams rtog pa/
244a3(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku'o// rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel ni// skye 'gag med par thugs chung pas// yid kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis// bsam gtan goms pas shes par bya// dad pa'i lcags kyu
244a4(rgyud): shes rab can// lha klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i sems dge ba// kun slong byang chub gtar gyi rin chen nor// thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung // sems kyi dbus su gces phyir da la spyod
244a5(rgyud): pas// dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad par du// pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gis brgyan par// myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams// bsdus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su bya// bla ma'i lung
244a6(rgyud): yod snying rje gang ldan pa// rgyal dang rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas// 'jig rten skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra/
244a7(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba las// gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas dga' ldan gnas 'khrungs pa// bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa// rig pa gsum ldan lha yi
244b1(rgyud): g+hu mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsos pa// sman ras gzigs la cher dad nas// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas shing // 'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas// mgrin gcig tu ni 'di skad gsol//
244b2(rgyud): oM// dbras gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso// 'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// sa gsum ye shes 'od po che// bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ rig
244b3(rgyud): ldan pade ldan byin rlabs can// g.yung drung rtag pa dam chos gtso// kun rtogs sel skyob phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras gzigs// byang chub sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal// bya ba
244b4(rgyud): byas nas bskal par gnas// pang 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi// thugs rje ye shes las byung ba'i// rig sngags 'phreng ba byin rlabs can// mgon po spyan
244b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang gis// sems can rnams la phan don phyir// phyag rgya 'phrin las ldan par gsungs// las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing // nyon mongs bdag rgyal gyis bcings nas// le lo ser sna'i
244b6(rgyud): 'dam rdzab can// khur dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams// myur du grol bar bya ba dang // thugs rje zhim bkram byas te// srid 'dam skum po bskam pa dang // myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir/
244b7(rgyud): lha dang gsang sngags blang ba dang // 'phrin las sbyor ba ldan pa dang // brgyud pa rgyun gzhan med pa yi// sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad du gsol// rig sngags rjes gnang med po ni// bsgrubs kyang
245a1(rgyud): 'bras med ngal ba ste// 'dren pa med pa'i shing rta ni// 'khor lo bzang yang gang du phyin// nyon mongs rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir// rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs// bdag
245a2(rgyud): 'dzin go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung // sdug bsngal mtsho skam nyi ma che// kun rtog rdul phung sreg pa'i me// shes rab me tog 'khrung ba'i rlan// nad ngan kun sel sman mchog ste// bag tshogs spel ba'i skyeng
245a3(rgyud): med bu// bgra chags bkru ba'i chu rgyun te// longs spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid// 'khor ba la rgal gru gzings te// nyes pa kun sel rlung dang mtshungs// de nas bcom ldan thub pa che// mgon po rdzogs
245a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas chen gyis// sgrub 'jam ring ba'i ljags bkram nas// tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsungs// 'gro la thugs rje chen po yis// sngags 'byung brgyad pa'i rim 'byung ba'i// cho ga
