245a5(rgyud): dam pa nyan brtson pa// shin tu legs so lha yi bu// nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogs su// sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor ltar// pad+ma'i gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni/ tshon snam lus rnams kyis
245a6(rgyud): brigri// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rig pa'i lha me khro bor bcas// 'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i// sku'am phyag rgya bkod pa dang // mchod
245a7(rgyud): pa'i tshogs kyang dgram par bya// mar me yon chab byug spos dri// zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang // gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang na bza' lgab lbub dang // sil snyan me tog 'gre
245b1(rgyud): du ma// srid 'ong mdzes pa'i tshig gis brgyan// slob ma gus pas bla ma la// yon phul brtson byas 'di skad gsol// sems can kun gyi sems kyi gnyen// dmus long lam log las 'dren pa//
245b2(rgyud): rab rib sel ba'i thur ma can// bdag la 'dren pa'i sgrol ma sogs// shes rab snying rje skye ba can// thos bsdam sgom pa'i gru gzings can// las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i// thabs brtson mnyan//
245b3(rgyud): pa khyod phyag 'tshal// byang chub lam mthong dpag yas thugs// 'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs pa// dge brtson dge la bskul ba'o// dge bcu med pa dag la stsol// dam tshig sdom gnas dang
245b4(rgyud): tshul bzang // bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba med// chos don gnyer ba'i don sgrub bo// skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol// dpa' brtan zhi dul sprad pa yi// dga' slad slob dpon 'di
245b5(rgyud): skad brjod// oM/ gti mug rnam dge bde gshegs thugs// rnam par snang mdzad skyebs su mchi// zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje thugs// mi bskyed pa la skyabs su mchi// ser sna
245b6(rgyud): rnam dag longs spyod gter// rin chen mdangs ldan skyabs su mchi// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i gsung // 'od dpag med la skyabs su mchi// phrag dag rnam dag 'phrin las rgyal// don yod
245b7(rgyud): rdo rje skyabs su mchi// A/ gnas med mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa// chos dbyings chos la skyabs su mchi// skye med skye snang ltar sgrub chos// 'phags lam brgyad la skyabs su mchi// don gcig chogs
246a1(rgyud): lam bcu gnyis grangs// gsung rab yan lag skyabs su mchi// rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so sor rtogs// nyan thos dge 'dun skyabs su mchi// gcig gam tshogs spyod rngu//
246a2(rgyud): 'phrul che// rang rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi// snying rje shes rab byang chub 'brel// sems chen tshogs la skyabs su mchi// gsod dang rku rdzu na 'khrig spyod dang // tshig rtsu ba phra ma ngag 'khyal dang /
246a3(rgyud): brnab sems gnod sems log lnga spyod// thar pa'i srog gcod bcu po spongs// chang 'thung til mar 'tshir las dang // mgar dang rgya skyegs rtswa shing gcod/ srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlu ma
246a4(rgyud): 'tshong // mtho ris lus kyi gegs chen spong // rtags dang phyag rgya 'dra 'bag dang // rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa'i yo byad sogs// 'gom dang bshig pa gtan du
246a5(rgyud): spang // mchod pa rnying dang sgrog pa dang // 'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang // sha dang dman pa'i lag gi zas// srog chags yod pa'i chu rnams spongs// de nas bzung ste ji srid pa// byang chub snying
246a6(rgyud): por thug bar du// sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang // dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims sogs// nam du mi dor brtan por gzung // lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing //
246a7(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gzung // 'grel zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs// chos kyi sbyin pa ci 'byor stsa la// theg gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams// mi 'gal sbyor bas rgyun du spyad// lus ngag yid dang longs
246b1(rgyud): spyod bcas// ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod// lha dang lha min gsang ba ba'i// rigs 'byung su gsung thugs kyi rgya// des slong dam tshig dam pa rnams// sdom tshul brtan po gzung bar bya
246b2(rgyud): 'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang // yi dgas rnams la gtor ma sbyin// dzam+b+ha la ni chu yis mchod// yi dgas dag kyang chus mnyes bya// de rjes slob ma rab dga' nas// ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod/
246b3(rgyud): dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs// snying brtses bdag la gzigs nas kyang // lha dang sngags dang byin brlabs thabs// de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs
246b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa'i// nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che// yid bzhin lo dra spyod char du 'bab// khang chen der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/
246b5(rgyud): spros bral dmigs su med pa'i don// lam chen bdag la stsal du gsol// de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa// de nyid bcu sbyar mkhas pa pos// g.yon pas chos gos rtse bzung ste/
246b6(rgyud): leg pa g.yas chos phyag rgya can// gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i 'od mdangs rgyas// dang ldan pa ni 'di skad brjed// oM/ bro shog theg pa chen po yi// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin phyir/
246b7(rgyud): gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams// khyod la nges par bstan par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas
247a1(rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes rnams// shAkya seng ge dpa' bos kyang // gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med kyis// bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung chen dag kyang 'dis/
247a2(rgyud): bcom mo// 'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir// 'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das// de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di bye shig/ sngags dang rdzas kyi bsrung ba dang / lha yi
247a3(rgyud): rten mig de la mchod// u dur ba rA'i me tog ltar// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag/ brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang na mi 'byung ngo // sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni/
247a4(rgyud): de bas kyang ni ches dkon te// gang gis tshul min sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig/ gang la sdig khur ci yod pa// lha yi dkyil 'khor
247a5(rgyud): mthong ba dang // byin brlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas// blo gros dri ma med pa yis// spyod tshul brlabs bzhugs nas lha// ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcad nas// mtshan ldan sku ni gzhan don
247a6(rgyud): spyod// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mtshungs med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pas// bdag nyid chen po khyod rnams ni// gang du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir// de nas khyed
247a7(rgyud): rnams theg chen rigs// sha stag tu ni skye nges te// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba// dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di// gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang // bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur//
247b1(rgyud): de bas spos brtson par gyis// slong ma ku sha drage ba yi// stan la nyal nAs rmi lam 'dri// bsang dang sbyang ba byas nas kyang // rgyas bkrus 'di rnams bklags pa dang // bkra shis du ma bkrugu byas te/
247b2(rgyud): gdong ba dar gyis bcings nus kyang // 'bras kyi metog 'phreng ba ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor dbus su dor// slar blangs mgo la bcing bya ste// bad+ma ldar rigs mtshan gyis brgyan// mig phye la
247b3(rgyud): lha rnams dang // byang chub phyogs chos mtshan ma yi// yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba// mchod rten lha tshogs bcas pa gdan// yid ches dang ba mngon byas la// ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa
247b4(rgyud): bya// de nas dgu pa'i sras de lnga// mar me la ni mar me ltar// 'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya// brjod pa dang bcas 'brel pa yi// rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying tshogs// sngags kyang gsal bar sbyin
247b5(rgyud): par bya// zhi ba shel gyi 'phreng ba ste// rgyas pa la ni a ru ra// dbang la lung thung dmar po shis// drag po ra'am ru rag sha/ bo de tses ni las kun byed// sngags bcas btsal nas mgo la bcing // hUM dang
247b6(rgyud): bcas pa'i rdo rje yang // lag pa g.yas su gzhag par bya// stod g.yogs kr-iSh+Na sa ri ste// smad g.yogs kha de sngon po'o// dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// zhal zas snod ni pad+mas brgya na// sems can
247b7(rgyud): kun don spyod pa'i rdzas// thub pas bkra shis bzhed pa'i rtags// gdugs nya bum pa dpal be'u dang // rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad+ma stsal// nad sal bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir// 'dod yon phyogs
248a1(rgyud): rigs grub pa'i rdzas// gi wang dur ba li khyi no// bil ba sbrang rtsi A ru ra// kar wI rA'i 'bras bu rnams// hrIHzhes dag pas stsal bar bya// gur ku ma gA pur gla rtsi dang /
248a2(rgyud): ba yi 'o ma sbyar byas nas// tshig 'di lce la gzhag par bya// oM/ yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang // ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang // dri ba lan sngon spobs pa rig/ phyi nang mtshan nyid don
248a3(rgyud): rig shog badz+ra d+harma pra ba sha oM bcas brjod cing lce la ni// lan gsum rdo rje gzhag par bya// hrI/ yi ge dmar po me 'bar bsam// gang la goms pa de 'byung zhing // goms pa gzhan
248a4(rgyud): gyi dbang med na/ rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad pa'i phyir// kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad// dmigs pa'i rten gyi sngags la yang // byin rlabs tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur// sa la dbang bskur thob
248a5(rgyud): 'dod pas// phyag na 'khor le 'chang la dmigs// ting 'dzin brtan la rdo rje ste// dpal thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs// gzugs bzang 'dod pas pad+ma ste// spobs pa 'dod pas ral
248a6(rgyud): gri'o// gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste// rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur// shes rab 'dod pas glegs bam mo// khang bzang gis ni mi'i rgyal po// thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam//
248a7(rgyud): thal sbyar bas ni 'gro bas bkur// 'khar gsil byams dang snying rje skye// lcags kyus 'jig rten skyong bas srung // rin chen ze'u 'brus lce bder 'gyur// dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur//
248b1(rgyud): babyung 'phreng gis ni lung bstan 'thob// khri rlung gis ni nye dbang 'gyur// lha sogs gdug pa dung yin te// mdung rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma dmang pos lha ru s+ye// rIm/
248b2(rgyud): baspyi thugs tshangs ris skye// sprin mdog lngas ni drang skyong skye// me long gis ni lhag la mthong // pad+ma dwags ye shes ste// pad+ma sngon pos dag pa'i zhing // pad+ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel// ri bos
248b3(rgyud): bu dang bu mo 'phel// dgra stos bdud kyi bar chod sel// 'khor dang sems mthun 'bring g+ha ras// phub kyis dgra dang gcan gzan 'joms// rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag/ me tog snyems nang
248b4(rgyud): sel byed// rin chen mangs ni yid 'ong grogs// gzhus ni nor dang go 'phang rnyed// chu shel dug dang tsha rig sel// mi 'jigs spyan gyis 'jigs skrag 'joms// dgra la rdo rje gtun shing ste/
248b5(rgyud): rdo rje nag po bdud 'dul 'gyur// rin chen ral gris rig sngags bzlog/ lto ba na la lhung bzed de// rims nad sel byed zhags pa'o// 'bru 'dod pas ni 'bru'i snye ma// nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen
248b6(rgyud): phug/ yang na lung bstan 'dod pas ni// mgo la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya// mngon par shes pa lnga 'dod na// sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya// de nas mgon pa spyan ras gzigs// 'dzum
248b7(rgyud): pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma'i zhal// sa yi snying po la gzigs nas// sa yi go rims 'di gsungs so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni// gsang sngags thams cad sa bdun te/ gsang sngags sa dang
249a1(rgyud): sngags sbyangs// rig 'changs dang rigs gsasas// rigs mchogs dang rigs chenas// b+hag rgya chen po'i sa rnams so// gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas sa
249a2(rgyud): gnas skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs// kun tu 'od dang pad+ma'i spyan// yi ge 'khor le tshogs chen sa// rdor 'chang ye shes bla ma'i sa// rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'i sa// sa yi snying pos
249a3(rgyud): gsol pa// mgon po 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ byin rlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i btson ra nas// klu phyugs 'bum phrag drung ltar dge ba kun sdong gis// byang
249a4(rgyud): chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las// byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
249a5(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// rab dga'i tshul du 'thungs pa'i na// ting dzin sangs pazhes byab// nogs pa rgya tshe zab pa zhig/ 'khor dang bcas pa banings byas te// megosarin chen
249a6(rgyud): rigs byung ba// ston pa'i phyogs smra char bzhin phab// mkha' la gdugs kyi zla re bkang // 'khor dang bcas pa mgrin gcig tu// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang /
249a7(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i// rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir// bdag dang sems can kun tu yang // dngos grub 'byung rim bshad du gsol// lal
249b1(rgyud): g.yeng bar gyur pa yis// bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyi// sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chang byed 'gyur// sngan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye// gdams ngag med pas 'gro bsdus// dngos grub
249b2(rgyud): med pas bsten pa gcig/ sred pas lan cig sogs par 'gyur// gnyis pa dmyal tshegs ngan 'gror 'gro/ la la las kyi skye mched s+ho// dbang po rtem pa dmar gyur la// gdam ngag rlung tshul
249b3(rgyud): yod mod kyi// chos tshul bzhin du spyod byed cing // gang la dbang du bzung ba yi// bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur nas// sdang ba 'phel nas rtsod par 'gyur// des kyang gnyis ka dmyal sogs 'gro
249b4(rgyud): la la thos chung shes rab dman// rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can// bstan pa dang ni 'chang byed la// skyon smod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro// la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen gyis// log
249b5(rgyud): lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can// yang dag lam spod brtson pa dor// log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro// la la bsam med sngags brjod med// mar me bdug spros gtor ma sogs/
249b6(rgyud): 'byung pos bsla te bdag nyid dang // 'khor bcas tshe thung longs spyod 'grib// la la 'dod sred gtum rdeb che// mkhas gzhan dag la phrag dog gis// sgo skur tshul 'tshos chos la smod// rang nyid
249b7(rgyud): lta ngan sgrub la rtsod// ther zug blo yi mun pa can// 'byung po drag po'i rigs su ste// la la sar sna rang 'jug pas// lha dang bra ma tshig gis bstod// zas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang // me tog
250a1(rgyud): bdug spos gtor ma sogs// nyung du mus tshul rgyun stsol na// zas s+hom dag gis gdungs pa yi// yi dgas dman pa'i rigs su ni// yang nas yang du skye bar nges// de phyir
250a2(rgyud): de dag spangs nas ni// ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas// tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis// gtan la phab don ma 'khrul bar// rjod cing yid la byed pa dang // the tsom med par brtson
250a3(rgyud): byed pas// 'gro tshogs sgrol byed thabs thob na// rang don 'ba' zhig smos ci dgos// de nas lag na rdo rje gtso// ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skus// 'gro la snying brtser rab gzigs nas/
250a4(rgyud): gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsungs// nga las mnyan par brtson byed pa// shin tu legs so lha yi bu// lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i// ting 'dzin nga yis bshad par bya// khyod nyid
250a5(rgyud): rtse gcig yid kyis ni// legs par nyon la yid la zung // shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i// dam chos thob pa shin tu dka'// rgyun chang meng pa'i thugs rje can// sprin ras gzigs
250a6(rgyud): dbang mgon po gtso// rang gi sems la bskyed par bya// shin tugs lan dngos grub 'gyur// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa yi ge'i byang chub sems// gsum pa sgo btags
250a7(rgyud): ming tshogs sems// bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems// lnga pa byin brlabs rgyas 'dabs sems// sgra dang brag cha'i tshul 'byung bar // gtso bo'i 'khor gyi khyad par gsol// dbus su yi ge/
250b1(rgyud): oM la ste// shar du hUM ste lhor ni swA// nub tu hrIHyig byang duhA// rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed// lha ni gang du 'pho 'gyur bas// dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung yin// rigs kyi phyag rgya
250b2(rgyud): de nyid kyis// rigs pa rigs kyi phyag rgyas 'debs// rigs kyi sna tshogs po mo rnams// nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis su// phan tshun du ni bltas nas gnas// ldem bgran bza' 'phyang
250b3(rgyud): 'phrul dang // 'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs// du ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste// la la ldem bzhengs bsgyings dang bcas// la la rdo rje skyil krung bcas// la la pad+ma'i skyil krung ste/
250b4(rgyud): la la sems dpa'i skyil krung can// la la khro stabs brkyang bskum can// la la zhal phyag zhabs kyang mang // la la zhabs ni gnyis yin te// la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis// la la pad sdong
250b5(rgyud): pad+ma can// la la pad+ma mi 'jigs phyag/ guN de bum pa lab dro gsil dang // rnga ya baM legs so skyabs sbyin phyag/ rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang // 'khar rnga shing rje rdza rnga rung // zangs lcags rdo dang rus/
250b6(rgyud): pa'i rnga// ring zlum rked nyeg leb phyal che// chu 'phra sbom yang dog pa dang // ral gri chu gri gri rings dang // gri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang // sta zur sta leb phyal sta dang // sta chung gzhogs ste 'bigs sta
250b7(rgyud): dang // zlum ste 'phreng ste gzhar sna dang // mdung dang rtse gsum 'phen mdung dang // 'khor lo kha dz+ra gtun shing sgyogs// snyi ma tig bu me tog dang // sdong bu lo 'dab yal ga dang // ba dan pad gdugs
251a1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan spangs// rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom// 'khor lo glegs bam ut+pal go/ de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas// phyag rgya stong sbed tshang ba 'am// brgya rtsa
251a2(rgyud): brgyad dam bzhi bcu drug/ nyi shu gnyis sum bcu gnyis drug/ bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung // phyag rgya bcings ldan phyag rgya ste// des ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed// goms
251a3(rgyud): pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che// seng ge'i sgra ni seng ge zhon// rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshul can// rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag/ pad+ma sdong bcas ral gri 'bar// dpa' bo'i lcags
251a4(rgyud): klu thos pa ni// nung pa bdun gyis cha gnas pa// gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma// g.yon du klu yi dbang phyug mo// pad+me dang ni zla ba'i steng // phyogs mdog sems dpa'i skyil krung can// yid bzhin
251a5(rgyud): nor bu rta la bcibs// zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang // rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag/ skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can// 'khor ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ste// mdog bzang sgeg
251a6(rgyud): pa'i lha mo ni// yid myur rin chen bzang mo dang // pad rgyal mo dang rta rna mo// rin chen pad+ma zla nyi la// 'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du'o// pad+mo 'byung gnas rdza bya zhon// zhal gcig phyag ba'i ldem
251a7(rgyud): bag can// pad+ma skyabs sbyin lcags kyu dang // ril ba spyi blugs phyag na 'chang // sgeg mo'i phreng ma glu garam// pad zla sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo // mi bskyod pa ni mkha' lding bcibs// ral gri
251b1(rgyud): bdU ma da' gcu dang // skyabs sbyin grang ba'i bum pa thogs// bzang 'dzin ma dang rnas spangs ma// sa spangs ma dang rab brtan mo// de dag gong gi cha byang mtshungs// don yong grags pa klu stengs bathas/
251b2(rgyud): rin po che dang zhags pa dang // skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o// seng ge mo dang glang po mo// rta gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan ma// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la'o// ha la ha la rus sbal stengs// rdo rje dril bu
251b3(rgyud): skyabs sbyin dang // chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o// nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od ma// chu dbang ma dang nor 'phreng mo// dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o// mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung che// chu srin steng du rol
251b4(rgyud): po'i tshul// Da ma ru dang bgrang 'phreng dang // mi 'jig phyag dang lcags sgrog go/ lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma// gsang ba mo dang ring bsrel mo// glang gsor rdo rje chos dbang phyug/ chos kyi 'khor lo
251b5(rgyud): chos 'chang bya// skyabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas// dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma// sil snyan ma rnams pad zlar ni// phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o// rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni/
251b6(rgyud): ha ri ha rI zhon// zhol gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la// 'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang // pad dkar bgrang 'phreng skyabs sbyin dang // bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa 'chang // mkha' lding gdong ma
251b7(rgyud): shA ra'i gdong // nyin la blagal lha mo'o// mgrin sngo dga' bo nyi dga' ste// zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang // po ti skyabs sbyin bgrang 'phreng phyag/ seng ge'i gdong mo klu zhal mo//
252a1(rgyud): dga' byed mo dang srog byed mo// pad byung sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo // dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig/ gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo// sngags srung ba dang grub srungs ma//
252a2(rgyud): kong ltar cha byad phyogs mdog go// phyogs bzhir 'khor lo'i cha la ni// gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas// shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni// thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug/ rdo rje phyag rgya
252a3(rgyud): gter sgrom can// kun kyang pad+ma b+hA ba la'o// lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste// grub chen dbang phyug dang pa gzhal// grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang // gru 'dzin dbang phyug ces bya'o// nub
252a4(rgyud): tu pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni// skyes bu seng ge'i zhal dang ni// pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag/ rtse bran rgyas mdzad ces bya'o// byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang // 'khor lo 'chang dang stag lpags
252a5(rgyud): 'chang // kun grub dbang phyug sgra dung 'phel// phyogs drang phyogs kyi mdog can no// 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang // rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po// kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams// bstan la
252a6(rgyud): dga' ba dgod par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du// rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa// bskal pa bzang po 'dir 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas stong yang dgod par bya// de ltar rgyas
252a7(rgyud): par spros pa ni// lha rnams grangs ni rgya che bar// tshig stong nyis brgya bzhi cu 'dun// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha// mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi// lnga grangs dkyil 'khor
252b1(rgyud): bkod pa'o// spyar ras gzibs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu/ 'jig rten dbang gi dkyil 'khor la// rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rdo rje the ba'i dkyil 'khor bdun// dkyil 'khor de dag re re la
252b2(rgyud): sems kyi pha la 'khor lha ma ste// rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga// rgyu 'bras tshul du rnam pa dgu/ ye shes chal lnga yin te/ chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal// gang gang mos pa de dang de'i
252b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am// gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas// khams gsum rgyal por longs spyod che// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur// gtsang sbra
252b4(rgyud): che zhing dang sems can// rtse gcig sgrub la nan tan rtsol// blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod// ngag snyan ngang gis khro ba med// g.yo sgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med// lus ngag dal zhing thos pa
252b5(rgyud): mang // nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med// gtong phod snying rje drag ldan pas// spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas// de yi snying po rtsa sngags la// bar chad med pas rab brjod nas// gzhan
252b6(rgyud): la phan phyir smon lam brjod// spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe// khro bo chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// de dag myur du sel byed shog/ sman ras gzigs
252b7(rgyud): mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang la nad rims gang byung tshe// gso dpyad sman dang sman par ni// bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// mu ge'i nang
253a1(rgyud): du 'byung 'gyur tshe// phyogs gcig nas ni rnam g.yos nas// zas skom rgyun chad med par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// gang du 'khrug pa che 'byung tshe// rang
253a2(rgyud): dbang gis ni sems gyur nas// bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gcig la gcig za dang // zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe// de dag
253a3(rgyud): sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// yi dgas zas skom gdungs pa dang // log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe// nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shogaspyan ras
253a4(rgyud): gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang // shes rab gru dang ldan nas kyang // thabs kyi sdug bsngal grol bar shogag spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo//
253a5(rgyud): tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag/ mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'dzeg/ 'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang //
253a6(rgyud): der phyin de rnams zad pa yi// gnyen po so sor 'byung bar shog/ spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo// dmyal rnams tsha grang bcad gtubs tshe// go cha che dang bsil grib dang // drod kyi 'od du
253a7(rgyud): 'gyur bar shog/ rig sngags yang yang brjod pa yis// yang dag lem nyid rtogs par shog/ kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni// sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog/ mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas//
253b1(rgyud): 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas/ dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir// sgrub pa la ni brtson par bya// zla ba dgar/
253b2(rgyud): po'i tshes gcig nas// khrus byas gos gsar gyon byas nas// sku gzugs bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas// smyung bar gnas nas nyin gcig la// dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod
253b3(rgyud): cing ci 'byor mchod par bya// tshes brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni// dben par gdan khri bzang po la// sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas gzhag/ bza' btung mngar bas sbags par mchod// a karu
253b4(rgyud): drang du ru ka/ bdug pa rgyan du bsreg par bya// 'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing // zhag gsum bzlas pa tsi nus bya// de nas zhag gsum bar du bdag/ 'o ma zho dang 'bras chan 'tshal// lha la mchod pa
253b5(rgyud): cher bskyed nas// byang chub shing drung stong rtswa brgyad// du ru ka yi mar du spangs// dum bu re re sngags re dang // byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bsregs// sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo// steng nul
253b6(rgyud): nas ni snyan pa'i sgra// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// khyed ni nan tan brtson 'grus can// 'dod dman don gnyer gang yin pa// mkha' la 'phur ram rkang mgyogs sam// drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la//
253b7(rgyud): bdag dang skal mnyam 'dod na yang // de ring nyid du stsal bar bgyi// bco lnga'i tshes la sku gzugs te// bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi// mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs// gso sbyong blangs nas
254a1(rgyud): smyung ba yis// srang petog ma gyurd/ sngags brjod pas skul brdeg/ de tshes dun nas rtsa ba nas/ 'brug sa chen po/ bu 'byung / sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'jug
254a2(rgyud): de tshe bdag nyid mi skrag par// sngags bsgrub rjes su dran bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa la// bdag nyid gus
254a3(rgyud): pas phyag 'tshal lo// bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ mgon skyab ster gnas gyur nas kyang // 'gro bkun gyi 'i 'dod rnams// tshul bzhin du ni nong bar shog/ de tshe 'dod pa sdu
254a4(rgyud): bal/ lha klu tshogs kyis bar chad med// sngags kyi 'dod don kun grub yin// bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo// phyag 'tshal rten la skor ba dang // mchod rten rtsig cing dkyil
254a5(rgyud): 'khor ni// rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas// bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir// rgyun chad med par brtson pa na// dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni// de dag myur du 'byung
254a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad// gang la dge spyod g.yel ba yis// le lo can ni bdud bzung nas// gya tshom smra zhing chos la smod// bstan pa 'jig par
254a7(rgyud): byed par gyur// de phyir dmangs rigs gdol pa can// log spyod can ni ring du song // ser sna la lo nga rgyal can// bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni// bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam
254b1(rgyud): pa/ zhugs dang slar la gtang bar bya// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//
254b2(rgyud): de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs// sngags brjod tsam gyis bsal bar bu shad// nad gdon gang dang gang la yang // sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la// rang gi rtse gcig sems kyis bzla/
254b3(rgyud): dang po snying rjer bcas pa yi// sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol// de tshe mchod la brtson par bya// smon nad nyin re ldang ba dang // nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa// nyin bzhi nyin bdun//
254b4(rgyud): ldang ba'i rims// 'byung po mkha' 'gro sha za 'am// smyo byed brjed byed lus srul po// 'dre gdon drag pos bgyis mod kyang // brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur// yang na srad bu kha dog lnga/
254b5(rgyud): mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags// khan mthobasagra pa yi// sgrib kun zhi zhing byang gyur na// bgegs sogs nad lta smos ci dgos// bde brlabs
254b6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab bo// skrangs dang 'bras kyi 'phreng ba dang // shu ba phol mig rma mdze dang // me dpal lhog pa g.yan la sogs// ma rungs pa yi nad rnams dang // ral gri mda' mdang la sogs pa/
254b7(rgyud): myos sam de yis nyen pa dang // sbrul dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang // bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa'i// gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang // brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod// yang na so sor 'jim
255a1(rgyud): pas byug/ de yis nad las grol bar nges// bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi// gzhogs gcig phyogs su nud langs sam// rna ba 'on nam sna bsubs na// brgya rtsa brgyad
255a2(rgyud): du bzlas pa'am// 'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang // lan bdun brjod nas bsku byug dang // zos shing rna ba snar byugs na// sos par 'gyur bar the tsom med// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// nyi 'od kyis kyang rig/
255a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang // bsrung dang lam 'gro bskyab pa'i phyir// byin rlabs ldan pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs// na mo bud+d+ha ya gu ra be/ na mo d+harmA ya tA yi ne/ na maHsig+hA ya ma hA te/ tri b+h+yo pi sA hA nA ma/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di
255a4(rgyud): brjod pas// sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams ni// lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing // rtag tu sems dga' dam pa 'thob// byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od kyang // bsrung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs// /
255a5(rgyud): sha ma ta he ru sha ho/ A dz+nyA pa tre/ su ru te/ shaM ki Te/ ba ra mA byA te/ su ru te/ kA la Ta te khi ma te swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ nA sar btags na nad sel 'gyur//
255a6(rgyud): gzhan yang yon tan grangs med 'thob// sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la// bdun bzlas rmakhar btib na sos// seng ldeng stag gzig dom dred kyi// pags la nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags// brjod nas
255a7(rgyud): thakhrims can la bskon// de ma thag tu rims sel 'gyur// glo bur gdon gyis nyen pa la// lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug/ ldong ros yungs kar lan tshwa dkar// sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa
255b1(rgyud): gcis brjod smad pa'id ltungag sanas bdugs na/ 'byung po'i thos kyin las zol / sil mA nang nga du tu bcos// byugs pas gnogs nang nand dang / 'grus myur du ses par bye//
255b2(rgyud): sa N+DI ma ngas bya// tis par lte bar bskus pa yis// myur du bu rlon 'gyur bar nges// snyim du shis rngon par ngasau// du ruka dang sa myong sbyar// snying nang drug pa sel bar gyur
255b3(rgyud): ba rog mo mi dzin gyis// rma la glan nu mes smyig sos// srin bu ring mo snying la thA// rta dkar gcin la khyor gang 'thung // des ni srog chags bud par babyung // 'bras la rams kyi lom
255b4(rgyud): yi/ khu ba bskol bas byugs par bya// bong bu'i rtug pa gsar pa btsir// nyal kar mig tu blug na sos// mtshan mo spangs la srud dkar ro// de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgya
255b5(rgyud): rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar// dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal// phug ron re lo ma nyi shu brgyad// bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang // shing sgrog la sogs grol
255b6(rgyud): bar nges// thal ba'am bye ma la ni sngags// stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol// gdon dang yams nang zlog pa la// dri bzangs chu la bzlas nas bkru// bud med du 'dod don du ni// stong bzlas pa
255b7(rgyud): mar btung bar bya// khyi ba sbrul dang rus sbal sha/ phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rangs// mar ga ni dang shu dag dang // lga dang ge stong sbrang rtsi sbyar// sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel
256a1(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba li ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ khA hi dzA hi/ ba li te swAhA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA/
256a2(rgyud): a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA yi/ tad+ha thA/ oM pad+me phu/ ma hA pad+mi phu/ pad+ma mo ts+yai ne phu/ a mo g+ha be te/ na mo a dotaH kutA ye/ sa ra sa ra/ kats+tsha gats+tsha/ i ma
256a3(rgyud): makI ro ga nA sha ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas nas kyang // thal bas mig ni phyi rol bskus// mig nA du thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun// sngags bdun bzlas pas
256a4(rgyud): rna ba yi// nad rnams thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// gur kum kar cha mnyam pas// sna yind ni sel bar byed// a ru ra yi phye ma dang // sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pas ni// so yi nad dang
256a5(rgyud): lU yi nang / thams cad 'joms par shes par bya// oM hUM shA~M trU~M shuk+She phu// nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla// 'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel// nu mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma ur+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/
256a6(rgyud): bi d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+na she/ ma hA tsat+ta/ a su ra marta ka/ dz+wA la dzA sa/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hu ru d+hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ hi na ha na/ sarba dz+wa ren+d+ra ka/ ban d+he na/ mA ra ya mA
256a7(rgyud): raya sa ma gyisaH/ sngags 'di mtshas gyis bris nas kyang // mgul du brtags na nang rnams sel// gnan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis// las rnams de dang de la sbyar/
256b1(rgyud): spang ba srin bu sgras s+hos pa// gsan pa shu bkren la// sAng rtsi pi bi mang gi rdzu// gang shing brtson du zhugs pa la/ \u0f7f gcig bzlas pa la/ tsan dan lde gus pa ra
256b2(rgyud): glang gi mig na sel pa la// shing mngar chu'am smos chu'am// nga la ga mi bungs bya// nA ba la ni ti la mar gyis// gzhan gyi mi gegs la ba dang // 'thab ma ga shegs kyi
256b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i // bum pa'i chu lis gdong pa bkru/ gang yang byis pa srung bani// seng ldeng phu bu sor bzhi la// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // don yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag/ stong rtsa
256b4(rgyud): brgyad du bzlas btags na// tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod// ba lang rwa dang po so 'chal// shing kun dang sbrul lpags pa dang // ras bal sa bon grung po dang // de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis// nas/
256b5(rgyud): kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i sgra// byi la'i rtug pa bra ha ti// shug pa bya rog sgo nga dang // ba lang rmig pa na le sham// da du ra dang lhan cig sbyar// de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis// pags rnams
256b6(rgyud): sel phyir ru tra yi// dud pa bcu drug ces bya ba'i// pu shel tsi dang ba bla dang // btsan dug gi ni sbrul shun gyis// bdugs na rims nad thams cad sel// nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed//
256b7(rgyud): ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni// so ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab// yi ge hrI yis byin brlabs nas// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni// dug dang rims nad sel bar byed//
257a1(rgyud): skyer ba bskol ba'i bu bar ni// som nga'i bye ma sbyar// ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshang // yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags brjod nas/ khros pa tsam gyis dug rig rnams// zos kyang
257a2(rgyud): lus la gnod pa med// 'o mar lung ba sran cig bskol// so mar dathugs te blung // so so chang lag la'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad sngags grangs tshang ga/ brjod de blung na skyugs nas ni// dug gis tshugs
257a3(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// khyim gyi dud pa rgya mtsha dang // skye du dmar rtsa lo mar bcas// phye ma mar gsar spang rtsi bcas// dben po'i rtsa ba'i sngags// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya// sbrul nad thams cad
257a4(rgyud): sel bar byed// shu dag ru rta a ka ru// yung ba bong dkar po rnams// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye// byugs pas dug nad thams cad sel// rgya mtshwa srang gang mar srang gnyis// gcin
257a5(rgyud): srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol// rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs// dug nad thams cad sel bar byed// rgya mtsha tshwa gsum mar srang bzhi// sbyar te mi bshol sngags brjod nas// byugs nas
257a6(rgyud): reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel// ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis// lci mtshwa myang tshwa sbar bcas la// gar dbang sngags dang chu yis btung // dug nang thams cad sel bar byed//
257a7(rgyud): ser po gnyis dang sdong ros dang // go thal gur kum le brgan rtsi// pad+ma rgyan lung sngags kyis btung // dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed// gang la gza' dang rgyu nar gyis// 'tshe ba byung na
257b1(rgyud): de bas la byig// pad+ma 'ad ba brgyad maN+Dal gyi// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dbus rnams su// mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni// mtha' lding gzigs su 'gyur ba la// spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu
257b2(rgyud): gcig gis// gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod// nyi ma thu ba lag 'dzin pa'i// khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs// mnan pa'i mkha' lding mig sman mdog/ nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs/
257b3(rgyud): mig gsum ldan pa brjid pa'i lus// rin chen lnga yi sder gshog can// rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas// nyi ma bye bas brgyan pa'i 'od// snying khar nyi ma 'od 'bar la// gaM yig nag po sngags kyis
257b4(rgyud): bskul// spu rnams gzings kyis gyur nas kyang // phyogs bcur rdo rje khyab par 'phro// gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te// gdon dang klu rnams bsreg par byas// thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags//
257b5(rgyud): 'breg sgra lte bur gsal bar brjod// gang yang grangs med stong phrag ni// lus rnams thams cad stegs 'dis 'grub// mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus// klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya/
257b6(rgyud): de la mgrin pa sngon po yi// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas ni// sa stengs gtum pa klu yi gdon// du ma nges par sel bar byed// klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsregs// 'grel
257b7(rgyud): mdzen gtong bar byed// mnga' lding dmar po sbru le 'am/ me tog zod pa kha rdeg pa g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pan// ral gri me 'ong 'bar ba 'chang // mgon po seng ge'i sgras
258a1(rgyud): bskul nas// dpa' rlabs bskal pa'i me dang mnyam// sbrul dang rin chen dbyug to can// mkha' lding sha ba'i gdon la ni// mgon po ha ri'i sngags kyis bsgru ba// sa@
258a2(rgyud): bgro'i gdon la mkha' ldi de ni// ljang khu ral gri phur pa 'chang // pad+ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o// ji ltar mos te phyag rgyar
258a3(rgyud): bcas// lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya// ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur// da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya// sku yi mdun du langs nas kyang // rkang pa g.yas
258a4(rgyud): bayung tsam bskum// lag gnyis so sor thung ngu brkyang // gung srin so sor mthil du bkug/ mtheb mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang // gru bug lag mthil mdun du bstan// 'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra
258a5(rgyud): dpung sas// rgyal phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya// na morat+na trA pA ya/ nam Ar+yA \u0f7f me kr-i te shwa rA ya kho d+hi sa twA yA/ mahA sa twA ya/ mahA kA R+sha NI kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a ba rke/ pa rab te/ sa gyi gsaH/
258a6(rgyud): yangan sngon ltar lus bgrangs te// snying khar zil sbyar spro ba bsnol// mdzub mo gnyis bslangs rtse mo spang // me the ba gnyis mdzub tshig dang por bkug/ lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa// gzugs
258a7(rgyud): sngags gang brjod phyag rgya'o// bgegs kyi 'tshe ba byung ba'i tshe// sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bsal bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki tai shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ mahA
258b1(rgyud): kA ru Ni kA ma/ d+yathA/ oM sarba d+harmA Ni maN+Da lA ya/ e h+ye hi pa rim shung d+ha satwa ya swAhA/ yang na sbom la 'jug pas ni// thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo // pus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar/
258b2(rgyud): mdzub gnyis bkug la rtse sprad nas// de la mtheb gnyis gzhar bar bya// 'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges// yang na lag gnyis rgyab spang nas/ sor me rtse rnams reg par bya/
258b3(rgyud): mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub nang sbyar/ smin mtshams su ni gzhag par bya// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwar ya/ bo d+hi sat+paH/
258b4(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tadz+yo thA/ oM sarba duSh+TA na mo badz+rA ya me swA hA/ khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur// yang ni bsgreng ste mnyam gzhag bya// snying khar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod
258b5(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba de ba a na le swA hA/ gro bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin// yang ni bsgreng ste rting /
258b6(rgyud): pa spang // lag gnyis kyis 'jigs byed tshul bya// rtsa sdug ging rung brjod pas ni// ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 'gyur// yang ni pad+ma rgyan lung gi/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis
258b7(rgyud): thal sbyar srin lag gis// mthe bo'i sen me mnor byas te// mthe'u chung rtse mo'i gung mo spang// gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste// dgug na mdzu rtse bskul cing dgug/ yang na g.yas pa'o//
259a1(rgyud): mdzub mo dgug/ g.yon pa slar gtang bya ba'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ khe d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwa ya/ ma hA kA rA Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM brag+sa
259a2(rgyud): e h+ye he swAhA/ yang na sor rje rnams bskyed na// mdzub mo g.yas pa lha chen rnams// yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la// nyi zla gzas bzung dus su ni// gzungs sngags pa mar la bzlas nas// phyag rgyas/
259a3(rgyud): btab nas zos pas ni// shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel zhing // nad med gzugs dbang thob par nges// 'grengs te rkang gshibs thal sbyar nas// mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa// snying
259a4(rgyud): khar gzhag bya spyan ras gzigs// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya// mchod sogs las kyi sngon 'gro ba'o// de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo // mdzub bkug mthe bong sen mor bcas/
259a5(rgyud): lag gnyis rgya ba spang gar dbang bya// thal sbyar mthe mdzub se sor brkyang // mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang // mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o// lag gnyi
259a6(rgyud): rgyu ba sprad mtheb gnyis brkyang // bdug po bzang la sngags 'di bzla// na mo rat+na tA yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya tad+ya thA
259a7(rgyud): na mor Sh+Ta shi'i tsan+da a la~M kAr man te dze su pra tsaka bi shwa dz+was/ t+yathA/ oM raSh+NI rat+ne/ ta sha re d+na ta ka ga rat+na/ pra te sa he shI dz+ra dzA te/ rat+na rje swAhA/ snga bar bcu rtse brgyad brjod do// nor yang
259b1(rgyud): thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur// 'gro gzhan bdag la byams 'dod na// so shing la ni nyi shu gcig/ ldob sbyin 'dod pa shu dag la// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas sIng bar sku// gang bshang phyag rgya dang bcas
259b2(rgyud): bas// gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs kyang 'bros/ na maHsarba bud d+ha d+harma saMg+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ye/ ma hA satwA ya oMm hA kA ru Ni kA ya/
259b3(rgyud): dad+ya thA/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu bi hu bi \u0f7fka pa du pi/ pra gA ya ni sAhA/ rnam grangs 'dug pas sangs rgyas 'dugalha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya// yan lag g.yas pa'i
259b4(rgyud): mthe bong ni// lag mthil bzhag nas ser mos dgag/ rna ltag phyar nas mdzub mo ni// brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang // g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste// dus ma yin par 'chi sogs zlog
259b5(rgyud): lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang // sor mo bsnol te bkod pa las// ma bong mthe'u chungs sor ni// smad de sprad pa shes rab rgya// oM sar+b+ba sa sho d+ha ni swAhA/ de bzhin bsnol te bkan pa yi// khung
259b6(rgyud): gnyis nang du ba shibs baspangs pa/ ma ma'i rgya sgra sngags 'angako/ yi dan sa cing nga/ dbang chubs nas kyang mo gcis// skang bsrings pa dushegs so// mi tAbatatasan/
259b7(rgyud): spang bor gyi 'ang sar dgug/ byug pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgya// oM d+ha li be+e t+ya swAT/ ting skad ser mo gyen du bzod// zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rgya// oM nai bi tse pra k+Sho ta swaH/ leg gnas
260a1(rgyud): bkug nas rje brgyad spyad// mthe bo rten du lan pa ni// na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM dA sa ra Ni swA hA/ snyim pa la phye teg pa'i tshul// rom stsal ba'i phyag d+ha'o// mos/
260a2(rgyud): kr-i hrIHsa ka la ga Na ba ri wA re dzaM kha re ke ra A a/ a ba tar te/ a ba ba raM ti/ a ba ta ran+na da sha di ka lo ka pA la/ sa pa ri wA re b+h+yaHi daM bi liM gr-id+han+tha/ khA da tu pi btu ya thai baM ya theSh+Te dza
260a3(rgyud): hU~M baM hoHsa triSh+Tha sarba sa twA ne/ shA ta~M ku ru dr-itra~M ku ru ba shi ku ru/ A pA raNaku ru gu pa ti/ kau rota kurbaHhUM hUM phaT/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shA ra s+ya/ A dz+nyA pA ya ti sAhA/ oM A ka ro mAHsa
260a4(rgyud): d+harmA NAM Ad+ya nutaM pan+d+ha tAta oM AHhUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIHdzam+b+ha la dza lin+d+rA ya sAhA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la// chu gtsang rtag tu sbyin par bya// oM A hrIHlo ke shwa ra hu nu smr-i ti ka rA ya
260a5(rgyud): swA hA/ yi dgras rnams la swa ru zas// ci phyir chu dang bcas bstsa la// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs// lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang // 'byung po yi dgas kun brtson 'gyur// sems kyi
260a6(rgyud): lcags kyu ldan bya ste/ ga nyon mongs sems la rab drang ste// lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i// kun spong byang chub rin chen gyis// las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed// mdzad pa rgya chen kun
260a7(rgyud): grub 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po badz+ra dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las/ sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'a
260b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa zhig/ mchod pa'i bkod pa chen po dang // bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bsas
260b2(rgyud): ba yis// bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas// bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang // phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig mchod// pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol// mgon po'i yon tan
260b3(rgyud): kun gyi rgyal// ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso// thar pa'i lam chen nyi shur rgyal// 'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan dpe mthar zug med pa'i sku// gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la/
260b4(rgyud): blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' can// sku yi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab// nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas// tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung /
260b5(rgyud): gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo// bsam yas bsam du med bsam pas/ bsam mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang // thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo//
260b6(rgyud): 'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i// ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa// kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi// sgron ma de ring ba shang du gsol// byis rnams mun pa'i 'obs su lhung // nyan thos 'dod
260b7(rgyud): chags tshogs kyis skrag/ rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzod dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs// nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la// shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis// bag
261a1(rgyud): chags bcas pa gtan spong ba'i// thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches// 'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas// tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gas
261a2(rgyud): snyan pas// nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas// shes rab snying rjer 'brel ba yi// sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma gsungs// bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di// nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni// legs so//
261a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' che// dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so// rtse gcig gus dang bcos pa yi// sems kyis legs rten yid la zung // nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su// shin tu
261a4(rgyud): dga' ba'i sa las ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// shar ram lho yi sgo btong bya// dkar po ser po dmar po dang // ljang khu'i tshon gyis bri bar bya
261a5(rgyud): dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// dkar po'i lte bar 'tsham par dmar// mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o// gser dngul zangs sams nyid la// bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra// kha g.yel zhabs tshod
261a6(rgyud): zhum pa la// shin tu gtsang mar bkrus nas kyang // gu pur gur kum cu gang dang // grwa rtsi gi'u wang chu yis bkang // b+hAg+ni seng b+hi ha sa der// ka ri kar ni de bko/ nas 'bras til mo mon sran dang /
261a7(rgyud): gser dngul b+hu ru mu tig dang // man shes yin te rin chen sde// bum par sprul nas ras dkar gyis/ mgul pa bcings nas brgyan yang // drin ma shing lo me tog gnag me tog 'phreng dang bcas pade/
261b1(rgyud): pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang // rgya mtsho chen por 'khrug pa nas// dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas// 'jig rten dbang gis gang ba yis// sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas/
261b2(rgyud): sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas// dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te// legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur// rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi// lha mo tshogs dang glu len dang // bkra shis
261b3(rgyud): du marjod par 'gyur// de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi// 'od zer bya ba phrag brgya yis/ shing chen yongs su smin pa las// bdud rtsi char chen 'bengs par 'gyur// 'jig rten skyong la
261b4(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par bya// skar ma la sogs 'bab pa'am// tshes gcig nas ni nya yi bar// sngags kyi 'phreng ba brjod par bya// lha la yang yang bskor ba bya/
261b5(rgyud): las rnams gang dang gang la yang // lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya// de dang de ni las rnams la// ci bde bar yang sbyar bar bya// phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags// lhog pa 'brum pa la sogs
261b6(rgyud): ga mi bshol ba 'i sngags kyis sbyar/ ma ni rigs thog sa par dbang ste/ khyad sems rig sngags zlog pa sa// don yod 'gras pa'i thugs kyis 'gru/ shes rab 'phel 'dzirje chos
261b7(rgyud): kAnang ha la ga las sel// che 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste// mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed// da'i chen pos bdug thos te// gdong bcu gcig pas gro bur sel// seng ge
262a1(rgyud): ni mdzend sel// rnal 'byor yo byad 'dod pas ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru// bkra shis rol mo du ma dang // gtsang sbra gos gsar ldan pa yis/
262a2(rgyud): sman pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru// myur du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang // 'dod yon kun grub sngags 'phreng ni// gang dang gang yang sbyar bar 'gyur// phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zla ba kaH/
262a3(rgyud): bzung gyur pa'i tshe// mar srang gcig ni dngul sdong gzhug/ sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod nas// zla ba sos nas mar bslangs te// zos sam lus la byugs pa yis// nad rnams ni
262a4(rgyud): zhing bde bar 'gyur// ldong ros gi'u wa nga cha mnyam pas// sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla// chus bkrus dpral bar thig le ni// khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub// chu dron sngar nas
262a5(rgyud): lus bkrus na// nad dang bgegs rnams dag par 'gyur// bas 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas nas khro zhal g.yas la byug/ dgra dpung phyogs su bstan na ni// dgra g.yul shin tu nyes par 'gyur//
262a6(rgyud): ngal bu 'bras bu sngags rer bcas// bal bu le la brgya rtsa brgyad// sku yi drung du bsregs pas ni// mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad// skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar po// sngags re btab pa'i mdud
262a7(rgyud): pa bdun// zhal gcig steng zhal brtags nas ni// nad pa la btags rims nad zhi// sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig/ mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas// mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon//
262b1(rgyud): drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed// gal te des kyang masos na// mdudu re brgya rtsa brkyang brjod nas// zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te// blangs te btags na nges par grol// sdug bsngal nang /
262b2(rgyud): payun rings brdungs// khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas// 'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras// sku mdun brgya rtsa brgyad bsgrags te// gong ltar sgrub pa'i skud pa yang // lus la btegs na nges
262b3(rgyud): bar grol// mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang // byad snyems drag po zlog pa la// sku la spos dang me tog mchod// bi na ya yi gzugs mdun du// bra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming sreg/ sngags re mdud pa brgya rtsa
262b4(rgyud): brgyad// mdung ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags// zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol// mdud pa re re'i bar du ni// sngags re brjod cing gcad par bya// bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong // rdzas dang
262b5(rgyud): sngags kyi nus pa'o// brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la// mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad// mdud nas mdud bzhag steng btags pa// zhag gcig yon dgrol lus
262b6(rgyud): btags na// las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub// gang zhig bsgribs po'i gshegs ldan pas// las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing // dus dus bkra mi shis byung na// gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po
262b7(rgyud): gnyis brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjed// dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya// gnyis pas bi na yaka bkrus// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btang nas/ rang tshong de nas bkru bar bya// khar chang byang /
263a1(rgyud): nas 'dod kun 'grub// ci ltar sprul ba'i gdon pas la phyir// khyi la'i dgo rus thal ba dang // sa bzang chu gtsang smras pa'i sa/ khyil yi ni gzugs byas te// u yi mdun du bgag nas/
263a2(rgyud): kyang // khron la g.yon par sradang bus gdags// rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag thab// gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i ral gri yis// dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du btung // dum bu re re sngags re dang // dong gi nang du ngor
263a3(rgyud): bar bya// de dag gnod pa gtan du sel// mig nad sna tshogs ma rungs la// 'bras bu gsum pazhib tu btags// spang dkar le'u 'tshe'i cu kor bcas// bu btsas gsar ba'i bud med dang / khyi phag das
263a4(rgyud): gis mthong byas nas// grum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags// sngags stong 'das nas sbyar ba des// mig tu blugs na mig 'bras skye// mig nad thams cad sel bar byed// mig rnon dag kyang 'thob
263a5(rgyud): par 'gyur/ lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chus// gu gul ga pur cha mnyam bskol// khyor gang 'dag par gyur pa des// rtsa ba'i zhal gdengs sngags stong 'das// bkrol nas ril bu byas mid ma
263a6(rgyud): ha la hA la'i dug 'joms 'gyur// glang po dkar po'i gi'u wa nga ni// mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun// stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bskul// dpral bar thig le byas gyur na// lha klu 'byung
263a7(rgyud): po'i mi rnams dga'// khyed shug mi mthun rtag pa la// ngur pa'i mjug sgo sku mdun du// stong bzlas lag tu blangs nas 'dum// chu bskams sa 'amachar med na// ling ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la/
263b1(rgyud): cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du// stong brjod chus skyes char chen 'bebs// gang zhig char tshe ring 'dod ni// 'gog par spoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing // sku yi mdun du rtag par ni// a ka ru nag
263b2(rgyud): bdug pa sogs// mchod pas rgyun du mchod bya zhing // brgyad nas nye bar sngags stong brjod// mig gi mngon shes sgrub pa'i phyir// dri zhim dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la// rgyal mtshan ba dan kha dog ba'i/
263b3(rgyud): bA re yol ba dkar po yi// dbus su pad+ma lnga bris te// ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs// tsan dan dkar po'i dri chu dang // bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya// ba mdog sar skra'i mar gyis na/
263b4(rgyud): sgron ma'i 'phreng bas mchod par bya// man shi ri ka ku shu dang // pad+ma dmar dang sngon po dang // rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang // nya rkun nag po'i myu gu dang // ma brlabs pa dang gu gul dang // ku ban sa dang gi'u
263b5(rgyud): wang dang // gur kum dbar dang ser po dang // tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs// de rnams phyed tshad glu rtsi dang // ga pur stsal nas re re'i tshad// sngags ni stong phrag re re grangs// sku yi mdur du
263b6(rgyud): brjod par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas// sngags khrir bcas te nya la ni// zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal// sku yi steng zhal btags nas ni// mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab/
263b7(rgyud): 'bang ba'i byur mas mig tu stsal// ling thog gas ni mchi ma 'dzag/ sbyin dkar sbyin dmar g.yas pa dang // klad pan deng mi gnang dang // glo bur long dang thibs pa sel// nyin gnyis bskus na
264a1(rgyud): lus kyi nang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar 'gyur// gsum pas gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur// bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad 'byung // lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las rgyal/
264a2(rgyud): drug pas rmi ngan byad snyems sel// bdun pas glo bur 'chi ba med// bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob// gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur// bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu// lnga pas lha ma
264a3(rgyud): srin po rnams// drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha// bdun pas nag po chen po 'grub// brgyad pas ma mo dgus gter mthong // bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur// bcu gcig lha mo'i khang par bya ni//
264a4(rgyud): bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim// bcu gsum klu yi khang par phyin// bcu bzhi sum cu gsum pa'i gnas// bco lnga mtshan mo kun mthong ste// bcu drug khams gter mthong bar nges// bcu
264a5(rgyud): bdun rdo rje sa gzhi dang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs po med// bco brgyad pa ni nyi ltar mgyogs// bcu dgus rgyal sras kun mthong 'gyur// nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis// lung bstan dam chos/
264a6(rgyud): bshad par 'gyur// nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi// zhing khams du mar phyin pa dang // dam chos nyan dang ning sbyong
264a7(rgyud): 'gyur// mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di// sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun
264b1(rgyud): 'brub byed nyon// ga pur gA rtsi gi'u wa nga dang // gur kum dzA ti mi shi dang // gtan la dang sug smel dang // tsan dan dkar dang pad+ma dang // gser gyi me tog ut+pal sngo// re re la yang sngags stong ban+d+ha/
264b2(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dkar po lhan cig bsdu// dkyil 'khor dbus su sku yi zhal// dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste// tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar// nyin re sngags stong brjod par bya// mchod pas rgya cher mcho/
264b3(rgyud): par bya// bstod dang gsol ba gdab par bya// dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang // bco lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla// de nas gtsang ma'i gnod bzhag ste// dgos pa gang dang gang la yang // lha ni de dang de/
264b4(rgyud): dag sbyar// gang la bgegs kyis gnod gyur nas// pad+ma gar gyi sngags kyis bdun// mgo bo'i nad yams gsal ba dang // ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas// gso la sogs pa 'dul bar bya// gzhan dag
264b5(rgyud): dga' bar 'dod pas ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng sngags kyis// mig gi steng du byug par bya// rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa// pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje chos kyi 'phreng sngags kyis// dpral bar
264b6(rgyud): thig le bya'o// mdze la sogs pa'i nad la ni// seng ge'i sgra yi 'phreng sngags kyis// lus la reg pa bde bar byug/ long du zhugs pa'i nad la ni// ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus// rang gi khong du btung /
264b7(rgyud): bar bya// byad stems rig sngags zlog pa la// don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug/ dug nad sel la mgrin sngon te// sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni// gdong bcu gcig pa nyid kyis sbyar// rgyal srid
265a1(rgyud): thob par byed pa ni// mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung ngo // de nas spong ba bshad bya ba// 'byung po sha za mkha' 'gro dang // lus srul po dang brjed byed kyis// nyin gcig nas ni nyin bdun
265a2(rgyud): bar// glo bur ba yi rims rnams dang // rtag pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims// brtun byed la sogs rims rigs dang // glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i ge don// nad drag po ni ji snyed dang // dug rigs rims dang
265a3(rgyud): lba ba dang // 'bras dang ldog pa me dpal dang // shu ba sngo dang 'brum bu'i rigs// pol mig ma dpal lkog la sogs// mngon du gang dang gang snang la// sngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jim pa ni// sku zhal dbus
265a4(rgyud): la btags nas ni// mchod pas mchod de sngags khri brjod// tshes gcig nas ni tshes brgyad par// gsol ba yang ni gdab byas nas// tshes dgu'i snga dro dgrol bar bya// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod//
265a5(rgyud): byugs pas nang rnams thams cad sel// cho ga de ltar ldan pas ni// sna nang ru rta 'bru mar byug/ yang nagre bar sngags bcas gdags// byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la// 'bru mar ram ni srad bu bya// dud
265a6(rgyud): 'gro la ni chu nyid dam// yang na srad bu bya ba ste// rtsi mar dag gis mchog tu 'gyur// sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang // sku byang mtshan dpe ldan pas ni// me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs/
265a7(rgyud): gsol ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur// dang po skye mched drug ldan sems// thun mong rigs can sra ba'i khams// gnyis pa mos dang ldan pa ni// thun mong kun tu zhugs pa'i rigs/
265b1(rgyud): gsum pa rig pa'i rtags ldan pa// rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs// bzhi pa lhag sems 'thun ldan zhing // gsang sngags sngon du gyur pa yi// lnga pa blang dor med pa'i sems// drug pa
265b2(rgyud): bdag gzhan dbyer med sems// bdun pa chos rnams rgyal ba'i sems// brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems// dgu parten 'brel zab snang sems// bcu pa mtshan bral grub pa'i sems//
265b3(rgyud): bcu gcig mtshan bral snang ba'i sems// bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems// bcu gsum lhag par 'byung ba'i sems// bcu bzhi shwe bya mthar thug sems// rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang /
265b4(rgyud): rtags dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i// gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs// sems rtogs gyur na sangs rgyas chos// rgyud kun tu ni rgyal bas bshad// 'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo'i bar//
265b5(rgyud): spros pas lha klu 'bum phrag dge ba kun slong sems// dkar po skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling // thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar cha// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud
265b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po pad+ma dri ba zhi bya ba las// sku la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs// rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// shar lce'i mtshams
265b7(rgyud): na bzhugs pa yi// nyan ka zhes la sogs pa// drang srong tshogs rnams mgrin gcig tu// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// oM/ kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha// mtshan dpe du mas brgyan mdzad
266a1(rgyud): pa// bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchog/ 'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba chags bral 'od gsal ba// rgyun chad med pas 'khor lo'i tshul// skye rgan 'chilas
266a2(rgyud): sgrol zhing // rnam dag sgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal// sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang // sa la 'dren mdzad tshogs chen rdzogs// rgyun mi 'chad du sku 'byung ba// thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs
266a3(rgyud): gcig 'khod// de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yab// dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi lha// spyan ras gzigs dbang blugs rje can// 'gro la thugs brtse'i srang du ni// rig sngags bla na med pa gsungs//
266a4(rgyud): sngags de myur du 'grub pa dang // stongs dang dag la sel ba'i phyir// me yi lus la brten pa phyir// sbyor ba'i ngom pa bshad du gsol// de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs// phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas/
266a5(rgyud): nas kyang // mchod pa'i char chen phab pa ste// thal sbyar bus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig 'dren pa'i gtso// sbyin sreg lus kyi cho ga
266a6(rgyud): 'di// nan tan du ni bka' stsal to// sa bzang dri bzang chur bcas pas// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bye// 'bras phye ba mar 'bru bzang rnams// shi rtsi shi'am brgya rtsa brgyad// bsgrags pas
266a7(rgyud): nad yams gnod pa'i// nad la mar lhag nyung zhig btung // nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur// yang na 'bru man phye ma 'am// sa 'am spra tshi la gzugs byas te// srang bu khro bo nal btags nas/
266b1(rgyud): rig sngags bcu rtsa brgyad brjod do// ral gris gtubs nas sbyin sreg bya// brgya phrag lngas ni sdang byed nyams// yang na dug gis gzugs brnyan gtum// dug phrag ni ma pa'i shing la bsreg/ drug cu rtsa bani'o
266b2(rgyud): grangs kyis ni// tshar bcad pa yi dbang du 'gyur// 'byung po drag po zhen pa la// gu gul yungs kar de ltar bsreg/ bal po se'u'i lcug ma la// bu rab sbrang rtsi zho mar sbags// sku yi mdun du bsregs pas
266b3(rgyud): ni// 'go ba'i nad yams 'chad par 'gyur// gu gul dkar po nyi shu gcig/ bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs// zho mar sbrang rtsi lung tang shing // nyi shu rtsa gcig sku bdun bsreg/ sa chen
266b4(rgyud): rgyal sras kun mnyam pa'i// rdzu 'phrul chen po des rnyeng 'gyur// gang gi bsod nams rgyas 'dod na// dri bzang chu dang sa gtsang la// gru ba ni zhu gang dkyil 'khor bya// dri ba dang shing la khru gang brtsig
266b5(rgyud): many+dza sha ka yungs kar spang // 'o mno mar a ka ru// tsan dan dkar po dmar po dang // dri zhim mthong gang tshad kyi shing // 'bru bzang tshad dang bcas pa dag/ dang por sngags stong bzlas nas kyang
266b6(rgyud): bcu rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis// tshe ring nad med rgyal srid 'thob// stong gis 'jig rten pa dag 'grub// khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te// 'bum gyis gzugs khams mngon du 'gyur// sa las rgyal
266b7(rgyud): sras kun mthong zhing // mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur// bye bas rgyal ba kun mthong zhing // zhing khams du ma sbyong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams la// ji srid nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/
267a1(rgyud): bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyar// sngags dang lhal sems brtan bya// nad lams drag po bsal ba la// gtso bor 'bras bu gsum sreg go// gdon chen rnams ni bsal bas/
267a2(rgyud): gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha/ brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan// phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la// dur ba yungs kar mchog tu bshad// 'bru rnams gang dang gang 'dod la/
267a3(rgyud): 'bru rigs de nyid sbyin sreg bya// char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni// tsam pa ka dang rnam gsum dang // mngar gsum na ga ge sar dang // dbang po lag gi sbyin sreg ni// ci 'dod char pa 'bab par 'gyur/
267a4(rgyud): gal te gcad par 'dod pa ni// thal ba de ltar yungs kar gyis// nan tan phyogs bzhir gar dbang gi/ sngags kyis yang yang gtor bar bya// yungs kar zho mar sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras yos kyis ni byis/
267a5(rgyud): ba sos// gdon nam rims las 'jigs pa dang // khyim srung bar ni 'dod pa yis// pad+ma dmar po'i sbyin sreg ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na bya// sems bzang sngags ring 'dod pas ni/
267a6(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya// phran tshegs yams nad sel ba la// lo ma tsam gyi sbyin sreg bya// phyugs nad sel bur 'dod pa'i tshe// 'o ma me tog dkar bcas bsreg/ nad dang ga
267a7(rgyud): bcas sel ba la// mngar gsum 'bru bzang ga pur bcas// dur ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams// dri bzang 'o ma can rnams ni// me tog bzang po'i shing la bsreg/ gdon nang zhi bar 'jod
267b1(rgyud): bas ni// 'bras du gsum sogs shing rnams bsreg dodan phran pa ni mngar gsum dang // dur ba dkarang po bsregs pas 'i// rmi lam ngar dang sras ngan kyang // 'bras phye mar bsngags sel bar byed/
267b2(rgyud): gos dang snod spyad rdzas dang lus// gzhan rje ba ngan pas gos pa la// 'bras phye bar dang spos dkar dang // me tog dkar po bsreg par bya// ting la byid kyi ma dog bsreg/ mi gdang thams cad se bar
267b3(rgyud): khyed// mi su yim rtsa bar bcas// bsregs nan pa'i nang sdel 'gyur// tsan dran gyi rtsi ba mar bsreg/ sna yi nang rnams thams cad sel// mu bi gu gul ril bu bsreg/ so dang we mi
267b4(rgyud): nad sil 'gyur// son mdza dang ka kur// bsregs pas skye nad 'joms par nges// sbrang rtsi tsan dan sha ka ra// bsregs pas glo nang sel bar byed// 'bras bu gsum dang no sha sa?/

267b6(rgyud): thams cad zhi bar byed// lus mdzes pa yang thob par 'gyur// nor 'dod pas ni seng ldeng mer// bser zho dang mar bsreg bya// gos mdog gang dang gang 'dod la// de dang mtshungs
267b7(rgyud): pa'i me tog dang // srang bu sor ni bcu gnyis pa// shing mdog de dang mthun pa yi// dri zhim dag la bsreg par bya// rnyed 'gyur the tsom mi bya'o// pri yang ku dang ka ling ka/ pad+ma'i ze ba yal sdong la/
268a1(rgyud): bsreg cing gsol ba gdab pas ni// gter gyi longs spyod rgyas par 'gyur// 'bras dang myu gu'i 'bras bu sogs// bsregs na longs spyod brtan par 'gyur// dan rod pa la 'bras/
268a2(rgyud): bu gsum// brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel// 'bras yos 'phel bar 'dod pas kyang // sri ka dzA ti me tog dkar/ kha dkar 'o ma zho mar bcas// bsregs pas 'khor dang dmag dpung 'phel/
268a3(rgyud): de 'bum grangs kyis rgyal srid 'thob/ mngar gsum bil ba'i 'bras bu la// 'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur// sngags mthu rgyas pa'i don du ni// nim pa'i shing la mar dang ni// yungs kar dkar/

268b1(rgyud): ni// pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg bya// las rnams gang dang gang la yang // de dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sbyar// zhi bzhi pa'i yid kyis te// bskal bzang blo ni rgyas pa la// chags dang 'dun sems ldan pas
268b2(rgyud): nini// dbang du gyur la the tsom med// khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni// drag po'i las su 'gyur ba yod// brtan po dal 'byor ldan pa'i blo// rgyun rtags gsal ba yod gyur pas// ji ltar bcas pa de 'grub kyi//

268b4(rgyud): sgo nas kyang // rnam pa kun tu bla ma la// smod pa 'bad de spang bar bya// smad pas dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro// bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang // ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya mchod//
268b5(rgyud): oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA dA ni swA hA/ bsang gtor dang ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la dz+wa lA na lArka sAT+Ta/ sbar ba'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA na/ oM ar+tha/

268b7(rgyud): b+ha smiM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ ut+pa la'i 'o// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras kyi'o// oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra sAhA/ ku sha'i'o// oM badz+ra bi dzA ya swA hA/ lag pan gyi'o// oM badz+ra mA la

269a2(rgyud): gro'o// oM badz+rA udz+nye / unas pa ral lo// oM k+tsi m-i ng+tha/ byung chub shi 'o// slob rgya la ldan/ n+ya d+hI ra~M// oM d+han kAs nga/ sa tha //

269b7(rgyud): lhan cig ste// drag po'i las de zhal zas dang // bdug spos bye brag shes par bya// rtsi mar dang ni a se ye// sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me ni// zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis// yang na pad dkar
270a1(rgyud): sdong bu yi// til lam shin tu dngas ma dang // sa ri hi yi sdong bu ni// rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis// yang na ba yi lag gi cha// na ke la yi mar dang ni/ pad+ma dmar po'i mar

270b2(rgyud): tshel du gtong // dag par byed pos chu bo ltar// nus pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang // gang bar byed pa rgya batsho ltar// sbyin sreg gis ni lha mnyes shing // sngags sgrub rdzogs kyi las rnams 'jug

270b6(rgyud): sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig/ 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der ldugs nas// phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas// mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod// phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston pa la/
270b7(rgyud): mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'di skad tshig ni gsol ba 'debs// oM/ mtshan dang pe byad brgyan pa'i sku// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// chos kyi longs spyod
271a1(rgyud): ji snyed pa// rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phrag 'tshal// gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo// 'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang // sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku// bde ba chen

271b1(rgyud): skung gsungs// dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas// 'grol phan phyir nus pa ni// legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che// shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so// sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas
271b2(rgyud): khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad// khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// legs par zung la rgya cher spros// ras sam gro gshing shun gang // 'jam shing nag ris med pa la// gur kum gi

271b6(rgyud): dang yams nad gdon rnams dang // 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par nges// rig sngags zlog nas khyad par du// rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga la// 'od kyi ra ba zlum po yi// ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa bri//

272a1(rgyud): nod sngags so// gas padag dong brgyagacig pa'i sngags// gsum par badz+ra kar dadang gi/ sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya// gas te nang yams thog pas
272a2(rgyud): 'dab brgyad pad+ma mu khyud gsum// sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la// mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags// gsum par rten 'brel sngags bris nas// lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni// nad rims
272a3(rgyud): dang ni lkog 'brum sogs// rlung gis rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur// de nas tshig de thos ma thag/ lha min bu mo nang bdag mo// sa du de bi zhes bya ba// bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te// bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig
272a4(rgyud): tu// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig pu// mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa// gal te 'brum nang byung na ni/
272a5(rgyud): bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ dam bcas 'dri ni dran par bya// tri bal bya yi kA ka pa ni ta/ su ma la bi lA sa kA ka ra Ni/ ki shun bany+tsa tA li he nA yi/ ke na ka tA tsa ra Ni/ ya mair+Na nad man tsa/
272a6(rgyud): ya mi par nang bur drA/ dA tsa bita tra tsit+ta nad de/ swa sU de wi me d+ha wA/ lha mos dri skad gsol ma thag/ mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to// oM oM b+ha bi ta/ ba ti ti mi ti/ ga tsan+d+ra ka ra Ni a
272a7(rgyud): mu ka s+ya ka bya/ lo hi ta gaM d+ha na rak+Shaku ru swA hA/ byin rlabs ldan pa'i sngags de ni// rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// oM ha na se rU pa d+ha ri sAhA/ srad bu mtshams dkar po la/ shu
272b1(rgyud): rtsa gcig mdud par bya// bzhi brgya rtsa ba ni bzlas nas kyang // lus sam mgul du gdags par bya// kr-i hi ti ka ti ka tra tha bra ka shig/ ta pA ya thA tsal he huM hUM phaT/ sran mardog po re re la/
272b2(rgyud): bucu rtsa brgyad brgyad po zlas pa yi// 'bru bdun zlum por byas pa zhig/ dri bzang bcas la mgul du thogs// yams nang kun dang 'brum nag nad// shin tu gdug pa kun sel 'gyur/
272b3(rgyud): de nas rig sngags 'chang ba mo// dpal 'phreng mas ni 'di skad gsol// bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlos pa// rims nad kun dang bral bar 'gyur// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA
272b4(rgyud): ya be d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo badz+ra mA ra bi dza yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ samyak+ka sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re ma hA badz+re/ sarba b+hI ra thA De ha na ha na badz+ra/
272b5(rgyud): sarba dz+wa ra pra sha ma na ye swA hA/ mi swA mi rus sne tres dang // gu gul yungs kar sgeg skya dang // shing kun gla rtsi'i kho ra lo ni// rtsibs brgyad phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri// mtshams bzhir bris te dbus
272b6(rgyud): su ming // sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la// gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags// bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs// nad rims thams cad sel ba dang // rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par
272b7(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// 'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol// rang byung can gyi ras la ni// sen rtsis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri// rtsibs
273a1(rgyud): bzhi hrIHla g.yon bskor du// hrIHgi wa shaM ku ru hrI// mu byung dang po mgon po ni// pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o// gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po 'phreng // gsum pa lcags/
273a2(rgyud): klu nyi shu gcig/ dbus su baM yig hI ra bcas bri// ljang ma nyid kyang dam byed na// 'gro ba gzhan lnga spyos ci dgos// gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang // bgags kyi gnod pa sel 'dod pas
273a3(rgyud): rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste// dbus su spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon// pad+ma gtsug tor sngags bri'o// rwa rnams kun la hUM yig ni// bgegs ming u tsa ta yis bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan
273a4(rgyud): ras gzigs// ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o// gnyis pa khro bo rta skad sngags// gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la// de rgyab ma yi phung po bri// gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas// sred med
273a5(rgyud): bu ltar mthu che ba'i// gdug pa can yang 'thor byed na// phran tshogs 'byer ba smos ci dgos// gang la ser sna rnam chags shing // longs spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na// phun sum tshogs ldan dpal/
273a6(rgyud): 'phel phyir// skyod pa'i phyag rgya bshad par bya// rgyal po 'am ni dge 'dun la// gtsang ldan rab bzang blangs nas kyang // dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug/ legs par brgyan nas thig btab ste/
273a7(rgyud): gur bu mo dang ni gla rtsi yis// pad+ma 'dang bcu drug pa bri// phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste// mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge gang // oM dang badz+rad
273b1(rgyud): kehUM// yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya// mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags// gnyis pa gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum pa ut+pal 'phreng ba ste// yang tog rje 'am mdzod bzhag nas/
273b2(rgyud): gsil btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel// bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas// de bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// phyogs bzhir hrIHbri mtshams su drang // dbus su khye'u'i gzugs shig bri// phyogs
273b3(rgyud): bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri// sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya// mtshams bzhir oM dang a ma ra// dzI wa na tI ye swA hAs bskor// mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs// pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags//
273b4(rgyud): gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gsum pa ut+pal dmar po'i 'phreng // 'od 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang // phul du byung ba bstod pos bstod// gsol ba 'debs shing sngags
273b5(rgyud): bzlas na// bu stsol 'gyur la the tsom med// srung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang // bu slong ba yi phyag rgya ni// smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri// lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri// gang zhig sems stor yid mi/
273b6(rgyud): dga'// glo bur yi mug skye 'gyur na// pad+ma 'drab ma bzhi pa yi// dbus suM rang gzugs mtshan ma bri// 'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyud la ni spyan ras
273b7(rgyud): gzigs// don yod zhags pa'i sngags bri'o// gnyis par rdo rje'i 'phreng bsgo// de'i chu ba da kyi 'phreng ba 'i// rnag par mchod cing gsol bgadapa// nad sel tshe rang bsod nams 'phel// gang zhig shes rab 'dod
274a1(rgyud): babazhi// dpas de'u rgyal po'i du bar ni// tI mig tub tu sngags 'dis bsgom/ oM dang kA la da ka la// ma ni sA zhes pabri// de yi cha rgya 'khor ba la// mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags
274a2(rgyud): bri// de rgya ba 'od kyi rab bri// gang gis 'di 'chang mchod pa la// nad dang gnod pa kun bral te// dug dang ribs nad 'joms pa dang // shes rab myur du 'brel bar 'gyur// yul du le tog nyams
274a3(rgyud): pa dang // thog 'brug ser brgod pa dang // klu dang sa bdag gnod pa ste// de bsal sbyor ba bshad par bya// shing shun dkar po mnyams pa// nyams dga'i nyi rim sbyor ba la// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa//
274a4(rgyud): mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya// grwa rnams la ni hUM yig la// oM dang dzi na ti ti te// hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis bskor// mu khyud dang por mgon po che// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags 'phreng bri//
274a5(rgyud): gnyis par thugs rje chen po mgon// mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis bskor// gsum par rdo rje 'phreng ba dang // me yi 'od dang ldan par bri// phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis// klu yi rgyal po mthu
274a6(rgyud): ldan rnams// 'khor dang bcas te lus bskams 'gyur// gang gi khyim du gdong pa dang // mu he na sogs yams nadang can// bsal ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgya ni// brtan par drang srong tshogs
274a7(rgyud): rnams nyon// ko bi ri'i shing la ni// khrug khru gnyis dbyibs gru ba'i// gas rmugs cag sogs med pa la// shin tu sra pa 'jam ser gcis rngams// shing des ni dra babs gzugs//
274b1(rgyud): 'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi// brtsegs pa'i g.yas zur dang po ni// rdo rje sdod pe rtse lnga ste// gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po'o// gsum par 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser/ bzhi par das
274b2(rgyud): dkar po'o// g.yon zur dang por pad+mad par// gnyis pa ut+pal ston pa'o// gsum pa ner bu bani rna zas// nang khong du ni pad+ma bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o// lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la// ma
274b3(rgyud): dang pi sha tsing r+Na// sha ba ri sarba byAd+hi// pra sha ma ni swAhA zhes// baM yig la ni bskor ba bri// ma khyung dang po spyan ras gzigs// gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags zi'o// gnyis par chos kyi gtsug
274b4(rgyud): tor gyi// rtsa ba'i 'phreng sngags bri bar bya// rgya skyegs dang ni mtshal yin te// de la shing sprin byug par bya// mchod drang gsol gdab sngags dag ni// bdun snod re re brjod byas nas// sgo
274b5(rgyud): gong la gdags 'byung 'jug tshe// 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// rta phyugs yems nad ma lus la// rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i// 'jig rte mgon gyi rig sngags
274b6(rgyud): mthus// myur du sel bar mnan pa dang // zlog dang bcing bar brjod ces brjod// phyugs bdag chen po skyong ba ltar// glang po rta bong ma he tshogs// rtag cing nang dang gnod pa med// shin tu 'phel
274b7(rgyud): zhing rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la// khyad par du ni skyob pa yi// phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par gyis// yung bas ras sam shing la ni// pad dkar
275a1(rgyud): steng du kha dz+ra dang // ral gri 'ong ma bri bar bya// de la gdu bu gsum gyis bskor// dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags// gnyis par seng ge'i sgra yi sngags// gsum par ha la/

275a3(rgyud): spyod spyir ni byang bltas bri// dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste// g.yul zlog pa ni lhor bltar bri// lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri// dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba yi// dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya// 'dzum
275a4(rgyud): dang rnga ma dang dgod dang khro// bzhin gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi// sngags dang sngags kyi 'od 'phreng dang // lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang // snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang // rgyan yang de ltar shes par bya//

275a6(rgyud): chub sems pa'i tshogs rnams dang // rig pa'i lo'i tshogs rnams dang // 'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang // spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang // khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang //

275b1(rgyud): mi 'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bad+ma dra ba las/ phyag rgyal brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas mkha' la
275b2(rgyud): gshegs pa yi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i drang srong mchog/ mtshan deb dus rgyas pa che// nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba// drang srong rjeng po na tshogs kyi mchog/ 'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can//
275b3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la// sangs rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol// oM/ 'od zer du mther zug gi/ srid 'dam stug po skam byed rgyal// yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku/
275b4(rgyud): mgron po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal// gsung sman yan lag brjod bral chos// bag chags ri bo skyil mdzad rgyal// skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum// mgon po spyan ras

275b6(rgyud): spyan dang sngags sbyar nas// lha yi gong bu'i ril bu ni// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi// thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad pa'i// mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol//
275b7(rgyud): 'gro rnams pa rig 'dam la zhen// srid pa'i thag pas rgya tham bcings// 'dod chags zhe sdang mur pas g.yogs// ngargyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs// ngan rtog log lam g.yang sar ltung // bas
276a1(rgyud): med ser sna'i dug gis myos// sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyal// bag chags thum po'i ri bos mnan// mgon khyod thugs rjes ngal ba med// nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i
276a2(rgyud): phyir/ shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du gsol// de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje// thugs rje thugs dpag mnga' ba yi// thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bur bcas// khyad par gsung 'di bka'
276a3(rgyud): stsol to// mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang // rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes// 'das dang ma 'ongs don shes dang // mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa// dngos dang rtag dang /
