276a5(rgyud): gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no// rnam pa brgyad kyi dpe bya yis// longs spyod dbang dang lus la dbang // tsho la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang // chu la mi bying mkha' la 'gro/ sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba//
276a6(rgyud): ni rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// dngos po gang dang gang bsgrubs rnams// ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyis// gzhan ni myur du 'grub mi 'gyur// byang chub sems pa'i ril bu ni/
276a7(rgyud): mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang // rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur// nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras// ma mos dbang du byas gyur na// 'byung po sha za lha min mi// ma mo
276b1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu// dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can// sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa yis// khyad par ril bu 'di bsgrub bya// /
276b2(rgyud): gi'u wang dang ni lig bre mig/ ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yos// ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// snod gtsang nang du gzhag par bya// sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na// sngun chad
276b3(rgyud): ma mthong snang ba 'am// sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs// yid 'ong mngon du byung ba sogs// mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas zla ba gzas bzung tshe// ci 'byor mchod
276b4(rgyud): de snyim par bcug/ bzlas brjod byas nas nyi shar na// du byar 'phrul dang dri can 'gyur// dud 'brul lus la byugs pas kyang // snang ba dang 'od gzugs can dang // 'dzam gling phyogs
276b5(rgyud): rnams rgyu ba dang // longs spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te// shi 'phos dga' ldan gnas su skye// dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang byed cing // thos pa 'dzin cing sgyu rtsal
276b6(rgyud): mkhas// shi nas 'dzam gling 'di nyid du// lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni// 'khor ba gzhon nu'i rigs su skye// yang na mi yi rgyal po 'am// glang po nyid du skye bar nges// 'bar ba lus la bskus ni lha//
276b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang lus nyi shar mdog/ bskal par gnas te 'dod dgur spyod// 'jig rten kun tu thogs med rgyu// mkha' lding sa 'og chu bran 'gro/ sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang // dbang po
277a1(rgyud): gnas te rgyal por gnas// sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod// 'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig rten khams// gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye// 'jig rten 'jig rten
277a2(rgyud): 'das pa yi// bdag nyid yid du 'ong 'dod pas// gur kum ga pur gla rtsi dang // gi'u wa nga bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas// brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang // sngags stong bzlas te chu gtsang gi//
277a3(rgyud): ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas// re re la yang stong stong brjod// rlung dang nyi ma ma reg par// bskams nas gnod gtsang gzhag par bya// ril bu tsam zhig mur na yang // rgyal po blon po 'khor
277a4(rgyud): bcas kyis// mthong na bu bzhin gzigs 'gyur na// tha mal skye bos smos ci dgos// nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang // bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur// ga pur gu gul gi'u wa nga dang /
277a5(rgyud): tsan dan ka na da brda dang // gla rtsi dag ste cha mnyam du// re re sngags stong bzlas nas su// brdungs te ril bu byas pa dag/ g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya// bdun nas nya yi bar du ni/
277a6(rgyud): sngags bzlas pa dang mchod par bya// bdugs pas nad dang gdon rnams sel// mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang // rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang // blon po la sogs dbang du 'gyur// khar
277a7(rgyud): bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong // gdam pa thams cad don yod 'gyur// spyi bor btags na byad stems dang // g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur// gal te phye mas bdugs pas kyang //
277b1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad 'byung 'gyur te// kun gyis mthong dang dga' ba dang // gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod// ga pur gla rtsi gur kum dang // tsan dan gla rtsi ka ko la// spos kyi rgyal po bad+ma
277b2(rgyud): dang // ut+pal sngo dang tsan dan dmar// re re la yang stong bzlas nas// cha mnyam phye ba'i gi'u wang bcas// ril bu tsa na ka tshad bya// grib bskams byas nas lus la 'chang // glang bzhi kun
277b3(rgyud): khyab rgyal srid 'thob// kra ku la yi thang chu dang // ldong ros be dang ut+pal sngo// rgya mtsho dbu ba gi'u wa nga dang // yung dang skyer pa gur kum dang // ga pur dang ni gla rtsi gsum// re re la yang sngag
277b4(rgyud): stong bzla// de nas sku yi mgul btags te// stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya// mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar// so nad la ni ka ka ru// rna ba'i nad la ru rta ste// ut+pa la mu tig mig nad la// gre ba'i nad la ba/
277b5(rgyud): sha ka/ glo nad la ni be le ka/ sha ka ru yi thang dang sbyar// rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar// mkhris nang la ni tig ta dang // bad kan la ni lga dang sbyar// mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs// ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa// spangs
277b6(rgyud): nad rnams la thug po che// bgegs dang yams nad sel ba la// gu gul dang bcas bdug par bya// ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni// nam yang brjod par mi nus so// gu gul la ni stong bzlas

278a1(rgyud): zlos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te// nad dang gdon dang dgras mi tshugs// 'dod rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra// sU ru ra dang til ti la// mnyam
278a2(rgyud): byas srin bya'i khrag dang ni// ril bu byas nas mig la byugs// klu dang yi dgas khang pa dang // sa 'og thams cad mthong bar nges// byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce// nyin gcig spros phor nang du gzhug/
278a3(rgyud): gnyis pa ra'o gsum dang 'byung // bzhi pa ril bu tshal chen gtso// lnga pa sbrang rtsi'i nang du ste// drug pa dngul chu'i nang du gzhag/ bdun pa rigs ngan grod par ni// byi la'i khrag gis bskus la gzhag/
278a4(rgyud): bskams nas bya dang spyang ku'e sha// lhan cig rang gi khar bcug na// de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur// gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med// ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang // dzA ti lo ma sa bon bcas//
278a5(rgyud): ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yis// bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges// pan dum dang ki ram dang // ma kA ri dang su mI tam// pra pan ta ma'i ril bu ni// nyi zla gzas bzung dus su ming /
278a6(rgyud): shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste// thos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos// gi'u wa nga swA hA tsa ni dang // sra ta sbrang gi ril bu bya// sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na// 'das pa'i don rnams shre
278a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// gi'u wa nga su ga pa yi dang // ba ra swa ta ha su ri// a ra hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas// ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzlas// mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes// gzhan yang nad
278b1(rgyud): 'dod byed pa yi// ril bu chen po bshad par bya// rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gul// kan d+ha na gu li dang ni// ru Ni a pa ya ba ni// i pa ya na ta ka ra// kan d+ha ka dang pri yang ku// 'khor lo che drang
278b2(rgyud): 'khor lo dang // biSh+Ta ka Ti de bzhin du// so mar tse unAn ti// re re la yang sngags 'phreng dang // brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya// de nas brdungs te sbrang dang bcas// byis pa lnga ni dpung par te/
278b3(rgyud): bu 'dod mo la mgul par gdags// 'di btags pa yid ma thag/ 'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las grol// ba mar shu dag ba lcir bcas// lcags kyi snod du btsos pa yi// ril bu a mra'i
278b4(rgyud): 'bras bu tsam// sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de// phyis ni nyi shu gcig brjod nas// sdu bar mid pas shes rab 'phel// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/
278b5(rgyud): ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM shud d+ha mr-i taM ba la baM d+ha ni swA hA/ srong dang tho rangs dge sbyod dang // dal smra gsong po dul bag can// khrus laM dga' zhing dri bzang bsten// spyod
278b6(rgyud): lam rab zhi khro ba med// rtag tu sngags brjod brtse sems can// spyan ras gzigs dbang la cher dang // gdung bag gdong la mchi ma can// lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i// skyes mchog de la/
278b7(rgyud): rab dag zhing // 'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang // 'byung po la sogs smos ci dgos// rtag par rang gi yid la ni// snying po gsang sngags bcang bar bya// nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i// lha yang /
279a1(rgyud): rang la nye bar byed// rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba// khri dang 'bum dang sa ya dang // sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de// kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni// lnga tsam gyis ni de grub yin//
279a2(rgyud): las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni// bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs// de ma thag tu chu'i yin te/ cung zad pa ni mar gyis bya// brtan par 'gyur ba ka ra ste// ches brtan
279a3(rgyud): pa la srad bu yin// sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de// ril bus ring du skyong byed yin// sngags sgrub pa la mi mos pa'i// bdun du rtsom na de dag rnams// de skad gsungs pa'i dri ma thag
279a4(rgyud): rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang // pad dkar rin chen snying po dang // pad spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang // ye shes dbang phyug pad dbang phyug/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams// rang rang sde dpung sngar
279a5(rgyud): bcas pa// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams// 'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams bkram byas te// rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi// mchod pas nam
279a6(rgyud): mkha'i gtor rab bkang // rol mo du ma lhab lbub dang // sil snyan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis// sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar// bkod pa mtha' yas bsham byas te// de nas byang
279a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mgon 'gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la// yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod// spyan ras gzigs dbang mchod rten che// 'jig
279b1(rgyud): rkyen dbang po dbang phyug che// bad+mas pas dpa' bar 'byung // rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra pa chen po chos rgyal gtso/ blo zos chen po sems dpa' che/ pad+ma 'chang ba ba dpral/ kha d+ma'i mgon/
279b2(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+ma las byung dam pa'i yid// pid+ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po// pad+ma rdo rje dam pa'i sku// khyod mchog sman la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba kun chen thabs po che// tshe mnyam dga' ba/
279b3(rgyud): dgengs pa che// dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal// bde ba chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po// rdul byor chen po mes chen po// bide stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che/
279b4(rgyud): pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo// chos mnga'i don mnga' pad+ma rgyal// dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin// rmad byung chen ldan chos rab 'chang // chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
279b5(rgyud): sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'// rin chen sems dpa' chos sems dpa'// dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'// kun mkhyen sems dpa'akhyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten dpa' bo dpa'/
279b6(rgyud): ngo mchog/ rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che// 'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten yi ge kha dog che// yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog
279b7(rgyud): yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs// yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// pad+ma'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i lag/ legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin pa'i// sangs rgyas tshogs te sangs rgyas chos// sangs
280a1(rgyud): rgyas che khyod phyag 'tshal lo// tshad med che sku sangs rgyas sku// gzugs bzang 'chang ldan rdo rje gzugs// gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba// snang bar mdzad khyod phyag/
280a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// gtso mgon rgyal po pad+ma'i dpal// chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa/ tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug mgon// tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo// cher gsal gtso bo snang
280a3(rgyud): mchog/ 'od chen mdzad par rang gsal mdzad// snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon// snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che// chos kyi spyan ni gzigs pa che// ting nge
280a4(rgyud): 'dzin po ye shes mtsho// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyur gtso// mkhan po chen po sangs rgyas sras// rgyal thabs brnyes pa khyu mchog che// sangs rgyas dpag med
280a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// drag po chen po brtul chen po// ha la chen po seng ge'i sgra// mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyud gang /
280a6(rgyud): 'chang la nad med bgegs med de// dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong // yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'// de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams// rang rang gdan la rnam par 'khod// de tshe phyogs bcu
280a7(rgyud): rnam par g.yos// bdud rigs thams cad mog por gyur// de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la// rtogs pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid// nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so//
280b1(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i spyad tshul can// dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba// sems can gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i// rigs ni rigs chen thams cad pa'o// lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni// rgyun mi 'chang du sbyor mod/
280b2(rgyud): kyang // rags pa yo ni gzugs brnyan mthus// sngags ster gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi// lha la goms pa lha mthong ngam// mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas// mkha' mnyam sems kyi rdzu
280b3(rgyud): 'phrul che// sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa// mtshan mo pho mo la sogs pa'i// mngon shes 'jig rten gsal mthong sa// 'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste// brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o//
280b4(rgyud): dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam spyod// sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang // zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang // sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam// bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang // rten 'brel zab
280b5(rgyud): don mngon gyur pa// 'jig rten 'odas pa'i rigs kun mchog/ mtshon med ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang // rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang // nges tshig chos don/
280b6(rgyud): spros pa'i mtha'// rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la// rig chen yongs su grub pa'i sa// mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan zhing // sems kyi snang ba du mar bsgyur// dngos rnams spros spang bsdu spyod pa//
280b7(rgyud): rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis// chos sku kun snang kun tu 'od// bde skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan// yi gi 'khor lo sprul tshogs che// mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje 'dzin// zag med ye shes bla ma'i sa// 'du 'brel med/
281a1(rgyud): nga'i bde chenas// de sar drug ni sangs rgyas kyi// sa rten bu med mthar gnas so// ngo bo spros med chos sems pa// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go// sems can sems
281a2(rgyud): snyoms byang sems 'dzin// nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so// sems can mi gtong tshul khrims srung sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum// rang gi sngags grub gzhan gyi sngags// bar mi gcod
281a3(rgyud): dang 'gro ba la// byams pa sgrub dang snying rje sgrub// sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu ba ni'o// dben pa bsten dang 'du 'dzi spong // thos pa bsam zhing de don spyod// phyi rol sngags spong ni dang skyong // de dag sngags
281a4(rgyud): sgrub rgyu lnga'o// dad pa 'dun pa gsol ba dang // phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang / spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang // theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang // sngags gzhung tshol ba mo skye dang // dge sbyong
281a5(rgyud): brtson dang drug pa'o// bzlas dang sbyin skyeg mchod gtor brtson// phyi rol dka' thub gdung medra dang // snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang // bu mo pha rol phyin yul lha// 'gro ba mi bsdu chos mi 'byed//
281a6(rgyud): theg dman mi len pa dang bdun// nyan thos rang rgyal blo ldan dang // rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tsom med// lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkun dang // dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang // ser sna med dang gtong la dgas
281a7(rgyud): gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yeng dang // gzi brjid dbang che'i lus thob dang // grags kun blo ldan brgyad por blta// skur pa med cing bden por smra// bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste// brgyad
281b1(rgyud): ba de yang sgrub pa'i rgyu// rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid// gang nig lugs kyu bzung bus gnyis re nas// klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems// kun spong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad d+ha// rtag
281b2(rgyud): par 'chang na gnas 'gyur byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan thub pa chis// blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa// legs so legs so sems dpa' che// gang dag de dag de bzhin du// bde 'dod rnam/
281b3(rgyud): pabar g.yeng ba dang // des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das// gdung ba chags sdang 'khrug pa dang // des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang // dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdod// sngags log spyod byed rig 'dzin
281b4(rgyud): gdon// gdul dka' dgal rgyun rings so// skye ngan 'jigs phyir blo zab spyod// gang gi khyim na rgyud 'di yod// bri dang bklag dang mchod pa dang // rim gro ched zhugs la byed la// bkra shis tshe ring dpal 'byor/
281b5(rgyud): skyed// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang / khro bo du ma dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang /
281b6(rgyud): lnga dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud/
281b7(rgyud): kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma tra/
282a1(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab bdu rgyas pa'i 'che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i gtsug lag 'ang /
282a2(rgyud): chen por paN+Di ta chen po so ma shrI b+ha ba zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lo tsa bak+Shur dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a
282a3(rgyud): mo g+ha pA sha hUM da yaM nA ma mahA yA ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg po chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la
282a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das po ta la ke'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la
282a5(rgyud): dang kha ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan med pa dang / a ti mug ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par brgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong /
282a6(rgyud): phrag bco brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs cig/
282a7(rgyud): tubazhugs so// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
282b1(rgyud): dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ tha gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mos g.yas pa'i lhung sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/
282b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig ni 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i
282b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams su/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdag gi dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
282b4(rgyud): kho gtser byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po'ang 'dus so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong
282b5(rgyud): bdag gis rab tu rnyed do// gzhan gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtogs par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
282b6(rgyud): tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro// gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das
282b7(rgyud): sa'i phyogs gcig pu de mchod rten du 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro// de bcom ldan 'das
283a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yon zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa// sdig pa'i chos
283a2(rgyud): thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa// 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la spong ba/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'athams cad dang // 'phags pa nyan thos
283a3(rgyud): dang // rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yong
283a4(rgyud): su dag cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa 'am// nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de'i phyir khrag tu 'dru ba 'am/ tshad pa'am/ lag pa
283a5(rgyud): nab+ha 'am/ rkang pa na ba 'am/ mgo na pa'am/ ha la ha la yis btab pa 'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ 'bras sam/ bye'u 'bras sam/ g.yan pa 'am/ mtshan ma
283a6(rgyud): rdol ba'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ khyab par na ba'am/ gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ brdeg pa 'am/ bsdigs pa 'am/ mi sman par brjod pa 'am/ mdor
283a7(rgyud): bsdun bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha'am/ sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// sngar nyid nas dag pa'i sems
283b1(rgyud): can dang cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang / rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang mchod
283b2(rgyud): par byed// gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang / don 'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed pa/ 'dri bar byed pa/ 'drir 'jug par byed pa/
283b3(rgyud): kun chub par byed pa/ sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par byed/ sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed
283b4(rgyud): pa dang / dor ba med pa/ gzugs med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/ rgyu med pa/ gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yang ba med pa
283b5(rgyud): phung po lnga dang bral ba'i sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o// de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro// khyed kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par
283b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ji snyed po tor bri ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa 'am/ rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam
283b7(rgyud): gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas shes par bya'o// de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra
284a1(rgyud): grags par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gur kum mam/ grwa rtsi bsnur zhing brgyad cing rdo ba 'am sa la bzhiH/
284a2(rgyud): nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ de la tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gur kum mam/ zlartsi bsnur ba 'am/ brgyad pas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dri zhim po'ang de nyid do// bcom ldan
284a3(rgyud): 'das de lta kho nar bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la'ang gang la la zhig gis 'bya zhing spong ba dang / snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod pa byed pa de dag ni/ bcom lnga 'das dmu/
284a4(rgyud): rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de phyi ma la yang ngo // gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der tshul khrims dang // ting nge 'dzin dang /
284a5(rgyud): shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do// gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/
284a6(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la sbyang bar gnas par byas te/
284a7(rgyud): lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod par yongs su bzlab na/ de la bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyis la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o// nyi shu po gang
284b1(rgyud): den/ gang de'i lus la rang mi 'byung ba dang / las kyi dbang gis na byung ba'ang myur duzhi bar 'gyur ro// snum zhing yid du 'ong ba'i lus dkar bar yang 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i ming du 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
284b2(rgyud): dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang ror rnyed par 'gyur ro// nor yod pa'ang kuni pos 'byor bar mi nus so// mes mi 'tshig go/ chus mi 'khyer ro// rgyal po'i yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so//
284b3(rgyud): de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying
284b4(rgyud): po chu 'am thal ba la yongs su bsngags te phyogs dang / mtshams dang / stang dang / 'og gi gzhi la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// mdangs za bas mdangs
284b5(rgyud): 'phrog par mi nus so// sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// dgra yis 'jigs pa byung ba'ang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang
284b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa drag po'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang / chu dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i 'dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// lhas kyang
284b7(rgyud): rgyun du nye bar srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms
285a1(rgyud): dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o// gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 'thob ste/ brgyad po gang zhen / 'chi ba'i dus su 'phags
285a2(rgyud): paspya nu ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang drug par ston par 'gyur ro// bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro// mthong ba 'khrul pa med do// lag pa g.yob pa
285a3(rgyud): med do// bshang ba med do// gci ba med do// rlung gi rnam pa med do// shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// kha 'og tu bsdus nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//
285a4(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi
285a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bklag par bya'o// chang dang / sha dang / btsong dang / sgog skya dang / de byed la byin po'i lhag ma khyad par du srung bar 'dod pas de rnams spang bar
285a6(rgyud): bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams nus sam mi nus shes par byas la nyan du gzhug par bya'o// slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir/
285a7(rgyud): phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin no// sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du'ang 'gyur
285b1(rgyud): ro/ shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/ de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po de bzhin/
285b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mdun du rjed par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi'ang phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
285b3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas
285b4(rgyud): kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
285b5(rgyud): dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gson cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam
285b6(rgyud): par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang / skye dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i don gyi
285b7(rgyud): phyir yang ngo // na ma s+t+rai ya d+hA a nug ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yaHa tI ta a nA ga ta pra t+yuta pan+d+he b+h+yaHna maHsamyag+ha tA nAM/ na maHsamyaka pra ti pan nA nAM
286a1(rgyud): namaHsha ra dwa ti pudz+wa la mad ma ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya me tre sa pra mu le b+h+yaHma hA be d+hi swAtwA sa n+te b+h+yaHna maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta shaM len+da rA dza pra pu le b+h+yaHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHarbad byungs byugs
286a2(rgyud): bud d+he b+h+yaHb+ha ga bad b+h+yaHna maHsu bar+N+Na bar+t+ta su pre ti b+hA sa bi nar ti te shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ka na maHsaM ha bi kr-i Di ta rA dzA ya ka ta thA ga tA ya/ nam Ar+ya e mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya kan maHsu pra
286a3(rgyud): tiSh+Thi ta me Ni kA Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta ra smAd ka ta shri kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na me bi pa sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya na mo bi shra b+hu dza ta thA ga tA ya
286a4(rgyud): na maHkra kur+N+Ne na dA ya ta prA ga tA yan maHka na ka mu na yau/ ta thA ga tA ya na maHkA sh+ye pA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshAk+Sha mu na ya ta thA ga tA ya/ arba te sa myaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA
286a5(rgyud): au ru ne mu ne ma hA pu na ye swa hwe/ e sha ma shra me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satAMsh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne sA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kArti ta nA ma d+hi yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ti a wa b+hA sa bi
286a6(rgyud): dzi ta sa rnam shi yi 'brug tA ya/ na maHan+di ke tud+ha dze shrI ye ta thA ga tI ye ka na me ret+na prab+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ma ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a pra ti he ha b+he'i tsu rA dzA ya / ta thA ga tA ya na mo bi kArA ga mi
286a7(rgyud): ni badz+ra ga tA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya na mo a tI ta a nA ga ta pra tu pan+de d+ho/ sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi sa te myo b+hag par d+huHka tid+ya thA/ smr-i ti bad+hA da~M/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni ka~M ga

288a1(rgyud): swAhA/ a b+ha ya dA ya swAhA/ dza yA yA sAr+b+ba/ bi dza yA ya swAhA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swAhA/ ba ra dA ya swA hU/ ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mri t+yA pra sha ma nA ya sAhA/ idany+dza
288a2(rgyud): kar+m+ma ku ru na mo stu te swA hA/ oM ra Na ra NA hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dza ye hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dz+re dz+r-IM dz+r-IM swA hA/ oM hUM dza ye swA hA/ oM hrI trai likya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA shA a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhUM phaT swAhA oM ba/
288a3(rgyud): su byA ti swA hA/ oM I ro lI ka swA hA/ oM be hu le be hu le swA hA/ oM A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhU~M phaT swAh+mA/ ni yaM ta a ni ya ta be dA nI ya a shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wa na kar+m+ma No a she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/
288a4(rgyud): oM pad+ma hista ya swA hA/ oM bud+d+he d+har+m+ma saM g+hA ya swA hAbaklags pas las thams cid 'grub pa yin no// dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// las
288a5(rgyud): kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// a ka ru'i bdug spos dang thal ba dang / chu dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo // rims
288a6(rgyud): nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o// nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon chas gcad cing srung skud
288a7(rgyud): kyang bya'o// ljon bal tshwa chus nyams par byed pa 'am/ 'jim bag gam/ chus kyang bya'o// mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o// so'i nangad la kar wI ra'i so shing gis
288b1(rgyud): so ma mas cing ba lani tshon sna lnga'i thung ba la lan ci shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng steng gi phur du bkal bcings te phyogs pazhir gangab par byas na mtshams bcings/
288b2(rgyud): bayin no// thams cad du srung srung dam/ chu'am/ thal bas byo'o// gapa'i thams cad latshon sA lnga'i srung pas bya'o// rims thams cad la sdud pa dkar po sa bya'o// sbrul dang
288b3(rgyud): sprin bu dang / bsdu byi ba dang / ldog pa dang / gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pibi ling dang ldan pas bya'o// mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'om/ rgyu stegs kyi chu 'am/ sbyang rtsi 'am/
288b4(rgyud): shing ngar gyis bya'o// rtsod pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa dang mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o// yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum
288b5(rgyud): gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de'i chus kyang gtor bar byas na sems can thams cad
288b6(rgyud): srung ba yin no// nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang yams rnams ni ba yin no// phyag rgya tsan dan gyi thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar yongs su bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad
288b7(rgyud): zad par byed do// rtag tu bzlas na khyim srung ba'o// pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis sems can thams cad kyi srung ba'o// tsan den gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang / 'byung po dang / rgyu skar thams cad las
289a1(rgyud): srung ba'o// rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / na gu li dang / dri'i nagu li dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang / dbang po'i lag
289a2(rgyud): pa dang // dri'i pri yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nad da zhes bya ba ste/ de dag gang yang rung ba la brgya rtsa brgyad
289a3(rgyud): kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o// byis pa rnams kyi ni mgul du'o// bud med rnams kyi mdoms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba
289a4(rgyud): dang ldan par byed do// g.yang med pa nyams nas bu'ang ster ro// nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no// dug dang mes mi tshugs so// dug gis byas pa'ang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
289a5(rgyud): nad byung ba'ang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro// gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / sprin dang / thog ni chus rengs par byed do// ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad byed do// 'phags pa
289a6(rgyud): spyani ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do// de nas sgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho gau ni tshon snga ma lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku
289a7(rgyud): gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ ri dgas kyi pags pas spad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugasa'i rang
289b1(rgyud): ban+d+ha thabs cang kyis brgyan pa bya'o// lha bcomakhan gso sbyong dang thun pas ma bri bar ba'o// de nas sgrub pa thos spu gzugs de'i mdun du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la mirtog la
289b2(rgyud): bye bkras de/ dri nem po'i rgyas bkang ba'i bus pa brgyad gdag par bya'o// nye bar spyad pa brgyad dang / nye bar mkhe ba drug cu rtsa ba'i dang / khrag med pa'i gtos ga dang bcas pa bya'o// a ka ru'i bdun/
289b3(rgyud): spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o// nyin zhag gcig tu snang bar gnas pa'am/ dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas ges gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas
289b4(rgyud): bzlas pa bya'o// de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid bris pa bltas na de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te bsam pa thams cad yongs
289b5(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed do// ldong ros sam mig sman la yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus na de nas mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs
289b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo// sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de 'dis byed do zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
289b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang /
290a1(rgyud): dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i/
290a2(rgyud): mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badz+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
290a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha bA sha hri da yaM ma hA na nA mad+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yong zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs sangs rgyas dang byang
290a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos thams
290a5(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs
290a6(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog
290a7(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu chen po thob pa la phyag

291a5(rgyud): bi lo ki tA/ lo kaM shwa ra/ ma hA shwa ra/ tri b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa ma a laM kri ta/ a wa lo ki te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM

291a7(rgyud): cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ de bzhin du gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / rdeg pa dang / spyo ba dang / rgyal po dang me dang chu dang dug dang / mtshan las yongs
291b1(rgyud): / rA d+hA/ / nu cu ru/ in la/ 2/ ma Ar+ya sad+has rba/ 6/ pa / ma
291b2(rgyud): dbyu ba/ sems pa/ thasams/ rnas nas/ na rlo / mahA mo// na na kAng ben// khwa dar mi pa'i zur// ma la ma la/ ma mamay-i/ mu lu sa Ta/ #
291b3(rgyud): Ti Ti TiTi/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ thi thiHthi/ d+hu d+hu trudz+dza/ e nai ya tsarbA kr-ita pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi mahA kA ru Ni ka/ I shwa ra/ me he shwa ra~M/ mahA b+hu ta ga Na sa~M b+han+ta ka/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru
291b4(rgyud): kha ra ba ra/ he ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sar sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud d+ha bi sha ya ni bA si ni/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dzA u pa
291b5(rgyud): b+h+r-iH/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dzA shi ra si kri ta dza TA ma ku Ta/ ma hA ad b+hU ta/ kA ma laM a laM kri ta ka rata la/ d+h+ya na/ sa mA d+hi/ bi mo k+Sha/ a pra kam+'u da~M hu satwa
291b6(rgyud): san ta ti/ pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba kar+m+ma a wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba dzI dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/ sarba satwa a shA pa ri pA ra ka/ sarba satwaM sa mA shwA sa na
291b7(rgyud): ka ra na mo stu te swAhAM/ a me g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+hA pA shA ya sAhA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA yai swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya sA hAM/ a mi tA b+ha su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra se r+ya
292a1(rgyud): A sa / aH s+'u s+sahA/ \u0f7fsa g+hu swA snrunas sa/ m+mu / rdum pa rnams par du la san/ byur bA /
292a2(rgyud): swa sAn+tu/ a kA la mri t+yA thA shi ma nA ye swAn+d+ha/ i daMHme kar+m+ma ku run mo stu te swedz+dza/ oM ra N+De ra Na hUM phaT+Ta/ idz+ra dz+r-i dz+ra/ oM dzA dzi d+hu s+yAd+d+ha oM hU~M dza ye swAd+he/ oM hrIHtrai la~Mkya
292a3(rgyud): bi dzi la a mo g+ha pA sha e br-i ti ha ta hrIHye hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs bum pa la bzlas pas mo bgegs kyis brlams pa'am/ 'dre gdon
292a4(rgyud): gyis zin pa 'am byad 'og tu chud pa 'am/ bud med byung ngan cing bu med pa 'am bu mi 'tsho ba la sogs pa la phan par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bya na/ 'bab chu'i 'gram mam shing
292a5(rgyud): gcig pa'i drung ngam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ khang stong la sogs pa'i dbus nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa blang bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi la nub phyogs sam/
292a6(rgyud): byang phyogs kyi sgo btod pa zhig tshon rtsi dkar po sna gcig gis bris te/ dbus su'ang pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa zhig bris la/ gser dngul lam zangs kyi bus pa ma zhum pa ni 'jig pa 'am/
292a7(rgyud): kham pa'i bus pa gsar pa so btang ba'i nag po dang ra ri med pa gcig spos chus bkang ste/ rin po che sna lnga/ sman sna lnga/ 'bru sna lnga thugs la/ mgul ras dkar po gsar pa kha tshar
292b1(rgyud): ma bcad pa dang me tog gi 'phreng bas bcings te/ kA khar shug pa'amathang shing gi mgo lcogs bcug la me tog dang 'bras bus brgyan pa gcig pud+ma'i steng du bzhag la/ gzungs rlog
292b2(rgyud): pa nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bsgyur te/ bum pa de'ang rin rjen rdzing bu bdud rtsi'i chus grang bar bsams lo chu de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar po gcig byung bar
292b3(rgyud): bsams te/ pad+mo de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yi ge dkar po bsams te/ yi ge de las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu gyur par bsams la
292b4(rgyud): mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te/ gang bsgrubs pa'i dngos po grub par gyur cig ces gsol ba btab pas a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs mang pos bum pa de la lan bcu gsum du tshig gzhan mi
292b5(rgyud): smra bar bzlas te/ bum pa de'i chus de'i spyi bo nas blugs na bgegs dang gdon la sogs pa las thar par 'gyur ro// de la gos dang bcas par spyi bo nas blugs la blugs pa'i tshe'ang
292b6(rgyud): gzungs klog pa dang klog par bya ba gnyis kas kyang lus phyi nang gnyis dag pa dang / 'dre gdon las thar par sems rtse gcig sems shing bklag gi/ gos gsher ba de'ang yugs dor ba'i thabs
292b7(rgyud): su bor la/ gos dkar re gsor bzhon te/ spos dang me tog la sogs pas lus brgyan pa de nyid lan cig bsngags pas lus bsrungs te bkra shis kyang bklag go// dkyil 'khor de'i khor khor yug tu
293a1(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyang so so'i mying smos te spyan drangs la mchod nas/ las gang bsgrub pa de grub par gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/ mchod pa rnam pa lnga pa bag
293a2(rgyud): gis mchod la// 'byung po phal rnams la'ang gtor ma rgya cher sbyin no// bdag bsrung ba dang mtshams gcad pa'ang a mo g+he pA sha'i gzungs de nyid kyis tshul bzhin du byas na/ de'ang tshes brgyad la bya ba'i
293a3(rgyud): rigs so// cho ga 'di bgegs kyis brlams pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ mi tha mal pa la byas na'ang phyis bgegs dang byang stems kyis
293a4(rgyud): mi tshugs/ nad 'go bas mi thebs/ dpal che zhing bsams so cog 'grub par 'gyur ro// rin po che sna lnga la gserab+hu ru/ mu tig/ dung / shIl/ sman lnga la/ sang hi/ byi gri/ gi ri ka'i
293a5(rgyud): rni sa ha/ sa ha de ba 'bru sna lnga la/ nas so ba/ 'bras so ba/ til/ gro/ mon sran pa ma sha'o// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
293a6(rgyud): rgya gar skad du Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha bA ra ra mi ta Sha Ta pA ri pU ra ya nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs
293a7(rgyud): par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas deng byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshas
293b1(rgyud): lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la drug 'tshal lo// oM a mo b+hA pa sha ma \u0f7fda nA pUr mi t+na pa ri bu rasna
293b2(rgyud): d+h+r-i/ dwe d+har/ bI bi nar/ dI rI tre d+ha saHsa/ u pA b+ho ka / ta thAg te/ ma dAn/ hU~M dzi maHpra ba tA sati rata ra/ twAr ya/ mtha tham gyi hU~M phaT swAd+ha/ 'don ngan meng lags pa
293b3(rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po chen po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam gyi sbyin pa'ang byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mchod sbyin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa chen po
293b4(rgyud): shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
293b5(rgyud): chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha shI la ka saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ mahA shud d+hA satwa pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta/ b+h+yaH
293b6(rgyud): d+ha ra d+hA ra/ sa man+ta a wa lo ki te hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas smyung bar gnas pa byas te mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu drangs pas brjod par
293b7(rgyud): byas so// de nas den yod gags pa'i snying po'i rdzas brjod bya'o// bcas brjod byas pa tsam gyis song lo tshul khrims dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// chul khribs kyi pha ro tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
294a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po mang po lus la 'byung zhing // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig nyi ma re re zhing gzungs 'di dran par
294a2(rgyud): byed na/ den rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dge slong gangal la zhig tshul khribs zhig cing nyams par gyur pas snang bar gnas pa byas te/ gzungs 'di bzlas brjod byas
294a3(rgyud): paM tsam gyis me la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang
294a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po snying rje chen po drang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+hak+Shan ti sarba bo d+hi satwa k+Sha mi Na/ k+Sha NAk+Sha NA ma hA me tri kA ru NA/ sarba
294a5(rgyud): satwa bta sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba sata k+Sha ma Na hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pas sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa dang // bzod pa chen po dang / snying brtse ba dang /
294a6(rgyud): snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa dang / byol seng gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ringags dang / bya dang / ltos 'gro la sogs pa gang dgra 'das pa gang yin pa
294a7(rgyud): dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang la la mig gzungs 'di dran pas bzod pa'i mchog sgom par byed na/ de sems can dmyal ba/
294b1(rgyud): dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhing // skye bo'i tshogs mang po sdug bsngal la gnas pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing
294b2(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'i gnas par gyur gyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
294b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa s+pha na ra sa gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ma hA bIr+ya a mo g+ha bi le ki teb ra ba ra/ dri TA bIr+ya mahA ba la/ ba la ba
294b4(rgyud): la/ ma hA be d+h+yaM ga/ ba la/ be d+hi hUM baT swAhA/ gzungs 'dri dus rtag tu dran pa 'am/ yongs su dag cing spro ba'i yid kyi sa dran pa tsam gyis mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
294b5(rgyud): su dag par 'gyur ro// gang 'di yid la byed pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i sna 'ga' tsam byas pa'ang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur/ stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/ myur bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi
294b6(rgyud): snying po la 'dug gi bar du brtson 'grus nyams par mi 'gyur/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ brtson pa chen por 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi
294b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
295a1(rgyud): oM sanatu nag mas so thAka dud+ha/ d+hun sanAnI/ sarba pa so// a b+ha kas+thAka/ tsu ru d+ha r+'u/ bru~M thA smrag+sa/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa
295a2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du yid la byed pas rtse gcig tu dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
295a3(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams du zhugs par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang byed
295a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
295a5(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA a ba b+hA sa swa b+hA ba / sa maM ta sA ra Na/ bud d+hi pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pra dzA a
295a6(rgyud): ba lo ki te tsak+Shu ShA ma hA pradzA/ ba rarA ma Ni mahA pradz+nyA pad+ma d+hA ra Ni b+hu dzaM hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
295a7(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i blo chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
295b1(rgyud): pathabasas dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pan 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab kyi rdo dang rab tu gyur bar 'a//
295b2(rgyud): yan la yang du rol tu phyin badrug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzong ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las yongs
295b3(rgyud): su rnams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la yang dag par rjes su song ba zhes bya
295b4(rgyud): ba'i de kho na nyid dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// blo gros dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rab tu dgongs par
295b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su sems par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gzungs chen po
295b6(rgyud): rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta many+dzu shI warma dang / lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// lo tsa ba ches kyi shes rab kyis kyang bsgyur te gtan
295b7(rgyud): la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du da sha b+hU mi d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ sa bcu pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
296a1(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gsang sngags la 'jigs pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad so sor sgrub par 'gyur ba ni/ e/ zhes bya ba don yod zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor
296a2(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad gsong sngags yi ge gcig tu 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas nas dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// sngon sdig pa bsags pa'i sems can dmyal
296a3(rgyud): ba mi bzad pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ji ltar rlung gis phyag dar gtor ba bzhin 'jig par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ don thams cad rjes su 'jug par/
296a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang dkyil 'khor gyi lha gzhan yang dgyes par 'gyur la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do//
296a5(rgyud): gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba dran nas tshe 'phos pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngag so yi ge gcig pu'o// oM b+h+yaHyi ge gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas/
296a6(rgyud): nas gnyis pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi spyan snga na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad rjes su sbyin par mdzad do// sdig pa thams
296a7(rgyud): cad kyang rnam par dag par mdzad do// sngon gyi las ngan gyi nadang kyang sos par 'gyur/ nor gyi dbang phyug nor bu bzang po'i bu dbang du 'gyur shing ge bar gnas par 'gyu // mi gang gis kyang phyi zhing bar chad/
296b1(rgyud): byed nus par mi 'gyur/ che 'phos nas kyang ri bu 'dzin du skye bar 'gyur// don yod nags pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// yi ge gnyis pa'o// oM pad+me/ gsang sngags mi ge gsum pa 'dum/
296b2(rgyud): biSh+Tha sa brjod byas nas gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
296b3(rgyud): dbang phyug gzhon nu'i cha byad can mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad do// don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor ston por mdzad
296b4(rgyud): de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su sbyin par mdzad do// yi ge gsum pa'o// oM pad+ma hrIH/ gsang sngags
296b5(rgyud): yi ge bzhi pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa bzhi pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing dpung pa
296b6(rgyud): brkyang nas phyag spyi bar 'jog par mdzad la/ rig sngags 'chung la legs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad dang / rig sngags 'chang tshur shog/ khyod kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad/
296b7(rgyud): yongs su dge ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shin tu dri ma med par yongs su dag go// mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// phyir/
297a1(rgyud): zhing nams kyang mngal na gnas pas gos par mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sa bkri pa'o// oM bad+ma b+hu dze/ gsang sngags yi ge
297a2(rgyud): lnga pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa lnga pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad do// sgrib pa
297a3(rgyud): thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes pa'i sgra sbyin par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
297a4(rgyud): skyes te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pas/ rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs
297a5(rgyud): por bskyed par 'gyur zhing / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bskyed par 'gyur/ khyod kyis don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya chen po'i rim
297a6(rgyud): par phye ba 'grub cing / rig sngags 'chang khyod sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad spangs kyis byas pa thams cad kyis shig/ yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du de dag thams cad
297a7(rgyud): shin du grub par 'gyur ro// sa lnga pa'o// oM pad+ma lo ki te/ gzungs sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas drug pa 'thob ste 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang
297b1(rgyud): bar mdzad par 'gyur/ stong gsum gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phrame snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing mngon
297b2(rgyud): gsum du ston par mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan des/ rig sngags 'chang de la
297b3(rgyud): yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang khyod nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog/ las byas pa shin tu yongs su zad cing //
297b4(rgyud): khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams ni phye/ khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon dang rigs sbyin ni khong du chud
297b5(rgyud): khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhogs pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi snying po dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
297b6(rgyud): pa'i las sgrung pa rnams ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shig/ oM pad+ma dza la hU~M d+h+r-ika/ yi ge bdun pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin pad+ma dri ma med pa sgrib pa dang bral
297b7(rgyud): bdag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs su 'gyur/ sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus kyi sna gang gis stong
298a1(rgyud): gsus kyi ga chen po'i ji na gyi khams kyi sangasargyas kyi gang thams cad kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed cing / gang da gang du 'ong zer cher 'bar ba rnam pa sa tshogs pa dag pa' ma la
298a2(rgyud): me tog gi char sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcor pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
298a3(rgyud): dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba gser gyi kha dog can dpung pa brkyang sde/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs 'byin par mdzad de rig sngags
298a4(rgyud): 'chang legs so legs so// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po gsang ba brjod kyi cho ga mchod pa'i mchog yin no// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po
298a5(rgyud): gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po yang dag pa'o// rig sngags 'chang khyod kyi dkyil 'kho mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po'i cho ga
298a6(rgyud): zhib mo dang don yod zhags pa'i snying por sprul pa grub kyi rig sngags 'chang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gyis shig/ oM a mo g+ha ma Ni padz+ra
298a7(rgyud): gzungs kyi snying po yi ge brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lus shin tu yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis nor bu rin po che me shel ltar phyi nas shin tu yongasu
298b1(rgyud): dag pa de sar rig sngags 'chang lus yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
298b2(rgyud): gzig dbang drug rang gi lus yongs su dag par rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bor ston cing / rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du gnas pa la rig sngags 'chang yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/
298b3(rgyud): phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'dzeg pa mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i bsam pa dga' ba la
298b4(rgyud): zhugs so// rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdzad mnyam par 'brel ba'i 'jig rten rnam par lta bar tshur shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis don
298b5(rgyud): ming rags pa bcwa'i madrug kor gyi snying po dkyil 'khor sasang 'thub kyis/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa dras pa bya ba thams cad kyis shig/ oM bcwol tshon tu du rje
298b6(rgyud): gzungs sngags yi ge dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sa dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
298b7(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa dgu dag rig sngags 'chang la mngon sum du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par byed/
299a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad do// legs so zhes bya ba'ang sbyin pa mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po lags so legs so//
299a2(rgyud): khyod kyis dang zhing sbyangs pa'i las legs par bsgrub par byas so// khyod kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa grub ste/ don yod zhags pa'i dkyil
299a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde dang lung dang bcas pa bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'dren pas bskrun pa gang yin pa de dag grub pa yin no// oM pad+mo Sh+NI ka bi ma le hUM phaT/ gsang/
299a4(rgyud): sngags yi ge bcu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par gyur nas sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod la/ bla na med pa yang dag
299a5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ don yod zhags pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa'i sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyi dngos
299a6(rgyud): grub blan med pa 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par sprul pa bzlas brjod tsam gyis 'grub pa yin te/ bdag gis sngar bstan pa thams cad la lhag par zhen/ gtsang ma gtsang sbra spyod pa/
299a7(rgyud): gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ byabs pa'i sems dang snying rje skyes pa/ bden par smrab blamal gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pache ba/ blam dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod
299b1(rgyud): pa byed pa 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med par bstan to// sa bcu pa'i gzungs phan yon dang rtog pa rdzogs so//
299b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha kawA rA dzA bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
299b3(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
299b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis shing bsngags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa'i
299b5(rgyud): rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo zhes bgyi ba 'di nyid skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / rjes su brtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du brjod par bgyi yis gson cig/ oM pad+ma hasta ma hA a mo g+ha
299b6(rgyud): bA sha hA yAM sa ma lA hring yAM tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba ste/ las thams cad kyang bgyid pa'o// oM di bya sa pU nAM ge bi lo ge ki k+Sha Ni hUM/ mkhar
299b7(rgyud): gsil gyi rig pa ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na sgra tsam grags pas sems can rnams ngan 'gro las thar par 'gyur ro// oM padz+ra pU ra ya a mo g+ha ba to sa man+ta pre b+he swAhA/ lhung bzed kyi rig pa ste/
300a1(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na bdud rdzi'i rnam par 'gyur zhing / gang gis zos pa rnams ngan 'gro las thar par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya thal mo lhan cig tu dam du sbyar ba las
300a2(rgyud): slar pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis nas mdzub me nor bu lta bur bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/ lag pa spyi bor gan se nas bzhan
300a3(rgyud): pa spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i rig pa 'di lan bdun brjod do// oM t+yai d+ha a nu ga ta a b+hi Shany+tsA tu mAM sarba trai ya d+h+wi ke pad+ma ma Ni su pad+me a mo g+he sarba ta thA ga tA ya a d+hiSh+Tha te hU~M/ rig pa 'dis dbang /
300a4(rgyud): bskor ba tsam gyi rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'a
300a5(rgyud): gi rgyal po chen por yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi gtso bo gcig
300a6(rgyud): pu'i gnas su'ang 'gyur bar the tshom ma mchis so// oM pad+moSh+NI Sha bi ma le hUM phaT/ bcom ldan 'das rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di snying rje
300a7(rgyud): dang ldan par bgyis te/ bzlas brjod bgyis na byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba nags bcu la gnas pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i skye dgu dag gis 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes/
300b1(rgyud): rjod par 'gyur la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur
300b2(rgyud): te 'di la the tsom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'di ni yon tan chen po tshad ma mchis pa rnams dang ldan par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
300b3(rgyud): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags kyi snying po 'di dag ni yig 'gyur re tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsas gyi kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/
300b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu gang gis ched du gnyer te/ ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod dang / sgrub pa dang / tsho gas tshul bzhin du rgyas par sgrub pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
300b5(rgyud): pad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po khro bo'i gzungs sngags rim par phye ba gsang sngags chen po yi ge bcu pa 'di lan cig tsam dran nama?/ bklags sam/ ming tsam yang bzung ngang
300b6(rgyud): dus tshigs 'ga' rer dran pa tsam gyis kyang sems can de'i mtshams med pa'i las byas pas mnar med pa'i dmyal bar gzhol ba tshe bsgral par gnas par 'gyur ba'ang las thams cad
300b7(rgyud): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyang rab tu zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad nga bral bar 'gyur//
301a1(rgyud): tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tsher bas thams cad du skye badran par 'gyur/ nam yang ngan 'thor 'gro bar mi 'gyur
301a2(rgyud): bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgyad cur 'khor los sgyur ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rab tu dgongs
301a3(rgyud): par gyur ro// sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rtsa bdon yod zhags pa'i pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyi
301a4(rgyud): snying po dri ma med pa gsang ba 'di rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las lan cig tsam
301a5(rgyud): yang dran par yid la byed cing / yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong
301a6(rgyud): ba'i blo dang / dmigs pa dang ldan pas sems can gang yang rung ba'i rna khung du brjod na sems can de dag ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med // sems can de dag thams cad dge
301a7(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod na rims dang 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / ldog pa dang /
301b1(rgyud): me dpal dang / g.yan pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze nad thams cad rab tu'i bar 'gyur ro// lan bzhi brjod na dug dang dbyig dug dang / byang dang / gshed byed dang / thams
301b2(rgyud): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan lnga brjod na 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / gshegs su gyur pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan drug brjod na 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
301b3(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan bdun brjod na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi
301b4(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang / yams thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de lta bas na sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re bzhin du tshig gzhan mi smra bar snying po 'di lan bdun dran pas bzlas
301b5(rgyud): pa bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la dag 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba bcu rab tu spyod pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs pa/ 'phags pa'i gang zag la rab tu brnyas pas
301b6(rgyud): de dag sems can dmyal bar gzhol bas tshe'i dus byas par gyur pa dang / dge slong gang lal dag rang gi brlab pa'i sdom pa dral ba/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral cing zhig pa dang / mkhan po dang/
301b7(rgyud): slob dpon la mgus shing 'khu ba dang / dam pa'i chos la rma 'byin pas tshe'i dus byas par gyur nas/ sems can dmyal bar gnal bar gyur pa de dag gi don du bye ma gtsang ma la lan
302a1(rgyud): zangs bdun bdun bzlas nas/ dur khrod du bor ba'i ro dang / ro bsregs pa'i rus pa 'am/ dur mchung ngu gcug pa'i ro 'am/ rus pa la bye ma des gtor bar bya'o// gang /
302a2(rgyud): dang gang na sems can rnams kyi rus pa gang dag yod pa de dang de dag tu bye ma des gtor ma thag tu/ de dang der byems phog pa'i sems can de dgra rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang /
302a3(rgyud): dud 'gro dang / sha za'i skye gnas dang // gnod sbyin gyi skye gnas su skyes par gyur na'ang de dag nga'i mong la tshe brdzes nas thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha dang mi'i gnas su rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur zhing /
302a4(rgyud): phyin chad nam yang sems can thams cad dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags yi ge bcu pa 'di nyid gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shog bu la bris
302a5(rgyud): te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ gnas der srog chags rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mangs pa dang / rkang med pa gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad mchod rten de'i grib ma phog
302a6(rgyud): patsam gyis de dag gi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing mtho ris su gnol bar 'gyur ro// ri dgas dang / bya dang / wa dang / khyi dang / ne'u le dang / thog sbur dang / sbrul dang / rus
302a7(rgyud): sbal dang / lag 'gro la sogs pa sron chags phra mo gang dag gis mchod rten de'i grib ma la 'khrims pa thams cad kyang grib sa pog pa tsam gyis de dag rnams kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
302b1(rgyud): drag par 'gyur zhing / de ga thams cad kyang bab+h+yo ris kyi 'jig rten du gshol bar 'gyur ro// bung dung la sogs pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon po'i rtse mo nas dung de bus na
302b2(rgyud): sems can gang dag gis dung do'i sgra thos pa'i skyes pa 'am/ bung med ngam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo'am/ lA'am/ yi dges sam/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de dag thams cad de
302b3(rgyud): 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad nas chos thos te rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag sbyin pa la
302b4(rgyud): dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum nye bar gang bzung ba dang / gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems
302b5(rgyud): dpa'i sdom pas yang dag par bsdams pa de dag gis sgra de bros na de dag thams cad byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
302b6(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe de brjes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dkor sa 'am/
302b7(rgyud): skye bo'i dbus sem rgyal po'i pi brang du 'dug par byas na/ gang dag de'i dri'i bsnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par byang bar 'gyur te/
303a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// chos gos la rab tu bdugs nas lus la gyon na gang zag de'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad ma lus par
303a2(rgyud): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lus la bab pa tsam gyis bag chags kyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / nyon mongs pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// gos la bdugs te bcangs pa tsam gyis 'jig
303a3(rgyud): rten thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag gi gos la rab tu bdugs te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po dang btsun mor bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro//
303a4(rgyud): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su zhugs na dge 'dun thams cad kyi mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhugs na nor dang longs spyod chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing
303a5(rgyud): mchod gnas chen po'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// tsa na dan gyi bdug pa'i cho ga'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rtog pa lasapad+ma'i gtsug tor dri ma med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
303a6(rgyud): de nas khro bo'i rgyal po che'i// rtog pa rab tu bshad bya ste// don yod rgyal po rmad byung tsho// kun tu dngos grub thogs med cing // dkyil 'khor kun tu dbang bskur bas// sdang ba thams cad rab tu
303a7(rgyud): 'joms// bdud dang bgegs dpung rnam par 'jig// gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// byung po thams cad rab tu 'bros// bsam pa thams cad rab rdzogs byed // oM TI ku Ti daMSh+Ta a mo g+ha sa ma
303b1(rgyud): e sa d+hi byams nabang a mo ga ags ni d+hA/ mI li mi li swAn/ khro ba'i rgyabya ba'i sring po'o// de nas sgra gzugs kyi tshug ni dngul la khro ba'i rgyal po so nyis kyi tshad tsam shin tu/
303b2(rgyud): mdzes shing tshed dang ldan pa/ gdong gsum pa/ ram pa'i thor tsugs can/ rgyal po 'od dpag tu med pas spyi bor brtan pa/ zla ba tshes pa mgol thogs pa/ gdong gsum gyi dang po thob gas/
303b3(rgyud): cung zad 'dzum pa// g.yon gang mo dgod pa/ lagu pa bzhi pa/ g.yas dang pon pad+ma/ 'og man ral gri 'phyar ba/ g.yon dang po na 'gas pa/ 'og man mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pag rgyan thams cad/
303b4(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la rgyal po'i rol stangs kyis 'dug pa/ gcan gzan khro bo'i pags pas smad dkris pa'o// g.yas phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma ut+pa la thogs pa
303b5(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// g.yon phyogs su ni lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi drung du
303b6(rgyud): rlig sngags 'chang pus me btsugs pa lag na spos phor thogs shing bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta ba'o/ yang na ni ri mor bri bar bya ste cho ga bzhin no// gzugs brnyan de dag
303b7(rgyud): gi drung du ba'i lci bas byug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing / gur kum gyis mchod yon bya ste/ me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor ro'i stengs du
304a1(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po bzhugs su gsol te/ de'i drung du bzlas brjod stong phrag brgyad bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rkang pas phan tshun du 'chag
304a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gzugs las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ legs so zhes sgra 'byin par 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams so cog
304a3(rgyud): thams cad dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur
304a4(rgyud): ro// dran pa tsam gyis mod la dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// bklags pas las thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang //
304a5(rgyud): grub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i zhags pa nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon chad bsags pa'i bsod nams dang las kyi bsgo skal thams cad mngon su
304a6(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du dpal chen po thob pa dang che ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gdong du bltas te bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro//
304a7(rgyud): pad+ma nas bzung ste bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ral grinas bzung ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na nam mkha' la 'gro
304b1(rgyud): pa'i dngos sung thob par 'gyur ro// rtse gsum nas bzung ste stong rtsa brgyang bzlas brjod byas na 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkeng pa nas bzung /
304b2(rgyud): ste bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nor rnams nye bar ga ni//
304b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// cad pan lo lan+da brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbul bcings na nges par dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// bzlas/
304b4(rgyud): brjod dang sgrub pa 'di dag gis ni 'phags pa spa na ras gzigs dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs kyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du byon te/ ci dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
304b5(rgyud): 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga las phyung ba rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta many+dzu shrI warma dang / lo tsa ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te
304b6(rgyud): gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki Thar e ka dra she mu kha nA ma d+hA ra ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs
304b7(rgyud): dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
305a1(rgyud): dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang du mas yongs su bskor she/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rlabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
305a2(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig
305a3(rgyud): gis gsungs pa lags te/ de sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / zo nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa dang bkra mi shis pa dang garmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba/
305a4(rgyud): dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / ma zhugs pa rnams dang bar bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du ba shad par bgyi'o// bcom
305a5(rgyud): ldan 'das snying po 'dis bsrung bar bgyi ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bzung bar bgyis pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyis pa dang / chad pa spangs pa dang / mtshon cha sdang /
305a6(rgyud): pa dang / dug gzhi la ba bgyis bral/ gang la la zhig 'gal bar bgyid pa de ma mchis te/ de ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer
305a7(rgyud): bcas pa ni bdag gis ma mthong ste/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs lags so// snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bstod cing dgongs pa lags so// bcom ldan
305b1(rgyud): 'das padag gi snying po 'din de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su grags rangs par mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dram lags te khasas pa gda'i klung gi byes snyed kyi snga ro'am/
305b2(rgyud): de bzhi gshegs pa pad+ma brgya'i spyan gtsug gis chags pa'i dus 'joms pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi babyung snasdang dag drang srong du gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di mnos lags te/ zos
305b3(rgyud): mthag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang thob ste/ de ltar bdag gi snying po 'di ni gces spras bgyid pa lags so// de lta lags pas
305b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu po dang ba dang ldan pas gus par bgyis la snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// gzhan yid la mi bgyid par rtag tu brjod par bgyi'o// nang par langs nas brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/ tshe 'di
305b5(rgyud): la yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ bro nang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / des bsgrims mi 'tshal bar nor
305b6(rgyud): dang / 'bru dang / dbyig rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad khugs shing thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po'i tshogs pa rnams gseng por smra bar sems par 'gyur ba dang / lus la dug gis mi
305b7(rgyud): tshugs pa dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs pa dang / rims kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan chas mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyis
306a1(rgyud): 'gum pa'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags so// gzhan yang yon tan pani yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ 'bum/
306a2(rgyud): pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yang bam spangs pas 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang
306a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa ga d+hA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol gyi yang ches snga rol du de bzhin
306a4(rgyud): gshegs pa man da ra ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ de nas bdag khyim par gyur pas 'di bzung nas bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil lags so// bdag gis snying po 'di bton pas byang chub sems
306a5(rgyud): dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying rje 'jug pa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba thob lags so// gang dag bcing bas bcings pa rnams dang / gang dag bcing ba la thug pa rnams dang / che ba dang
306a6(rgyud): zhugs dang / sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zhen pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag gi snying po 'dis gnas pa dang / bskyab pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen bgyi'o// gnod sbyin dang srin po sdang
306a7(rgyud): ba rnams kyang snying po 'dis bkug la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems su bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di
306b1(rgyud): ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so// lan cig brjod pas rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga po dag kyang ma lus par 'byung bar 'gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
306b2(rgyud): nan tan bgyid pa lta spos kyang ci 'tshal/ de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na/ bzlas brjod bgyid pa dang sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/
