306b3(rgyud): bsams pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// su zhig bdag gi slad du tshes bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga la spung ba bgyis na/ de bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil bar 'gyur lags so//
306b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 'dzin pa ni don mchis te/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bas lhag lags so// bdag gi ming 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur/
306b5(rgyud): bro nang thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig cho ga bzhin du
306b6(rgyud): sbyor ba bgyid na de dag gi sug par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal po/ rigs kyi bu khyod sems can thams cad la de ltar snying rje che ba legs so legs so/
306b7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu thabs 'dis sems can thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par nus te rangs kyang snying po 'di bzung zhing rjes su yi rang ba byas kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/
307a1(rgyud): smros shig/ de nus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ thagos phrag pa gcig tu gapar nas bcom ldan
307a2(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te snying po 'dri smras so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sAM gA rA bi ro tsan byA hA rA dzA yai/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ sa d+ya ka sa~M bud+d+hA ya na maHsarba ta thA ga teH
307a3(rgyud): arba te b+h+yaHsama?ka saM bud d+hed+d+ho/ na ma Ar+yA ba le ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwe ya ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru Ing ti/
307a4(rgyud): bAn+d+he/ tsa le tsa li/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su me ba re/ i li mi lai/ tsi ti dz+wa la me ba nA ya sA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni sgrub mi dgos par las thams cad byed de/ rims nyin gcig pa dang /
307a5(rgyud): nyini gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dre dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / lba ba dang / 'bras kyi 'phreng ba
307a6(rgyud): dang bas baljags la sogs pa dang / dug dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa la 'jim pa la bsngags te bsku'o// lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na las kyi sgrib pa sbyong bar
307a7(rgyud): bgyid ngo // byis pa gdor gyis zin pa la ni 'bru mar ro// rna babro 'tshal ba la ni ru rta dang 'bru mar ro// snga dro 'tshal ba la ni gro bang dra nengs ni bar 'gyur ro// bro nad thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bgyi ste
307b1(rgyud): bklags pas 'grub bo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugag la bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// / 'phags pas la/
307b2(rgyud): bcu gcig pa'i rig sngags kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
307b3(rgyud): 'das man na yong 'o ma'i myugu'i dkyil 'khor na/ dge slong gyi dge 'dun chen po stong nis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dang thabs cig/
307b4(rgyud): tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni gtso bor gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma tshad med pa snyed dang
307b5(rgyud): lnga dang / klu dang / ki nod sbyin dang / dri za dang // lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i 'khor
307b6(rgyud): mang po dag gis yongs su bskor nas mchod cing rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas te/ gsang sngags brjod pa la chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
307b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dang phyug drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye bo khrag zig brgya stong tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sder lhags nas/ bcom ldan
308a1(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
308a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag la rig sngags kyi snying po gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bgyi ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu gcig gis gsungs pa mchis te/ deng bdag gis sems can/
308a3(rgyud): thams cad la sman cisade bar bgyi ba dang / khro nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad dgag/
308a4(rgyud): pa dang / dus ma lags par 'chi ba thams cad bzlog pa dang / ngan sems can rnams gdul zhing dang ba thob par bgyi ba dang / mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dag bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / kho na
308a5(rgyud): dang bcas pa rnams 'dum par bgyi ba dang / bdud dang gdon bgegs rnams zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems kyi smon pa rnams mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
308a6(rgyud): bdag gis ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa la sogs pa gang gis kyang rig sngags 'dis bsrung bar bgyis pa dang / 'di len
308a7(rgyud): pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yi ger bris nas spel bar bgyid pa de dag la bgegs bgyid pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa dang / dug dang / byang
308b1(rgyud): sems kyis gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// bdag gis rig sngags 'di gnas pa'i phyogs su ring yang rung nye'ang rung ste/ ji tsam du mtshams bkum pa las 'das nas
308b2(rgyud): gnod pa bgyid du mchi ba ma mthong legs te/ sdig pa'i lus nges par rnam par smin par gyur pa ni ma gtogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das des dngos po 'dri nges par de lta bu lags par rig
308b3(rgyud): bar bgyis nas mngon par yid ches pas blang bar bgyi'o// rnam par rtog pa ni mi bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis na gdon bgegs thams cad thag ring du spong bas nye bar mchi zhing glags rnyed par
308b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur lags so// rig sngags kyi snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mtshungs par bsngags pa brjod cing / mtshungs par rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa lags so// de bzhin
308b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mngon par dran lags te kha skal pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma skad kyi sngon rol na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
308b6(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma brgya'i spyan thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i gtsug tor yon tan rab tu rgyas pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bdag de'i tshe drang srang du
308b7(rgyud): srung bas bcom ldan 'das de las rig sngags 'di mnos legs so// rig sngags 'di 'thob pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar gyur/ mi skye ba'o chos kyi bzod pa'ang thob par
309a1(rgyud): gyur pas/ rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so// de lta bas na yongs su dang ba dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la sogs padag gis rig smra/
309a2(rgyud): 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don par 'tshal na gus pas sems rtse gcig tu dran pas bcangs te rtag par nang par langs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par bgyis te/ rig sngags 'di
309a3(rgyud): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la phan yon rnam pa bcu 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcu gang zhe na/ rtag par lus la bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par phyogs bcu'i
309a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / gos dang / zas bas pa ma mchis pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thams cad thul zhing 'jigs pa ma/
309a5(rgyud): mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ya rabs btsun pa rnams kyis bkur zhing gsong por smra bar 'gyur ba dang / dug dang 'dre gdon gyis mi tshugs shing gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha dang dbyig/
309a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / chab kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / zhugs kyis 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma lags par 'gum
309a7(rgyud): pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dag lags so// gzhan yang yon tan gyi sman yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang 'anams kyang
309b1(rgyud): ngan gro rnams su ltung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / yang bam spangs pas 'grus pa'i dus dgying bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ba dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag/
309b2(rgyud): gis mngon par dran lags te/ 'di nas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed dag gi snga rol dag gi yang ches snga rol ra de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
309b3(rgyud): man dar ba'i bsung zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i che bdag khyim bdag chen po zhig tu gyur pas sangs rgyas de la rig sngags 'di nos lags te/ rig sngags 'di thob ma thag tu bskal/
309b4(rgyud): pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba bsnyil lags so// rig sngags 'di klog pa dang 'dzin pa dag gis gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
309b5(rgyud): cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i chos kyi sgo thob par 'gyur te/ de'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis gang dag btson ra dam por chud pa dang / mtshon char stsal ba dang / 'gum pa la thug pa dang ga chab dang / zhugs dang /
309b6(rgyud): rlung dang / chom rkun dang / dug dang / byang stems dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bgegs thams cad las yongs su skyob par gyid pa lags so//
309b7(rgyud): bdag ni 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / skyabs dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su srung ba dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / gling dang / khang khyim du gyur pa lags so// rig sngag+sa/
310a1(rgyud): 'di'i mthus gnod sbyin dang srin ngo ma rungs pa la sogs pa thams cad yongs su bsdu zhing yongs su bzung nas sngar byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i sems bskyed du stsa la/
310a2(rgyud): nas / de'i rjes la bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'god par bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig sngags 'di'i gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pas gang le lo zhig
310a3(rgyud): gis lan cig tsam bzlas brjod bgyis na'ang rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga yongs su 'brang bar gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang dag
310a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bsnun pa rnams kyis deng gdod rig sngags 'di thos par 'gyur lags na/ len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub
310a5(rgyud): ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/ gang la la zhig gis gdugs mtshan du rig sngags 'di klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis de dag gi smon pa ci mchis pa yid bzhin/
310a6(rgyud): du 'grub par bgyid lags so// gang la la zhig gis zla ba pyad cing tshes bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga la sbyang bar bgyis te/ sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas chos bzhin du yongs su dag par ba
310a7(rgyud): te/ sems kyi gcig tu bdag rjes su dran par bgyis nas rig sngags 'di 'azlas brjod bgyis na khanam pa ba zhi khri'i 'khor ba bsgril bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rig sngags
310b1(rgyud): dbang gis gling btsun mi thos par dka' bar byar lags te/ gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i mtshan nas brjod cing yid la bsams pa dang / gtan rung 'ag //
310b2(rgyud): gis skang cig tub du bsam pa thag pa nas bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par gyur na// de gnyis kyi yon tan mnyam ning mtshungs lags so// bdag gi ming nas brjod pa de dag thams
310b3(rgyud): cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur/ khro nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis nongs pa zhu byang
310b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur na bdag gis bstan pa'i rig sngags 'di len pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags te/ gang zag de dag
310b5(rgyud): ni bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub lag mthi ldan mchis pa bzhin du khong du chud cing lpags par 'gyur bar rig par bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan
310b6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs sngo legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems can thams cad la de lta bu'i byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas rig sngags
310b7(rgyud): chen po 'di rnam par phye ste bstan pa yin pas/ khyod thabs 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi nad kyi sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / bgegs dang / 'jigs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang /
311a1(rgyud): yid kyi nyes pa las yongs su skyob pathar bar byas nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rnam par 'jog pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu
311a2(rgyud): dbang rjes su yi rang nas khyod kyi rig sngags yongs su gzung gi/ khyod kyis spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las
311a3(rgyud): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ljang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rig sngags 'odi 'don pa gang lags pa des 'di skad du/
311a4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
311a5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje
311a6(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod par bgyi lags so// tad+ya thA/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa la pra tsa le/ ku su me ku
311a7(rgyud): su me ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi to tsi ti/ dz+wa la ma hA pan yang shung na tA mA hA/ mahA kA ru ta~M ka ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rtse bo'i rig sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig gis rjes su draH
311b1(rgyud): ning bzlas brjod du kyis na/ gong du bsan pa lta bu'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dgu 'thob par 'gyur lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin
311b2(rgyud): gshegs pa ye shes rgyu ba co rnam pa sta nga / dra pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par bya
311b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugazugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ha hra ha ha/ i li mi li/ tsi la pa
311b4(rgyud): li/ khi li hi laM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni cha ba dang gos la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'tshal na sngar khrus bgyis te/ de'i rjes la sngags 'dis
311b5(rgyud): cha ba la lan bdun btab ste lus la gtor bar byas nas bsang bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis lan bdun btab ste bzod bgo bar bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag
311b6(rgyud): 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gsheg pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
311b7(rgyud): rgyargya thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/
312a1(rgyud): tAd+ya b+hU/ d+hu ru d+ha ru/ ga bswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzin pog spos dang mar me la gang ba pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas pag spos bsregs te mchod pa gyid /
312a2(rgyud): pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis pog spo so la len bdun btab ste gdong bsreg par bgyi'o// mar me sbyar bar 'tshal na yang sngar sngags 'dis 'bru mar la lan bdun btab ste gdong mar me sbar bar bgyi lags so//
312a3(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
312a4(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par
312a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si ri d+hi ri swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni me tog dang byug spos dang / 'phreng ba la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas me tog dang
312a6(rgyud): byug spos dang / 'phreng ba dag gis mchod pa bgyid pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis me tog la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la gtor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis phyag spos la lan bdun
312a7(rgyud): btab ste sku gzugs la byug par bgyi'o// gzhan yang sngags 'dis 'phreng ba la lan bdun btab ste sku gzugs la brgyan par bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo//
312b1(rgyud): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
312b2(rgyud): cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA
312b3(rgyud): sa te sa taM/ si ti si ti/ su d+hu su d+hu swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas la mchod cing dbul ba'i zhal zas la gdab pa'i sngags lags te/ gang la la zhig zhal zas dang / me tog dang
312b4(rgyud): 'bras bu la sogs pas sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshe sngar sngags 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btab nas de'i rjes la gdod mchod pa bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par
312b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
312b6(rgyud): thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA kha si ta//
312b7(rgyud): bu ru hu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ su su dusus/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni lam shing la gang ba pa'i sngags lags te/ gal ti la la zhig gong du bstan pa'i rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis bgyi ba mchis te/ sngar
313a1(rgyud): sngags 'dis me tog sha ta'i shing la lan gcig gdab par bgyi'o// zhugs 'bud par 'tshal na logs shig tu me tog sha ta'i shing blangs nas dum bu sum cur gtubs
313a2(rgyud): zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi'i nang du spangs nas zhag lon par bgyis te/ gdugs re dum bu re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste zhugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi'o// de dag thams cad bas par
313a3(rgyud): bsregs lags nas de'i rjes la gdod bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyi lags so// dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang
313a4(rgyud): mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems
313a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ I li mi li khi li ti li/ tsi li hi li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mtshams
313a6(rgyud): dbum pa'i sngags lags te/ mtshams dgum par 'tshal na sngar sngags 'dis chab la lan bdun btab ste phyogs pazhir gtor bar bgyi'o// yang na yungs kar ram thal ba gtsang ma la lan bdun
313a7(rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs pa'ir gtor na sems kyis te ring ji tsam bkum pa mtshams su gyur nas yongs su srung bar 'gyur lags so// dkon mchog gsung la gus par phyag 'tshal la/
313b1(rgyud): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par snang mdzad bkod pa'i rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
313b2(rgyud): thams cad la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/
313b3(rgyud): bi Te bi Te ti Te tri Te/ tsi To tsi Te/ biT+Te biT+Te/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga bAn/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sa b+ha sa b+ha sa b+hA naM swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag slar rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i sngags 'gra
313b4(rgyud): na bgyi ba ci mchis pa bgyis lags nas/ bdag slar rang gi gnas su mchi bar bskul ba'i tshe sngags 'dis cha ba la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bdag slar mchi bar 'gyur
313b5(rgyud): lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di ni dngos grub mngon du ma gyur lags kyis kyang las su bgyi ba rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pas sems rtse gcig tu bzlas brjod bgyis na smon pa
313b6(rgyud): rnarnams kyang mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so// gang zhig spros nang gdugs re la na re ldang ba'am/ gdugs gnyis shing lan re ldang ba'am/ gdugs gsum zhing lan re ldang ba'am/ gdugs
313b7(rgyud): zhi zhing lan re ldang ba'am/ gdon 'byung pos bgyis pa'am/ mkha'i 'groms bgyis pa 'ag rab zas dgyis pa 'am/ lus srul pas bgyis pa 'am/ skye byed kyis bgyis pa'am/ brjed byed kyis
314a1(rgyud): bgyis pa 'am/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bgyis pa'ang rung ste/ nad pa de dpal sngags 'dis lan brgyad btab na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrib
314a2(rgyud): pal+li ba zhig lags na tshon sna lnga'i skung pa la sngags lan re bzla zhing re re mdung de brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas nang pa'i mgul pa'am dpung pa la btags na kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pacu byang zhing
314a3(rgyud): bro nad kyang sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te spangs pa dang / 'bras kyi 'phreng ba dang / shu ba dang / phol mig dang / rma 'dzags pa dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bro 'tshal
314a4(rgyud): bar gyur tam/ ral gri dang / mda' dang / dung la sogs pa phog ste smyos par gyur tam/ sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / rtsangs pa dang khung ba dang / gdug pa la sogs pas zin par gyur na sngags 'dis lan
314a5(rgyud): bdun bzlas te btang na sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrib pa lci ba zhig lags na ngogs ser po'i 'jib pa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste bro 'tshal po'i dmigs su bya ku na sel/
314a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags so// gal te rlung nang na pa 'am/ phyogs gcig pa langal bar gyur tam/ rna ba 'on pa'ab/ sna tshubs 'am/ rlung gis zin pa'i nang la sogs pas bro 'tshal bar gyur na sems
314a7(rgyud): rtse gcig tu sngags 'di bzlas brjid gyis nas nang pa de dag la lan bcu rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab na nang sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te sgrib pa lci bzhig lags na 'bru mar dang / chab mar/
314b1(rgyud): dang / khro dang / rudran pas bskol te sngags lan bdun btab nas lus la bskus sa pa/ rna ba dang snar blugs sam/ 'tshal du stsa yan blo rang mos par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang bro rang
314b2(rgyud): gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zo 'tshal bar gyur na sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di ga ba par bgyil// yang na bdag nyid kyis bkris brjod bgyis na 'tsho bar 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngag/
314b3(rgyud): 'di sgrub par 'tshal na sngar sra zhing 'phar skyon me mchis pa'i tsan dan dkar po las byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs srid du mtho phyed drang ngo mchis pasug pa lag
314b4(rgyud): pag yin pa na pad+ma le brgan dang ril pa thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas bgrang 'a phreng thogs shing 'jigs pa ma mchis pa stsol ba'i lag tu ston pa gdong bcu gcig par bgyis te/ mdun gyi
314b5(rgyud): gdong gsum ni byams pa dang snying rje dang bcas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par bgyi'o// g.yer phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni khro bo'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs kyi gdong gsum ni mche ba dkar
314b6(rgyud): pobyin du 'byung ba'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// rgyab kyi gdong gcig ni thegatum che zhing rab tu dgod pa'i mtshan can du bgyi'o// spyi bo'i gdong gcig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyi gzugs can du bgyi'o//
314b7(rgyud): mgo rgyan de dag thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyab kyi sku bzhugs par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i lus ni dong gal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan/
315a1(rgyud): par bgyi'o// gzugs bgyis lags nas smon pa rnams grub par 'tshal ba gang lags pa des gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos te/ spung ba bgyis nas sdom pa yang dag par drang /
315a2(rgyud): te/ zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshos gciganas/ tshes brgyad kyi bar du gdugs gcig la dus gsum du sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad dam/ yang na dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de slan chang gnas
315a3(rgyud): dben pa gcig tu stan gtsang ma bting ste/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs bgyis pa la nub phyogs su bstan te bzhag la nyams kyis ci 'byor pa'i bza' ba dang btung bdag gis mchod
315a4(rgyud): nas/ a ka ru dang du ru ka 'ba' zhig bsreg par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa de 'bru phye dang 'o ma'i zas 'tshal nas snga ma bzhin du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ gdugs gsum pa la thug pa'i bar bgyi'o// de slan chad mchod
315a5(rgyud): pa'i yo byang ba shams pa'ang sngam pas ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi'o// rnal 'byor pa de zas dkar gsum po 'di lta ste/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / 'bras chan 'ba' zhig 'tshal bar bgyi'o// byang chub kyi shing blangs
315a6(rgyud): nas gzugs de'i mdun du zhugs sbar bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang shing de brangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te du ru ka'i mar gyi mang du blangs nas gdugs gcig la dum bu gcig blangs te/ sngags lan re
315a7(rgyud): bzlas nas thugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas par gyur na// de'i tshes chen po rnams rab tu g.yo bar gyur la/ de'i dbang gis sku gzugs bgyis pa de'ang rab tu g.yo zhing nang gi gong na mchis pa'i
315b1(rgyud): gdong gi lanas snga byung nas rnal 'byor pa de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'di ltar nan tan brtson 'grus kyis spen pa rnams yongs su gnyer bas bedag gis khyod kyi smon pa/
315b2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// khyod 'di nas nam mkha' la 'phur te 'gro'am/ yang na khyod rgyu zhing 'gro ba la thogs pa med pa 'am/ yang na drang srong rig 'dzin gyi rgyal po byed par gyur pa 'am/ yang na bdag ji lta
315b3(rgyud): babazhin du rang dbang thogs pa med pa nyid du bya'o// zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba dkar po yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
315b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gdong bcu gcig pa de sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos la gso sbyong dang sdom pa yang dag par
315b5(rgyud): blangs te/ gdugs mtshan gcig la rab tu spung bar bgyis nas su ma na'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ me tog re re blangs nas sngags lan re btab ste/ thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/ de'i tshe
315b6(rgyud): gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gdong gcig gi kha nas 'brug sgra lta bu'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de'i dbang gis sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur bas/ rnal 'byor pas de'i tshe rang gi sems bde bar
315b7(rgyud): bzhag nas/ skrag cing 'jigs pa mi skyed par rig sngags dang smon cing sgrub pa gang lags pa 'ba' zhig rjes su dran par bgyis te 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+ya/
316a1(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nam nig na sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs su gyur nas sems can thams cad kyi sems/
316a2(rgyud): kyi smon pa rnams yongs su skong bar 'gyur zhes brjod par gyur na// de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ji ltar smon pa rnams stsol bar 'gyur te/ smon pa rnams stsol ba'i tshe lha dang klu la sogs pa gang
316a3(rgyud): gis kyang bar chad dang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas zla ba la gza' zhugs pa'i tshe chab mar srang gcig blangs te dngul gyi snod kyi nang du stsal nas gzugs bgyis pa'i
316a4(rgyud): mdun du bzhag ste/ sngags 'dis bzlas brjod bgyis na zla ba'ang snga mkho bzhin du skyabs 'og tu gyur pas/ de nas blangs te 'tshal na lus kyi bro nang rnams mi 'byang ba gang yang ma mchis lags so// gzhan yang rnal
316a5(rgyud): 'byor pas ldong ros rang gi'u wang cha mnyam par bgyis te/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du bzhag nas sngags 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te chab kyis sbrus nas dpral ba la thig le bgyis na don rnam pa
316a6(rgyud): gsum 'grub par 'gyur lags so// sngar bstan pa bzhin du chab dron po dang sbyar te khrus bgyis na bgegs thams cad dang bro nad ma rungs pa thams cad bsal zhing 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang
316a7(rgyud): gal te pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs kyis g.yul 'phrog par gyur na// spyan ci mar tsho'i 'bras bu gcig blangs te sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btang nas gzugs bgyis pa de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong la
316b1(rgyud): byugs te/ dgra'i phyogs su la bstan na dgra'i dmag tshogs rnams drung du mchi bar mi 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gal te yul phyogs su mi dang phyugs la rims nang byung bar gyur na// gzugs bgyis pa de'i/
316b2(rgyud): mdun du shing shug pa'i thugs bus la/ gzhan yang shing de blangs nas dum bu stong rtsa brgyad du gtubs te/ dum bu gcig blangs nas yungs 'bru'i mar gyis bskus te/ sngags lan re bzlas nas zhugs kyi nang du/
316b3(rgyud): dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dmar po la thag mdud pa bdun mdud de/ mdud pa lan re mdud cing sngags lan re bzlas nas nang gi gong na mchis pa'i gdong gi spyi bo
316b4(rgyud): la btags na rims nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nad zhi nas sngags thag kyang 'grol bar 'gyur lags so// gnan yang glo bur du mkha' 'gro ma dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin
316b5(rgyud): tho 'tshal bar gyur na skud pa dkar po la sngags mdung 'i shu rtsa gcig mdung de sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa re re mdud nas mdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas
316b6(rgyud): zhag lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na bro nad sos par 'gyur lags so// gal te las kyi sgrib pa ldi bzhig lags te sos par ma gyur na sngags thag de blangs nas yan la de brgya rtsa brgyad sngags
316b7(rgyud): kyis btab ste/ snga ma'i gzugs kyi spyi bo la btags nas zhag lon te slar bkrol la nad pa'i mgul du btags na nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur ba lags so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig bro nang rgyun rings kyis
317a1(rgyud): btab nas sdug bsngal zhing sos par ma gyur tam/ 'dre gdon ma rungs pa khyim du zhugs par gyur na/ phun lug thang 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du/
317a2(rgyud): 'dzum bu re re blangs la sngags lan ra btab nas thugs kyi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing thams cad bas pa'i bar du bgyi'o// gzhan yang srung pa dkar po la sngags mdung nyi shu rtsa gcig mdung de sngags lan ra
317a3(rgyud): badz+ra zhing mdud pa re res dung das bdun gyi byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas zhag len te/ slar bkrol nas nang pa'i mgul du btags na rdo nang rnams 'byang zhing gdon bgegs ma rungs
317a4(rgyud): parnams 'byer zhing 'gyes par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang mi mdza' ba dag gis glags btsal bar gyur tam/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang byang snyems kyis gnod pa bgyis par gyur na/ me tog dang pog spos
317a5(rgyud): la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis gzugs bgyis pa de la mchod cing bi na ya ka'i gzugs kyi mdun du zhugs sbar nas 'un ti 'bras bu 'brum bu brgya rtsa brgyad blangs te sngags lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du
317a6(rgyud): dor bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang skud pa dkar po la mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyud mdud de/ sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa re re mdud nas gzugs de'i g.yon phyogs kyi khro bo'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas
317a7(rgyud): ga bzhi len te/ slar bkrol la sdud pa de blangs te mi mdza' ba de'i ming nas brjod de mdud pa re re nas so so tha dad par sbas nas re re la'ang sngags lan re bzlas shing re re nas gtubs te thams cad
317b1(rgyud): bas pa'i bar du bgyis na/ mi mdza' ba de dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal mi 'byor cing rang nyid skyabs su mchi bar 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig legs pa'i dngos po 'grub par 'tshal na tshen sna lnga'i/
317b2(rgyud): srung ba la sngags mdung brgya rtsa brgyad mdud de/ sngags lan re bzo zhing mdud pa ro mdung nas gzhan yang gzugs bgyis pa'i bdun du sngags lan bdun gyis btab ste/ byams pa dang sridu rje dang
317b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i gdong gi spyi bo la btags nas nag lon te sngar bkrol nas bdag nyid kyi lus la btegs na smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang gang la la zhig sgrib pa'i bgegs
317b4(rgyud): dang ldan pas legs pa'i dngos po rnams pal cher smon pa yid bzhin du 'grub par ma gyur tam/ bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po dag dus dus su rgyun ma chad par 'gyur na spros chab kyis gzugs bgyis/
317b5(rgyud): pa de bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang cha ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste bi na ya ka'i gzugs bkru bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang cha ba la lan brgya rtsa brgya sngags kyis btab ste rang nyid kyi lus
317b6(rgyud): la btor na/ sgrib pa dang bgegs thams cad du byang nas smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
317b7(rgyud): de skad ces smras pa dang / 'khor mang po thams cad kyis mthun par skyes bu chen po legs legs so// sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di smras pas bdag cag kyang rjes
318a1(rgyud): su yi rang zhing yongs su 'dzin par smon to zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// de nas 'khor mang po thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
318a2(rgyud): la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyag byas te gyes par gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
318a3(rgyud): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// byang chub sem/
318a4(rgyud): dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang mig stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga zhib mo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
318a5(rgyud): padus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ri gru 'dzin na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs
318a6(rgyud): shing / bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ khri de ni rin po che'i mchog sna tshogs du mas spras pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis yongs su brtsegs pa
318a7(rgyud): lha'i ba dan sbyangs pa ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs nas 'di snyam dgongs te/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs bshad gor ma chag
318b1(rgyud): snyam du dgongs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
318b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ldan gyi rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
318b3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
318b4(rgyud): dpa' dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po
318b5(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos/
318b6(rgyud): kyi sras sha stag dang thabs cig go// 'od srungs chen po la sogs pa gang dag gis nyan thos dag gis sa bcu spyad par gyur pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa dang / tshangs pa
318b7(rgyud): dung la sog pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu du ma dang / lha'i bu sa 'tsho la sogs pa lha'i bu dum dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'phags skyes po la sogs pa du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
319a1(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du ma dang ba klu'i rgyal po nus pa'i dra ba la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po du ma dang
319a2(rgyud): lha'i bu mo gzhon nu'i mig la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha du ma dang / dgon pa'i lha du ma dang yang thabs cig go// 'bab chu dang / mtshe dang / mtsho bran dang / khron pa dang / chu klung dang / chu klung chen po dang /
319a3(rgyud): sman dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal dang / nags khrod dang / gtsug lag khang dang / khyim dang / chu dang / me dang / rdul gyi ri dang / sa dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / mchod rten dang // dri gtsang
319a4(rgyud): khang la sogs pa na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang der 'dus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor chen po de'i nang na 'dug pas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par
319a5(rgyud): shes pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis ma tshor bar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams khyab par snang bar byos shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dibang gser gyi
319a6(rgyud): kha dog lta bur byas so// lha dang / klu thams cad dang / lha mchog thams cad kyi khang pa dag kyang khrol zhes g.yos so// chu klung dang / chu klung chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / ri khor yugra dang / ri bo ri/
319a7(rgyud): rab dang / rdul gyi ri dang / ri nag po thams cad kyang shin tu g.yos so// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rin po che dang / me dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi 'od kyang mog por byas so// byang chub sems dpa'
319b1(rgyud): gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos ltas rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/ ltas sngon ma mthong ba la the tshom skyes te/ de stan las langs te thal mo sbyar te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i ltas 'di sus/
319b2(rgyud): bgyis zhes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas zhus pa/ deng su byang chub yang dag mthar thug gyur// thams cad ldan po'i 'od zer su yis btang / 'jig rten mgon po ci
319b3(rgyud): slad phyogs bcu yi// zhing rnams gser mchog 'dra bar gnas par gyur// stong gsum 'di ni ci slad tshig pa 'dra// deng 'dir su zhig gis ni dbang thob lags// sngon chad ma byung rdzu 'phrul stobs
319b4(rgyud): sus bstan// su yis 'dir ni zhing rnams g.yos par bgyis// ci slad lha dang klu rnams khyim 'khrugs shing // gzhal med khang mchog dag kyang rab 'gul dang // thams cad skrag nas rnam par blta
319b5(rgyud): zhing mchis// ci yi slad du stong gsum g.yos pa dang // gang gis 'khor 'di re the tshom skyes gyur de'i// rgyu dang su yi mthu lags ma 'tshal na// ci slad rdzu 'phrul mngon shes bstan bgyis pa/
319b6(rgyud): rgyal ba byams pa'i thugs can bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod la sogs pa 'di ltar
319b7(rgyud): shes par gyis shig/ da ltar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ming 'phags pa span ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba zhig yod de 'di ni bskal pa du
320a1(rgyud): ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin pa/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / thabs la mkhas pa bsgoms pas sgrub pa dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la nus pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems/
320a2(rgyud): can gyi khams thams cad la zhi ba dang bde bar 'dod pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po 'di phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
320a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug stan las langs te gos lags par bgos nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
320a4(rgyud): 'das bdag la snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis gsang sngags snying ltar bzung ba mchis te/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis phan pa dang bde ba thob par bgyi ba dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad dang /
320a5(rgyud): las lci ba rnams 'byang bar bgyi ba dang / bgegs dang mi khom pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs bsod nams thams cad 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams
320a6(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad yongs su spang ba dang / mchog thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag da de brjod par 'tshal na
320a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rjes bdag la nges par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye rigs kyi bu shin tu snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod
320b1(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir// gsang sngags kyang brjod par 'dod pa 'di da ltar legs par khyed kyi dus la bab kyis byar du smos shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin du
320b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang rjes su thugs rang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces
320b3(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dran pa bskal pa du ma 'das par gyur pa na/ 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer stong gi rgyal po dag par gnas pa zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom
320b4(rgyud): ldan 'das 'gro ba'i bla ma nges bdag la byams pas dran par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du thugs rje chen pos snying lta bu 'di yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi bzlog pa dang / rgyas
320b5(rgyud): par bshad de/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag bdag gi mgo la bzhag nas 'di skad ces/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa can gyi dus kyi sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba chen po bya ba'i
320b6(rgyud): phyir/ snying lta bu'i gsang sngags 'di zung zhig ces bka' stsal to// bdag ni de'i tshe thog ma nyid du sa dang po la gnas par gyur to// 'di ltar bdag gis gsang sngags 'di lan cig thos pas de nyid na/
320b7(rgyud): gnas bzhin du sa brgyad pa nges par rtogs par gyur to// bdag gis de'i tshe snying la bab pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba thob nas/ de nyid du bdag gis smon lam 'di skad btab ste/ 'di ltar
321a1(rgyud): bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / zhi bar bgyid nus par 'gyur zhe na/ dnges par bdag gi lus la lag pa stong dang
321a2(rgyud): mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces bgyis pa dang / smon lam de skad btab ma thag tu de nyid na mchis bzhin du/ lag pa stong dang mig stong yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// phyogs bcu dag tu
321a3(rgyud): sa chen po'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'od zer stong stong bdag gi steng du bkye nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa snang
321a4(rgyud): bar gyur to// de slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das du ma'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su yang dang yang du rnyed cing thos te/ de dag gi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di bzung ngo // yang dga' ba dang mgu
321a5(rgyud): bdu ma skyes par gyur to// bdag gis bskal pa du mar skye ba dang 'chi ba nges par rdzogs par phyi mo thob par gyur to// de sngan chang rtag tu brjod cing bzung ste bskus pa gyur to// gzungs sngags
321a6(rgyud): 'di bzung ba'i don drag gang gang du skyes par rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skyes nas/ ma'i mngal du skye ba bzung bar ma gyur to// dge slong ngam
321a7(rgyud): dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen mangs/ kyi 'u 'as/ bu mo gang la lazhig brjed cing 'dzin par 'tshaming des/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bsam pa dang / snying rje'i bsam pa'i
321b1(rgyud): sems bskyed bar bgyi'o// thog mar bdag brjod pa'i 'og tu smon lamachen po 'di skad gang babar bgyi ste/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag/
321b2(rgyud): nges par shes rab rten po'i ming thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod sa phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par sems can yongs su slob par gyur cig
321b3(rgyud): btsun pa spyan rus gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du thabs la mkhas pa thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la
321b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par shes rab kyi grur zhugs par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho
321b5(rgyud): las rgal bar gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag tshul khrims kyi rkang pa dang ldan zhing lam myur du thob par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras
321b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myur du mya ngan las 'das pa'i ri la 'dzeg par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje tshon po
321b7(rgyud): can myongs phya ga 'tshal lo// bdag nges par myor du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig/ btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhing rje tsas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag myur du
322a1(rgyud): chos kyi sku dang gcig gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag ral gri'i ri de la 'gro ba na// ral gri'i ro de bsnyil zhing zhig par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdagu me ma pur gyi nang du 'gro ba na// me ma mur
322a2(rgyud): de rang med par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag sems can dmyal ba'i lam du 'gro ba na/ sems can dmyal ba rnams rang bzhin gyis stongs par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba/
322a3(rgyud): na/ yi dgas rnams rang tshim par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'gro ba na/ de dag gi sems rang dul bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe bdag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro ba na/ de dag ye shes
322a4(rgyud): chen po'i de kho na rang thob par gyur cig/ ces de ltar smon lam de skad btab nas/ dad pa dang ldan zhing sems kyis dran par bgyis la bdag gi ming brjod par bgyi'o// de nas yang bdag gi slob dpon
322a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med rtag tu dran par bgyi'o// de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par rigs so// nub gcig la 'di lan lnga brjod na bdag nyid kyi skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i/
322a6(rgyud): las lci ba stong phrag brgya dang / bye ba stong phrag bcu bsags pa rnams spong bar 'gyur/ byang bar 'gyur ro// yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha dang mi thams cad snying rje chen
322a7(rgyud): po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di ji lta ba bzhin du brjod cing 'dzin na/ gal te de dag 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i steng du phyag rkyong zhing 'di
322b1(rgyud): skad ces khyod gang du skye bas 'dod/ gang dang gang du smon lam btab pa der song zhig ces gsung so// yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi 'am mi ma lags
322b2(rgyud): pa gang zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gsang sngags 'di brjed cing 'dzin la/ de gal te ngan song gsum du lhung bar gyur na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
322b3(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye ba ma thob ni bdag sangs rgyas su ma
322b4(rgyud): gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang sngags 'di brjod cing bzung la/ des ting nge 'dzin dang so so yang dag par rig pa du ma ma thob na bdag sangs rgyas su ma gyur cig/ yang su zhig gis gsang sngags
322b5(rgyud): 'di brjod cing bzung la/ tshe gcig gis yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs na/ 'di snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i ming thob par mi 'gyur ro// su sdig pa bgyid pa/
322b6(rgyud): dang ma dad pa ni ma gtogs so// bud med su zhig bud med kyi chos la yid byung nasabadag skyes par gyur cig ces 'tshal te/ snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags bzhi 'di brjod cing bzung
322b7(rgyud): la/ de bud med kyi lus las ma gyur cing / skyes pa'i lus ma thob na bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gal te 'dzin par bgyid pas de la the tshom cung zad tsam zhig bgyis
323a1(rgyud): na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mi 'grub bo// gang gis dge 'dun gyi bza' ba dang / thug pa dang nor dang / 'bru phrogs sam/ chud gsar te/ gang la sangs
323a2(rgyud): rgyas stong gis bshags su gnang bas bshags su lags kyang bshags par ma gyur la/ gal te gsang sngags 'di brjod kyis/ sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar ma gyur na// de'i slad du dge 'dun gyi rdzas
323a3(rgyud): ci spyad pa dang / chud gsan pa dang / phrogs pa des phyogs bcug na rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi so so'i mdun du mchis la bshags na/ de'i tshe de'i bshags par 'gyur ro// gal te de ltar gsang
323a4(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod par gyur na/ phyogs bcu dag tu gtogs pa'i rab tu byung ba'i 'dus pa rnams de la dbang yin no zhes smra zhing las thams cad kyang bshags par chud par 'gyur ro// sdig pa bcu po thams
323a5(rgyud): cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la mi snyan pa brjod pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / dus ma lags par zas 'tshal ba dang / bslab pa nyams pa dang / mchod rten dang
323a6(rgyud): dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / dge 'dun gyi rdzas chung gzon pa dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag par gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshul khrims nyams par bgyid pa dang / de la sogs pa'i sdig
323a7(rgyud): pa'i las shin tu lci ba thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gang po chos 'tshal ba ni ma gtogs te/ de'i sdig pa chung ngu dang / las yang ba'ang 'byang bar mi 'gyur na/
323b1(rgyud): shin tu lci blta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba rnams byang bar ma gyur tu lags kyang / yun ring mo zhig na sangs rgyas kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro// yang 'di skad/
323b2(rgyud): ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te mi 'am mi ma lags pa zhig gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod par gyur na/ de skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga thob par
323b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga ni myong bar mi 'gyur te/ bco lnga gang zhe na/ dang po ni gang ltogs pas sdug bsngal te 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni gang chad pa ngan pas bcang ba'i
323b4(rgyud): tshor bas nyams thag pa'i gnod pa dag gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dgra dang / kho na mchis pa dang / phyir zlog pa rnams kyi dug dang / mtshon gyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang dman
323b5(rgyud): gi g.yul 'gyed par zhugs pa'i tshe 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// lnga pa ni gang stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa gcan gzan mo rungs pa rnams kyis gsad pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// drug pa ni gang sbrul
323b6(rgyud): gdug pa dang / rtsangs pa dang / srog chags u tsi ling gas zin nas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bdun pa ni gang me dang chus 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// brgyad pa ni gang dug tu 'gyur 'tshal bas 'gun
323b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ba'o// dgu pa ni gang srog chags sna tshogs kyi dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu pa ni gang rmongs pa dang / rnam par g.yengs pa dang / brjed pa dang / nyal bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu
324a1(rgyud): / gcig pa ni kAng ri dang / shing dang / g.yangs dang / gang pa las ltung bas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// cu gnyis pa ni gang byas kyis 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni gang dag
324a2(rgyud): lhagayon can rnams dang / 'byung po sdig bcan rnams kyis glags bltas pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi pa ni gang gsor mi rung ba'i nad rnams kyis btab nas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba'o// bco lnga pa ni
324a3(rgyud): gang bdag la bdag gsod pas 'gum par mi 'gyur ba ste/ gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin can te/ gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de la/ ka shis ngan du 'gum pa rnam pa bco lnga
324a4(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang po rnam pa bco lnga'ang thob par 'gyur te/ dang po ni gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du chos dang mthun pa'i rgyal po rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// gnyis pa ni gang 'phags pa'i yul
324a5(rgyud): duspyi bathob par 'gyur ba'o// gsum pa ni dus bzang po dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// bzhi pa ni gang rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba'o// lnga pa ni gang dbang po mtha' dag tshang ba'i lus
324a6(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// drug pa ni gang dge ba'i phyogs la sems yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'o// bdun pa ni gang tshul khrims nyams par mi 'gyur ba'o// brgyad pa ni gang gnyen pa shes rnams dang bran
324a7(rgyud): g.yog rnams kyis bye brag shes shing mthun par 'gyur ba'o// dgu pa ni gang yo byad dang / nor dang / zas rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rnyed par 'gyur ba'o// bcu pa ni gang gzhan gyis go 'phang
324b1(rgyud): bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti rnyed par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gcig pa ni gang nor dang yo byad mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba'o// bcu gnyis pa ni gang bsams pa sems dang mthun par 'gyur
324b2(rgyud): ba'o// bcu gsum pa ni gang lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin rnams kyis kyang rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba'o// bcu bzhi pa ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing chos kyang thob par 'gyur
324b3(rgyud): ba'o// bco lnga pa ni gang chos thos pa dang don zab mo shes rab kyis rtogs par 'gyur ba ste/ gang la la zhig snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa des gong du smos pa'i skye ba rnam pa bcos
324b4(rgyud): po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slang du lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod cing bcang bar bgyi ste/ de la skyo ba bskyed par mi bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
324b5(rgyud): phyag gis tshig de skad smras nas/ de'i rjes la 'khor mang po'i dbus de nyid du 'dug ste/ lag pa gnyis mnyam par thal mo sbyar nas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed de/
324b6(rgyud): 'dzum pa'i bzhin rgyas par byas nas rgyas pa chen po'i kun nas yongs su rdzogs pa thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po gzungs sngags chen po gzhi mdzes pa 'di smras so//
324b7(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya ma hA satwA ya ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sarba ban d+ha nats+tsha ra na kA ra ya sarba pA ba sa mu
325a1(rgyud): drets+tshi Sha kar ya/ sarba bya d+hi pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ sarba i tu ba dra ba'inA shan+ta ka rA ya sarba b+ha ye Shu tA ra NA kA rA ya ta s+ya na ma s+thi tA I Ar+ya a ba lo ki
325a2(rgyud): tre shwa ra/ ta ba ni la kaN+Da nA ma pa ra ma hri da ya/ mA bar+ha yi Sh+ya mi sarba ar+tha sa d+ha nAM/ shu b+ha tse ta nAM/ sarba satwA nAM pA paM mAn bi sho d+hA na/ tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te ka lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti
325a3(rgyud): e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa / he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ s+phA ra hr-i da yaM ke e h+ye hi/ Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya par ma mai tI tsit+ta kA ru NI ka/ ku ru ku ru
325a4(rgyud): karma/ sA d+ha ya sA d+hA ya bi b+han de hi de hi/ me e raM ga maM ga maM bi haM ga ma/ sid d+ha yo gI shwa ra du hu du hu ma hA bIr+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hA raNAM shwa ra dz+wa la bi ma la mUr+Ne/ Ar+yA a ba le ki te shwa rA/ kr-iSh+Na dzi na dza Ta mu ku TA
325a5(rgyud): a laM kr-i ta/ sha rI ra lam+bi pra lam+b+ha ba bi lam+ba/ ma hA sid d+ha shud d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba lam la ma la ma hA ma le/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa le ka kr-iSh+Na k+ShA/ kr-iSh+Ta bAM sha/ nir+g+hA tAn/ he pad+ma haste/ dza ya ka rA ni shA tsa ra
325a6(rgyud): shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Ta sarba kr-i ta yedz+nyo pa bI ta/ e h+ye hi ma hA bI ra/ ma hA ba ra ma hA ba ra ha mu kha/ tri pu ra ha ha ne shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na rU pab la ge ga d+hA ri/ hi nI la kaN+Da/ e hrI hi ma hA/ ha la ha la bi Sha ni rdzi ti lo
325a7(rgyud): kas+yu rA ga bi Sha na sha na/ dwe Sha bi 'bi nA sha na/ mo ha bi Sha be nA sha na/ ni nir mo k+Sha Na hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ ha lA ha la/ ma hA pad+ma nA b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+hu bu d+d+ha kho d+ha ya bo
325b1(rgyud): d+ha yA mi ta ba nI laN+DA/ e h+ye hi/ bU mas+t+ri ta/ ma hA sing ha mu kha/ su hA sa hu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ma hA T+Tan+tha nir+N+Na de ne/ e h+ye hi b+ho b+ho ma hA/ sid d+ha yo kI shwa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ba tsa n+da sA sA ya/ sA d+h+ya ya/ khi
325b2(rgyud): d+yan/ sma smar sti/ he b+ha ga bA na/ le ki bi lo ki staM/ ta thA ga ta/ de hi de hi mA dar sha na/ kA ma s+ya da raM sha ne/ pra sA d+ha ya me swA hA/ sid d+hA ya swAhA/ ma hA sid d+hA yaM swA hA/ sid d+ha yo gA shI ru ya swA hA
325b3(rgyud): mI la kaN+Tha ya swAhA/ ba rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ si hA mu~M kha ya swA hA/ ma hA pa na ra sing hA mu kha yi swAhAM/ badz+ra hastA ya swA hA/ ma hA badz+ra hastA ya swAhA/ sId d+ha bid+yA d+hA rA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+ha bid+yA b+ha rA yai
325b4(rgyud): swAhA/ pad+ma hAstA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma hestA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo pa bI tA ya swA hA/ ma hA mu lA ma ku TA d+ha ra ya swA hA/ tsakrA yu d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shang kha shab+da nirni da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha ni ka rA ya swA hA/
325b5(rgyud): bA mas+thi ta skan+ta daM she kr-iSh+Na dza nA ya swA hA/ bI ma hA sA byA kyA tsarma Ni bI sa nA ya swA hA/ lo kai shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma ma lo ke shwa rA ya swAhA/ sarba sid d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUr+t+ti nAM swA hA
325b6(rgyud): na mo b+ha ga ba ta~M/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA yai/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid d+h+yan tu me/ man+t+ra pa dA ni swAhA/ oM hrIHtrai la~M kya bi dza ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ a pra te hi ta hrIHha hUM
325b7(rgyud): badz+ra swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po 'di brjod nas sa chen po ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// 'gul lo// 'ur 'ur ro//
326a1(rgyud): bar snang las rin po che dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi chad mngon par bab bo// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad rjes su thugs rang ngo // bdud dang gzhan
326a2(rgyud): mu stegs thams cad spangs skrag ste spu zing zhes byed par gyur to// 'khor de thams cad ni so sor 'bras bu thob ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba
326a3(rgyud): dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// kha cig ni sa dang po thob bo// kha cig ni sa gnyis pa/ kha cig ni sa gsum pa/ kha cig ni sa bzhi pa kha cig ni sa lnga pa nas/ kha cig ni sa bcu pa'i
326a4(rgyud): bar du thob bo// gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang dpag tu med do// de nas tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/ gos legs
326a5(rgyud): par bgos nas/ gus pa'i sems kyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad rjes smras so// kye kye las mdzad pa chen po legs so legs so//
326a6(rgyud): bdag kyang 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa de pag tu med pa dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par gyur te/ bdag gis de dag tu chos kyi rnam grangs dang gzungs kyi sgo sna tshogs dag
326a7(rgyud): kyang thob na/ bdag gis snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi gzungs sngags gzhi thogs pa med pa rgya chen po 'di ma thos kyis/ da byang chub sems dpa' las mdzad pa chen po de'i lus dang / rtags dang /
326b1(rgyud): tshul dang / mtshan nyid nges par bshad du gsol/ bdag la sogs pa 'khor chen po 'di thos par 'tshal zhing smos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
326b2(rgyud): gis tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// kye khyod kyis thabs mkhas pas sems can gyi khams thams cad la phan pa drang bde ba'i phyir dri nga 'di byas so// de nyon cig dang mdor cung zad cig khe bos khyod
326b3(rgyud): la bshad par bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ni snying rje chen po'i sems so// 'di ni mtshungs shing mnyam pa'i sems so// 'di
326b4(rgyud): ni 'dus ma byas kyi sems so// 'di ni chags shing zhen pa med pa'i sems so// 'di ni stong pa nyid du lta ba'i sems so// 'di ni bsti stang du byas shing gus pa'i sems so// 'di ni ma 'khrugs shing skyon
326b5(rgyud): med pa'i sems so// 'di ni bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te/ sems de dag la sogs pa ni snying po 'di'i mtshan nyid dang tshul yin par de ltar shes par bya'o// de ltar tshul 'dis spyad par bya'o// bsgom
326b6(rgyud): par bya'o// tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag la sogs pa 'khor 'dis snying po 'di'i tshul dang mtshan nyid deng slan chad ma 'tshal to// dra sngan chad ni blang ngo // mi bskyod par bgyi
326b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin na/ des byang chub
327a1(rgyud): kyi sems chen po yangs pa bskyed pa'o// de ltar yi dam bcas nas/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzung bar bya'o// khas dus dus su bza' ba dang tshul khrims dang
327a2(rgyud): ldan par bya'o// sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o// rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chang par gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// gtsang mar granas pas gnas par bya'o// khrus
327a3(rgyud): legs par bya'o// gos gtsang ma bgos la lha'i ba dan dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// sems rtse gcig tu gzung bar bya'o// yang
327a4(rgyud): dag pa ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o zhes de skad ces brjod par bya'o// de ltar gzung bar bya'o// 'on tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang / lha'i drang srong du ma'ang der//
327a5(rgyud): 'gro ste/ dbang byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// kho bos kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o// lag pa stong gis sba zhing bzung ngo // 'jig rten gyi mdo dang / yi ge rnams lan cing 'dzin
327a6(rgyud): kyang nus par 'gyur ro// gzhan mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang / rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni 'jig
327a7(rgyud): rten na 'byung pos phyung ba'i nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed do// de sa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nang gang yang med do// yang 'byung po'am lha rnams la'ang rgol ba'i mthu yod/
327b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bdud kyang pham par byed do// gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi phyogs kyang lkugs par byed do// gal te ri la gnas pa 'am/ dgon par gnas pa gang zhig kha ton byed dam/ bsam gtan
327b2(rgyud): byed pa la de na gnas pa sdig pa byed pa dang / bgegs byed pa dang / gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang 'byung po sna tshogs gang dag sems 'khrug par byed na/ snying po 'di lan cig brjod pas de dag thams cad
327b3(rgyud): bcings par 'gyur ro// gang la la zhig tshul 'di bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na// srog chags thams cad la snying rje bskyed par bya'o// de'i tshe kho bos kyang
327b4(rgyud): lha dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang gsung ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs la bsrung ba bgyis te phrad par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// mig gi 'bras bu dang rang gi
327b5(rgyud): srog ji lta ba bzhin du srung bar 'gyur ro// tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/ gang zhig dad pas snying po 'di// kha yis rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa pol du sa kun tu// soms la srung ba gyis shig
327b6(rgyud): ces// khung bu mig dang de bzhin du// stobs po che dang lu gu rgyud// lha yi dam pa lcags kyu dang // lag na rdo rje bsgo bar bya// kho bo'i snying po mchog 'di ni// dad pas rtag tu 'dzin pa yi// sgrub pa sdig dang bral
327b7(rgyud): ba la// khyed cag srungs shig skyongs shig ces// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // nor gyi bu dang drag po dang // ku ma bir dang ser skya dang // de dag rnams la kho bo bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis/
328a1(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di brjod 'dzin byed pa'i// rig sngags 'chang la mi g.yel bar// soms shig srung bgyis shig ces// lnga rtsen dang ni bde mchog dang // N+Din ngal dang su ma la// bing ga la
328a2(rgyud): dang ga shin rje la// kho bos lung gis bsgo bar bya// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// kho bo'i gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // rtag brjod rig sngags 'chang ba la// bsam pagyis shig srung bgyis// sgrub pa po la
328a3(rgyud): srungs shig ces// bden pa po dang so brtsegs dang // mi mdzad bdag dang lha mo dpal// de dag kun la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi// gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags
328a4(rgyud): 'chang ba la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// lha mo chen po dbyangs can dang ka lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang // sum cu gsum dbang ro langs dang // mang po 'dzin la kho bos bsgo// kho bo'i rig
328a5(rgyud): sngags 'di chang la// soms shig srung bgyis shig ces// gnas lnga dgra na gnas pa yi// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha rnams dang // yang dgang ge dang nor bu bzang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo//
328a6(rgyud): gang zhig dad pas kho bo yi// gsang sngags 'di ni rtag 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces// rgyal po rnam thos bu dang ni// 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /
328a7(rgyud): yul 'khor srung dang skyong byed dang // mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes dang // skam byed gzhon nur gyur pa dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dang ba yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin
328b1(rgyud): cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung bgyis shig ces// dga' bo nye dga' klu gnyis dang // stobs kyi lha dang rgya mtsho dang // drang srong nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo//
328b2(rgyud): gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'dri 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// soms shig srung bgyis shig ces// klu yi rgyal po ut+pal dang // 'phrul chen lto 'phye che rnams dang /
328b3(rgyud): lha min mi ci dri za dang // de dag rnams la kho bos bsgo// gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis// rtag tu gsang sngags 'di 'dzin cing // rjod byed rig sngags 'chang ba la// sems shig srung ba gyis shig cis// chu dang me yi lha
328b4(rgyud): rnams dang // sha ba rnams dang glog dang sprin// grul bum dag dang mkha' lding dang // de dag kun la kho bos bsgo// bde bar byed pa'i lha g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa khyed thams cad dang / de bzhin du lha dang klu'i
328b5(rgyud): rgyal po rnams dang / lha dang / lha'i bu mo la sogs pa dang / gnod sbyin stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyang gang snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byed pa de'i phyi bzhin du 'brongs
328b6(rgyud): shig/ gnod pa sol cig/ srung ba gyis shig/ gal te sngags pa mi zhig ri drang nags tshal stong pa thibs po dag na gcig pur grogs med par nyal na'ang / bde bar byed pa'i lha de dag rang gi 'khor dang bcas
328b7(rgyud): te srung bar byed do// yams kyi nad rnams dang bgegs rnams kyang zhi bar byed do// gal te ri khrod du lam stor bar gyur na gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas pa dang / bde bar byed pa'i lha dang klu'i rgyal po de
329a1(rgyud): dag mi'i gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byed do// gal te ri dang / nags dang / dgon par son la chu dang me med par gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de la bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang
329a2(rgyud): me ston par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa gzhig cing bsal ba'i phyir zhi bar byed pa'i tshig
329a3(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams shin tu// stag dang spyang ki gcan gzan khro rnams dang // sbrul dang rtsangs pa dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// 'ong yang 'di thos sngag mthus ldog par 'gyur/ rgya
329a4(rgyud): rgyachu mtho na 'gras sanas gdu ldan sngal dang phrul 'dzi byed pa dang / chu sprin gnod sbyin nya dang ku bi ra// 'ongs na'ang gsang sngags thos na 'jigs par 'gyur// dmag dpung chen po'i dgra dang 'thab pa dang // nor
329a5(rgyud): 'phrog chom rkun rnams dang phrad na yang // dad pas rtse gcig sems dang byams pa yis// gsang sngags bzlas na sdig byed mi nus ldog/ rgyal po'i khrims can go rar bcug pa dang // btson rang
329a6(rgyud): lcags dang shing sgrog bcug na yang // dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na// rgyal po bdag nyid de la dga' bar 'gyur// gal te dug can nags sam khyim gang na// dug can zas yod der ni son
329a7(rgyud): gyur la// dang dang ldan pas gsang sngags mchog brjod na// dug rnams thams cad gyur nas bdud rtsir 'gyur// gal te bud med bus thogs mi phyin cing // g.yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang //
329b1(rgyud): dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na// 'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsal bar 'gyur// 'byung po sdang dang gnod sems klu rnams kyis// gsad pa'i ched du gnod pa byas na yang // ngang pas
329b2(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na// tshe yang 'phel zhing nang rnams 'byang bar 'gyur// gal te 'byung pos skrangs nad byas pa dang // bas bldags nad dang shu ba rnag khrag can// dad pas rtag tu
329b3(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di bzlas no// gsang sngags mthu yis thams cad med par 'gyur// sems can rab tu sdang bas gsad pa'i phyir// g.yo dang sgyu yi las rnams byed na yang // dad pa drag pos gsang
329b4(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod na// de drung sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gro mi 'gyur// dam pa'i chos nyams sems can rnyog pa can// 'dod chags bcings shi log pas rmongs rnams dang // nyin mtshan mi drang ma ni rtog ldan
329b5(rgyud): zhing // khyod dang lhan cig mi dga' bud med rnams// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pas 'byin nus te// 'dod chags me zhi sems ni drang por 'gyur// gal te snying po 'di yi mthu brjod na// bskal pa gcig
329b6(rgyud): gi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur// tshon skud sna lnga pa la snying po 'di lan lnga bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud po nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la mgul du gdags so// snying po 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
329b7(rgyud): d+hA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o// gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la/ yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la/ myur du yongs
330a1(rgyud): rdzogs par byu ba'i phyir gsungs 'o// gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sems bskrad pa de dag kyang dang dru du sems skyed par byed do/ gang na thos kyi 'grus bu rdzo pa
330a2(rgyud): kyang myur du theb par byed do// gang gsum gyi sdostong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed po ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems skyeng par byed do// gang theg pa chen pos
330a3(rgyud): ches yi dbang po rnams dang pa mad pa sa kyang rkyo par byed do// nga po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thang da'is ngon gyi n+ya grang bis par 'gyur ro// zhes te dgos pa'i g.yod na'ang me 'i snying rje dang thab la
330a4(rgyud): bakhas pas thams cad 'grub bo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sun dmun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang // gal te snying po 'di thos na sdus
330a5(rgyud): bsngal rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sa dang po ma thob pa de dag kyang sa bcu nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro// skyes bu chen po'i mtshar
330a6(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / depe byang bzang po brgya cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// na thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan cig thos na/ drang po'i sems kyi bas
330a7(rgyud): pas mos shing zhes par 'gyur ro// ge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhing ji ltar 'dod pa bayin du 'tho ro// gal te de gar bong na song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byi nang na yod pa'i ridang / rdo dang /
330b1(rgyud): rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang / ri khor yug rnams kyang g.yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'ang rol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro// gal te de dang de'i gam yon sems can gang dag
330b2(rgyud): 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang ldan par byas la/ snying po 'di bzlas
330b3(rgyud): brjod byas na yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro// stong gsum gyi stong chen
330b4(rgyud): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha'i drang srong dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//
330b5(rgyud): mi 'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bang chu 'am rgya mtshor khrus byas na/ de na srog chags gang dga'akhod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur//
330b6(rgyud): tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ mngal nas skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dang / sgo nga las skye ba'i skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na/ gang 'di 'dzin
330b7(rgyud): pa dang / rjod pa dang / klog pa lta ci smos/ 'don cing rjod pa lta'ang ci smos rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung ngos sems can gang lo la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad

331a2(rgyud): nas
331a3(rgyud): sa sa na
331a4(rgyud): klu lus sa du nga sa
