387a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams gya nom pa bye ba phrag brgya stong snyed mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcu dang bzhi stong rnal 'byor pa de'i grogs
387a3(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur lags so// gang dag dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi sgor lan gsum ma zhugs pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgo 'di mthong du'ang mi rung la che ga 'di'ang bgyir mi rung lags so//
387a4(rgyud): rtags mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chos dang / ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa gsal ba zhig lags na ni ci dang ci smon pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so//
387a5(rgyud): gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ oM sarba tsak+Shu ka rA ya d+hA ra Ni in+d+ri ya swAn+ta ka de la lnga pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i lag stong kun spyad pa'i phyag rgya ni 'od lags te / langs/
387a6(rgyud): nas sug pa rkang pa bshibs te/ sngar sug pa la g.yas pa'i lag mthil bkang nas sor mo lnga so sor phan tshun du bsnyen te/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i lag mthil g.yas pa'i
387a7(rgyud): steng du mnan nas snying khar 'jog pa gang lags pa 'di ni lags stong kun sdud pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ste 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud ji snyed mchis
387b1(rgyud): pa thams cad sdud cing 'dul bar bgyid lags so// gzungs sngags ni 'di sa sne / tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba duSh+Ta o hA ya ni swA hA/ de la drug pa byang chub sems dpa'
387b2(rgyud): mig stong pas ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng ste rting pa gnyis sprang nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bsgrengs te gung mo bkug nas mdun du phul la/
387b3(rgyud): de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ gung mo bkug ste nang logs su phul ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'dis ting nge
387b4(rgyud): 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bkod pa dang / chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang rtogs par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon du bgyid par 'gyur lags so//
387b5(rgyud): rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o// de la bdun pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas lha klu sde brgyad dang 'dre srin rnams dgug cing sdud pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas rkang pa gnyis
387b6(rgyud): gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo la reg par bgyis nas/ de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis te/ mthe'u chung dang gung mo gnyis drang
387b7(rgyud): por bsgrengs nas rtse mo phan tshun phrag par bgyis la/ lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis sbyar nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM sar+b+ba de ba nA ga a na ri swA hA/ de la
388a1(rgyud): brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pas tshangs pa chen po dang / ban+d+ha byin lha'i dbang po g.yar drang nas chos 'dri ba'i phyag r+b+ha ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma'i steng du
388a2(rgyud): lag ngar gyi tshigs gnyis phye nas sug pa lag pa'i zur spang de/ lag mthil bkan la mdzub mon pang tshun rgyu bar bgyi'o// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM ma hA pra hwA ya e hi oM ha~M sAhA phyag rgya
388a3(rgyud): dang rig sngags 'dis ni gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mo tshad ma mchis shing grangs ma mchis pa thams cad yang dag par sdud cing 'du bar bgyi'o// gal te nyi zla la bza' zhugs par gyur na/ chab
388a4(rgyud): mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis gdab par bgyi'o// yang na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags bzla bar bgyi'o// chab mar phyag rgyas btab ste 'tshal na dang po rno bar 'gyur bas gdugs gcig la
388a5(rgyud): sho lo ka khri lobs par 'gyur lags so// phyag rgya'i chos kyi sgom 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal
388a6(rgyud): pa lags so// de la dgu pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ bgreng nas snying khor thal mo sbyar te/ mthe bong gnyis ka lag
388a7(rgyud): mthil du bkug nas sor mo gzhan bzhi ni drang por bsgrengs te snying khar thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags snga ma 'don par bgyid na// gdon mi 'tshal bar lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag tu 'jug par
388b1(rgyud): 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu rgyu zhing rin po che brgyad stong bsams pa bzhin thob nas sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig chos
388b2(rgyud): kyi sgo 'di mngon par sgrub pa gang lags pa des nang par sngar langs nas khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/ phyag rgya 'di bgyis na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong nas/
388b3(rgyud): bskal pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyi 'khor ba'i las ngan pa'i kha na ma tho ba lci ba rnams yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur bas// de'i slad du yon tan 'di lta bu'i bsngags pa brjod pa legs so// de la bcu pa byang chub
388b4(rgyud): sems dpa' mig stong pa'i smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyis sen mo
388b5(rgyud): mnan nas mdzub mo'i sran mo ni rgyab sprad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags ni snga ma bzhin bzla bar bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis na smon pa rnams mngon par 'grub cing gdon mi za bar byang chub kyi lam las ldog par
388b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur lags so// de la bcu gcig pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du bgyis pa las mdzub
388b7(rgyud): mo lnga drang por bsgrengs te thal mo dbye bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bdag sngon rgyu'i sa la gnas pa'i tshe gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la stsal bas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag
389a1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/ rig sngags ni snga ma nyid bzla bar bgyi'o// de la bcu gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas sangs
389a2(rgyud): rgyas spyan 'dren pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du snying khar thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM sar+b+ba bud+d+ha
389a3(rgyud): sa ma yo/ e hi e hi/ brah+ma shud d+ha satwa swAhA/ de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i cho ga ni 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul chen po/
389a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya'i chos 'dis ni dus tha ma'i dus kyi tshe rig sngags 'dzin pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig sngags kyi gzungs sngags kyi
389a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad myur du gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/ rig sngags 'dzin pa'i gang zag gang lags pa des rtag par ngag bsdams te bre mo gtam
389a6(rgyud): rnams smra bar mi bgyi'o// gzungs las 'byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma ya mtshan can rdza pa sna tshogs gang lags pa de dag ma brtags par bab col du brgyad par mi bgyi'o// yongs su dang
389a7(rgyud): nga'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag nas skad cig tsam du'ang rnam par g.yeng bar mi bgyi'o// gal te khe la gdubs spang rol tu gzhan dag la tha dad pa'i mtshan ma ston par bgyid na/ sdig pa'i las sbyong bar 'tshal/
389b1(rgyud): yang de dag 'grub par mi 'gyur lags so// gal te yang dag pa'i yongs su dang ba dang / chos kyi bsam pa gang lags pa des sgom par mi bgyid na/ bgyis pa rnams chab 'tshal zhing don ma mchis
389b2(rgyud): par sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba tsam du bas kyi/ nams kyang sgrub pa dag mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur bas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis tshul khrims yongs su dag par bsrungs nas dku ba rnam pa
389b3(rgyud): lnga dang sha chang 'tshal bar mi bgyi'o// gal te dbyen tshig dang / g.yo sgyu'i tshig dang / phrag dog gi tshig smra bar gyur tam/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga rku ba'i nongs pa 'di dag byung
389b4(rgyud): bar gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis spong bar mdzad pas/ 'di skad du ngas khyod spangs pa ma yin yang gzigs shing yongs su bsdu ba'i 'os ma yin no// zhes
389b5(rgyud): gsung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zag de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bshig pa dang // dkon mchog gsum dang / yang dag pa'i chos dang /
389b6(rgyud): dge ba'i mtshan nyid thams cad la skur cing 'jig par bgyid pa lags pas/ de lta bu'i gang zag de dag ni rtag par lha'i bu'i bdud dang / 'dre gdon thams cad dang / mu stegs can rnams
389b7(rgyud): dang / bi na ya ka rnams dang / khams gcig tu bsdu ba dang / las gcig la gnas pa dang / gtan du skyabs ma mchis par gyur pa lags pas/ 'phags pa rnams kyi yongs su skyob par mi
390a1(rgyud): mdzad cing / rtag par sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'a'agrub dag lha dang drang srong thams cad kyis smod par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so// lam sun/
390a2(rgyud): 'byin cing chos 'jig par bgyid pa'i gang zag de lta bu de dag gdugs mtshan du rtag par gzungs 'di rjes su dran par bgyid kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang zag de dag rnams kyang 'grub par
390a3(rgyud): mi 'gyur bar mthong lags te/ de ltar mi 'grub pa de'ang bdag gis nongs pa ma lags kyi/ de dag rang nyid kyi nongs skyon lags pas don de'i slang du gzungs 'dri'i chog dang / glegs pam de dag
390a4(rgyud): gis mthong zhing thos par mi bgyi/ 'don cing 'dzin du stsal bar yang mi bgyi ste/ gang dag tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa srung ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can
390a5(rgyud): la snying brtse zhing byang chub yongs su gnyer bar bgyid bdag gis yi ger bris nas klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par gyur na/ yum gyi gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par
390a6(rgyud): 'gyur bas so// chos kyi cho ga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po lags pa'i slad du rig sngags 'dzin pas yang dag pa'i sems dang /
390a7(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi sems kyis lus kyi yan lag dang / ting lag dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / rtsa rgyas dang / nang dang / mgo dang / mig la sogs pa'ang yongs su sung nas gzhan dgal stsal te
390b1(rgyud): chos 'di yongs su gnyer nas rtag par nan tan brtson 'grus kyis mngon par bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rin po che dang / 'bru dang / dar zab dang / gos dang / mal cha dang / sman dang / nor rdzas rnam pa sna/
390b2(rgyud): tshogs rnam par grol ba'i yum gyi gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag brgya'i gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi ched du gtong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ slob dpon gyis bstan pa ji lta bu bzhin du sems
390b3(rgyud): rtse gcig tu bsgrub par bgyi'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par grol ba'i gzungs kyi chos 'di ni slad ma'i dus tha ma'i tshe sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyis nas/ yang dag pa'i
390b4(rgyud): spyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang / lta bas bgrod pa'i phyogs dang / rnam par grol ba'i lam mngon par 'grub par bgyid cing
390b5(rgyud): de de gdus 'di nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du nams kyang ldog par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas so// dkyil 'khor de'ang gtsug lag khang gi nang ngam/
390b6(rgyud): 'am chab mig 'bab pa 'am/ nags tshal gyi drung du'ang rung ste/ nye 'khor kun tu khru gang yan chad na shing gi rtsa ba dang / dog sa ngan pa dang / gyo mo dang / gor ma dang / rus pa la sogs/
390b7(rgyud): paci mchis pa brkos te gsal nas/ dog sa bzang po las rmang khru gang tsam du blangs te brdungs nas mnyam por bgyis la ba lang gi lci ba dang spos cha ba dog sa ser po dang bsres nas 'jim pa
391a1(rgyud): rgyas pa legs par chug na la gas sa nas tha 'ang gA'o// de rgyas thog keng nags cas btsas/ dngus pang rjod rngug
391a2(rgyud): du sa na byung ga tsug/ ngas gyi'i bad+mal bye dmas su rgya sa sa
391a3(rgyud): bang ma'i sa 'dod par bar ba bar bya'o// di rjes pa nga gi zla nga 'i mang ba ring snyeng du ya ni rlo
391a4(rgyud): dran pa'i seng du 'ang 'a bar 'ardzi ba bya'o// ldazhan yang 'dabras sus cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i ba du'i gling du drung chub sems dbyu ni ras ga shes byang drub gzugs ca dang
391a5(rgyud): las bkyis pa gcig gnag par bya'o// de nas jing gcis pa ni ke du khri ba bar bgyis nas/ snar na 'ir bad+ma 'i b+ha gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang sa da ji tshe'i snying du ma brdzun po'i
391a6(rgyud): dam pasasas kyis pa gams par mchisas byung ga ma sa kyi na byung gaben pa'i mamig// gang rlo parnams kyi shA sa mi da
391a7(rgyud): ni tshangs pa chen po tho'o// rlung byung mtshams kyi snyan la ni byin thib du'o// na yang ngos ga gyi che'i maton pa rje par du rdzobar gyi'o// den ma thongasasus pani zhing /
391b1(rgyud): du thu ngo pa bgyis te/ sa gzhi sngon po la gser gyi thig bkye ba 'ba' zhig bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling bzhi pa ni zheng du khru gang bar bgyis te/ nges pa ni spyil bar chad nyi shu rtsa brgyang du byas nas
391b2(rgyud): bar char pu 'u re re'i nang du'ang pad+ma kha bye ba re re bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang go rims bzhin du pad+ma de dag re re'i steng du'ang rdo rje thob dang / rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang / dgra sna'i phyag rgya dang / grong phyag rgya
391b3(rgyud): dang / ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / dung gi phyag rgya dang / chu gri'i phyag rgya dang zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa thogs pa'i phyag rgya dang gdugs kyi phyag rgya dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang
391b4(rgyud): gshin rje'i dbyig pa'i phyag rgya dang / bi na ya ka'i phyag rgya dang / mtshon cha'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / sug pa lag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya rnams so sor bris nas/ phyag rgya
391b5(rgyud): de dag kun la'ang 'ong 'bar ba dag bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang lho phyogs kyi chab skor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni 'thab bral gyi lnga bri'o/ nub phyogs kyi chabaskor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni chu lnga bri'o//
391b6(rgyud): byang phyogs kyi cha bskor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni ku be ra bri'o// shar phyogs kyi cha bskor bar chad bgyis pa'i nang du ni lha gzhon nu bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gru bzhi'i gnas so sor ni rgyal po chen po
391b7(rgyud): bzhi khro gnyer can g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bgyi'o// de nas gling lnga pa ni khru gang bar bgyis te ngos bzhi kun tu 'bras bu'i ljon shing me tog gi ljon shing dang / rin po/
392a1(rgyud): re'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs bri bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang grwa bzhi kun tu rin po che'i ri rab lhun po re re bri bar bgyi'o// chab sgo bzhir ni rgya mtsho chen po'i chab bri bar gyu/
392a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi slad nang gi gling rnams kyi sa gzhi ni kha dog sngon por bgyi'o// gzhan yang srad nang gi gling rnams kyi nub phyogs kyi chab sgo'i lce'i ngos kyi zur la sngags mkhan 'byung zhing 'jug pa'i
392a3(rgyud): chab sgo gcig dbye bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa gcig dbus su sbyangs te kha shar phyogs su blta bar bgyi'o//
392a4(rgyud): gzhan yang mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i mdo sde grogs bam gcig pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis mchis pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas/ gzugs bgyis pa de'i mdun du gzhan yang
392a5(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po'i dri cha bzhal bu bcu drug dang / zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang kashing thog la sogs pas bkang ba'i gzhong bu nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / spos chab bre gang dang
392a6(rgyud): bum pa dang tshon sna tshogs dang ka me tog dang / ljon shing gi yal gal sogs pas kha brgyan pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang me tog dang 'greng ba sA sna nas nyi shu nyi shu dang / mar me nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
392a7(rgyud): byug spos dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / de la sogs pa'i spos deb tshe nyi shu dang 'byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dris pa'i 'phan dang ga da tshon sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i 'phan spyir phreng ci shu
392b1(rgyud): smrabasam par gyu'o// 'di gyur brtson pa gyin pa'inasar ba dang / snod gyung dang / rnam pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyang bster dang / dngas dang 'bang bram sogs pa las bgyis/
392b2(rgyud): b.las sbyar bar bgyi'o// gal te yang dag par ma mchis na brnyan ma'ang rung legs te/ 'di ltar yo byad de dag thams cad kyang sad nang gi gling rnams ngos pazhir chos bzhin du bri zhing dgram par
392b3(rgyud): brgyaro// gdan dang me tog sna tshogs gzugs shing gtor bar bgyi'o// 'bras sA lu'i me tog dang / yungs kar dang / me tog rnams sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gtor bar bgyi'o//
392b4(rgyud): zhal zas de dag kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du gsar du bgyis pa bzang po las mchod par bgyi'o// sngags mkhan de'ang 'byung 'jug gi tshe khrus yongs su dag par bgyis nas byug spos kyis
392b5(rgyud): byag ste/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur la sogs pa bsres te gdugs gcig la dus
392b6(rgyud): gsum du byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bgyis pa la mchod par bgyi'o// nang gi gling gsum pa'i nang du mig stong pa'i gzugs
392b7(rgyud): bzhag pa'i mdun du rang byang chub sems dpa'i sgom pa gsum po dag yang dag par blang bar dam bca' bar bgyi'o// gdugs mtshan du slar rol gyi gling gi nub phyogs kyi chab sgor skyil mo krung bcas te mchis
393a1(rgyud): nas gzugs gtsigs sus gyi gzungs san song rgya brgyad par mnas mchis par gazlas brjod bgyis nas/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar dubasam pa gtugs te mchod/
393a2(rgyud): par bgyi'o// gzhan yang dus drug tu dkyil 'khor gyi nub ngos kyi zur gyi chab sgo nas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/ gling gsum pa'i nub phyogs kyi chab sgor 'greng ste/ sngar bstan pa'i phyag rgya dang
393a3(rgyud): po dang / gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas/ bcu gnyis pa sangs rgyas spyan 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar gyi phyag rgya kun dgyis nas sngags lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcu gnyis pa'i bar du/
393a4(rgyud): bgyis lags nas kyang bdag nyid byang chub chen po'i smon lam shin tu brtan pa las phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// zhes smon lam btab nas g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/ thams cad nye bar mchis par
393a5(rgyud): 'gyur bas lus drang por bsrang ste mchis nas/ nges pa'i sems kyis lha 'dre thams cad sgrib cing chod pa ma mchis par mig sngar mchis so snyam du 'dra shes nye bar gzhag te/ tha dad pa'i yul la mi dmigs
393a6(rgyud): par lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'don par bgyid na/ de'i mtshan mo gzugs bgyis pa de las 'od zer chen po byung nas byang chub sems dpa' sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid gdon mi
393a7(rgyud): 'tshal bar mngon sum du lus ston par 'gyur te/ lus bstan nas mchi ba'i tshe kun dga' ba'i lus kyi byad gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ dga' zhing 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rnal 'byor pa de la ci zhig dgos/ kang
393b1(rgyud): tho pa rnams nararas 'ji draklas sa pan cis 'dispya na than me pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i thang rgyam dang / bzungs dang / kyang nge 'dzirgyarnam songs sa pacer ba dang / gzhan yang bkyis
393b2(rgyud): rdzab rgyu dang / sngags kyi chos thams can mngon par 'drab pa dang / 'dres ton thams pa 'dral zhing gcan par 'gyur ba thas pazhes na gdam par mabya'o// bar ston pa rnams
393b3(rgyud): rtsub nas kyang bdag nyid pa rig par gyi gzhan 'gal brjod par mi bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi chog 'di ni bal ras sam/ gtsaras la rim zos te bgyis na'ang rung lags so// smon pa
393b4(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'tshal na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la a ka ru bsregs te/ lus po che'i sngags snga ma lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ bcu pa smon pa rnams yid bzhin du
393b5(rgyud): 'grub pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas smon pa thams cad bsams pa bzhin du 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so// gal te skye bo mang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur bar 'tshal narang/
393b6(rgyud): dga' ba'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags kyis til 'brul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab par bgyi'o// yang na sdigs lan re bzlas nas lan re zhugs kyi nang du dor
393b7(rgyud): ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na thams cad yid bzhin du dga' bar 'gyur lags so// gnod sbyin rnams dga' bar 'tshal na gnod sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i ljon shing gi yal ga blangs
394a1(rgyud): lan te shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btam nas kun dga' rabar por na dga' bar 'gyur lags so// si ma rungs pa 'amar gyur pa gdul bar 'tshal na shing yong lan 'bogs 'ang/
394a2(rgyud): DiT wa gcig sngags kyis btas nas/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na skyabs su mchi zhing thul bar 'gyur lags so// 'dre gdon gdul dka'
394a3(rgyud): ba zhig mchis na gu gul dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab nas sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na 'dre ga don/
394a4(rgyud): thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so// yul phyogs su rims nad dbyung bar gyur na chab kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis nas/ ba mar bzang po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste/
394a5(rgyud): sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re zhugs su dor ba lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang na chab nyung zad cig blangs te rims kyis thebs pa 'tshal du stsal na 'phral
394a6(rgyud): ru'atsho bar 'gyur lags so// sngon yul ge byin zhes bgyi bar rims nad byung nas/ gang rims kyis btab pa de dag gdugs zhag gcig gam gnyis las mi 'da' bar 'chi ba'i rus bgyid par gyur to/
394a7(rgyud): de'i tshe bram ze ra tsin te zhes bgyi ba zhig snying rje chen po skyes nas/ cho ga'i sgo 'di bshams nas yul khams gcig gi rims kyis thebs pa thams cad gsos pas thams cad zhi bar gyur te/
394b1(rgyud): rnaM rnas pa 'du 'i nasas ng+yas byung ba gyur pa'i ma duzhan man mamar dag par bkyi lags // pa sa thamams pas rgyas bams pa par / ma
394b2(rgyud): drug pa byung bar gyur nasus sus swa dpa'i slan ba rig blags pani brgyas brgyad bzlas brjod pa thos na ma dang chos kun de dag thams can rang gi ngangashes rab tu ni par 'gyur
394b3(rgyud): lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis tshobs su che ba'i tshe 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snga ma bgyis te/ gdugs
394b4(rgyud): re bzhin du mchod pa bgyis nas a ka ru bsregs te/ rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sngags lan re bzlas nas de'i ming nas lan re 'don par bgyid na las kyi sgrib pa de dag
394b5(rgyud): yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// sngon yul wA rAt+na sir khyim bdag cig gnas pa las/ bu gcig las ma mchis pa de mo bcu drug las mi thub par gyur nas/ lo bco lnga lon pa dang
394b6(rgyud): khyim bdag khyo shug mya ngan gyis rod nyams par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze zhig sgo kun tu rgyu zhing zas slong ba las/ khyim bdag de mthong nas ci'i phyir mi bde bar gyur ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag
394b7(rgyud): gis lo rgyus de dag rgyas par bshad do// de nas bram zes khyim bdag de la mya ngan ma byed par bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du byos shig dang / khyod kyi bu tshe ring bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/ de'i tshangam ze
395a1(rgyud): des cho ga'i sgo 'di nyid zhagang dran tshangs par bgyis pa dang / gshin rjes khyim bdag de la khyod kyi bu'i tshe'i tshad lo bcu drug las mi thub pas/ lo bco lnga lon te gcig las
395a2(rgyud): ma lus pa las/ deng dge ba'i rkyen dang phrad pas lo brgya thub par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'dir rang 'ongs nas bsgo ba yin no zhes smras pa dang / de'i tshe khyim bdag khyo shug rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas
395a3(rgyud): khyim gyi nor ci mchis pa bteg ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la phul bas cho ga 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan par rig par bgyi lags so// sngar
395a4(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang ka rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po ra lan gsum zhugs pa zhig lags te/ dkyil 'khor mi 'tshal te/ phyag rgya bgyis nas rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyis
395a5(rgyud): smon pa rnams mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lan myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang 'gyur lags so// bud med gang la la zhig bu btsa' ba'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur
395a6(rgyud): na chab mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste 'tshal du stsal na nang par bde bar 'gyur zhing / khye'u dang bu mo btsas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang ldan
395a7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ dge ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas sngon bsod nams bsags pa'i mthus skye bo mang po kun gyi steng du skrag par 'gyur/ rtag par mi'i nang du longs spyod khyad par 'phags pa dag la
395b1(rgyud): longs spyod par 'gyur lags so// sems can gang la la zhigs ga nad kyis thebs te sdug bsngal zhing mi bde bar gyur na/ sngags mkhan gyis byang chub sems dpa' mig sbyong lag stong dang /
395b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i phyag rgya bgyis nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mig la phya gargyas bathob par gyur na mig kyang 'tshe bar 'gyur la/ d+hu dang byin rjes byung bas de sbya'i mig thob par 'gyur bas
395b3(rgyud): lha rnams gsal bar mthong 'a / longs spyod mchogal la nges spyod par 'gyur lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig song lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs
395b4(rgyud): 'dri ba'i cho ga ni ras dkar po khru bcu drug pa'as khru nyi shu pa'ang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus ni 'dzam bu'i gser gyi kha dog can dris gyis te/ gdongs mig gsum mchis pa/ sum
395b5(rgyud): pa lag pa stong dang ldan zhing / sug pa lag pa stong po de dag re re'i mthil ru'ang mig re re bri'o// sug pa lag pa chen po yang dag pa nyid ni bco brgyad mchis te/ sngar sug pa gnyis kyis ni snying par
395b6(rgyud): thal mo sbyar bar bgyid do// sug pa gcig gis ni rdo rje'i thob thog so// yang gcig gis ni rtse gsum pa thogs so// yang gcig gis ni glegs bam thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rin po che
395b7(rgyud): phyag rgya thogs so// yang gcig gis ni 'khar gsil thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i nor bu thogs so// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i 'khor lo thogs so// yang gcig gis ni pad+ma la bye
396a1(rgyud): ba thogs so// yang gcig gis mi zhugs pa thogs so// yang gcig gis ni lcang ma'i lhag mthogs so// yang gcig gis ni 'od zem pa dog lnga 'byin par bgyid no//
396a2(rgyud): yang gcig gis ni 'grang phreng thogs so// yang gcig gis ni ril ba thogs so// yang gcig gis ni zil ngar yongs su gtong ba'i lag tu ston to// yang gcig gis ni rin po che'i char chags
396a3(rgyud): 'debs shing mi 'jigs pa'i mag tu gyon to// yang gces ni lte ba'i mad+ma kar g.yon pa g.yas pas mnan nas mthil bkan te mchis so// sug pa lag pa gzhan dgu brgya gra bcu rtsa gnyis mon
396a4(rgyud): sa thams cad ni sprus pa'i mug pa lags te/ sug pa de dag kun kyang sa so nas mtshon ma dang / phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas/ kha cig ni sug pa lag pa'i phyag rgya sa rgyar ba'i tshab la mchis
396a5(rgyud): la sonas sa mthun mas// snad pa'i sa rnams byu cu byed rnamasems dpa'adzin pa'i ngon pa na bdun kyi can thogs so// sag ma ni rba stor rnas pa chogs pas brgyan //
396a6(rgyud): sras sa ni 'phreng ba khrims shing bya'i rin ma cha gas ma nas pa dag bgos pa yin no zhes gsungs pas du'o// rkyen gyi de dag kyinang dra go ba'i sbyin bral pa ma bgyi'o// kun tu rdu chu
396a7(rgyud): 'byo'o// gang dag sum gyi sazungs kyi chog btsun par 'tshal ma sngar 'i gzugs rim po'o// gzug par so dra bar ma ngas par ngas pon du mangs
396b1(rgyud): kun tu tsan dan dkar po'i chub kyis dogs la byugs te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// gzhan yang ri mom khan 'byung 'jug gi tshe brus bgyis nas gagos gsar pa gtsang ma 'gos te nyin re bzhin sdom pa brgyad/
396b2(rgyud): yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o// chos bzhin du gzugs bris lags nas kyang / ri mo mkhan chos bzhin dus bgyis par rigs par gyur na/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa gcig yid la ji ltar mos pa bzhin
396b3(rgyud): du bgyis te/ kha dan dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dang ka zas dkar gsum dang / me tog dang ka 'phreng ba dang ka spos chab drang ka me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu khyab par bkram nas mchod
396b4(rgyud): pa rgya cher bgyis te/ rnal 'byor pa dang ri mo mkhan gang lags pa des gdugs gcig la dus gsum du gzugs bris pa'i mdun du nongs pa rnams 'brel bshags na/ zhag nyi shu rtsa
396b5(rgyud): gcig tshang ba'i mtshan mo mig stong lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs bris pa las 'od zer chen po byung nas/ nyi zla zil gyis mnan te 'od kyis phyogs bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
396b6(rgyud): khams mtha' dang tshad ma mchis pa thams cad thogs pa ma mchis par gsal bar bgyid pas/ rnal 'byor pa dang / ri mo mkhan gang lags pa de dag dang / sems can gang dag 'od kyis reg pa de dag
396b7(rgyud): thams cad shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba ci mchis pa dus gcig tu zhu byang nas yongs su dag par 'gyur lags so// cho ga 'di sgrub pa gang lags pa des sems rtse gcig tu ma bgyis pa ni ma gtog+sa/
397a1(rgyud): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzig/
397a2(rgyud): kyis kyang phyag stong dang spyan stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdun chen po rnams 'dul ba mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis kyang lag stong dang mig stong po 'di dag bstan nas bdud chen po rnams btul/
397a3(rgyud): ba lags te/ sug pa lag pa stong po de dag kyang so so nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po re rer mngon par sprul nas/ bskal pa bzang po rabs stong gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur la/ mig
397a4(rgyud): stong po de dag kyang so so nas sangs rgyas re rer mngon par sprul nas/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas spong dang mtshungs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i/
397a5(rgyud): lus bdud 'dul ba'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so//
397a6(rgyud): ngas kyang byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bskal pa mthar thug pa'i bar du khyod kyi yum gyi gzungs 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o// / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzin
397a7(rgyud): dbang phyug thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzungs bam po gsum pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan
397b1(rgyud): 'das kyis bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas rab tu dga' zhing mgu bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang mig song /
397b2(rgyud): lag stong dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ngas kyang rjes su yi rang gi khyod kyis dashon cig
397b3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis smras pa dang gnas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis reg sngags 'di smras pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
397b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes mer min gyi bar gyi lha'i gnas thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'og sin gyi lha dang dbang phyug chen po'ang mi bde bar shin tu dag
397b5(rgyud): par gyur to// 'je gdon ma rungs pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po skyong bar gyur pas/ ku co 'don cing shar nub tu byer nas 'gro ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed par gyur to// de nas sprul pa'i lus kyis
397b6(rgyud): 'khor mang po rnams dang 'dre gdon ma rungs pa rnams la khyed gal te bdag gi rig sngags kyi rjes su mi 'brang zhing 'gal par byas par gyur na mgo tshal par 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// bcom ldan
397b7(rgyud): 'das rig sngags 'dis ni ri rnams 'joms par bgyis shing rgya mtsho chen po skam par bgyid do// rig sngags 'dis ni lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams bcom nas yul rnams srung bar bgyid do// rig sngags/
398a1(rgyud): 'dis ni 'dre gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang nad thams cad dang / mi ma rungs pa thams cad tshar gcod par bgyid do// rig sngags 'dis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha/
398a2(rgyud): rnams 'joms shing dral bar bgyid lags so// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/ gang zag de'i mthu stobs brjod kyis mi lang ngo // rig sngags
398a3(rgyud): 'di 'don pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa de dag btsun zhing dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang ga nam 'tsho'i bar du rgyal pos byams shing yid du mchi ba dang / smon pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do//
398a4(rgyud): gang la la zhig phyir rgol ba'i bdud gdul ba'i 'tshal na spos gu gul bsregs te/ bdag gi lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// skye bo mang po thams cad kyis bdag la
398a5(rgyud): byams par 'tshal na lcug ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ g.yar khar bcas na byams shing bkur bar bgyi'o// bdag nyid spobs pa dang shes rab dang ldan par 'tshal na shu
398a6(rgyud): dag la lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste ka snying khar bskus na thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur te/ yum gyi gzungs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'
398a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te gsug pa lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar nas mthe bong gnyis mdun du brkyang bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya
398b1(rgyud): 'dis ni 'das kyang srung zhing gzhan yang srung bar bgyid do// phyogs gang du mchi'ang rung ste/ mtshams dgus par 'tshal bas chab gtsang ma'am thal sa gtsang ma la lan brgyan sngags kyis btab
398b2(rgyud): gang du mchis pa'i gnas der chas ngas thal ba stim pa kyang sngar rang sde lus la gtor nas de'i rjes la stsogs bzhir chos bzhin dugator na de nyid mtshams su 'grub
398b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre srin ma rungs pa dang log pa'i gdon mang po rnams kyis gtses par gyur na bal po se'u'i yal sa
398b4(rgyud): dang grib logs kyi ljang ma'i yal gablangs te/ rig sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis nas nad pa la gzhus na nad gang yang rung ste mi 'tsho ba ma mchis lags so// rig sngags ni 'di lta ste/
398b5(rgyud): na maHsarba bud+d+ha/ d+harmaHsag+hA pra/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa ya nA mo badz+ra pA na ye bo d+hi satwA ya tad+ya thA si bi si bi kA ya si bi pa la sha pa la sha ni
398b6(rgyud): swA hA/ rig sngags kyi phyag rgya 'dis ni log par lte ba'i mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar bgyid do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag par gdugs dang po 'char
398b7(rgyud): ba'i tshe dang / gdugs kyi gung dang / gdugs bas pa'i tsha lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bcu la mchod pa bgyis pa dang / bye
399a1(rgyud): zag tu gyur pa ma mchis pas nam du'ang bud med kyi dngos po len par mi 'gyur/ tshe 'das nas kyang ngan song gsum po dag dang gtan du 'bral zhing // de bzhin gshegs
399a2(rgyud): pa'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i phyag gis spyi bo la byugs te/ khyod nga'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'jigs shig ces bka' stsal par
399a3(rgyud): 'gyur / tshe 'di nyid la'ang glo bur du 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing ka 'dre gdon dag gis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis stong
399a4(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi kha nam thob yongs su sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas 'di ltar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa mdun du brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga so sor phye nas mdun dungul
399a5(rgyud): sor mo lnga char bsgreng ngo // de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug ste/ sor mo gzhan bzhi ni khu tshur du bcings nas rna ba g.yas pa'i thad kar bzhag ste/ lus pa/
399a6(rgyud): che'i sngags bzlas nas mdzub mo ni phan tshun brgyu bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya ni gdugs gcig la dus gsum du bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ dus gcig gi tshe'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na mtshams ma mchis pa
399a7(rgyud): lnga dang / shin tu lci ba bzhi'i kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur lags so// sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje bskyed par gyur na kha na ma thob thams cad kyi rtsa ba bsregs nas/ tshe 'das pa'i rjes/
399b1(rgyud): la'ang sangs rgyas rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/ gzhan yang bas pa ma mchis pa'i gter zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs dang ye shes
399b2(rgyud): mnyam pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang mtshan nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshe 'di nyid la mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce la sogs pa zo 'tshal bar mi
399b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / lus kyi nad thams cad kyang yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi las dang kha na ma tho ba rnams kyang zhu byang bar 'gyur lags so// gal te than pa byang bar gyur na til 'bru yog po'i
399b4(rgyud): 'bras bu'i mar dang sbyar te ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na dgung char 'bab par 'gyur lags so// gal te char ches na 'bras sA lu brngos
399b5(rgyud): pa'i me tog yungs 'bru'i mar dang sbyar te/ ril bu bgyis nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis btab ste chab rdzing du bor na dgung char 'chad par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa'
399b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud rnams btul ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sor mo bsnol mar btang ste/ g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan te
399b7(rgyud): khu tshur dam du bcangs te spyi bor bzhag nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis na 'khon pa'i dgra thams cad rang dul bar 'gyur lags so// cho ga 'di bgyid pa gang lags pa des ring bsrel
400a1(rgyud): #dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du chos nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo can dam dkar po'i phye ma'i dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram nas yongs su dag par
400a2(rgyud): khrus bgyis te/ gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos nas sug par pog por thogs te a ka ru bsregs la kha shar phyogs su bltas te skyil mo krung bcas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
400a3(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag stong mig stong dang ldan pa spyi bo la mchis par 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste/ lus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na 'di dngos grub thob
400a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i phan yon dang po mchog lags so// gzhan yang yungs kar til gyi 'bras bu dang gcig tu bsres te brdungs nas phye mar bgyis te/ pho gsum gyis cung zad cig blangs nas lan
400a5(rgyud): cig sngags kyis btab ste zhugs su 'dor ba dgung bdun tshang bar bgyis la/ gdugs re la'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis na/ slad kyis ci bgyi'o 'tshal mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags/
400a6(rgyud): so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'jigs pa ma mchis pa chen po'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa lag pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te sngar
400a7(rgyud): sug pa lag pa g.yas pa bkan te lag ngar g.yon pa bteg nas pus mo'i steng du bzhag par bgyis te/ sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ rtag par ring bsrel gyi mdun du
400b1(rgyud): pus po che'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na ka sbyar du sems can la mi 'jigs pa stsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang shing kun dang /
400b2(rgyud): sungs kar dang / shu dag dang / ta ta pa'i ril bu blangs te dngos po 'di dag zhugs kyi nang du bor te 'asreg par bgyi'o// 'di drag bsreg pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/
400b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ram gnas gtsang ma dag tu bsregs nas lus po che'i sngags bzlas te/ sngags lan re bzla zhing lan re bsregs pa brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bgyis nas spos dang
400b4(rgyud): me tog dag gis rig sngags la mchod pa bgyis na/ ci dang ci smon pa rnams yid bzhin du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te rig sngags gzhan gyis ma thub pa dag sngags 'das
400b5(rgyud): bta ba na thams cad thub cing 'grub par 'gyur lags so// gal te rmi ltas mthong bar 'tshal na sngags 'di bzlas nas phyag rgya bgyis te mig la btab na ci dang ci mthong bar 'tshal ba de dag thams cad rmi
400b6(rgyud): lam du mthong bar 'tshal lags so// bsod nams ma mchis pa gang dag ci bgyi'o 'tshal yid bzhin du 'grub par mi 'gyur na/ gdugs re bzhin rig sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa dgung bdun du tshang
400b7(rgyud): par gyur na ci dang ci smon pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su rgya mtsho'i chos kyi 'dun sar chos ston pa na/ klu mang po rnams sdug bsngal chen po
401a1(rgyud): rnams myong bar mthong ba dang / klu mang po rnams la snying brtse nas de dag sdug bsngal las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can mang po rnams sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'khon pa'i
401a2(rgyud): dgra ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bstan pa las/ de'i tshe klu'i bu mos chos 'di gnyer ba'i slad du nor bu rin po che mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rib gcig phul ba dang ka bdag gis ni de la yum gyi
401a3(rgyud): gzungs 'di rgya cher bstan pas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs rnams dang bral bar gyur lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu shel gyis rig sngags 'di yongs su 'dzin pa dag la phan gdags shing
401a4(rgyud): bgegs yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras so// bi ma le/ ma hA bi ma le/ u ha le/ ma hA u ha leg hu ma le ka ma hA hu ma lekas ha le/ ma hA sa hA letsau le te swA hA rigs kyi bu 'am
401a5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig phyogs gang du gnas kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i chos kyi cho ga 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na// bdag kyang rtag par
401a6(rgyud): nag gi rjes su 'brang ste yongs su srung bar bgyid pas/ bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyi bar dag gis gtse bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig brel zhing 'phongs par gyur tamag pa ros gyi dbus gtses sam/ chom
401a7(rgyud): kun dag gis gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/ tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing mdud pa ri madra ras dpung pa g.yon pa la mdud par babya'o// gzhan yang sug pa
401b1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i srin lag dang / gung mo dang / mdzub mo rnams khu tshur bcangs te/ mthe bos steng du mnan nas mthe'u chung chom rkun gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/ sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na thams cad rang /
401b2(rgyud): gyes nas gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so// sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangs ril gnas te chos ston pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po'i yul na gnas pa'i skye bo
401b3(rgyud): rnams sems can gyi sha khrag 'ba' zhig 'tshal zhing dge ba'i sems ci'ang ma mchis pa mthong ba dngade'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de thabs la mkhas pas phan gdags shing sems
401b4(rgyud): can gdul ba'i ched du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus de ma thag tu yul de dag tu mchis nas/ mig stong dang lag stong dang ldan pa'i sa bdud gdul ba'i lus mngon par bstan te/ yum gyi gzugs
401b5(rgyud): mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya bgyis pa dang / de'i tshe srin po'i yul gyi rgyal po bdag gi thad du mchis nas/ nongs pa 'thol bshags te phyag bgyis pa dang bdag gis kyang mngon par 'grub pa'i
401b6(rgyud): phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mngon par 'grub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di
401b7(rgyud): lags te/ 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gzhibs te/ snying khar thal mo sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis snol mar btang zhing / g.yon pas g.yas pa mnan nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu
402a1(rgyud): cu gcig bzlas nas/ chogarnam pas tshogs gang bgyid kyang rung skye thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
402a2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis 'gro ba drug po dgra sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su skyob pa'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob par 'tshal
402a3(rgyud): na 'khor lo'i phyag rgya spyad par bgyi ste 'di ltar sor mo bcu'i rtse mo phan tshun phrad par bgyi ste/ lag ngur gyi tshogs dang lag mthil ni dbye bar bgyi'o// sor mo rnams kyi bar yang tshon gang tsam
402a4(rgyud): mchis par bgyi ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro ba drug po dag tu gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi bgegs las yongs su bzlas pa zhes bgyi ste/ 'di ltar phyag rgya'i 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gi
402a5(rgyud): thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur pas so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar
402a6(rgyud): sug pa g.yon pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car bkan nas pus mo g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag go// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo lnga car kha sbub nas pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du
402a7(rgyud): mnan par bgyi'o// 'di ni 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dra ste/ 'das pa dang sha ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mtshungs par phyag rgya 'dis
402b1(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba lags pas/ phyag rgya 'dis ni las kyi sgrib pa thams cad sel bar bgyid do// rnal 'byor pa bsam gtan sgom pa gang dag ting nge 'dzin mngon sum/
402b2(rgyud): dum gyur na/ gzugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du dgon pa'i gnas su mchis nas gzungs 'di bzlas te phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas/ sems rtse gcig tu sangs rgyas rnams mig sngar mngon
402b3(rgyud): sum du bzhugs pa yid la bgyis te gdugs mtshan gcigal dus drug tu 'thol bshags bgyis na/ sangs rgyas rnams kyang mngon sum du 'gyur zhing bsod nams kyi phung po
402b4(rgyud): chen po tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mge stong dang ldan pas sum cu rtsa gsum
402b5(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi khu tshur bcang bar bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i mthe bong khu tshur
402b6(rgyud): bcangs pa bzhin bcangs nas lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag pa g.yas pa'i chang pa'i gong du rtse mo phyung nas/ sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o// sngags/
402b7(rgyud): ni 'di lta ste/ oM ku tsi ku tsi/ ku tsi ya ri ka tsa ri tsi rika tsa ri le swA hA/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang sngags 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang las
403a1(rgyud): zhig mchis nyal kar phyag rgya 'di bgyis te sngags 'di lan re bzlas shing / snying par phyag rgya la na re bgyi ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar gyur na/ sems la ci dang ci 'dor /
403a2(rgyud): pa rnams rmi lam du rig cing mthong bar 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ sdig pa thams cad byang nas byang chub kyi sems
403a3(rgyud): stong par mi 'gyur bas gang zag de mtshan mo mchis nyal ba'i cho ga yar lam na rgya cher 'phel zhing bkra shis par 'gyur/ g.yar lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung ngu
403a4(rgyud): bzhugs nas lung ston pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba'i bar dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang lha rnams kyang rtag tu
403a5(rgyud): nye bar mchis nas rim gro bgyid cing yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas lha dang / klu dang 'dreg don sde brgyad po
403a6(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te 'greng nas sug pa rkang pa gnyis gshibs te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug nas/ sor mo bzhi khu tshur
403a7(rgyud): bcangs te snyeng khar gzhag go// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas pa rna drung du gtad nas mdzub mo phan tshun du brgyu bar bgyi'o//
403b1(rgyud): sngags ni 'di lnga rtseg na mo nI lu kar+tha nam a d+ya sa pa tA swAr+tha/ nA ma Ar+ya sha sa swAna.e hi e hi swAt+ma/ rigs kyi bu 'amarigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs/
403b2(rgyud): dang phyag rgya 'di len tama'adzin tam/ klog gam/ 'don par bgyid na/ myur du tshe rabs bdun tshun chad kyi sngon gyi gnas kyi dngos po rjes su dran par 'gyur/ sbrul gzugs/
403b3(rgyud): pas zin par mi 'gyur ro// drug gis mi tshugs par 'gyuramatshon gyis gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur/ rgyal pos gshe bar mi 'gyur/ nams kyang sems
403b4(rgyud): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so// gang la la zhig gdugs re bzhin du rig sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na 'dre srin sde brgyad po rnams rig sngags 'don pa'i
403b5(rgyud): drung du nye bar mchis nas rig sngags 'don pa nyan par bgyid do// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'dre gdon gyis zin par gyur na skud pa dkar po la
403b6(rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste/ sngags lan re bzla zhing ma dud pa re re mdud de/ mdud pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu tshang bar bgyis nas de'i mgul du btags na de'i nad sel bar 'gyur lags so
403b7(rgyud): gal te yul gang du lus ngan pa dang rims nad byeng ste/ yul mi mang du gus par gyur na/ rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang rdzing dag tu pad+ma stong rtsa brgyad blangs te/ pad+ma re re la sngags
404a1(rgyud): lan re btab nas zhugs kyi nang du bor tebs par bsregs na// rims nad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems dpa' mig stong dang ldan pa'i/
404a2(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i gung mo mthe bo'i rtse mo dang sbyar te bkan la/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni brkyang nas pus mo
404a3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i steng du gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas sug pa lag pa pus mo g.yas pa'i steng du kha sbub tu gzhag par bgyi'o//
404a4(rgyud): gang la la zhig rtag par phyag rgya 'di bgyis nas lus po che'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal rnams kyang
404a5(rgyud): rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mi dge ba bcu dang mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i dngos sdig phun sum tshogs par bgyis pas
404a6(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa ci mchis pa de dag thams cad rdul phra rab tu bgyis la/ rdul phra rab de re re'ang bskal pa re re mngon par byung bar gyur na gang zag de dngos sdig rnam pa sna tshogs
404a7(rgyud): bgyis pa'i dbang gis bskal pa'i grangs de skad kyi bar du sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal myong zhing gtan du 'byung ba'i dus ma mchis pa zhig lags na'ang / rigs kyi bu 'am
404b1(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar zla ba dkar po'i ngo tshes bco lnga la gdugs mtshan gcig zas bkum ste phyag rgya mdud nas rig sngags stong
404b2(rgyud): brgyad tshang bar bzlas na gong du bstan pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'byang bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na/ de lta bu'i gnas ma mchis lags so// de la byang chub
404b3(rgyud): sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ langs nas 'greng ste sngar sug pa g.yon pas rkang pa
404b4(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mthe bong la btsir nas khu tshur bcangs pa bzhin du bgyi'o// de'i rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pas g.yon pa'i lag dar gyi steng du btsir nas/ lus po che'i sngags lan bdun
404b5(rgyud): 'don par bgyis na/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar mchi 'tshal na'ang dka' ba ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// sngags 'don pa'i tshe sgra 'byung bar mi bgyi'o// de la byang chub sems
404b6(rgyud): dpa' mig stong dang ldan pas rdzu 'phrul la rang dbang thob pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sngar sug pa lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mthe'u chung gi sen mo'i steng du reg par bgyi'o// de'i
404b7(rgyud): rjes la sug pa lag pa g.yas pa'ang de bzhin du bgyis nas/ sor mo gzhan gsum ni so sor yan par bsgrengs te/ lag ngar gyi tshogs sbyar nas spyi bo'i steng du bzhag ste/ lus po che
405a1(rgyud): sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bgyid na/ zang srong 'phur te mchi ba dag dang 'dra bar rang dbang du mchi bar 'gyur lags so// de la byang chub sems
405a2(rgyud): dpa' rnams sems rtse gcig tu spyan 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di lags te/ sug pa gnyis nam mkha' la thal mo sbyar te/ lag ngar gyi tshogs sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis ni phan tshun brgya bar
405a3(rgyud): bgyi'o// sngags ni 'di lta ste/ oM a ru li te li ka lo ka bi do ya/ sarba la dru/ pra mardan ka rA ya/ bu ru swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos
405a4(rgyud): chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das
405a5(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsod do// byang chub sems spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong sbyin stong dang ldan pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i thugs rje chen po'i sems
405a6(rgyud): rgya cher yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs chog dang bcas pa rdzogs so// / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las
405a7(rgyud): bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//
